Title: Hidden Faces
Synopsis:
This is my second story but please consider it as my first as I was not taking my first one seriously at all and was overall just messing around completely.Although, I am still going to use the core idea from the Original Story
 
 
 
 
 
Alec and Zephyr connected through Soul, separated through tragedy.Read to find out whether he will curse the land eternally into damnation for not deserving it in the first place or will he oppress all for a cleansed land with an army of Justice-Crazy Angels that will hypocritically do anything to get their job done....Either way all of you are royally fucked.

Title: Life of Death
Synopsis:
The life of Death the God.
 
 
I am writing this as my second story dont expect much in the way of frequent or quality updates.

Title: Indigo
Synopsis:
During Adolf Hitler’s rule in Nazi Germany, anti-Semitism was implemented in its most grotesque form. The Nazis, unrelenting in their belief, used anti-Semitism to carry out the Endlösung, or the Final Solution. Through the persecution and later extermination of European Jews, the Nazis hoped to solve the long-debated “Jewish problem” once and for all.
Throughout the 1930s and 1940s, more than 6 million Jews were murdered.
While much of Nazi Germany was devoted to the concept of anti-Semitism, there were equally as many who were revolted and appalled by these ideals.
We cannot change the past, but we can certainly repeat it. This is equal parts a work of fiction and a work of false hope. It is based in history, but also in modernity; in both past and present affairs.

Title: Royal Larva
Synopsis:
This is a story told in a dungeon-core style, but with a little twist. :)
 
A mother is forced to abandon her child.
The child will learn to survive.
It will learn to adapt.
It will learn to evolve.
And it will learn to overcome.

Title: The Virtual Apocalypse
Synopsis:
For twenty years Terra suffered endless torment, death infiltrated every nook and cranny of the once beautiful planet. Under the tyranny of a mad king, the Southern Continent declared war on all who opposed its treachery; leaving in its wake, two decades of blood shed.
Under the threat of extinction, man was compelled to make advancements in technology, several research units and groups were commissioned. Included in the most vital research programmes was one of the earliest programmes to be commissioned, the Personality and Neural Enchancement Programme (PNE). The programme promised heightened sensory and intellectual abilities, it was a race against time to vindicate mankind.
Pain, an orphaned baby on the brink of death, obtained salvation in the PNE programme. However, before the programme was shut down, the lead researcher, Dr. Dante Bell mysteriously disappeared along with Pain. 
17 years later, Pain and Dr. Bell make their majestic appearance, albeit under new identities, leading to a chain of events that will forever change the course of mankind's destiny!

Title: Transcending All Worlds
Synopsis: Dropped.

Title: Journeys in the Fairworld:  The Brigand of Potham (Complete)
Synopsis:
Harlow Barnstabrake is the most popular young man in the village.  There is nothing he can’t do, and he usually does it better than anybody else.  But when a terrible crime is committed, Harlow must face real danger for the first time.  To unravel the mystery, Harlow must also team up with Fanny Howard, the most boring girl in the village.  Will Harlow and Fanny bring the culprit to earth without getting themselves killed? 
Journeys in the Fairworld is a fantasy anthology series set in The Fairworld, a magical realm existing in parallel with our own world which is governed by a group elfin beings known only as “The Good Folk”.  These mysterious entities work in secret to keep the peace between the myriad of peoples and nations which dwell in The Fairworld. Complex relationships and bitter rivalries emerge against a backdrop of constrained resources and conflicting values to produce a world of high adventure and tangled mysteries.
This novel is a completed work (although there still may be a few outstanding errors here and there), and is about 52,000 words long.  If you want to read more stories from Journeys in the Fairworld, please checkout “Journeys in the Fairworld:  The Gatekeeper”, which is also available here on Royal Road Legends.
https://www.royalroadl.com/fiction/19338/journeys-in-the-fairworld-the-gatekeeper

Title: Volume 12: The Two Monsters
Synopsis:
This is a fanfiction of "Overlord" and follows the events of the original Volume 11. Jaldabaoth attacks the Holy Kingdom, who in turn have no choice but to ask the Sorcerer Kingdom for help. Ainz accepts and has a showdown with Jaldabaoth. Who will win? You might be surprised :) More sasuga, more keikaku, Demiurge approves.
I originally wrote it at the end of 2016, now I've edited and completed this volume.

Title: Moving into an SSS Ranked Dungeon?!
Synopsis:
Andrew Lee, a young, promising professional hitman and the son of one of the most infamous arms dealers falls into a new world.  Durandal, a world where Elder Dragons and God reign supreme.Where magic exists and the most advanced weapons were nothing more than swords, bows and magical sticks. A world that changes your very perception of reality, turning it into nothing but a mere game. A world where fabled dungeons hold the greatest treasures and the most treacherous of traps.
What's a gun obsessed hitman to do in the fantasy world of Durandal?
Make the best of it, of course!
 
Chapter release every tuesday, and a break on occasion to get a headstart on future chapters and what not

Title: How Far We've Come
Synopsis: A bunch of short sci-fi stories written as interviews for a documentery about the advancment of humanity into the commercial age of space travel. Wrote the first one on a plane one day, thought I would post it.

Title: Azeal Neralum
Synopsis:
***WILL BE CONTINUED BY TheJuggernaut***WILL BE REMOVED FROM HERE TO THERE***
What are we but a collection of memories? Each, defining who we are and what we think.
But, what if we lost that mental capability, it being shattered almost beyond repair? Would we be the same people although we haven't 'experienced' anything? What would happen when an ordinary man dies, his memories of everything he cared about and loved taken away from him. Where only great pain and suffering could help him remember?
This is the story of a man who is named Azeal. Losing everything he was, he reverts to being a child. Yet, the world he lives in is not kind. It a dark world filled with death and destruction. Follow Azeal as he walks a path of mental and emotional instability as he finds who he was and accomplishes his greatest goal; to protect his family from evil and darkness.
 
Amazing cover was done by Wizard-Hunter on Wattpad! Simply Amazing!

Title: Blackness of space
Synopsis: Its a space, politics, alien thing, so yeah...

Title: Tower of Eden
Synopsis:
A tower that reaches into the heavens.
All you desire can be achieved.
Wealth? Power? Fame? Or perhaps, something else?
However, nothing comes easy.
What are you willing to sacrifice for it though?

Title: The Unlucky Third
Synopsis:
James is an unlucky third. More of a mistake then a plan. For 12 years, since the day he was born, he has done nothing but remain hidden from anyone and everyone. Only 4 people know that James even exists and those people are his parents and elder brothers. The law of the state has declared James as a taboo, something forbidden and not allowed. When his sanctuary is destroyed, he turns to other things to keep himself occupied when one day he catches a glimpse of something that may not change his life but at least understand him and keep him company.
For ever he had thought he was the only one. Maybe he isn’t?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
English is not my first language so please try to go easy on the grammar and the punctuation.
3-4 chapters will be uploaded per week.
This will be a somewhat short story. I intent to write story that I can at least complete.
I hope you may enjoy my work.

Title: Fiction ideas
Synopsis: This is just a series of short intros to some of the things that I wrote in my spare time. None are properly edited and none are finished.

Title: Spiel der Verliese/Game of dungeons (Ger)
Synopsis: Ja da ist sie wieder, die beliebte Wiedergeburtsstory.Begleite den Protagonisten durch sein neues Leben.Wird er die schweren Prüfungen, welche Ihm auferlegt wurden meistern?Kann er wachsen, so wie es seine neue Natur vorsieht?Wird er sein Schicksal erfüllen oder seinem verlangen erliegen?P.s.Mir ist bewusst das meine Rechtschreibung unter aller Sau ist.Die Grammatik ist so hoffe ich nicht ganz so schlimm.Wie dem auch sei, ich bin für jeden Tipp dankbar.

Title: Tearha: Titan War
Synopsis:
A war had raged on for centuries in an isolated part of the world. Under a smog of burning rust, the continent of Katoki tore itself apart with Titan battles between mechs and golems.
With Adelaide Wiltkins and Joashden Stalewaver at her side, Lucinda Baerrinska returns to the Titan War she escaped from in hopes of finding a doctor to save her comatose sister, only to arrive to a new threat.
Elsewhere, deserter Shou Kenta performs an experiment that could change the outlook of the war and put an end to the conflict but finds himself back in the crosshair of the army he had escaped from.
As the players move onto the board, the wheels of the eternal conflict begin to tremble.

Title: Days of Survival
Synopsis: Four young teenagers and their school mates try to survive alone in their enclosed school as a zombie apocalypse wipes out man. Then they venture out of their safezone prepared to what may come to find out what has happened to their world. See how they brave this new world.

Title: The Troll's Bridge Tavern
Synopsis:
This Synopsis Involves Limited Spoilers and Mockery of Spoilers
The Troll's Bridge Tavern is a satirical black comedy fantasy novel written to spite the fantasy genre while celebrating its absurdity.  Its author is an unreliable drunk ski bum who begs attention so that he can finally make his abusive mother proud.  Happy reading!
Fantasy novels suck.  In this one, a hobbit named Hildago tries to write his literary masterpiece; his quest for adventure depends upon finding that perfect group of questing adventurers which will find him riches, success, fame, and ultimately material for his great epic to solidify him in the annals of Hobbit literature. 
This first-draft novel-in-the-making is a constantly updated, expanding saga of satire on the fantasy, gaming, D&D, Tolkein, Rawling, and Dragonlance worlds of banal fantasy fiction with a literary twist written by an untrustworthy, jaded college drop out author who constantly interferes with the plot (is he/she another character?)
Can you trust Hildago? Probably not, because he will probably die (or will he?)  Should you root for the drunken Archmage Silas, the man responsible for the Cataclysm?  Or his tinkering gnomish butler, Rufus, the man who can make you a perfect martini; but resents his engineering background, and wishes Fate had not cursed him with science rather than magic?  How about Severn, the dashing steampunk airship pilot who may or may not appear in this story?  If you need your stories to have a Sapphic twist, Sigrid the Amazon might tickle your interest.

Title: Gods and Men: A litRPG Adventure
Synopsis:
Hi, my name's Bart but you can call me whatever you want. Anyway, I don't want you to click away from this. Yeah, that's right, follow the sound of my voice and continue reading. Bet you want to know how I got stuck inside of the internet don't you. Well, it is a long and tragic tale that starts very simply. With the release of a game.
Not just any game mind you, it was the release of the first ever full dive VRMMORPG, cliche sounding I know but bear with me as I thought the same thing. Any explanation on how it was released is beside the point just know that it was and I, just as any self-respecting gamer would be was extremely fucking hyped for it.
The game was called 'Legend Has It' and the allure was that you would get to play as a god or spirit and interact with a vibrant world of NPC's. So I began to play, eager to experience this for myself, little did I know my life would change forever. 
So sit back, relax and let me regale you on how I got myself stuck in this predicament, for it starts with a boy, a game and a battle between gods.
Ominous I know, let's get started.

Title: Not Hurt by the Frost
Synopsis: Weekly updated new fantasy novel from SmaugBeiber. Underpowered rpglit.

Title: Illusions
Synopsis:
Ten years ago, a mysterious man with impossible strength and the ability to fly saved people from a burning building. Calling himself Crimson Titan, he revealed that superheroes were not just characters in books and movies but real people with fantastical abilities, dubbed supers by the media and soon revered as gods. Every day in Crescent Bay was like living out a comic book, with the
occasional villain, sometimes with a goofy name, threatening to destroy the affluent city or taking the mayor hostage.

Rory Reyes is not a super, just a teenage girl with a quick wit and intelligence that rivals the geniuses of today. When she is not inventing some gadget, she is cheering on her brother at a gig
or forced to attend superhero fan club meetings with her best friend. She never understood the superhero craze but one night, she finds herself thrust into a mystery that threatens the city. 

Forced to work with Crimson Titan and his sidekicks, including a beautiful new hero struggling with her powers, to clear her name, she learns that everything is not as it seems, the line between good and evil a bit blurred.

Title: Dragon king's throne
Synopsis:
Someone stands on the battlefield. The armor covered with his blood and that of his enemies.
" I have done enough, time for me to sleep. This is where I will slumber."
With a smile full of sorrow, his eyes become empty. His body starts to fracture as he drops to his knees, his body and armor lose colour. The blood dries and with a gentle breeze, turns into a stream of ash.
A ball of light leaves his body and races towards the stellar night.

Title: The True Dungeon King
Synopsis:
A young man, hosptialized for most of his life, now faces a new world and all new dangers he never thought was possible. With a new body and new powers he walks forward instead of dwelling on what ifs, following a path he never knew. The Path of the king, not any king but a King of monsters, a king... of Dungeons.
--------------
Author Note: This is my first real story I am writing so apologize if there is anything thats hard to understand. This does follow the usual dungeon master trope along with transported to another world, though possible with more things in the future. I do hope I make this story unique enough for others to enjoy, welcome any helpful critisim to improve my writing. Names in the story are subject to change at any time.

Title: Challenged Dungeon and the Arrival of Mana
Synopsis:
One day, a few spirits drifting through the astral plane discover Earth and decide to create dungeons to bridge the gap between worlds, and eventually make themselves the gods of Earth.
After being created, Three has the misfortune of falling through a grate in an alley in New York City and making that its entrance.  Suddenly propelled to sizes much larger than an infant dungeon should be it becomes the frontrunner of all its sibling dungeons, yet faces problems initially attracting creatures.  Three's problems only worsen over time as its demanding and seemingly capricious creator gradually strips away its ability to be a true dungeon while compelling it to reach a nearly impossible goal: conquer all humans.
Also follow Stan, the alcholic veteran cop and his pet cat Ms. Winters as they get embroiled into the arrival of dungeons and mana.
I have most of the story mapped out, but it can still use some work, my goal is to release at least a chapter a week until I am finished.  I would greatly appreciate any help proofreading or editing, and advice is always appreciated.

UPDATE
School caught up with me back then and I lost the thread, so this is now (definitely) dropped, sorry all, maybe I'll get back to it one day.

Title: Master of Rhyme
Synopsis: Drake was a normal guy. Well, except for the fact that he only speaks rhyme when talking to others. This can lead to situations where thinking about what to say is harder then saying what he wants!

Title: Empathic capacity of a teaspoon
Synopsis: Reincarnating with the gamer interface was all a part of the plan, being reborn as Ron Weasley not so much. It was something I could work with, sure. Magic is great! But as I would soon learn, it had the tendency of introducing a plethora of other issues.

Title: The Girl From The Sea
Synopsis:
Since the disappearance of his beloved twin sister Julie, Tobys life has been a disaster. Plagued by insomnia and nightmares, his fear of the monsters from the sea surronding the island he lives on haunt him more often than usual. But one day after a vicious storm wrecks havoc on the island, strange things begin to occur. Bodies start washing up on the shore and strange people begin to charm the locals along with sightings of a phantom white stallion begin to stir suspicion on the island. But the most unusual of all is probably the appearance of a strange young woman with grey hair and dark eyes at the doorstep of Tobys family bed and breakfast. 
Nobody knows where she came from or who she is. But will Toby ever find out and could all the strange occurances be linked to his sisters disappearance?

Title: The Patch
Synopsis:
Another game for the Full Drive Rift. Another world. Another life. Another place to kill for.
A typical open world MMORPG where people can join in online communities in real time and have fun traveling an exotic fantasy world. Hunt and slay monsters with friends or build your own house with any intent for it.
But with freedom comes with chaos. Consequence and connection. The world has started developing it own consciousness and now it's the world's turn to play.
Nen, a dual wielder lives as a blackguard within this world, struggling to proceed through the game and earn himself any wages. But before he decides this is enough, the world decided to keep everyone here, with consequences.

Title: The Villainess's Dark Side (Completed)
Synopsis:
When she finally understood, she was already too late. The protagonists had already fallen in love with each other and planned for a marriage. Maybe she was still lucky though, for she narrowly avoided a situation of certain death. A long, painful and agonizing death. However, she couldn’t let this be. There was inside her a growing anger that had yet to disappear. She had yet to vent. It was a need. One that may lead her to death’s door too, but if she died by this person’s hands, certainly, it would be in a quicker way.
She just never thought that his revenge would come in the form he chose to give it. He was quite a… bewildering man.
 
 
N/A: Smutty story with little plot. It contains reverse-rape, and maybe even rape? I hope this won’t trigger anyone! Well, you’ve been warned!

Title: Gamblers Gambit
Synopsis: A young man that lost something precious became a gambler to fill the void. After reaching an astounding height in the gambling world he goes missing after playing in one of the most exclusive tournaments the world has to offer.

Title: Until Death
Synopsis:
There is just one step between hatred and love they say. Reason and folly should have about the same difference between them. Just a tiny step, so easy to take.
 
N/A: A short, strange oneshot in one of my moments of procrastination when in the middle of procrastinating... you know that spiral of wanting to take your mind off something when the said thing was already helping take your mind off another... you don't? Well, doesn't matter...

Title: heroes,monster and mistakes
Synopsis:
luke was a normal student in highschool, a few friends a loving familly.
And, of course, the summoning to another world... wait what?
 
 
 
But, something is wrong with this one, what is this talk about a new race?

Title: RE: Wisp of the Elves
Synopsis:
I saw no shining light at the end of the tunnel.
Instead, I became one.
And although I am for now just a glowing orb of turquoise light, I get much respect from my elves. Or, should I say, my dungeon minions?

Title: How do I delete this?
Synopsis: Made it by mistake, how do I delete it?

Title: Advent of the White Mage
Synopsis:
Peter has a class: citizen; talent: optimism and certainly no magical skills.
Yet it is not like that for Martin, a man Peter reincarnates into. 
At a first look, he is even worse off - no money, no results as an apprentice mage, and his family is calling him back home. Yet, turns out, just a different mindset is all that's needed to make Martin's life a legend.
And to be honest, maybe a certain game system also plays a role.

Title: Ascendance of the Big Sister Monster Tamer
Synopsis:
Elise grew up while surrounded by supreme existences. In order to become one of them, she goes on a journey in search of power. She will follow the path of a monster tamer, making contracts with certain beings and raising them into powerful existences.
This time, she will be the Big Sister.
New Chapters every second Thursday.

Title: Eternity
Synopsis:
eternity

??t??n?ti,i??t??n?ti/Submit
noun
infinite or unending time.
"their love was sealed for eternity"

synonyms: ever, all time, perpetuity

 
-
 
Dario was turned when he was twenty three, rendering him ageless. He had always been a ladies man, always having every girl in the room swoon over his good looks. 
 
There was only one mortal, however, that had ever caught his attention. She had the heart of a lion, and the soul of a fighter. She was stubborn, hard-headded, and had a way of always getting what she wanted.
 
The burning flame of passion she ignited within each and every thing she did, and everyone she met, intrigued him. With time, as he got to know her, he realised he was falling for her. In a way, she knew it too. The feeling was mutual.
 
One night, something terrible happened. Dario was left without his love, doomed to live an immortal life of solitude. 
 
He prayed to every God and Goddess he knew, hoping, wishing that someone would hear him.
 
Someone heard. Someone listened.
 
Seven hundred years later, the universe has given Dario a second chance. Leila has been reincarnated, and Dario was able to find her.
 
It appears Fate has given Dario a second chance at Eternity... Will he use it wisely this time?

Title: Conscripted
Synopsis:
Just imagine a world in which the gods have to answer your prayers. You might think that such a world should be a paradise, but would all-powerful beings really be pleased about being teleported out of the shower?

This is the direct Prequel to Until Death.
———————————————————————————————
Reading Order of the Multiverse-Books
———————————————————————————————

Title: Shameless Bodyguard
Synopsis: Edit this later after I get a better way of summarizing the general story/plot.

Title: Sleeper within
Synopsis:
Struggle is a part of life but what if life is a part of a struggle.
Inspired by berserk and claymore(only inspired me to make gore dark fantasy other than that story is different).
First two chapter is character development chapter. 
 
The story is the life of nick balesto known as grey-man.   Constantly figthing with himself so that the monster within him doesn't shallow every precious thing of his.
A struggle of the past and to find his woman who he first thought was dead, be careful as it is going to be the darkest of the dark.
Also striving towards vengeance against the mystery of the church who have marked him and his family (military orphanage) sacrifice. But soon he gives up on vengeance as he realized rather than giving satisfaction it was taking his humanity. only to find out it was all connected. Aided only by titanic strength due to harsh childhood in military, his blunt magic blade and SLEEPER WITHIN.........
 
 Find who is this sleeper within.

Title: Tales of a lonely op girl and an evil op demon
Synopsis: Elsa has two of the heaven defying treasures and Lewis has one of the heaven defying treasures. Thanks to that both of them become extreamely overpowered. Lewis is a demon and he wants all the heavenly treasures. He is greedy, evil and shameless. Elsa is constantly bored and lonely. She also has a mood disorder. What will happen when they eventually cross paths? This is a world of magic. The magic of this world is simple. But there are higher realms of planets and many ways to gain power beside magic.

Title: Inertia
Synopsis:
A man is summoned to another world by a goddess after completing the nigh impossible final boss of a game. However, this world isn't your typical fantasy world. Though it has magic, it is set far into the future where technology reigns, and magic itself is just a finely-tuned science.
How will our hero survive in a galaxy that looks down upon humans? One where his race, which once reigned supreme, is treated like trash along the roadside. Will he, with his diverse crew, be able to save the galaxy while fixing the hostility between the races?
 
NOTE: The image used for the cover is not my creation. It was listed as a CC copyright for reuse with modification. If you are the creator and this was wrongfully labeled, contact me and I would be more than happy to take it down and talk.

Title: Future Unknown: The Beginning of Hell
Synopsis: As Arius grew up in the war-ravaged country of the United States, he watched the people closest to him fall victim to the sin he’s committed. In searching for the truth, he became obsessed in finding out who he was and what it means to live in a world of a Future Unknown.

Title: Ancient  Sins
Synopsis: The adventure of a child who must escape death and find the mysterious man in order to live the life the child was meant to. But on this journey to a cure, this child is met with terrible acts and rough decisions that will change the minds of the world. This kid is a sinner in the eyes of the public, but a hero to the future.

Title: Demonization
Synopsis:
The world revolves around humans controlling demons to perform superhuman tasks. Kiwi is one of those people who always dreamed to be a controller of the demons, one of the Possessed. However, upon discovering the truth behind how Possession works, Kiwi abandons his ambitions and is cast out from society. 
One day, after receiving a beating from bullies that he will never forget, Kiwi discovers that he has a unique power of his own. Armed with this new power, Kiwi is employed by a mysterious man whose secrets know no bounds. Together, the two of them embark on a journey where they discover that the line between human and demon is not as clear as one might expect...

Title: [DROPPED] City Dungeon Abyss
Synopsis:
As an adult in society, you are expected to be able to help out the community as soon as possible. Individuals would be shunned if people were to know that you are not contributing to society when everyone else is. As an abomination to society, Umehara Subaru hides away within his room playing games and mobile apps all day without a care.
One day, Subaru gets a text from an unknown sender. The content of the text shown:
"Umehara Subaru, it's time for you to contribute to society. You have exactly 5 secs to reply to this text or you will have to face the consequence of your careless choice."
Because of his choice, Subaru is forced into a different world to work as a corporate slave of his choice. From now on, all of his choices will decide his fate on how are he will be enslaved to work. Who was it that did this? What would happen to Subaru? How will his life turn out?

Title: Shadow: Sovereign of Kings
Synopsis: Shadow. It's not a human. It's a black mist-created by mysteries of the universe. Watch as Shadow gained sentience and embarked on the path of cultivation.

Title: Rise of The Demon Goddess
Synopsis:
She had bad luck all her life, and been throught hell so much that in her new world  she want to rule it 
 
 
not my cover
girl love
R-18  gonna be very messed up in the beginning and on

Title: Land of Blood: Returning of Origins
Synopsis:
In the thousand years after the "First Invasion", the Great Continent of Zebois has always been experiencing an everlasting change. The land which was originnally filled with wars and disputes between the four races, had been changed into a war between the four races alliance against the invader, the "Dregoreth" race.
Follow Evric's adventure in the Land of Blood to obtain the Absolute Power of Origin and stand against the arrogance of the world.

Title: Faceless Phantom
Synopsis:
A man had given up his real life. He was one of many NEETs who wished to change their life. A new popular virtual reality game, Heallance, was released. He intended to become a new person inside the game. Thus, he promised to himself that he would never log out. And he was reborn as a player named Zeroth. Throwing his real life away, Zeroth's new life in artificial world has begun.
 
Note: English is my third language, so my vocabulary is limited and my grammar may not be good. There's no proof reader too. Please leave any critics or advice for me. I'll try my best to improve. Well, I hope you will enjoy my story!

Title: The Naruto system
Synopsis:
Tristan thought he was dead after he was run over by the infamous Car-kun/smashed his skull, only to find himself staring at a masked man upon opening his eyes. The man produced a piece of paper and handed it over him with a single question. "Will you sign it?" 

Author’s note: Hey guys, the outline of the novel is already ready. I am working on it to make it more concrete. I promise this novel isn't based on Naruto itself. Even if you don't know who Naruto is, you'll easily be able to understand the story. So please do not leave the story if you think this is just a Naruto fanfiction repeat.
 
Please read and comment if you feel anything is amiss I would really appreciate it. Thank you! ?

Title: The Greedy Rogue
Synopsis: A certain young man named Lionel had all his life dreamed of becoming an adventurer and gaining vast riches. Yet he was stuck living in a rural village as a normal peasant with only a few coppers to his name. But when the tragedy struck he had been forced to follow-up on his dreams, he wanted to or not.

Title: Top Deck
Synopsis:
"Some people are only alive because it's illegal to kill."
Malice Ryder, a name that perfectly encapsulated his essence – malicious. He was the kind of person who could take a life without flinching, without a hint of remorse. What do you expect from a man who had killed his own parents, making them watch as he snuffed out their lives? He lived up to his name, and then some.
But then came a moment when he couldn't dispose of someone as planned. 
It was from that point forward that we truly delved into the depths of the malevolence that everyone, including himself, believed him to be.

Title: Welcome to the Gaming World
Synopsis: A young man struggles with unemployment, failed dreams and overall becoming a useless member in society and decides to kill himself. Upon seeking this method of death, he encounters a being from the alternative realm who gives him an option of starting his life over from scratch, from level 1 on his planet. This gives him the chance to finally carve out a path for himself that he could never do on earth.

Title: An Angel Among Us
Synopsis:
She found herself entangled in the deepest depths with the devil, a place where the world could never reach her.
In times of dire need, when the world she once knew turned dark and shallow, who would she call upon? A protector, an angel, or perhaps even God?
"They will only come to your aid," they said, "if you believe in their existence."
But who did she call upon when she witnessed the world slowly devoured, like a candy bar she wished could last just a little longer?
The answer was simple.
No one.
It was almost amusing, really. She didn't believe in anything—neither in God nor in the devil. They were mere notions lurking in the recesses of her mind. She had never bothered to contemplate where her soul might end up when she eventually departed from this world.
Was this the end for her?
How bitterly cruel.

Title: This is ME
Synopsis:
Life is  war, where at every turn, things come to bore me. To survive one must........EAT.
 
On the brink of insanity. Everyday I battle with myself split personality and extreme disorder......

Title: Whatever Am I?
Synopsis:
Hiro Aragon is your classic neet in a semi-futuristic America. After he dies, he meets a twelve-year old looking girl that chose him for reincarnation in a beta fantasy world known as glabys (gla-bese.) after a series of choices, he ends in the new world with some changes to himself. follow his story as he has multiple identities to help him have an interesting life. 
This is a story about an OP mc, read at your own risk!
Largely inspired by A Monster Who Levels Up, but not a fanfic.
may be gruesome in some areas (a hole in someone so that you can see through them, and some other gross stuff)
I am only Writing on this site so if you see this on any other site please let me know
this is my first story so expect it to yeah... but I still hope you enjoy!

Title: A Fox's System
Synopsis: A small blunder leads to Riku being cruelly killed by a fox goddess, who leaves him with an easy choice: Being reborn with in a new world or to become the plaything of some old dudes in the afterlife.Naturally, Riku decides on the former and is promtly reborn in a fantasy world - as a girl and sole survivor of the fox kin. But the goddess still was not done with him...Why would she do all of this!?

Title: A Song of Gods and Mortals
Synopsis:
Mortals exist for a blink of time.
Gods persist until the heavens collapse.
At the center of the grand continent rises a single valley ruling above all of humanity. A thousand clans fight a never-ending bloody war in the wildlands clashing against a milliard of other races. Mortals leave their flesh and blood on the barren grounds while Gods arise from the scattered ashes to continue the glory of their kin.
A continent full of the echoes war, death and the strive for greatness combine into a cruel yet beautiful melody resounding over the battle-weathered lands.
A Song of Gods and Mortals.

Title: The Boss that learns from mistakes
Synopsis:
Intelligence.
This is something that no Bosses have. They may be able to distinguish between “Player” and “NPC”, but this is not true intelligence.
True intelligence is learning constantly. Mistakes fixed, skills tailored to exploit weaknesses, even simple things such as where to stand. 
This is a story of the first Boss that has “True Intelligence”. A consciousness. Full reign over their dungeon and skills. The year is 2094, and the hardest game to appear has just begun.

Title: Worlds Defenders
Synopsis: In the year 2020 a new dimension called Realm of Defenders was opened on Earth. It enables the rapid development of technology and more importantly the use of what can only be called magic. ---- Release Schedule: 1 chapter / day (7 chapters / week)

Title: Dennis the Conqueror (Sword & Sorority Book 1), A Harem Fantasy—a '#1 Best Seller', Available on Amazon & KU NOW!
Synopsis:
Book description below after this note to you, the reader.
Thank you to all of you who have read all or some of the draft of Dennis the Conqueror on RoyalRoad. I appreciate the feedback and support I've received. The final version of the book is now on Amazon (including Kindle Unlimited)!
The book has been well received, attaining Amazon Best Seller status in three categories! Thanks for your support!
If you enjoyed the story, or were enjoying it but didn't get a chance to finish it, you can get it there. It is priced at $2.99 (and free to download if you are a KU subscriber).
I'm working on book 2 now.
Also, I'd love it if you shared book 1 with others, to let Dennis' legend be known far and wide!
You can get the book on Amazon at https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B07JVBC6NM
You can sign up to my email newsletter on my website at http://scotcmorgan.com I'll email out a reminder to all subscribers when the book is live for sale on Amazon.
I had to pull down from Royal Road all but the first part of the book before publication to comply with Amazon's exclusivity terms of service for KU. My apologies if you hadn't finished reading the story, but it'll be available on Amazon & KU soon. FYI, the book is about 87K words (roughly 300+pages).
Thanks again for your support. 
-Scot
A REAL HERO KNOWS HOW TO RISE TO THE OCCASION
Dennis is a second-year college student whose only luck with the ladies is ogling them from afar and picking up their misplaced bikini tops the morning after wild pool parties he never attends. Struggling to keep his 4.0 and to pay the rent for his crappy one-room apartment, he works late at Conan's Pizza and does poolside cleanup every morning before rushing to class. His hope that something better will one day come and his overactive Frazetta-inspired imagination are all that get him through the day. 
Dreams of slaying beasts to rescue babelicious women will soon be put to the test as his sudden gut-emptying illness turns out to be the side effects of desperate priestess magic from a world of savage-land hotties and nightmarish monsters.
With his newly bestowed herculean body and the aid, advice, and welcome attentions of his female companions, Dennis must learn the skills of a warrior, gain the heart of a champion, and fulfill the uniquely different desires of the women who choose to call him their man.
Facing deadly vagabonds, ravenous beasts, and mythical creatures, he does his best to survive the challenges of this new land and protect the women relying on him. But his hard work in college never prepared him for any of this, and especially not for the Dark One.
Disclaimer: This book has violent conflicts with both men and beasts. Cursing occurs throughout as the main character sees fit. This novel also includes a harem of women and all of the expected extracurricular activities with a red-blooded young man in such a situation. This book is not meant for readers under 18 years of age.

Title: The Grand General - MmoRpg
Synopsis:
This is the tale of Noah, Pestilence in game, who starts his adventure in the newest all promising VRMMORPG: Vesper.
Vesper's design is maximum freedom, a fun and everlasting adventure to keep you enthralled. Its purpose is to create a new reality where everyone can have a shot at the top!
When he has no clear future ahead, he will live day by day but with death, he shall rest!
-----Hello! I'm Matt, an Italian guy with little experience in English. I got the language down by reading a lot of web novels so expect some grammar mistakes and spelling errors, I'm trying to improve my writing so every comment and correction is very welcome!
This story will focus on a necromantic adventure with some out of game development, actually, there is no skeleton(pun)  programmed development and I'm writing day by day. I'm open to suggestions both in progress and revising of content.

Title: Empire of Angels
Synopsis:
The fall of heaven is happening and Lucifer couldn't be more happier to see everything his "Father" had build, crumbling down. He felt alive, more alive than he had been.
Gabrielle was Heaven's, The Empire and earth's only hope.

Title: Let's Shine
Synopsis:
So, first things first, this here is a magical girl thing. There are girls in it, they have magical abilities, fight supervillains (who have magical abilities, too, but in a more menacing way, like superpowers), and also do girly stuff. But it's not for children. Or at least not entirely. The idea is, it should be cute, but at the same time serious. Cute-serious, yeah…
So, this is experimental for me. I'm planning to make short updates for as long as I can keep it up or until the plot resolves itself, whichever comes first. Most of all, I'm planning to not overthink or overedit things as much as I usually do, so there are bound to be mistakes and inconsistencies. I'll try my best to keep them to a minimum, though. But if you notice something, please feel free to tell me!

Title: I didn't actually want to change ♂♀
Synopsis:
In the 21st Century, it's not uncommon for people to be transgender. Far more frequently than is publicly admitted, many individuals have thought to themselves that they feel like they were born as the wrong gender. For some people, this is merely a casual passing thought or an embarrassing guilty secret never to be spoken of again. For other people, these discordant feelings are so disturbing that they live on the edge of depression and suicide, a murky cloud looming over their heads as they attempt to suppress their deep-set feelings in order to desperately fit in with society.Every once in a while, you might encounter somebody who was brave enough to take the nerve-wracking leap to begin "transitioning" into a life as the other sex using medications. Their stories are peppered throughout the media, and they are publicly known in the everyday world as "transgender".But what about the 95% of people who never choose to "transition"?Lin Xiaorui (???), a second-generation Chinese university student with Japanese heritage, never wanted to be transgender. Even though he instinctively knew from a young age that he never fit in with the other boys and secretly desired to have been born a girl, he never dared to mention it to his conservative traditional family.Lin Xiaorui is also a realist. Even as a teenager, it was more than apparent to him how hard life would be if he made a certain taboo choice that everyone shunned. It would be hard to get a job, hard to pay bills, hard to face his family, hard to make friends, and just as hard to find love. The world as it stands remains filled with discrimination against "apache helicopters". Lin Xiaorui wasn't brave enough to commit himself to a life of constant hardship and struggles. A quiet peaceful life was all that he desired, and Lin Xiaorui never thought of himself as a particularly daring or brave person. He's been a quiet, studious, and withdrawn straight-A student all his life after all.Despite how badly his heart yearned for it, every part of his brain screamed that it was a bad idea to become transgender. It wasn't a rational choice. In fact, it seemed like a horrible one in the grand picture of things.This was why Lin Xiaorui never wanted to be transgender.Lin Xiaorui resolved himself a long time ago to simply be a man.Until one day he woke up and discovered that a tanabata wish that he had frivolously written over nine years ago at a shrine unexpectedly came true -- though, not quite exactly in the way that he (she?) expected.

Lin Xiaorui: "Please let me experience high school as a girl."

Title: Karmic System
Synopsis:
Cardis, a prodigal scientist in his past life, one who was solely responsible for the invention of FTL, and Intergalactic travel through the discovery of a god particle. Finds himself at the end of all life, and the beginning. The karmic system, a scale to judge your life based on your actions, whether Evil or Good, give you rewards based on their intent, and how effective they were. So what of the man, the man who led his race to the top of technological superiority? The man whose sole intent throughout his entire life, is to free them from the confines of their solar system. To bring them away from their impending doom. When he has succeeded and lived his life. What is he to gain in the end?

Title: Corpse Haven Survivor-Season 1 The return of the survivor
Synopsis:
Overwhelmed with regret of what he could have done for the better.
Qiu has caught the attention of the god or the devil who knows who has decided to give him another chance.
Now would he be able to grasp onto the hand that has reached out towards him or will he once again not be able to grab onto the outreaching hand.

Title: The Saiyan Immortal
Synopsis:
Its the eave of the destruction of Planet Vegeta, a saiyan couple are in the nursery looking upon their child when they hear from Bardock of the incoming destruction and send their child off.
Unfortunately the child never reached his destination as a space tear appeared in the pods trajectory and landed him in a world unlike any in the dbz universe.
Read on as our unlikely protagonist grows strong in this world of kill or be killed.
ps: I write this as something of a hobby. Its literally the first time I write a series. If you have constructive criticism go ahead. consider this a very rough draft. I also decided to put it up on Webnovel.

Title: Nameless: Ascent
Synopsis:
Everybody has a Name.
Names are a path to power, a gift from a god. When a child receives their Name, they learn the path their life will take, and they can see the strictly defined system that lets them rise beyond human limitations.
When Maiz receives his Name, he has the chance to become something he has only read about in history books--a God Chosen. But his path will force him to serve a dark master, and question what he will do to gain power.
Shadar is the Dungeon King, a man who spent years earning the right to lead an army of monsters in their struggle against humanity. He holds immense power, but he is constantly plagued by unrest among his subjects.
Two men poised to create new legends with ancient powers. Two men who must learn who they are in a world of Names.
(Contains an RPG-based magic system)

Title: Ethereal Creator of Realms
Synopsis:
I have this story on Webnovel.com Scribblehub.com Royalroad.com. Besides these websites, I have this on Amazon.----------------------------------------------
Ethereal.
A Primordial Storm.
A Hyper-Sentient Being A God?
No.
But his creations seem to think so?
Whole worlds sculpted from his own body.
Countless denizens living and breathing on and within his worlds.
Immortal Powerful Overseers descended from one born in the primordial Origin.
Massive Guardians Dragons that birthed all dragon-kind.All serving you, all look up to you.
Yet you say no, you are not a God.
Because I am not.
I can be hurt.
I can be killed.
I have limits.
My Power is Finite, not Infinite.
Thus I am not a god.
I used to think It was only me in the void, but I am not alone.

Title: The Lordship of Ineriah
Synopsis:
On the world of Mariaea life is harsh and can be hectic in peaceful times let alone after the destruction of 1/4 of the planet. Again..  
On another planet, Seth is in the middle of becoming a true Ineriah Mage. Sadly, that didnt work out so well and he ended up reincarnating into the body of a Drakion named Arszoami.  Follow the adventures of a young Drakion trying to come into his own power and understand the residual memories of a past life.
Synopsis under construction. 
The story will heavily follow a lord and craftsmen MC. So expect plenty of kingdom building and enchantment in the chapters. Release will be 1-2 a week depending personal scheudle and how a chapter flows.  The average length will be 2000-4500 depending on the subject matter. Thanks for reading!

Title: Kitt & Sunder
Synopsis:
*Update - I still like the concept behind this novel, and I plan to contunue it, but Backyard Hero won the vote. I will focus on EN and BYH for now, but I do plan to come back to Kitt & Sunder by the end of the year. *
Marcus Sever is the leader of the Black Hand mercenary group. Kitt Price is a rising Hollywood star. Each are at the top of their profession when tragedy strikes. 
Kitt wakes up in the wounded body of the mercenary leader, a dagger still in her chest. Will she be able to survive the infighting, betrayal and assasination attempts that await her? Will Hollywood survive Sever as the grizzled mercenary evades police and tracks a ruthless killer?

Title: Backyard Hero
Synopsis:
On the outside, Max is a normal office worker. He is stressed, overworked, and newly dumped, and now he has to train a classer to take the promotion he deserves. Max has neither the money nor connections to become a classer himself, at least not legally. Only the elite of the elite are permitted to access dungeons or to claim the classes they provide.
Max's home holds a secret, however, one that will draw him into a world of intrigue and adventure. Will Max survive the dangers that lie beneath his backyard shed, or will they destroy him?

Title: The Dark Hierophant Saga (Complete)
Synopsis:
Fully Edited Version Now on Amazon and Kindle Unlimited!
Eldritch horrors descended from the sky to consume the world. Only a last-minute intervention by a mysterious Hegemony of Worlds saves Earth, albeit temporarily. Skills, levels, and battles with twisted monsters are part of the new reality the survivors will have to face.
Augustus Finn wakes up after surviving countless terrors. He is thrown directly into danger as a twist of fate places him in an area designed to contain and dispose of eldritch lifeforms - areas also known as dungeons. He will have to compete with monsters, alien Peacekeepers, and his own inner demons if he is to survive.

Title: A Jaded Life
Synopsis:
Succesfull gamer Samantha Jade Jacobs, formerly known as Titania, was feeling the bitter sting of betrayal, being kicked from the team she founded and made great when the gaming world was turned upside down. A new type of game was going into Beta and Samantha would be one of the few testers. Little did anyone know that the road would be longer than anybody thought.
Follow Samantha's Journey into the world of Mundus and beyond on a trip nobody could have forseen, not even the gods themselves.

"Beta"-Part of the story ended with Chapter 666 - Take that as you will.

Title: Soldier Of Evolution
Synopsis: This wretched place where the strong rules the weak; but for me, the strong is but a stepping stone, the weak my instrument. I will devour this world. I am a Star Eater.

Title: The Masks of Under
Synopsis:
The Masks of Under is currently under publishing contract! What you see here are the first few chapters of a finished six-part series. Thank you, everyone, for your support! "King of Flames," the first book in the series, is on sale now on Amazon and free on Kindle Unlimited.
If you read the original draft story here on RR, come join my discord (link in the first chapter) and PM me for a copy of the first book as a thank-you for those of you who supported the story!
 

Everything about my life has been pretty normal working as a forensic autopsy technician. Until the day I woke up with a mysterious symbol tattooed on my arm.
 


Suddenly normal no longer existed as the barrier between Earth and a world called Under, dissolved. 
 


Now I’m trapped with dozens of other people, held prisoner by the creators of myths and legends, where the realm is ruled by two masked kings who want to turn us into creatures like them.
 


But even though I didn’t choose to be here, this new world manages to pull me deeper, affecting me differently than other humans. Unfortunately King Edu, also known as the King of Flames, notices this and I’m now considered a threat. 


 
If I want to survive King Edu and the dangers of Under, I need to escape. The only problem is, there’s another masked king who seems to have an interest in me. Aon, the King of Shadows, wants me here in this world, and he wants me alive. 


 
I just need to figure out why.

Title: Poltergeist
Synopsis: A story about the reincarnation of a mental asylum escapee.

Title: Chronicles of Trial and Error (re-write)
Synopsis: It was supposed to be a simple trip, a throw back to the highschool joys they once had as teens. Brandon was not ready to go into the light just like that. But alas, the light came to them and he could only resign himself to getting dragged along, taking solace in having Tim along for some of the ride.

Title: Sons and Daughters of All
Synopsis: In a Limitless World, with Countless gods, there are fated subjects, pitiful people, fearful dangers and beasts, fortuned persons, beautiful places, as well as mysterious and precious treasures, uncovered lands, and unknown zones.It is a Fantastic world with countless cities, empires and clans, Reigned by practicioners of the qi and essence, and masters of the spirit.Our pitiful Main character started well, but with a corrupted fate, now he has to grow with a limited timelife, follow Yiang Sei, a special kid with a strong fate on his hands!Will he be able of surpass all the hardships in his life?, Become a peerless god?, Travel the world?, the universe? Find it out reading it!

Title: Sonnentanz
Synopsis:
A time of war, and peace. A time of the revolution, and anarchy. 

A wuxia story.

Title: Twilight Abyss
Synopsis:
Watch as David will overcome challenges and obstacles to gain what people have always dreamed off.
Inside the game of 'Twilight Abyss' many are given chances to obtain the ultimate power, but how many will really take the risks that are necessary to gain the rewards, not everyone will succeed, but those who do will be granted the power of a lifetime.
Watch as kingdoms rise and fall, as new empires are created and the ones who control them will be in power.
Watch as we grow larger and larger, taking on the hardest of challenges, fighting to overcome the strongest.
Release 1/week Min.

Title: Fresh Blood
Synopsis: He was climbing the corporate ladder, now he's climbing the food chain.Felix used to be a traveling salesman, drifting through the galaxy and hawking his wares. Used to be, that is, until a freak accident in an out of the way system. One rough landing later and Felix finds himself stranded on a wild, alien planet-- front and center in a deadly role he never auditioned for to entertain a secret audience. The upside? A fellow passenger made it to the escape pod with Felix. With this reptilian stranger at his side, he’s not totally alone.The downside? They don’t share a language. Worse, there’s not one scrap of survival know-how between them, and an ominous clawing is coming from outside the escape pod.As if the struggle to avoid becoming lunch and finding some of their own wasn’t enough, an autonomous implant from an unknown source seeks to integrate them into the system.

Title: The Demon Lord's Servant
Synopsis:
Philian Evergrow, an orphan boy who was raised as an assassin after the Grand War of The Five Continents. At the age of 5, after his parents died from the war, he was taken by a group of slave traders, who then sold him to a group of harsh trainers that had 19 other kids. The trainers' goal, to make the ultimate assassin who'd kill anything no matter how protective of a fortress that single group holds up in. However, over the 20 kids they had, Philian was the only survivor after everyone was dumped into a forest called, The Forest of Decay.
It was five years later, Philian was successfully trained into the ultimate assassin, after assassinating a major commander of one of The Five Continents. Even when the commander himself was warned that he was going to be assassinated beforehand. Unfortunately though, the so-called ultimate assassin disappeared, with the only trace of that was a group of dead trainers.
But, the ultimate assassin was found two years later when the princess, Rose Everheart, found the very boy in an alleyway. Instead of reporting this, the 18-year-old princess took him in and lived a wonderful life with him. This was a time Philian himself cherished such a thing.
Until a year later, the princess was framed as the traitor of the kingdom of Astoria. Every day, the princess went to the private home she and Philian lived in less. The princess smile would always grow weaker every time she attempted it. And sometimes she would cry to Philian with bruises all over her body, always crying about how she lost her virginity and how everyone she once loved treated her as trash.
It was finally until that day, Philian saw it all. While hidden within a group of civilians, Philian watched regretfully as before they hung the person he loved so much, they allowed many to rape her. A day later, they dumped her body in a small poverty part of Astoria. There, random people raped the dead body every day, until Philian had enough. When in the middle of it in a rundown house, Philian killed every single bastard that was in it and was about to run away with Rose's body, until royal guards barged in and surrounded him. And behind those royal guards, was the person who framed Princess Rose... Queen Rose, Rose's mother.
"You bastard!" Philian yelled as he stared dreadfully at the Queen's eyes. "One day... I'll kill you!" After the young boy said this, he was pierced by many spears. His body was then tossed into the Forest of Decay, to be left to decay for eternity. However, a year later the body that was supposed to be decayed disappeared, and standing in front of the spot was an incubus boy who stared down at it. The boy stood still for what seemed like an eternity, until slowly turning around and walked towards the kingdom he dreaded, Astoria.

Title: Xanxhin Swarm queen of Ker´xaba
Synopsis: Xanxhin and her twins sister Xoto have long ruled the empire of Ker´xaba yet now, with armies of "heroes" knocking at the door and their children falling, will they persist or will they fall?

Title: Journal of Justain
Synopsis: This is the Journal of Justain a citizen of the Drift known as The Vessel.   I began writing this journal as a way to record my adventures as they began. My life has been fairly mundane up till now.

Title: Isehair
Synopsis:
Koko was a loner through and through, despite his best efforts. His long waving hair just didn't sit well with most people, and his stench drives even the most kind people away. After a series of "hairy" accidents, he finds himself in another world, lost, but hopeful. Perhaps here, in this world where creatures of all kinds co-existed in peace, he could become friends with someone.
But then the Grindark attacked, and the balance between all races was broken.
 
 
___
Writing this whenever I feel guilty for not writing other stuff (If I complete it, I will upload it to RRL)

Title: The Book of Adam
Synopsis: Follows the story of Jennifer, a 19 year old girl searching for Destiny, the physical embodiment of the concept who has abandoned his creation and fled. Time, the other co-creator of reality, has been struck down and replaced by his child Death. Jennifer meets other personified versions of concepts both abstract and concrete like fire, Life, Oceans, and the planet itself.

Title: Legatee
Synopsis:
About a few years ago a meteor crashed into the ocean with a bunch of alien monster things arising from it. We called them Ningens because they were similar to the cryptid but a whole lot bigger and humanlike. They didn't come in peace so to fight them humanity banded together to make giant robots called "Soldiers" to kill them.
After a bloody battle, it looked to be that Humanity won but when our protagonist gets a draft notice things aren't as peaceful as they seem...

Title: The Orc Elementalist
Synopsis:
Dylan Harvey was just your average mall cop. A man with little responsibility is suddenly thrust into a world full of magic and mayhem after a night of texting and driving. Now, reborn as an Orc, can Dylan survive the brutality of Orcish culture before his journey can truly begin? Or will he become some dumb brute's stepping stone to power?
 
(Updates whenever this funky cat completes a chapter.)
(Art made by me. Don't judge, I only have MsPaint)

Title: Last of the Mage-Kings
Synopsis:
In life, Aryon lived as a king of a magical kingdom. In death, he swore to forever to protect it beyond the grave as a Relic King: an undead mage, set into slumber, to be summoned during the kingdom’s dire need.
But now, Aryon has awakened to a foreign world of mysticism and heaven-defying acts. Can the magic of the old world compete with the mystic arts of the new? Read on to follow the journey of Aryon as he seeks to unravel the mysteries of the past and overcome the dangers of the present.

Title: System...I Really Don't Care[BL]
Synopsis:
Xiu Yan is lazy by nature. Faced with physical labor he worked hard to make a successful company to rise in the ranks.
After he made the richest company in the world, he thought that he could finally lay back and relax binge-watching his favorite shows while eating sweets but no, life had to just kill him.
Join him on his forced journey to save worlds against his will.

Title: Back to Pokemon and Earth
Synopsis:
Archer Sullivan volunteered to be a part of the first ever Dimension Travel experiment conducted by the UASMDT: United Association of the Scientists Majoring in Dimension Travel. Little did he know that his decision would lead him to a new world where Pokemon exists and everything revolves around Pokemon. 
Trying his best to live in this new world and to search for his way back home to Earth, little did he know that his decision would change the both worlds that he was concerned about, both the world of Pokemon and Earth.
 
Note: I do not own Pokemon. This is just fanfiction. This is my first time attempting to write my novel so please bear with me. Hope you enjoy my crap and thank you. And cover art is not mine. :D
 
Release Schedule: 9:00 PM a chapter/day - 13:00 (UTC)

Title: Project: cure for those demons.
Synopsis:
What if you die all of sudden?Only to later on find out that there's a life after this.It happens to a girl, filled with love and emotions. She died and wakes up in the neitherworld, where she´s now will try tolive her life to the fullest. There´s so much for her to learn and so much you want to do.This is partly her story.
 
Facebook: Midsummer Feast

Title: Gods and Glory
Synopsis:
What is Right? And what is Wrong?
 
It's the hypocrisy of history written by victors. The Gods are good, the Devil is evil or so we've been told. Those who oppose the rulers in this world shall be persecuted and entitled evil, for they might shatter the false peace established.
 
There never will be true peace, only coexistence. For to live is to devour; To devour is to deplete that which is consumed. This is the fact of life.
 
What makes a Hero? Who deems what deeds be called 'Heroic'?
 
Saving the world? Being chosen by a God? Unbelievable Power and Skill? Spirit of Self-sacrifice? Or Devotion and Bravery?
 
Who knows?
 
Our protagonist shall play the part, starting over again to correct her mistakes. Pit against the tides of fate, struggling to change the future.
 
Her nemesis, victim of a cruel life and the irresponsibility of adults. Sights set on revenge, now he crawls his way back, looking for blood.
 
Watch the contest between wits and brawn, as they fight their way up to victory. In the end, who will prevail? Noble or Peasant? The Hero or the Devil? Mortal versus Immortal.
 
This is a story of Sin, a tale of Trust, a novel of Nobleness, and a chronicle of Magic.
 
 
~ fin ~
 
 
"I will write my way into another life."
- Ann Patchett -

Title: Bitter Sweet Love
Synopsis:
The strangely emotionless Chief of Crime Specialist Division encounters with gruesome murders of pregnant women in one night. No clue lead Quinn Monroe any closer to the lunatic killer.
Until the killer himself, fascinated by Quinns exquisite beauty, contacts urging her to catch him.

Title: Chromatic: Kings of Colour
Synopsis:
For decades the existence of Chromatic Aura had been kept secret. Set a decade after the desolation of Noir by the combined forces of the Rainbow Alliance, Jet, the last of Noir and more importantly, it's King, returns to the city. Can he safely see out his goals, and keep his continued existence from the other factions lest they unite to destroy him for once and all, or can he persist in peace and obscurity?
On the Horizon, a new force emerges which threatens both the real and Chromatic worlds, can Jet survive all these challenges and ensure the contiued exisrtence of the world?
 
Chapters posted atleast once a week.

Title: The Path to Power
Synopsis: A young man died, but instead of being reincarnated his spirit flew across the realms untill it found its twin.  Here Chao Yee found himself alive again in the body of a yong boy.  In a world where power is never given but only earned Chao will have to overcome obstacles and mysteries to become the man he has chosen to be.

When Death was in need of a guardian for the Underworld, he ripped the shadow of Cerberus and a part of the soul of is middle head to create "Hound" The Shadow of Cerberus Guardian of the Underworld...

Title: Rising Sovereign
Synopsis:
Jin is a fourteen-year-old prodigy, a Divine Sovereign whose proficiency with the sword and blade instills fear among the most powerful of immortals in the High Realms. After a tragic event, Jin is stripped of his powers and exiled to the Lower Realms, forbidden to ever return.
Okada Yuri is an intelligent but sheltered heiress. On one fateful night, the Okada Clan is wiped out by scheming enemies. Pursued and desperate, Yuri inadvertently crosses paths with Jin. Their chance encounter sets off a tale of adventure, revenge, love, and ultimately redemption.

Title: Everyone Loves Fluffy Tails
Synopsis:
A fanfiction spin-off of the series called "Overlord". It's about a player that's sent to another word in their in-game avatar that of a Kitsune Queen from the DMMO-RPG called YGGDRASIL. The events take place a couple years before the main series.
Warning: The series will contain fwuff, and it's not for the faint of heart.
[New Official ELFT Discord Server for my novel! You can find it here: https://discord.gg/GV9hXrs]

Title: Cinder
Synopsis:
The devil's faction has finally been massacred by God and his 'heroes'. As the devil's son and final heir, Luce, luckily manages to sneak his way back onto earth with his father's sacrifice. Being the final hope of the devils, he is forced to cast a forbidden magic onto himself to suppress his powers in order to get off of God' radar and live undetected. Waking up centuries later, and forgetting everything about his past what will he do now without the slightest shred of power?
Watch as the devil's reincarnation makes his way up in the world while learning of the mysteries of his past and treads through the realm of the Enderbed to gain powers along the way.

Title: The Game of Petty Gods
Synopsis:
They woke up in nothingness and knew two things:
They knew who they were.
They knew why they were there.
The world before this one was hazy and meaningless but their identities, if not its details, were still in-tact.
They were there to play the God's Game. 
What that meant was different for each of them but all had the same goal: to Win.

Title: Not a hero nor a villain, just a town guard.
Synopsis:
I know too much about heroes and villains, kings and queens, dungeons and countries to make the mistake of becoming famous. I also know that if someone becomes strong and tries to hide the truth that it becomes more of a superhero/vigilante story. I don't want to touch that. I am not going to make a huge farm to feed the country, nor am I going to become wealthy. I instead plan on doing one thing: become a guard in a town and have a steady job and not stick out at all.
 
it might work, who knows?

Title: The Facility
Synopsis: A young paladin has been dispatched to a derelict facility to take care of a creature that haunts it. What she finds there will lead her on a path to enlightenment, if she can survive the encounter.

Title: Travels of a spirit fox
Synopsis:
When the village she watches over is destroyed in a civil war Gyoma, a kitsune is trapped in the mortal realm. With a letter adressed to the brother of a man she killed, a lord chasing her and a desire to find a way home she begins her journey
I created this story as a school project and it consumed all my writer's motivation for a year. I am now going back off hiatus and am allowed to post this here. Due to the constraints of the project I feel it is more condensed than I would have liked but I won't change that. lots of research went into this.

Title: Chosen Shackles
Synopsis:
The future came in devastation, but we bury it in the lights now, to forget. It was better once, they tell us not to say. Now, at the end of our century, we’ve rebuilt. The city neon glows brighter and casts a shadow deeper on the world.
This is just the beginning.
In the Pacific Megalopolis, a sickness is taking roots in the city’s guts. Dead angels are raising dark choirs to sooth our nightmares. They speak of a prophecy as old Patriots plan war. And Frode, a young sheep, can’t sleep. Even in dreams, there’s no rest no more, for a hungry God is waking up.
The screen is running static. Face your shadow.

Title: Rise of the Three Gods
Synopsis:
When two children die at birth, their souls merge with their lone brother's body and as time goes by they become closer and closer to one. After a tragedy strikes, ending these brothers lives, they are reborn in a world of power, a world in which humans have no limit. Follow their journey as they regain bodies and rise above the heavens to challenge the gods.
This novel is also being hosted at qidian and word excerpt. With word excerpt having 2 to 5 head start on the chapters.
Patreon: Every donation is very much helpful and appreciated as it aids me focus more on writing .
https://www.patreon.com/ForsakenAsura

Title: Estrias
Synopsis: Osiris Jaxton, a nerdy failure of a jock is brought to the new world of Estrias that reminds him about all the fantasy games and books he’s read. He’s told that God has chosen to bring him and others from Earth to this new world because of Earths coming end. He has been selected as a trailblazer for his people along with his two brothers and many others to prepare for the rest to come. He decides to make the most of this new world and opportunity to come out on top and be able to protect himself and those he cares for. He soon learns that not everyone from his old world has the same ideas as him and that this new world already has plenty of enemies.

Title: Bellum Metra Taktika (War Measures Tactics): Celestials Overdrive
Synopsis: (Re-edited)This is the story of a junior high school boy named Loyd he happens to be a part time soldier in the Galactic Empire Geona along with his comrades that he treats like his own friends in battle even though they are his friends he goes to a school called ELMS-Taldren High School on an artificial Island called Arcane of Science Island, since he`s a soldier one of his missions is involve of a rescue mission on trap civilians on the battlefield as he was doing so he rescued an unknown girl who happens to be the princess of an enemy Empire and one or more of her relatives wants to kill her to claim what they think it's his/her belongings and the enemy soldiers tried to kill her for suspicion of treason under the royal command of the Empiral Court. Title: Gods Game
Synopsis: 25 people are chosen by a God to be thrown into maps he himself created where they must survive for his entertainment. Each person is equipped with a tattoo that gives them access to their personal data and The Infinity God Store. Watch as our MC Mark goes through life-threatening situations while he becomes stronger to survive the cruel god who sees them as toys.

Title: Mabbo's Obscure Short Stories
Synopsis:
I'm an isekai trash addict. Here be the collection of my short stories. 

I usually update on my site first, then bring it here at least a month after. Though, I won't update as often, since I don't write that often as well. Do forgive my erratic schedule.

Title: Devoured by the Void
Synopsis: As the Void slowly ebbs into their reality, draining it of life. Those left must fight in any way they can to defend themselves from the encroaching doom. Invictus, the protectors of the few remaining cities have sent several of their elite soliders on secret missions to find the true nature of the Void.

Title: Pokemon: Plumeria's Arc
Synopsis:
The first, undefeated Champion of Alola makes a statement by barging into Plumeria's life without so much as a warning. She cleans up their home in Po Town, earns a living by thrashing Challengers like they were the next best thing since sand bags, and Plumeria is clueless as to how Luna finds the time to be reportedly seen at three apparel shops simultaneously. 
A/N: Contains Yuri, simply put.
The inner workings of the world may differ from the manga and anime. Although I am trying to follow an apporximate timeline according to the Pokemon: Ultra Moon/ Sun game- but with my own interpretation and imagination as to how the 'logic' may work.

Title: Jack-of-All-Mages
Synopsis: Apocalypsis: The Real World Online. In the works for years, Jack thought his crowd-funded money was long gone until one day he gets the invitation to test not only the game, but a prototype of the newest full-immersion technology as well. Choosing a less-than-popular class, the Omnimage, Jack jumps into a game only to find himself in strangest of places: at home.

Title: Forsaken Realms
Synopsis:
Welcome to Forsaken Realms! Where myths become reality and you can do anything. Do you want to kill your enemies with brute force? Well now you can! Do you want to be a mage? Do it! Would you like to be king? Anything’s possible in this new virtual reality game and two friends, Jackson and Brandon are starting to figure out exactly what’s possible.___________Disclaimer 1: My synopsis is kind of shitty compared to the actual planned contents of the book so just read the prologue and decide if you want to go any further or not
 
Disclaimer 2: I have experience writing. I don’t however, have experience writing a book

Title: Sleeping Beauty and the Medecine Prince
Synopsis:
In a faraway land full of magic...well China is not that far away, and technology isn't really magic, but for the sake of narration let's continue.
In a faraway land full of magic, there lived a beautiful young maiden (well, as beautiful as the most average high schooler can get) who, because of a powerful spell cast by an evil witch was cursed to fall into a deep sleep until her prince comes to deliver true love's kiss.
Or what is really happening: An average high schooler cursed with the sickness of laziness finally found her prince charming. Unfortunately her prince is a dense student who can't take the hint. Her evil mom tells her to study, but all she wants to do is find love. Thus begins her quest to win over *cough* coerce *cough* the prince, and get *cough* steal *cough* a true love's kiss.
Princess: 'My prince is so handsome, I hope he notices me *blush*. It was so hard to find his schedule...'
Prince: 'Oh, that creep is under my desk again. I feel sorry for the person she is stalking...'
Classmates: '...'
Homeroom Teacher: '...'
Princess: '...'
Mom: 'Did you finish your homework?'
Princess: '...I wrote my name...'

Title: The Astral is Alive
Synopsis:
The essential question explored in this novel, set in the backdrop of one corner of the Known Worlds, concerns responsibility--namely, unavoidable and divine responsibility for others and the direction of society. What does one do, and how does one act under the brunt of ultimate expectation? When one is expected to stop wars, bring peace, and choose the winners and loser of history, how would they operate? How should they operate?
The character of the Astral was designed to inhabit and navigate that space by tackling sets of episodic obstacles thrown at him chapter-by-chapter. He inherits a broken, chaotic world that expects him to order and renew it into the future, yet is given very few tools by which to make that divine mandate a reality. And so, as we are all called to do, he sets out on his homeworld of Arow to make his own way and discover what being the Astral really entails.
This novel is the culmination of many things. It represents seven year's work and a lifetime of consideration. While designed as a whimsical and entertaining narrative, it's also intended to be an anthem to my life and to those ideas that both captivate and inspire me--and in the end, a vehicle by which to share them.
This novel is a completed work for sale through Amazon. If you enjoy these first few chapters, consider making a purchase at https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B07FBSTMCN
This a slow-burning work designed at setting up an entire universe. Any help you can offer brings that dream closer to reality.

Title: Legend of Amnesiac Archer
Synopsis: This is a story based on a popular online game Ragnarok Online about a mysterious archer from Payon village who had no memories of his past and embarks on an adventure with his partymates, a beautiful and strong swordswoman Yoona  who had been accused of kidnapping and an all knowing, two-faced genius high priest named Eye Doctor who is a dispatch from Prontera Kingdom. They were tasked to complete a quest to rescue the village's princess, but what kind of adventures awaits on them?

Title: Osaethar
Synopsis:
In the VR game, World, the strongest player is labelled as the overlord. One day, the overlord, Kindred, went to a mission with his team. However, the mission was not a success. Due to a series of misfortune, the squad is teleported to an alternate land, called Osaethar, that is absolutely no different from reality except for the existence of magic and superhuman strength.
Disclaimer (?): This light novel is heavily inspired by Overlord by Kugane Maruyama. Expect a lot of elements that come from it. But I wouldn't consider this fanfiction.
Enjoy!

The story is told from the perspective of an immortal whose unstable musings belie the true nature of an ancient's thoughts.

Title: Sort of Forgotten

Waking from a prison that held her for 1500 years, Sariah was obviously ready to stretch her legs.  Emerging into a world with little to no magic and no idea as to where all of the pieces of her physcial body are located, she begins her hunt.  Vengance, death, destruction and war are in the future for all of the realms involved in her imprisonment.  She must move quickly to outrun her quickly fading memories and her enemies powers growing.  
Her escape has began the return of magic, both good and bad.  While her captors are the enemies she has in her sights, something darker and older than Sariah has awoken, and hates her beyond any and all logic.

Title: The Journal

The idea is to create hyperboles that shows the absurdity of life and along the way makes the reader subconciously map it to the reality of their own lives.

Title: Exiles
Synopsis:
Kalkonu, the lost continent.
What was once served as a prison for civilization’s worst criminals has become a dumping ground for political outcasts, refugees, and the undesirables of society. There is no escape. For those who are exiled there is only the cold at the top of the world, the wilderness, and the doom of the long night.
But there is fire under the snow. Shadows loom over the clouds. Old evils have begun to wake, and it is in this land of lawlessness that the rejects of the mortal races will find their one and only chance to survive. They may not trust each other, but if they want to get out of this mess, they’re going to have to work together.
And if they’re very, very lucky, they might just save the world.

Title: Conquest of the Evolutionizing Extraterrestrial Being
