‘I want to live…’
[... I can let you live but on one condition]
‘... I will do anything if I can live’
[Then become a monster among monsters, you shall kill, command, capture, rape, consume, and evolve to become the strongest monster in my world. Show me your resolution, give me some entertainment]
 From that very day, Wei Yang died in a hospital bed after contracting an incurable disease. Gifting him a chance at rebirth right before his death by an unknown existence, he accepted the conditions stated and took its hand. When he awoken as a monster, the conditions he had made before grew on him and made him grow stronger and stronger. Will he be able to survive until he reaches the pinnacle or will he fall along the way.
Warning: Has slight elements of Futanari. It also contains quite a bit of bloody gore and some other dark elements. Read at your own risk. ( slight meaning it plays only a small part of the story, mainly for lols)

So when he wakes up in the middle of a forest and doesn't recall anything from the night before he figured he's run out of luck. Always was going to happen it's Vegas after all.

Synopsis:
Disclaimer: This story is intended for adult audiences. You should not read this if you are under the age of eighteen.
"I was born with an extremely prestigious but combat-weak logistics class. As the son of the clan head and the next heir, that just wasn’t enough of an excuse to spare me from my father’s grueling training. For in his creed the only strength that mattered was that grasped in one’s own two hands.
In my journey through the lands with my harem, I was grateful for his training as it saved my life multiple times when my girls weren’t there to engage in combat. This is my story."
Check out my Discord server for character art.

Title: The Manifest
Synopsis: Years after a mysterious plane crash, a woman feared dead is spotted at an anti-war rally. A private investigator named Edgar Willis is hired onto the case, however, he must abandon his virtues after learning of the real destiny of the airplane.

Title: Tangled Peril (A Jake Mudd Tale)
Synopsis:
SOME DAYS ARE MUDDIER THAN OTHERS.
Jake faces down a double-crossing buyer on a routine delivery and helps a desperate woman escape captivity. But now the same man is determined to kill them both.
He's a former mercenary turned galactic cargo runner who tries to get by and lay low. But his conscience, questionable choices, and bad luck thrust him into the thick of trouble more than he’d like.
Join Jake on a day that goes from bad to worse as he narrowly escapes death more than once, trying to make things right.

Title: Allies or Foes
Synopsis: A blood debt that needs to be settled. The exiled Han Princess, Da Ying, comes to collect what has been owed.

Title: Yours, Ours, Us
Synopsis: Zhao Ling always wanted nothing more than to live a peaceful life independently. However, on a fateful day, she somehow gets transmigrated to the the past. Not any normal ancient civilization though. One that uses spiritual powers. Zhao Ling wants to do everything she can to just go back to her time, but yet, she can't. Somehow, she came to regain memories and started to pursue through all kinds of troubles to finally someday have everything go back to normal. Wei Qiang, her husband has lost his memories, but he stays stuck to her no matter what. Many kinds of troubles come and Xia Lin solves them with triumph. -------------------------------------------------- Preview on the story... On a fine day, Xia Lin's ex-boyfriend comes to greet her. Xia Lin had been with Xiao Qiang for the day showing him the modern world. "Hey! Ling Ling nice to see you again. Want to-ahh my eyes!" Xiao Qiang pulled her into a deep kiss in front of her ex with a triumphant smirk that seems to say, "Hmph! I win." -------------------------------------------------- At a party, in the restroom, Xiao Qian pulled her into a kiss. "Xiao Qian, we are at a party." He pulls out his sad and cute puppy eyes, "But all the men were staring at you." "Sigh... What am I going to do with you. Your too unfair Xiao Qian." -------------------------------------------------- After Xia Lin came back from work, she found that Little Tan was missing. "Honey, where is Little Tan?" "I sent him to spend time with Father Liu." "Wh-mph!" Xiao Qian pushed her down to the bed and started to kiss her. "I need time with you too."

Title: Sarkoth the Black
Synopsis: Competing for a job as a head game designer, players are given the opportunity to roll one strange, exotic new characters and are tasked with competing an exceedingly difficult quest before their third death.

Title: Starhopper
Synopsis: After a colony ship goes silent, humanity learns that all 25,000 colonists have been trapped in a virtual reality program meant to entertain and stimulate the minds of hibernating spacefarers. What follows is the strangest, largest rescue operation ever undertaken by humanity.

Title: Runeville
Synopsis: Alexander Runeville is a young adult with a troubled past that gets off on drinking, fighting, and flirting with the ladies, and trouble follows him everywhere, but when a friend from his early days seek him for help, memories he had wished long dead start to surface and he finds himself on a quest that will test the limits of his body and mind.

Title: Asashin Academy
Synopsis: Shime Akira, an unassuming boy, is sent to Asashin Academy, an academy of asssasins, by his parents. His interest in socialization, or lack thereof, immediately sets him apart from all the other students.

Synopsis:
In a seemingly peaceful, alternate world, the deities are working to gain what they want most. Lesser deities may want more influence or power, greater deities may want true love or even simple rest. Whatever their desires are, they have the power, and thus to achieve these goals they do what they want, some may be constrained by personal limits, others do it by any means necessary.

Title: Version... Eternal hiatus
Synopsis:
A mind unknown...
A life unlived
A tale forgotten
A voice unloved
From a place hidden from all
One Shall Rise…
One Shall Fall…

Title: Dark Academy. LitRPG series: Transformation (Book 4)
Synopsis:
TRANSFORMATION. BOOK 1  Kindle FREE. Read right now!
The familiar world collapsed overnight. As the Game Transformation progressed, disasters occurred throughout the Earth. Materials changed their properties, new species of flora and fauna appeared, and there was no more electricity. The Game was massive, spread across multiple worlds, and when a new planet was added, it was converted into a huge dungeon, completely replacing the previous civilization.
However, the aliens’ plans for Earth began to go awry from the very beginning. The conversion was less successful than expected and then an ordinary young man stole the bonus for the first gaming action in the new dungeon, depriving the invaders of their perk.
How can he manage the situation? Which of the aliens will become his ally? Which ones are his enemy? Dare they rebel against the all-powerful invaders, regain their land and even create a new world?
 

 
The 4 th book will be released on Amazon 07 February 2020

Title: From Chief to the Emperor (Rewrite)
Synopsis:
A university student has passed through to the prehistoric period; will history still evolve along the original trajectory?
In this ancient wasteland of ruthlessness and bloodshed, Edward armed with his imagination and human knowledge of the 21st century is out there to lead his small tribe into creating an empire for generations to remember.
From introducing fire, the secrets of the soil, and aspirin to launching the savage cave fashion show.
But against him stands his savage rivals, ferocious beasts and hundreds of barbaric ethnic groups.

Title: The Inquisition: DAI one-shot
Synopsis: An assassin for the Inquisitor gets caught, and finds more than she bargained for. (A short one shot with my OC Inquisitor and assassin.)

Title: Dah Ork Life!
Synopsis:
What do you get when you put the mind and soul of a lazy weeb into the body of the most ferocious and savage species ever concieved by the mind of man? You get Dah Ork Life! Both Cunningly Brutal and Brutally Cunning, Felix strives to become the stronkest and killiest Ork that ever was, all the while struggling to find a proper balance between the wisdom of man and the ever encroaching fury and madness that permeates every aspect of Orkish life, all set in the most horrific and dystopian sci-fi fantasy universe ever dreamed up by the nightmares of man, the Warhammer 40k universe. 
 
Born in a spaceship poised directly for one of the Bastions of the crumbling Imperium of Man, the planet of Armaggedon, Felix must strive to both survive, and cope with the necessities that come with his second chance at life. And he has no intent to squander this second chance, even at the cost of a tarnished and dirtied soul.

Title: A Bygone Era
Synopsis:
Bodyer has been a criminal since birth, stealing his first breaths in a world not designed for him. He fought his way to the top, where he sits uneasily upon his bloody throne. He finds a complicated truce with god.
Deksen was born as a gift to god, and god appreciated the gift. Era, the god in question, kept his eye on Deksen, keeping him in his own good graces. Deksen returned the favor by leading his army and devoting his life to Era's service.
There comes a day when all things must be questioned, including Era's domain. Is their god as powerful and benevolent as he purports? Or is there something more sinister in his designs?

Title: Character Overload
Synopsis:
After being banned in the most popular game in the world, he was given another opportunity to continue playing the game with his cheats... except it was no longer a game.
His levels uncapped, his items unobtainable, his power unstoppable, he roams the world in the bodies of his characters.
 
 
Slow Release

Title: Skeleton in Space
Synopsis:
Synopsis:Douglas is a simple summoned skeleton, formed from an old battlefield when some ancient fossil of a necromancer raised him without even asking. His memories are a bit foggy, but who cares about some people he barely remembers when there is walking to be done! Or stabbing cows! Douglas loves life, the simple joy of doing repetitive tasks - like battering down this large tower door - is all that's needed to keep his clacking bones satisfied. But just when he was done with these rapidly changing tasks, the wizard he was mobbing took some weird crystal out and now there are stars everywhere.
Come join Douglas the magical skeleton as he tries to live a fulfilling life in a sci-fi universe!

Title: Wish System
Synopsis:
Have you ever wish for something? Have you wished about something to be better? Have you wished for you to be better you? Or any something else entirely?
This is the Wish System. Your wish is what matters. Just don't die. And of course, you have to use your WP to get what you wished.
We will follow the life of Quinn what her trying to get better and survive.

Title: ERROR: Ascension Online
Synopsis: ERROR: Ascension Online Is a tale of a player trapped inside a game with no memory of how they got there. Every day is a struggle as they search for clues and uncover the mystery of who they really are and why they are really inside the game.

Synopsis: Hi there, the name's Cam. And this is the story of how I enchanted a whole forest with various magic thingies.

Synopsis:
Five magic nations have been created out of the land of Rasec.
Gloseren, Loche, Veile, Lieza, Meharea. Each nation with their own unique setting, and thus have their own unique understanding of magic. One thing was common though: they rank their magi according to their capabilities, and the one with the highest capabilities become the ruler of the nation.
This story is about a boy from one of the nations. He stood out more than his peers not because he has something unique, but because he has nothing. He has zero.
Watch the story unfold as the boy who has zero becomes the Magus Zero.

Title: D20 System
Synopsis:
The planet Earth. Built upon the bountiful nature, endurance and ingenuity of its past, this planet is now among the most troubled planet in the entire universe
However, the current greatest threat to the Earth is human greed, but none of the human leaders is trying to solve this issue.
The people of Earth are ignorant. Pollution holds no importance at all in their lives and, if anything, the one thing they worship is money.
-Are you sure?
-Yes, He already order it, release the D20 System upon the earth.

First time writing a story, feel free to comment as mean as you can

Synopsis:
The Eternity Games
A game played by the gods.
Played using sentient species as champions to represnt each god who participates.
A game that leads to godhood to the victor and the playing field is a newly formed galaxy.
Champions chosen by their patron dietys are unaware of a deeper purpose than godhood until they accept to play The Eternity Games.

Title: She, the one (rewrite)

She, the one. A special woman in a special place. All those who long, all those who belong are for something. Meet Red, the woman of darkness in a world just like ours, cruel and unforgiving.
Those who seek will find. This dark fantasy is a curved mirror of our history and inner self.
Red is strong yet weak. Cruel, yet kind. Clever yet stupid. Honest yet twisted.
This novel contains gore, violence, sex, drugs and many other disturbing content. The prologue is to scare you away.Do not read under 15, no matter what you think of yourself. This is the authors request.

Title: Succubi's Curse Online
Synopsis:
Tame the Succubi Queen. Save the world!
When Lanak, a former succubi tamer, is asked to embark on a quest to bring the downfall of the succubi queen, he cannot refuse. Lanak must now travel the subcontinent in a magical spherical craft and battle the odds to save the lives of thousands. Along the way, he must reawaken his old tamer skills which are so important for the quest.
But Lanak is not alone. His friends include a giant of a man, a dragon… and a superhuman girl!
Grab your copy today!
Warning: Book contains pulpy adventure and gore. Succubi can bite. Read at your own risk!

Title: A tale of teleportation
Synopsis: Mark is an aspiring young wizard with research into the pursuit of the near impossible skill of long range teleportation.  Meanwhile, Sarah is a normal young woman recently fired from her public relations job.  When Mark's first test in long range teleportation goes awry, he appears in Sarah's world as their adventure begins.

Title: This World of Systems
Synopsis: In this world of dreams and thoughts there is no passion, there is serenity and yet Through passion, I gain strength. I hope you give my Novel a chance, Feel free to hit me as hard as you want with your thoughts!

Title: Megacity Rhea
Synopsis: In the year 2201, four corporations come together to build a city spanning 200 miles in the Sahara Desert. The city is christened Megacity Rhea and boasts that its mission is to bring humanity into godhood. Millions flock to this hive-like city of skyscrapers for the promises of a job and a home. Unfortunately, something has gone wrong for a young woman who finds herself waking up in an alley with amnesia and greeted by a... floating cartoon unicorn?

Title: Rebirth of the Heavenly General
Synopsis: The Great General of the Heavenly Army is betrayed by the very person he swore an oath to serve until death.  Saving the Realm one last time by sacrificing his own life, a thing of the past gives him a second chance at life and start everything anew.  .............

Title: Looking Down From Olympus
Synopsis: The world ended but no one can remember how it happened. You wake up, sore and confused, in an underground bunker in the foothills of the Smoky Mountains. What await you outside the confines of concrete? What will you do, with no past and no future? What will the gods think, sneering down at you from the heights of Olympus?

Synopsis: Multiple POV characters, medieval themed story about politics and system of medieval life, but later unexpected advantures and fantasy moments.

Synopsis:
With the world anew due to the God Sage's recreation magic, Haruki discovers the development of magic different from what he knows after attaining power. The four systems of magic possesses main combat magic except for one, and Haruki has the lowest of all. With devotion in seeking a way to become strong in the lowest form of magic system, he finds great animosities along the way.
Other copies of this book are published on my account in Webnovel.com and Wattpad.

Title: DON'T BLINK
Synopsis: Allen always thought the world was unfair until the whole world was given a chance to change it by god you want everyone to be equal well you should be careful what you wish for.

Title: Shattered Side of Yowen Empire
Synopsis: Yowen Empire was once a powerful empire until problems to sprout from within. No one thought nothing of it at first, but over time the problem grew bigger and bigger. To the point where the empire split in half. Two hundred years have passed since the fall of the empire. Two sides of the empire is left. The factions of humans and the demons.      [Side note] The military aspect is like that of ww1 and ww2 but with a little twist of magic. If you read tanya the evil then its pretty much like that but set in a fantasy setting. Also the hierarchy is like that of medieval. It's basically a medieval setting where the military is like that of ww1 or ww2 theme along with magic (every fantasy must have).

Title: Re:Fiction
Synopsis: This is a tale of secrets and romance, a tale you may have heard before but with a new beginning. This story follows the misadventures of a young man named Kayné, a descendent of sir Lancelot of the Knights of the round table, and queen Guinevere. Following him on his journey are the many variations of legends and heroes of the past and myths alike, as well as his fiancee/stalker the curious and very unusual forrest elf Cecily, who believes in love at first sight and loves to eat meat more than any other. The duo follow a new path for themselves and others for a new interesting twist of the legends we know.

Title: Manifest of Dao
Synopsis:
Immortality. The epitome of might.
Cultivation. The Path of enlightenment.
To reach Immortality, you must first climb the Ranks of Cultivation. Beware, the path is full of hardship.
To cultivate, you must gain Weight to strengthen your hold onto the Path.
Your worth will be your Weight. Lose it, lose your worth.
To gain Weight, you need to eat. What you eat is what you shall be, so take care or something precious will be lost.
The greater the Weight, the greater the Karma will be.
 
Remember, to never lose sight of your Path. You can lose your Weight, you can even gather bad Karma. However, once you stray from your chosen Path, you shall never find the True Immortality.

Title: Horrible Heroes
Synopsis:
A C-list Superhero story. A story of tragedy and failure that's almost entirely the fault of the would-be heroes themselves.
 
Follow the life of Impromptu, a slightly overweight super who is mistakenly classified as one of the fastest speedsters in the world. Watch as Impromptu fails to save the day, Witness his daring plans as they fall to pieces around him and weep as the girl decides to date the villain instead because they're better dressed.

Title: Adventures of Shadow and Garb
Synopsis: Shadow and garb venture through a Dungeon like setting where monsters spawn and only get stronger and stronger as they venture deeper, afterall they where raised their as far as they can remmeber.

Title: Dragonfall: Soulborn
Synopsis: Damien's life was more perfect than he could have ever dreamed, until everything was taken from him. Will his despair and desire for vengeance strip him of his humanity? Will his trials break him? Will his last breath be taken on the blood soaked sands of the colosseum? Or will he endure and rise like a phoenix from the ashes of his old life?

Title: Crazy, Not Stupid
Synopsis: The world is filled with crazy and/or stupid people. I'm one of them.

Title: Midas Touch
Synopsis:
There is no such thing as time travel, i know that, you know that, we all know that. However if you were to find yourself at the exact point that caused you to lose your everything you owned and everything you aspired to achieve, what would you do.
Foloow us as we follow the journey of Simon Emerson who finds himself in the past but is certain it is merely in his head as he attempts to undo his failures in life and achieve his lifelong dream.

Title: I was Reincarnated as Bai
Synopsis:
The young boy opened his eyes, what he saw was something that he never expected. He was sitting on a chair in the middle of the dark room. And in front of him was a computer monitor. "What is this?" The boys uttered as his dark eyes opened wide. "A script?" The young boy even surprised at what is displayed on the computer screen. "The author of { Legend of the Perfect Emperors }." The young boy narrowed his eyes and read what he saw. "I'm Bai. The best author in the world. No one can criticize me or fool me. I'm perfect."

Title: My Orange Glove
Synopsis: An adventure, through worlds filled with savage barbarians, beautiful scenaries, and vicious monsters.

Title: Milky Way: Story of Eden
Synopsis: In the year 5016, THE MILKY WAY FEDERATION has expanded research facilities and space colonies throughout the Galaxy. The dastardly ABRENO REGIME has sent spies into Federation Controlled science facilities in deep space. On the edge of the Vakkaro Star System, a lowly dwarf star gives light to a single small ice planet. This solar system is restricted allowing only FEDERATION ships to enter. On the small planet of FC-1293-Keta, resides a large science base for the INTERGALACTIC SOCIETY OF SCIENCE dubbed THE EDEN SCIENCE COLONY by the organization.While the possibility of a spy is low, tensions are high. Scientists work every hour in this colony on advanced experiments in order to better life in the Galaxy and for THE FEDERATION.

Title: Armorless Knight
Synopsis: After the end of the last war begin a new age that bestowed upon the Torrelia kingdom, the age of enlightement. Many academies sprung out after the success of the first ever academy Barrelia Academy. This is a story of a boy named Ren as he start his quest of finding the answers of his family and himself.

Title: 8 crystals of the world
Synopsis:
Earth rules began to change. Dead animals sometimes disappeared and left an item, monsters and treasure chests appeared out of nowhere, people began to see a transparent screen, some can't pull the trigger on a gun no matter how strong they are while others can't swing a sword. Some can survive a train crash unharmed while others will have a broken bone after getting a slap once. The cause? A meteorite that came to the earth and shattered into the 8 pieces. 
Red Crystal on the Grand Canyon granting people with Melee Skill
Blue Crystal on the Blue Lagoon granting people with Magic Skill
Yellow Crystal on the Sahara Desert granting people with Agility Skill
Green Crystal on the Amazon Jungle granting people with Ranged Skill
Brown Crystal on the Uluru granting people with Tank Skill
Purple Crystal on the Komodo Island granting people with Summoning Skill 
Black Crystal on the Black Forest granting people with Curse Skill
White Crystal on the Mount Everest granting people with Supporting Skill

Synopsis: A self-insert story(as much logic as it can have or I can put in it), a little different than most, as the name says about his personality, he is easy-going (lazy). Title: The Structural hack.
Synopsis:
Zen is a fifteen-year-old boy who is still in high school who accidentally receive an insane power that practically makes him a pseudo-god in itself.
In the world where humans are ignorant of what lies in the dark, Zen will find and change all that lies even beyond the dark.
This story was supposed to be made to write for fun and experimental on an inconceivable logical idea I had dreamt of. XD

Synopsis:
Inspired by their father's words. These brothers set off with a goal of conquering everything in their path be it, betrayals, romance or themselves. Synopsis:
This is a story about a high schooler that loves light novels,anime,and manga gets reincarnation into the world of Ishtaria.

Title: The Abyss
Synopsis: One must always come to terms with their own mortality. Death is an omnipresent force in our lives, one we can never truly escape.  Her fear of death drove her into a land of nightmares.  Only the strong survive, then they too die.  In a land ruled by the fittest, she will learn that survival always has a cost.

Title: Reincarnated as a Troll in a Dark Fantasy World
Synopsis:
A troll wakes up in the "forest of beginning" of a fantasy world with only faint memories of his past human life and unable to speak. The human realm will spare no expense to bring down this monstruous threat. While clinging to his humanity, the troll must use his cunning and modern knowledge to survive and evade the hunters.
 
It is a dark age in a world of swords and magic, ruled by superstition and iron-clad rules. Tradition and conformity are the absolute cornerstones of society. There is no calendar, people count time by seasons, or days. Death, famine and vicious monsters are everywhere. People clutch in their communities, afraid of what is outside.  Here and there, a Hero rises, his tale brief like a shooting star.
 
Powerful monsters that drift too close to human's realm must be eradicated at any cost, or society might crumble. The Troll comitted this sin.
 
This "isekai' LitRPG novel is an experiment in writing. We commit to the "Adventure" and "Fantasy" genres, but it might have comedy, romance, and both dark and light tones.
 
Some events in this novel are drawn from random encounter generators and others are decided on a die roll just like a tabletop RPG. Things take a unpredictable tone!
 
Non constructive / offensive comments may be deleted without previous warning.
 
Daily Updates: One each monday through friday, two on saturday and sunday.
 
As of september, the updates will be every even-numbered day.
 
Cover Credits: "Ett gammalt bergtroll" - John Bauer, 1904 (with modifications)

Title: Riftwrought
Synopsis:
A 1000 years ago the world was irrevocably changed. Rifts to other worlds opened and monster poured forth. Not only this, but some humans began the change - their eyes turning to violet gaining an immense power inside them. The humans fled from their capital city from where the only permanent Rift had spawned, starting life a new elsewhere. Erecting a Wall to keep them safe from the Denizens of the other worlds the humans survived.
A thousand years later Rifts still appeared throughout the continent and every ten years the Gateway Rift, where their capital once lay opened up. Denizens were still about but the Riftwrought were drying up. The Hunter's school had been established when the Riftwrought had first came into this world and this is now where our young hero Tairis, has arrived.

Title: Getting a Common Game Ability on Normal Life [Revised]
Synopsis:
This was based on my other story, since i made a mistake somewhere in the middle and the story kinda became generic.
**
Suddenly, without explanation, a transparent screen appeared in front of random people around the world. 
They were bestowed with cool abilities like, [Fireball], [Heal], or [Summoning]. Some used it for the greater good, others for their own benefit. However, some had meh ability
Like my sis, she had [Daily Spin] that allowed her to get a random gift every-day 
I knew another guy that had [Spicy Breath] spewing fire from his mouth whenever he ate something spicy
As for me! i had [Mini-map] as my ability! like what the hell! seriously!? Now I’m stuck with a box on the top right that blocks 1/16 of my vision…
Right, i didn't forget to mention about monster right?

I do not own the image, I put random images from the internet and photoshopped it
And feel free to criticize me, at least point out where I make the mistake ^^

Danetello helped me making the description!

 
Follow my patreon at
https://www.patreon.com/KidyZ 
Also i have a discord channel
https://discord.gg/KYC8yM
If you have interesting idea about common tropes in video game feel free to join in ^^

Title: Path to Godhood: The Silver King (RWBY)
Synopsis:
A man given an unknown chance, was brought to the world of Renmant. With the body of a child and the a trusty system. Follow him as he does his best, to change the fate of the entire world.
To protect those who he cares for, and defeat the forces of Darkness.
But remember the more you alter the the world, the more rewards you will recieve. Yet thread carefully as the unknown is filled with many possibilities and great danger.
Only those able to leave a mark in the entire world are worthy of ruling it. 
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
This is my first story, but because of my limited time. It will be pretty fast paced, but i ask you to bear with me as the content exist mostly for my enjoyment. 
I would appreciate any constructive comments as English is not my first lenguage.
I hope you enjoy it.

Title: Dogma
Synopsis:
There was a laugh, a laugh that, at the time, only served as torment, but nevertheless a beautiful laugh, behind the door. 


     A middle-aged beat cop stationed in Camden, New Jersey, takes in a young, stubborn, and streetwise prostitute after a sting operation leaves her with nowhere to stay.  Getting to know each other, they bond over their troubled pasts, and within months, they find they are strongly attracted to one another, mind, body and soul, but in a sudden twist of events, they're targeted by the American mafia. The cop turns in his gun and badge, the call-girl resigns, and their lives are changed forever.

Title: Can I really create a VR game?
Synopsis:
A jack of all trade trying to create a Virtual Reality game
He isn't a genius
He has no money nor connections
He doesn't even have the required technology to run a full-dive VR program and has to make it by himself
He will do it in the way no regular people ever thought about
Will he success? Obviously he will, since this is his story. He will success not because he can do what people can't. He will success because he can see what people overlooked.
But is the goal really that important? Or it is the process?

Title: Speed Build
Synopsis:
Nobody really understood when the screens came. They only had a minute to grab what they could, for anything else would be left behind forever. Humanity has been summoned to Altera, a world of swords and sorcery.
For 16 year old Max this is both a shock and a dream come true. A world where people can get stronger by leveling up? Heck yeah! But first he needs to figure out how to survive in this new world. All he has is his wits and his speed. But for Max, that may be just what he needs.

Title: Space business draft
Synopsis: A science fantasy script I have been working on

Title: Inori's Plan
Synopsis: In future times specially trained children named basilisks train to protect the dome cities on the remnants of earth's ashes. With resources run dry, a new resource called cervenium is mined and used for everything from energy to food. Only the prior inhabitants of earth don't agree with this. The children do as they're told from higher ups, but are they doing the right thing? Specially trained mechs and swordsman are all that stand in the way of millios of lives lost.

Title: KHR-Secret Idol
Synopsis:
Aidoru Gakuen
Shia and Kyoya were childhood friends. Shia wanted to be an idol so Kyoya decided to help out.
Apart form Shia, the only people that know that she is an idol are just Reborn, Hibari Kyoya and Sawada Tsunayoshi.

Title: World's Strongest Halfbreed
Synopsis: Tada Ruark is a goblin in a another fantasy world washed with the constant notion that death could be around the corner.  being a cross breed of human and goblin also means he doesnt fit in with anyone. as tada flees from an encounter with humans trying to hunt him he's presented with a opportunity to  finally prevail against his lonesome living style. when an attractive female adventurer wanders into his living quarters for the night tada panics as to whether to flee into the dark abyss outside or stick around.

Title: My Story in the Otherworld
Synopsis:
This is my story and how I came to be. You may think "what the hell is he talking about". However, I have quite the story to tell and you may actually enjoy my story.
 
Let me just say that this is an experiment I'm doing. I never wrote something like this. I'll try my best to write the best I can, but I can't guarantee the best results. However, I'm going to make this my masterpiece and try my best to make it one. Please be patient with me and let's go through this journey together!

Title: Era Of Mist
Synopsis:
So, it's the apocalypse, yay. No more jobs, no more taxes, no more freaking anything. Less stress overall, even with giant killer rats, mosquitoes, and all the rest. Our protagonist, Jesse, is trying to survive the apocalypse. Woohoo, let's all root for her. She has a bit of a weird mind; her body's got scars all over it, and let's not spoil anymore about who she is; let's just say she's been through some stuff.
She doesn't know it yet, but she has a year and a day to somehow make her planet safe, or safeish, and I don't know about you, but monsters everywhere are not conducive to safety.
With her intellect, sheer grit, and somehow or another a huge helping of luck, both good and bad, here's hoping she can make it, because if not, well, I don't want to spoil the surprise.
This book will have some basic tags from the beginning: adventure, action, mystery, horror, etc. Others will be added as needed in the future as things start expanding.
This is my first book. I am a native English speaker...sorta. Do give me some constructive criticism; it shows you care.
My final goal with this book is to write an amazing series and an amazing story about the journey of Jesse and the other characters and to show character growth and overall just entertain you. Because sometimes reality stinks, so a good book and a reading nook with some snacks, a lamp, and a blanket, and you're happy for life.
This book is first person for the first Arc, so about the first 10 or so chapters after that it moves to a third person unreliable with a smattering of first person point of views. I like the unreliable narrator and think it is interesting as a story device. The reason being you yourself have to think a little to figure out what's truth and what's not and how each of what I say in the mystery reveals itself as a bigger unfolding of events, little by little.
Overall, it's a good book, is what I hope my ratings, comments, and reviews say. Do all of those, yeah. Wouldn't you want to be encouraged if what you're doing is awesome or not? I do, so please speak up; your voice matters.
1 chapter on Saturday every week. Might get 2 if work is lighter.
Ps. Era of Mist is only on Royal Road Legends. Please tell me if it shows up elsewhere. Thank you.
I write this on my phone 90% of the time so minor errors may be present. I apologize for this; inspiration strikes randomly and at work I can't pull out my home laptop and type away like a madman.

Title: A Century Later
Synopsis:
Follow a genderbent summon who gets deviated away from a simplistic ending.
Many thanks to all the awesome readers & others who supported me~!My first published story, a 1st-person draft converted to 3rd-person form.Thank you everyone for the honest feedback since it means a lot to me.With what I've learned, I'll find time to rewrite this from scratch and return.Consider this a test run since a badly rooted tree can only branch so far.Certain tags only appear later. Once again, thank you, and enjoy reading!

Title: Fenrir
Synopsis:
Fenrir the first of the beasts; who guided man in the earliest of their days and earned devote worship, for teaching them the art of hunting and cementing their bond with nature. Yet the pantheon of Gods grew jealous of his idolisation and devotion, only emboldened by the oracles prophecy, which foresaw that he who walked amoung both man and beast, would be the end of their King.
They tricked and deceived him, before binding him in Godly chains; locking him away until the end of time in the deepest reaches of the underworld; there he lay for eons, slowly forgotten by even the Gods themselves and left to rot… or so they thought.

Title: The Tale of the Alchemist God and his dark master
Synopsis: Alrow was right. If you wanted to describe Bower's fighting skills, the word pathetic wasn't enough to cover them.Thankfully, he was an alchemist. He didn't have to fight, only brew a potion.A potion of a rank hitherto unreached. Not even mentioned in myths, it was so high. And use it to defeat an Archdemon Emperor who was billions of times stronger than he was.Within a deadline of one year.Easy, peasy, farbreasy, parcheesy.Now, he could understand the pressure of middle-aged managers in Japan.However, seeing his fate, should he fail, he made up his mind.He would SUCCEED.Hopefully.Or: a very lighthearted novel about a middle-aged taxpaying, itinerant alchemist who finds himself in the wrong place, at the wrong time. Stupidity ahoy.

Title: The Awakening
Synopsis:
Spoiler: Spoiler


 



 

Spoiler: Spoiler


 



 
On the eve of his manhood Michael Craven awakens to new powers which makes him aware of a world he never knew existed.Now an ancient organisation wants to hunt him down at any cost.On the run, the only things he can rely on is his newly awkened power and a mysterious girl who claims to be his servant.

Title: My home is NOT your rest area!
Synopsis:
Florence Anselm, a stubborn 57 year old spinster wakes up in the middle of a desolate wasteland, only to discover that she has become…
“....???”
“A PLANT!!?”
And so the story of Florence Anselm begins as she tries to survive in a dangerous new world, caught in a war of survival between heroes and monsters.
My first fiction :D please go easy on me~

Title: Divine Responsability (Dropped)
Synopsis:
This Fiction Is Dropped
 
How it feels to be powerful? To be nearly unstopable? To be able to do almost anything? Awesome, right? But what happens if you add a responsability to you, a big one at that. Would it be still awesome? If you had incredible strenght, but also have to protect many lifes, it would be still awesome? Would you like that?
Power corrupts and absolute power corrupts absolutely.

Title: Mists of Creation
Synopsis:
I died.
Wasn't as bad i thought it would be really, just agonizing pain accompanied by my soul being torn from my body, ending with a sprinkling of nothingness for about five minutes.
Then some guy named Shaun showed up and sent me off to my reincarnation, what a nice guy.
Oh, and according to this 'System' my Soul is unique, Shaun gave me a weird smile when i told him that, ominous right?

Hey, it's me, the author, this is my first time writing anything like this so don't expect anything.
There will be slow updates.

Title: Out of Space
Synopsis: The crew of the Training Ship UNS Singapore escaped from an alien fleet, finds themselves stranded on an unknown planet and has to survive against deadly monsters and magical creatures.Genre  Sci-Fic, Fantasy, Magic, Kingdom Building,  Army Building, Technology gap, War, Grand Strategy Book 1 Chap 001 - 200 Book 2 Chap 201 - 400 Book 3 Chap 401 - 600 Book 4 Chap 601 - Ongoing----------------------Updated the previous chapters for spelling and grammar mistakes.Updated with a MAP !https://ibb.co/msigDzMap of the New Worldhttps://ibb.co/eHMM0K----------------------Audio Narration by Agro Squerrils on Youtube!https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TvM0lAnxdGo----------------------Please support if you enjoyed my story! =)https://www.patreon.com/neobearDiscordhttps://discord.gg/A8Tm86V

Title: Brain Cultivators
Synopsis:
Muyoung is a young 18-year-old student who was unfortunately killed in his previous world.
In a world of exciting cultivation, he quickly realized that something was very wrong
The larger the cultivation the larger the head

Title: Experimental Western Novel
Synopsis: In which a man goes to claim what he is owed.

Title: The Last Trial
Synopsis: Humanity has forgotten its roots in this futuristic fantasy where an evil entity that influences all known intelligent life is poised to end everything as we know it. Our unlikely hero must unlock his hidden powers in time if anything is to be salvaged. Evil, sentient dungeons and mazes must be explored, with the constant threat of dangerous puzzles. It is unknown if the weapons of the future and the forgotten past will prove to be enough.

Title: The Story Forgotten
Synopsis:
Well, Im not really sure what to write, and my grammer/spelling is shit so don't complain. I will be writing my mind. Comment if you like it and want me to continue. Genres are going to be unkown.
Here we go: An ancient forgotten being awakens and is born from its eternal slumber by a small boy who has nothing and no one, driven by hunger and instinct the beast goes to traverse the world evolving it's mortal body along its path. When death comes over the horizon and revenge has only started what will happen then...
Found Cover on google, can replace if issues arise.

Title: Decisions
Synopsis: Ivy Rose is different. She's always been different. she's accepted it until life throws at her obsticals that derails her from her perspective. People start to tease her about her past, a past she finds haunting. She puts on a fake smile and pushes through, but what if enough...just isn't enough? One major decision will lead to one huge consiquence. will she be able to keep herself from doing that decision?

Title: Hunger
Synopsis:
A small boy finds himself unwilling to accept his dark fate as he fights the hunger. His body and the world around him however have a different plan for him. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The cover used is by Randis on DeviantArt

Title: Bloody Angel
Synopsis: Death awaits everyone at some point. However, a young boy who almost met it was not saved by a divine messenger nor a hero of lore. No, he was saved by the filthy hands of destruction, a demon. Now equipped with knowledge and power only a demon would familiar with, Akiael Fanlus, survivor of a massacre, will purge the world of its filth using the power of myths and creatures passed down generation from generation. His victims are not the demented monsters that torment mankind. But against threats against the percieved order and balance within the world. Man, God, Demon, Monster, Beastman, good, or evil? It does not matter. If he can prevail over his enemies, then means are of no concern. A world of sinners awaits him and many adversaries who are willing to serve his head on a platter.

Title: Higeki no Hiro
Synopsis: A young man dies in an attempt to save a girl from hoodlums one night, and awakens in a void he assumes to be limbo. A voice speaks out to him in this void, and ask him to destroy a great evil in his next life, offering him a boon to aid him. The boy who has always dreamed of going on such an adventure accepts and is sent on a journey to save the humans from a mad king of evil.

Title: Strongest Protagonist's Aura
Synopsis:
So, you're given a chance to reincarnate into another world, what special power would you choose?Extreme mental capability? Immortal body? Power of creation? Oh wait, you could choose the Strongest system? Or the Naruto system? Maybe an ultimate evolution system?Hell no! Obviously you should choose the Strongest Protagonist aura because only that is truly invincible!
NOTE: Story already elsewhere under same author (Fluffypie)
WARNING: Chapters 1-12 are prologue (tend to be boring). They can be skipped if you don't want to know some background info. (Start at Arc 1 Chapter 1)

Title: Aeon
Synopsis:
"Sense is polished, and talent blooms, but what does it mean when u seemingly don't have both?"
In a world where humans have surpassed themselves and civilization has evolved along with that progress, Lumen Razio, a sixteen year-old boy has lived his life suffering through reality's cruel treatment of the powerless. However, fate won't always leave you empty-handed. He's given a chance to study in a prestigious school where the greatest talents are developed.
With a will tempered through hardship and determination to gain strength, he begins his endeavors, discovering the light and darkness of the current world, delving deeper as revelations are made known, all which seem to pull themselves towards him. A story where several youths in their journey to overcome their burdens encounter one another and in the process, change the world around them, now begins.

Title: For Grass and Glory
Synopsis:
Being old is difficult. But losing the love of your life to natural selection and being left in the dirt is even harder. Join Walton in his final journey as he figures out if his principals are just as important when there is nothing left to lose. Combating hypocrisy, youth, bad diet practises and a general lack of respect towards humanity, Walton's struggles are the true adventure of the everyday man. 
A story about unlikely friendship, being old, unexpected beauty, and the obsession of kicking a round leather ball in the best way possible. A story about a new world, and its possibilities. A story about the grass, and let us hope, a small bit of glory? 
 
Author note: This is a project of mine I started in 2016 and recently been writing for again. Writing for me is something I love to do, but can't always find the time for. This is also the reason I have not finished (or come close to) Ethereal Space yet. I get distracted. 
I started this novel intending to create something else, to break a bit with the current go to's story wise in the litRPG or virtual reality communities. So, this is my attempt at "Something different" I would love feedback or just your general opinion. But most of all, I hope it entertains. 
Enjoy!

Title: The Tower Defender
Synopsis:
A unique idea for a novel!. Check it out! RPG, Blue Screens, Level Up, Skills, Magic, Monsters, Questing,
and most of all, Tower Defending.

Title: Laksil
Synopsis: Laksil is about a protagonist who’s is liked by a few gods so much so that right before his death, he’s taken to a white room on the whim of one of these gods. He’s grant dominion over a whole universe. He trades for power worthy of a god and in the end is tossed into a world that he arranged but doesn’t have any memories of doing so, because it was part of the deal to acquire power. Watch the protagonist stumble his way through all of creation, will he be worshiped will he be evil or good, who knows.

Title: Second Life
Synopsis:
A boy is imprisoned for twenty years at the age of ten and instead of a juvenile prison he is sent to prison meant for the adults. He struggles for twenty years, but when his time arrives for freedom he learns that he has only few months to live. 
What would you do if you had died without living at all? Would you ask for a second life?

Title: AROWNE'S REBIRTH
Synopsis: There was this one guy that lived in modern earth, he died in his 20's, and somehow due to mysterious reasons he was granted the chance to be reborn with his memories intact by some servant of the creator of all worlds with one wish granted,as for the world in itself,he was given the choice of suggesting a theme, and it will be selected at randomi will create a discord in the future for the fansand for the record when the discord is made the fans can take part in making the story

Title: Didalam Dunia Raja Iblis
Synopsis:
'Berpindah ke dunia lain' 
Beberapa orang mungkin berpikir jika mereka akan bertemu dengan dewa atau orang yang memanggilnya.
Tapi, kali ini berbeda...
Bagaimana jika yang memanggil adalah Raja Iblis, yang dengan sengaja menantang manusia dari Bumi...

Title: How To Tidy Up Loose Ends
Synopsis:
And they lived happily ever after... PSYCH. It's time to tidy up the loose ends and get the true closure that they didn't know they needed. 
 
A/N: Working on this for NaNoWriMo. I love how it counts my words for me.  Didn't work out but still continuing. 
A/N: Previously titled How To Lie. The story I had in mind for this title didn't end up happening so I think it'll end up as a trilology. 
1. How To Tidy Up Loose Ends
2. How To Lie
3. How To Love

Title: UNDR Online: Fever Dream (LitRPG)
Synopsis:
Being blackmailed is never pleasant, but it’s even worse when you’re not sure you did anything wrong. Harry Deveau, Editor in Chief, spends his nights in a digital reality called UNDR Online. On some of those nights, he partakes in dalliances that his wife tolerates because, in her eyes, they aren’t real. The women he meets all look to be attractive and of legal age, but in a virtual world, appearances can be deceiving. 
Harry needs to know the truth. Paying the man holding his life ransom is not an option, and he refuses to let a lie ruin him. He brings in his most trusted friend and protege. Casey Tillman, to help him get answers, but those answers can only be found inside UNDR Online. To get them, Casey will need to enter an entirely new world. one where the inhabitants party, kill each other, level up, and return the following night to do it all over again.

Title: Define Heartless
Synopsis:
His depression eats away at him until he could no longer see himself.
She might be what Sherlock would call "a high functioning sociopath".
She became his light and he, well, became her dotted on pet.
 
                                                                                                       
 
Three part story -
Part I: Seph's POV
Part II: Vivian's POV
Part III: Epilogue

Title: A Blank Tale
Synopsis:
I only hope to be with him for this life. For he's the one who fills in the blank in my life. Yet, my mind only draws a blank as to who he is.
(NOTE: Story under same author (Fluffypie) on different site with same progress)

Title: One Life
Synopsis:
With everything in tatters, Jason jumps on the bandwagon of One Life: Virtual Vacations and Adventures. Giving up everything he knows, he logs in to the game, hoping to find a purpose beyond the rut he had found himself in, in the real world.
Lucking out early, Jason discovers a questline no one had managed to find, the now Deran finds himself in a sticky situation, relying on his new friends to help him stay alive. Especially since in this game, you only get one life.

Title: Unknown Genome
Synopsis:
What is being a 'person'? It is being a person, feeling emotions? Or it's being a person to be able to think on our own? Only humans could be a person? Or other... Things could be a person? You can think, you can talk, you have feelings, you have a personality. I can think, I can talk, I have feelings, I have a personality... Then, why can you be a person and I can't? What makes us so different? What's the difference between you and me?
Created, imprisoned, used, experimented upon, tortured and discarded. That was my life up to this moment, that's how I've lived since I was born. Now they wanted to kill me. You know why? Because they can't understand me, because they don't know what I am, because they are... Scared. They are scared because of that, they are scared of me...

Title: Legend of Yomi
Synopsis: The story of a betrayed God reincarnated as an orphan with no memories of who he once was as he dies his soul was transported into the body of a female imp. On her journey she grows and unlock her sealed memories

Title: Pathogen: Chrysalis of Monsters
Synopsis: An unknown pathogen has spread and everyone is currently infected by the inactive form of the pathogen.Activated pathogens are prone to various mutations, creating zombies and even monsters that are not supposed to exist in this world.

Title: Chooser of the Slain
Synopsis: A death is a terrible thing to waste. And for our hero his death isn't his own to spend. It belongs to the Morrigan the Chooser of the Slain.

Title: Trails of Ascension
Synopsis:
At the top of countless universes that constitute the Great Cosmos, stands the Divine Realm also known as the "Peak of all worlds" where the Gods reigned supreme and all ascension stopped.
But the Path is endless, and upon the discovery that there were actually higher realms in the path of ascension, a revolutionary army of ascenders and warriors of many dimensions rose up to overthrow the reign of the so-called Gods.
The resulting Cataclysm shattered the Heavens and the death of the majority of powerhouses threw the Cosmos into chaos, but it also granted freedom to all.Upon the destruction of the chains that oppressed them and now that the seal upon the countless worlds has been broken, how will the new ascenders face these challenges and how will their paths intercross each other?
This is the story of how new powers rise into existence, heroes and overlords ascend to the higher realms and the new order of the eras is formed, now that the regents of the laws and elements of the multiverse are gone, new paths are created and a future of infinite possibilities opens!

Title: Upside Down
Synopsis:
"Sometimes you have to let life turn you upside down, to learn how to live, right side up."
Eighteen-year-old Milan Lohmann was a typical teenaged social influencer. With a promising school career ahead already accepted into the best university in the country and right about to make it in freestyle skiing, major brands were in line to sponsor everything he wanted and needed.
Add Cara, a supportive and loving near-girlfriend, too many friends to keep track of and a nation-wide fanbase to the mix and a seemingly perfect life is created. But the fifteen minutes of fame have downsides to it and while Milan tried to juggle sports, his career and his friends, he didn't have time to appreciate to advantages of his life.
But sometimes all it takes is the blink of an eye and a very hot-headed jerk to turn everything upside down.
And maybe another hot-headed jerk, a hyperactive guy without personal boundaries and a bit of luck is all Milan needs to turn his life back around.

Title: Crow
Synopsis:
Awakens starting appearing when beasts start pouring out of cracks that appear in the space other than in dungeons.
When these cracks appear which now called dimensional crack countless people died and cities were destroyed. After fighting these monsters for 20 years first human awaken appear and change the fate of humans that was on the brink of extinction and again human become leading specie. Awakened people wield power that was beyond human capacity. Some awaken has the power to destroy boulders with bare hand, some were able to produce fire from thin air and so on.
After some researched human know this power came from a formless energy inside the human body that convert itself in these abilities. This formless energy was named as Aura.
After approximately 1000 years after first awaken appear. Human stopped producing aura in their body. After the initial panic, one of the researchers found that Aura also found in nature named as Aura particles. So, they started researching and found a way to absorb Aura from nature. Now there are techniques to absorb Aura from nature. And also help to expand capacity to store Aura in the human body.
The human body starts absorbing Aura only after they become 15 years old. If younger than this try to use any technique to absorb Aura from nature they will die painfully.
There are some cases where human body starts producing Aura naturally regardless of age and they can tame beasts this ability is only these people have.
Now everyone who practices aura particle absorption techniques can be awakened.
This story take place after 3000 years of first awakened. It’s a story about a boy name Ethan who was ordinary in all aspect but because of this world cruelty he has to become powerful to protect people that are important to him. See him overcoming many hardships only by desire to protect others.
P.S this novel is also on webnovel
https://www.webnovel.com/book/11195721705294205/Crow

Title: Lingua Terra
Synopsis: A man experiences an uncouth death and makes his way to the afterlife. His death had been caused by being summoned into a fantasy world. He is reborn into a new world and given a journey he's not quite sure he wants to fulfill.

Title: Modern system
Synopsis: This is not a story of a loser/failure.  This is not a story about cultivation.  This is not a story about reincarnation.  This is not a story about a second chance.  This is not a story about time-travel.  This is not a story about the apocalypse.  This is not a story about a different world.  This is not a story about beating/fighting everyone you see.  This is not a story about chasing every beauty you see/meet.  This is not a story about being a horndog.  This is not a story about gods and demons.  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Modern system (MS): this is so fucking hyped man.  Mr. Easy: After reading this, I realize that a lot of people would think, what this gonna be about. I mean I literally just said no to so many cliches/things.  Modern system (MS): so, you are not gonna tell them about the story, man, you are such a tease.  Mr. Easy: I know the cover is horribly made, but I am not an artist, and I am a lazy person so...

Title: Nagareboshi (Shooting Star)
Synopsis:
A rumor can only become a rumor if it's not certain. Once it is certain, it stops becoming a rumor.
But a rumor that fulfills a wish becomes a legend.
And that legend is just what Ryou and Mayu needs to support them in their current state.

Title: Who Am I?
Synopsis:
Lyle grew up an orphan taken under the tutelage of the main religion of the continent The Dragon Order. Growing up with always being discriminated against for not having dragonkin blood in him. 
Adding on looking more beautiful than most men and women drove him to wear a mask while staying as far as he can from the church. Going on peace keeping pilgrimages kept him from dragged into the darker political side of the church.
Every year on what he assumes is his birthday when he came of age he started hearing a neutral voice asking him in his dreams, “Who are you?” Responding with his name silences the voice every time. Yet, what happens when everything he knows and believes is wrong and he finds out he is not who he thinks he is.
Join Lyle as he sorts through random memories that show up at night of different people and what they go through. Will he be able to keep his sanity long enough to discover who he is to save the world or will he change to a person who doesn’t know who they are descending into madness while the world is covered in darkness?

Title: Shut-in Reincarnated as Gorgeous 17-year-old Girl
Synopsis: A fat 31-year-old shut-in, Kazuki Katsuhisha, died in an accident when he went out of his home for the first time in six months. He met with this bad luck after saving a child too. Feeling wronged, he refused to go to the afterlife, and then found himself reincarnated into someone else's body. However, the body was of a gorgeous 17-year-old girl. What's a guy to do in this situation?

Title: Technically Deceased
Synopsis:
Sam Sterling's life is pretty dull. His work in technical support for The Ancient World, a fully-immersive VR-RPG, pays the bills. Well, his work and his three roommates' work. Living with his best friends from childhood is fun. Working with them is amazing. Playing The Ancient World is even better. They are the perfect raiding party. They don't need to pay for a subscription, nobody knows they work for the game's developer, and he's getting ready to make the most important decision of his life. 
Artos is a talented swordsman,maybe the best in The World, serving his dear adopted sisters as their backup plan when magic, arrows, and stealth don't work. He lives for the blade and for his family. He's vaguely aware that when he is asleep, a man named Sam in a world far away wakes up. 
When Sam's body fails him, can Artos keep his family together? Will Artos remember what Sam was planning, and can he still do it?

Title: The Awakening: Adventures in World of Cultivation
Synopsis: After a life-altering car accident that left him in a coma for over three years, the protagonist's world takes an unexpected turn when his consciousness is awakened inside the highly acclaimed virtual reality game, World of Cultivation. As he delves into this immersive and captivating action RPG, he becomes the first human to have their entire consciousness transferred into the game. Tasked with being a beta tester and game moderator, he discovers a thrilling new destiny awaits him. Alongside the game's advanced AI system manager, Emma, he embarks on a journey filled with challenges, mysteries, and legendary creatures. As he explores the medieval-themed virtual city, he encounters Persephone, a powerful being known as the Bringer of Death, and an epic battle ensues. With the prospect of forming a comradeship, the boy must prove his strength and skill in an intense clash, all while unraveling the secrets of this extraordinary world. Join him on his awe-inspiring adventures, where dreams are born, and the boundaries between reality and virtuality blur in "World of Cultivation: The Awakening."

Title: Black Book Saga
Synopsis:
Lux was taken from his burning home on earth to a slave training outfit on Eden as a boy. Luckily his fate saw him purchased not for his potential as a sex slave but instead for the latent potential for magic within him. Trained as a battle mage and healer for the kingdom of Avalon, Lux had a respectable standing in life and an envious status as a slave.
Yet all good things must eventually end, and as the four worlds brought together thirty four years ago drift closer to inevitable conflict Lux finds himself the subject of a strange prophecy.

Main Project
Random Releases (On Break)
Cover Wanted!

Title: Fairy Tale Romance
Synopsis: Anastasia is in love with none other than popular boy Jacob Williams who actually has a perfect life. Well, now you know a little about who Anya is… So do you want to know more? Then dive into Anastasia’s world by reading “A Fairy Tale Romance”

Title: Wandless
Synopsis:
Self-Insert into the harry potter universe while changing as little as I can from the original text. Main character is just an average joe doing his own thing while harry and his friends go about messing with things like normal. Have seen all the movies but only read the first book so I'm most likely gonna miss somethings from the books.  First time writing a story like this so don't expect much but if you think I could've done things differently let me know in the comment section. I'm writing this story as a hobby while doing uni so the length between updates may vary from a couple of days to a couple of months so don't think Im dead or have abandon the story if I havent updated in awhile, I will let you know if either of them have occured.
PS. When doing a review of my story do a proper review plz. I dont want any "this is good 5 stars" its makes it really hard for people (a.k.a me) to find stories worth reading.

Title: Time Travel System
Synopsis: One day Nathan got the system with the ability to time travel.

Title: Once Upon a Box
Synopsis:
The world of Terrania has thousands of epic tales to tell. With the countless possible combinations of Levels, Skills and Jobs available, there is no telling who or what might leave its mark on the pages of history. There are stories of heroes who triumph over insurmountable odds and villains that threaten the freedom of all living things with their ambitions. Tidings of monsters that lurk at every corner looking for their next meal and undead that strive to strangle the life out of the living as their instincts dictate. Legends of Gods who shaped the world to fit their vision, and great demons that sough to wreck it for their own amusement.
This, however, is not one of those tales.
This is the story of a man who finds a cat in a box.
DISCLAIMER: This is a slice-of-life spinoff/prequel of my other story, Everybody Loves Large Chests. You probably won't get what's going on if you're not familiar with that one.
CONTENT WARNING: Contains scenes of attempted adorableness and terrible cat puns.

Title: "Not your typical Demon King"
Synopsis:
Rue Griselle Han born as a normal girl, her parents expecting she will help the family in the future but instead she grow up to be another dissapoint just like her eldest brother or even worse than her eldest brother. She become a neet even though she have graduated from college, she could not decide which job that she wants because everytime she wanted something her parents disapprove of it. She could not even chose her own course in college leading her life being a girl who did not know what to do with her life. Because a girl needs to know how to do chores and cooking but she suck at it. So she drown herself by reading books to comfort her lonely self only books make her feel alive, when she reads it she feels like she was the main character in those stories doing incredeble things but reality is cruel because when the story ends her fantasy came to a stop bringing her back to the real world in which she was just another worthless person.
"I wish, I could die. Maybe then in the next life, I could do what I want and be who I wanted to be." - Rue 
As tears fell down her face like waterfalls, she grabs the knife and pointed at her throat. She slowly press the knife to her throat and blood spill she winch and stop she throws the knife away.
"Hahaha! Pathetic, I'm pathetic I can't even kill myself. Ha ha ha... I'm so afraid" - Rue
tears still streaming down her face, she trembles hiding beneath the dark corner of the room.

"Nothing (blushes)....(cough), I'm just talking with myself that's all." - Rue
??? (/I did not know our demon king is a weird fellow/) - (####)
"Y..y..YOU! (Points at him) What's with that look of yours?, your thinking I'm a weird demon king right?!" - Rue
(####) ?--->? avoids looking at him. "YOU PEASANT!!!" - Rue
"Rylen Ruega Ishwar Vasilias I" - (####)
Rue/Rylen flinch looks back and smile nervously. "Hello mother" - Rue
"Ohh! You still remember I'm still alive huh?... Oh my?! Where are my manners your highness (helds her skirt & bows gracefully). Please forgive me" - Mother Rue/Rylen
Cold chill run down the spine of rue/rylen and nervously spoke in panic. "You! Don't have to do that mother" - Rue/Rylen
Mother Rue Rylen smiles wickedly and said "just so you know my dear beloved son even though your a king. I'm still the empress in which more higher status than you. You flaunting your status calling your imperial knight a peasant just because your father is not around to teach you good manners. Does'nt mean I will tolerate this, come my dear beloved child. I will teach you how to be a good king."
"WHAT?! Are you doing mother!?!, wa..w..why? Are you holding that bloody wwhip! While smiling evil you old hag!" - Rue/Rylen

Title: Wonderland Secrets
Synopsis: This is a sequel to Adventures in Wonderland and it's told by Sapphires perspective again. About a year has passed, everything was going fine  but  what happens when they receive terrible news?

Title: Heavenborn - LitRPG
Synopsis: The year is 2044. VR-MMORPG is the most popular Olympic event this summer. Fame and fortune await the winners, while national pride and greed motivate the contestants. To win the ultimate prize, how far will our unlikely heroes push themselves?

Title: Corrupted Guardian
Synopsis:
The world was devastated by wars lasting for centuries. The glorious civilizations were crushed or succumbed to their own corruption. The society was plunged back into dark ages, knowledge was lost or forgotten. In this world full of gloom and doom a mysterious creature is weaving his own fate in hopes of prosperity.
Within couple decades of his life he gathered a substantial knowledge and now is time to act. Yet he cannot act alone, his plans need allies and friends. He needs people he can trust and rely on.  
This is a story of his adventure towards his heart desires. Beasts and monsters, humans and elves, beastkin and others will stand in his way.
 
Be advised: The fiction will feature smutty content, questionable morals, pointless violence and gore, cardboard characters and most off all poor English.
Saying that please give it at least three chapters. I want to know what you think.

Title: IWH Bonus Chapter: Birthday Party
Synopsis: A Standalone story taking place 7 years before the start of IWH. A tale of two sisters that sets the course of events for the main story.

Title: Hunter's Bond
Synopsis:
When Simon immerses himself in the world of Apex as Arheis the Guardian, he finds a living, breathing ecosystem that feels more real than anything he’s ever experienced before. The creatures that inhabit Apex are cunning, ferocious, and a massive challenge for even the most experienced hunter.
In order to rank up in the Hunters’ Guild and participate in the most prestigious hunts, Simon will have to slay increasingly more threatening creatures and use what he gathers to craft powerful armor and weapons.
But a fearsome beast stalks the jungle, untouchable even by the Guild. To have any hope of stopping her, Simon won’t just have to level up and hone his skills--he’ll have to put his trust in his fellow hunters.
And for a lifelong soloer, that’s no easy feat…

Title: Return of the Soldier King
Synopsis:
"We own the English License of this series and are posting here with the permission of RRL's staff." 
After returning from a special mission abroad, he is forced to accept a job as a bodyguard. He is then tasked with the mission of protecting the powerful (and beautiful) CEO of a multinational company based in Shanghai. Follow Ye Fei in a story that isn't afraid to go over the top and pokes fun at they typical Wuxia, Xianxia, and hero tropes found in most Chinese Web Novels.

Title: My Nightclub Landlady
Synopsis:
"We own the English License of this series and are posting here with the permission of RRL's staff."
After my brother in arms died to save my life, I swore to protect his sister, no matter the cost. Little did I know the grip the underworld had in her town. Working undercover in a Nightclub/Hotel in the gangster infested city of Tianhe, I must deal with the problems that arise from corruption, money, and the search for power.

Title: Soul Cultivator
Synopsis: a town is masacred by beastkin and only three children escape. This story follows the survivors journey to gain strength in order to get revenge.

Title: ORTUM DOMINUS
Synopsis:
What would happen when a weapon engineer gets reincarnated in a magical world?
Brian's life was turned upside down when he died in an accident. To his surprise, he found himself in the body of city lord in a completely different world. A world where magic was not just a fantasy but a reality.In a world where death, political conspiracies, and war was commonplace. will Brian be able to keep himself alive?
This is the story of a lord giving the world of magic a simple taste of the power of science. 
There will be lots and lots of ROMANCE AND ACTION so Enjoy :)
