Title: The Chaos of Evolution
Synopsis:
Earth broke down. Some people left, some didn't. Not many of those who remained survived.
But those who survived, EVOLVED. Men who mastered their bodies to the peaks, beasts that overcame their instincts, elementals who gained sentience, machines that accepted humanity - species, known & unknown enjoying peace and evolution for millenniums in the Continent of ILND.
A drop of chaos..... Will they survive again? Or will they become stepping stones for others??

Title: The Burning Empire
Synopsis:
When a nuclear war burned Earth apart, a new empire arose. Rebirthed from the ashes of society, the Phoenix Empire prospers and grows. When Jason Werner is discovered to have an incredibly powerful Gift, he is sent off to the Academy to train his Gift for the good of the Empire in the war on terrorism. Jason must learn to conquer both his Gift and his classmates in his struggle to achieve.
This is a Sci-Fi / superhuman novel. It is my first real attempt at a novel so any and all feeback will be appreciated.

Title: Secrets
Synopsis: Secrets are kept by everyone. Some may keep them for protection, or gain, but all are kept in fear. Kyle, your average angsty teenage boy who sucks at drawing, attempts to unveil the secrets of the mysterious transfer student, Mickie, while coveting his own. How will these kids cope with bullying, unrequited love, and strangest of all, Magic?

Title: Shades of grey
Synopsis:
Our MC appears in Star Wars universe. 
Force powers, space battles and amazing women compete for his attention.
But sadly, the MC is now hard as a rock...wait, what?

Title: Tribe Online: Conquer The World
Synopsis: Shi Xieren is a runner athlete. He starting running at the age of 8. At the age of 10 he starting to attend the running competition. At the age of 12 he become the fastest in the Zhoushan. At the age of 13 he become the fastest in the Zhejiang province. At the age of 14 he become the fastest in the China. At the age of 15 he become the fastest in the Asia. At the age of 16 he become the fastest in the World. At the age of 17 he stopped running because of some incident which make him could not run anymore. But his legend doesn't stop here. He stopped running in the real world but he continues running in the virtual world. Join Shi Xieren, the fastest runner in his age creating his Legend in the virtual world.

Title: Bones in the Sun
Synopsis:
Everything's a mystery. New lands, Gods, demons, magic, and a coffee shop.  
-

Title: The Path Toward Heaven
Synopsis:
Time is a tide. 
All that it gives, so it must take.  
Thus once more, sleeping giants must wake. 
Once more, dead gods turn in their tombs. 
Once more, monsters stalk city streets. 
Once more, the world changes.
Once more, an era of peace meets its end.

Title: Ishval (French)
Synopsis:
Ishval est une planète, un peuple mais aussi le debut d'une histoire.
Je rajoute un avertissement ici: Cette histoire contient de la violence, du sang, des morts et plus tard du sexe.

Title: Travelers in a Strange and Wondrous Land
Synopsis:
A camping trip gone wrong, a flight of terror into another world entire, and a prophecy detailing the return of a monstrous, all assimilating entity known as the Denizen and the six warriors whose ancient weaponry is said to be the key to reseal it.
For ten teens, a send off for a friend becomes an adventure none saw coming and few could dream of wanting, but what is life like for those not guaranteed by prophecy? And is prophecy enough to protect you in the face of all dangers?
More importantly, however, is whether the Denizen is the most dangerous monster, or if that title is held by one much closer to them than any could have imagined…

Title: You're Kidding, Right?
Synopsis:
The life of an author isn't the most glamorous, and only the slightest bit stressful; however, no author would expect that they'd be dragged into their own work! Taking the guise of the most powerful entity in his story, this nap-loving author must adapt to his own world to survive... and hopefully see his old life once again.  
 
[Hey guys, author here! The story will be updated regularly (to the best of my ability). The Cover Illustration is from the Pintrest of cobaltplasma, in case anyone was wondering. Gore will be sporadically placed throughout the story, but not a mainstay of the story by any means. More like goat's cheese - a wierd flavor that you want to try every once in a while (just me?). Suggestions are appreciated. Hope you enjoy the story! ]

Title: The Arcanum Principles
Synopsis: The Arcanum Principles: A set of rules that governs all natural states of magic, imploring that Warlocks heed such ancient advice. When an old Prodigy of the school begins to continue the sins of the mysterious past, a wayward young man is thrust into the venomous world that sits beside our own. Heralded as The Chosen One, our unfortunate lead isn't quite so lucky - as his status as 'Savior' is but a farce; to mislead the great decievers and players of both social and mystic machinations, he must fight against this concoted destiny that he has been given.

Title: Vampire Lord Lorik
Synopsis:
I do not own the cover of this novel I found it on google if you are the owner please tell me I will give you credit in the description, Thank You.
I will be releasing a chapter for this novel every Monday.
In a world much like our own, there are monsters in the shadows such as Vampire, Werewolves, Ghouls, and many more and they have been in hiding for nearly 10,000 years
but due to an arrogant and warmongering Werewolf known as Renkas who thought they should be top of the food chain started a war against The Humans at first they were winning but due to the humans ingenuity they found that the monster's weakness is silver and the course of the war changed in one night and after a hard-fought 13 years Humanity won the war over the werewolves but they didn't stop there.
knowing there are monsters lurking in the shadows Humanity founded a private military group known as The Venatores which is Latin for The Hunters.
Over the past 27 years all around the world, The Venatores have been eradicating anything they think is a monster even monsters that if encountered would never harm someone such as fairies and gnomes but The Venatores don't care.
The Vampires are near extinction with barely 100 or so left all over the world and most of them are younglings barely 100 years old but there are still 3 Ancients left in the world.
First, there is Lord Zano he is roughly 1200 years old he built a monster city known as Sanctuary he is a peace-loving man but that wasn't always the case as 300 years ago he ripped apart an entire city of humans by himself when he found out they killed a baby ghoul that wasn't even a day old.
Second, there is Lord Remidor he is roughly 800 years old and is the Head of Security at Sanctuary and is a good friend and advisor to Lord Zano the reason being is 48 years ago, Lord Zano saved him from The Venatores and since then he has vowed to spend 200 years repaying him.
Lastly, there is Lord Lorik who is the oldest monster in the world as he is roughly 7,800 years old and over his time he has made one thing painfully clear, he is not good nor evil he does what he wants when he wants and no one can stop him and even the Venatores have decided to leave him alone until they have the means to deal with him.
 
I apologize the first chapter will be very short roughly 400 words just to get this approved and see what you all think of this kind of novel. 
 
This is the first novel I have ever written and my grammar sucks.

Title: Chronicles Of The Voidbearer
Synopsis:
Follow Andrew, a young former special-ops participant, as he lives his last moments on earth. Faced with an abyssal enemy, he shows why humanity has become the top of the food chain and why they will prevail no matter the odds. Naturally, where there is war, there have to be sacrifices, and Andrew had never been one to shirk responsibility. Yet it seems that death was not his destiny. 
Isn’t it great? I found myself in a new world full of magic, monsters and mystery, surrounded by people I love. Having been summoned by a kind old sorcerer to live my life in peace and happiness. I am enjoying myself immensely. 
No, joke a side. It feels like I have jumped from a slight problem right down to cluster-fuck with no stops in between. My soul feels still raw from having been high-jacked right before I could enter heaven and don’t let me talk about all the other things that have- and still are making my new life a damn roller-coaster. But not the kind where one enjoys the ride. No, the one where the builders had stopped after having finished the first half of the loop…
So, yes, please join me! Having some more bodies will cushion the fall, and who knows, maybe I will survive.
Be not surprised. Most of the time I am pragmatic, strategical and efficient, only sometimes I need a short break to let off some steam. 
topics: journey to another world, magical school ark, adventures, some detective work (not sure how much yet), battle and a lot more
There are multiple POVs, but the idea is to only use one real POV and smaller others to complement. This will not be a multiple storyline novel. 
_________
Cover is self-made, can change in the future
_________
This is my first fiction and as I am not a native I will have writing mistakes.
I do this because I love writing and want to improve my English, so I am looking forward to many constructive comments. :-)
enjoy

Synopsis: A story of how a cabin boy in a ship was transported to a game of fantasy before he died. This is my first book that I have writen and will welcome any tips on how to improve. Title: Glimmer, A Throne of Souls (An RPG Gamelit Novel)
Synopsis:
Adam is on the way to see his fiancée when he wakes up in the game world he has been alpha testing. He proceeds to waste multiple lives with suicidal tactics (not by choice) on the first monster he meets before getting sucked into quest after quest for truly bazaar reasons that fail to advance him getting home. A journey that takes him all across the Beyond and forces him to level up and find gear. Forced to fight for his life Adam has a limited number of lives to spare and because of his earlier mistakes... not many left. 

LitRPG / dungeon core

Synopsis:
In another world that the king of Satan has mastered, the remaining humanity must accept this bitter reality.

From the beginning this figure of the hero will appear ...

When aliens secretely took over the world, they made students fight eachother using special Artifacts to survive.

Title: Unexpected Consequences
Synopsis:
All that occurred in this tale came about because the Gods Of Light overreached. Becoming complacent with easy victories they bit off more than they expected. The resulting chaos in the five worlds that they controlled brought great changes and opportunities.
 
NB: This story uses UK English spelling.

Title: In Fairy Tail with Magic System
Synopsis:
Magnus was an proud otaku who had just learned he had less than a month before brain cancer killed. Not long after learning this he ends up ran over by Truck-Sama after going to meet up with his best friend for a binge anime watching marathon of their favorites. He was ready for his rest, though annoyed that he hadn't deleted his browser history before he did so, only to be told by an angel he was needed in another world!
Now, reincarnated in his favorite anime/manga series Fairy Tail with an amazing system and a surprising magic he discovers he's not the only traveler to come here and some have far more nasty goals in mind. Follow Magnus as he protects his guildmates from evil plans while attaining all kinds of magic and new allies along the way!

Title: Princess Of The Black Castle
Synopsis: The gods are beings that create the worlds and many races, they enjoy looking at their creations and the things they do be it war or peace, but sometimes they want to change it up a little so they created a very special being called the demon king and his kin the demons so they created an endless cycle of death for the king and his kin, but that same demon king and his kin manage to escape the cold cage created by the gods, and now he is reborn as a human what will become of this new world?

Title: Kata Street
Synopsis:
Number 225, Kata Street, is filled with a complex mix of characters and personalities. From the beautiful Maya, to the curvy Josephine, to the dark and terrifying Mama Akunna. This masterpiece carries great humor, , romance and real time happenings in Nigeria and beyond seen through the eyes of these robust characters.
Riveting, mesmerizing, reality altering and deeply immerses..

Title: The Primordial
Synopsis:
With one goal fueling him, he broke through the final barrier, reaching the apex of power and regaining that which was once lost.
Trying to find a new beginning, he reforged himself anew as he awoke to memories of a long forgotten past. Memories that intersected with his new reality.
His invincible soul now unchained, surprises await him as he begins his new jouney in an unknown land.
 

 
I'm just writing this for fun, but i'll never drop it. This won't be something short, as I have the very long term in mind, but I'm a total noob to writing, so I most likely won't release chapters very often, at least until I really get the hang of it. But, the chapters will always be several thousand words long. At the minimum 2k, maximum like 6k... Pretty big variations, sorry.
If you like it, great. If you don't, that's understandable. Regardless, if you have a read, I'd appreciate feedback for areas you think I should improve on, whether it's the use of some words or how I should write something or WHATEVER. I'm open to anything, good or bad, because with your help, it'll help make this story better.
**DISCLAIMER**
So you don't waste your time, I want to let you know what you're getting into, because I like knowing ahead of time before I read something.
This might appear like a Xianxia novel, but it's not. It only starts that way. This is a western fantasy world and setting that many of you are familiar with.
The beginning chapters might be a bit of an info dump. Some of it might seems superfluous, but a lot of information is relevant to the story. The first few chapters might also seem rushed, but I'll try to keep it exclusive to those.
This is a cliche, OP MC story with the typical harem, but other than the quick start, everything else will be gradual. There will be romance, and probably many moments at that, but don't expect anything TOO detailed. If you want something really steamy, look elsewhere.
References and throwbacks to stuff most likely.
The setting won't be really dark or really light. Middleground, I guess. The MC is far from a young kid, but he won't totally reflect his age.
I don't plan on discarding info, abilities or characters that you KNOW should come back and be around. I see it a lot and it sort of bugs me haha... but I could have oversights, I dunno. As I said, I'm a noob.
That's it, really. If you're interested, welcome to my world!

Title: Yuri Dungeon [Discontinued]
Synopsis:
Goddess Dungeon Master Zellana installed fear throughout Tiapra. Working with the [Demon King] and his cohorts, they plagued mankind with their forces. With Goddess Zellana by his side, they never lost their lands to the advancing humans. Zellana's dungeon was a lot of things. A prison, a torture chamber, an arms factory, a training yard, a monster facility, an academy- it was a lot of things. It served to be one of the greatest dungeons in the world.
 
But due to the peace between demons and mankind, Goddess Zellana got bored of the peace and Tiapra. Unable to cope with this era, she traveled through various realms and worlds, exploring the mysteries and wonders of these other dimensions. 
 
Two thousand years later, she returns home, longing to see her kind again, missing Tiapra.
 
But sadly, cause of her disappearance, time has changed. And her dungeon has been forgotten. Correction: It's in ruins.
 
Watch this former Goddess remake her dungeon into something that is completely different from its former glory. Abandoning any means of servitude, she will show everyone what she really wanted to do.
 
Hint: If you know your Japanese, the first word of the title should give it away 
 
Warning: 18+ Will be heavy on the lesbomancy.
 
Edit: I guess I should also place this sort of warning down here because even if I am writing this for the heck of it, there will be scenes/implications/recurring actions of rape. It may be silly, at first, but when it comes down to it, it is, technically, the MC doing whatever the heck she wants and enforcing her views and actions onto another being unwillingly or against their will. So if you did not read this, you miss the warning label.

Title: Princess Dragonslayer
Synopsis:
It's an old, old story.  Princess is in a tower, guarded by a dragon.  Prince slays the dragon and rescues her. Said Prince is then awarded the Princess and half of her kingdom.
Arriane is having absolutely none of that.
She takes fate into her own hands and forges a path of her own.  But in a world where stories are practically alive, she's going to learn that all choices have consequences.
What you can expect:
This is a more “traditional” fantasy writing.  There’s no game system, numbers, or levels.
Hopefully: Good writing, humor, interesting characters, and subverted (or avoided) tropes.  LGBTQ themes will be present.
I have around 50,000 words written currently.  My motivation to write tends to come from feedback - if you like the story, please tell me!  If you like parts and dislike other parts, please tell me! Hate the story? Please tell me why.
I will be posting a couple of chapters initially, and then at least weekly until I run out of content (based on the remaining story I am expecting this to go around 100k-120k words for Book 1).  Chapters are in the 4k-6k word count range. If I get a good response, I may write more and post extra chapters.
Tags:
Gender Bender: No “true” gender swaps, but crossdressing and gender role mixups.  This is not used for titillation - it’s important to the plot.
Multiple Lead Characters: With some exceptions chapters will alternate between the FL (Princess) and ML (Prince).
Profanity: Present but not excessive (one character may not obey this because they are an asshole like that).
Sexual Content: Fade-to-black.  Nothing explicit.
Gore: Fighting scenes but not overly descriptive.
Traumatising Content: Rare, but there will be occasional scenes that fit this warning so I wanted to call it out.

There is no sun but a fallen sun in the world of a certain wanderer.
Yet, all he can do is to live on.

...

Zheng woke up by the continual noise of the voice. "Huh? what is this System thing?"
*****************Special Announcements*****************
Schedule Release: Probably 2 or more chapters per week.
Question #1: Why so little chapters?Answer #1: I only have 2-3 hours worth of writing time per day.
Question #2: Will you drop this novel?Answer #2: Of course NOT. Not to my knowledge.
Question #3: Your grammar sucks! Why?Answer #3: English is my third language meaning, I'm not a native English speaker. If you want, you can help me edit my mistakes. :D (free of course)
I'm happy to hear your thoughts so leave some comments and let me know what you think. Thanks for reading, I see you around.
***************************************

Title: Elswynd
Synopsis:
One day the news inform that lately, people have gone missing leaving only holes on the ground where they stood.Upon hearing this from the news Leon thought this was just some elaborate hoax but soon things turn grim as his dog Robert disappears leaving a deep hole in his backyard.  
After this, the veteran Leon goes frantically running into the forest near his house thinking that his dog had ran away for some weird reason. But something happens in the forest and Leon is never seen again like the others that disappeared.
A story of how a veteran with PTSD is reincarnated into another world. 
On his search for his dog Robert, Leon explores the world that wasn't as great as he first thought it was, as he faces the situations affecting the races of Elswynd and the ongoing tensions between nations.
   Tag Grimdark comes to play as the story goes further. Slight comedy but not enough to justify the tag.

Title: I was reincarnated on the One piece World
Synopsis:
An ex marine officer who was fired by the government was executed with death penalty for case of theft of private and secret documents in the Pentagon of United States and being a part of International Terrorists Isis. 
 
Unfortunately, all of this was just an alleged accusation. Despite of his prestige and good record in marine, he was still sentence to death.
 
Before he died, he just remembered his favorite anime One piece. Remembering Whitebeards word, he terribly shouted his dying will.
 
 
" ONE PIECE EXIST....ONE PIECE IS REAL ".
 
Yet, soon as he knows that his death had arrived, his body trembled and an unconscious calmness covered him. He was like a golden Buddha who had reached Nirvana. Facing Death with out regret.
 
 
Later he find himself in another world, a world where in he himself is very familiar off. He wonders around it and saw a huge crowd around the corridor of every street.
 
On his way he saw a tall execution platform. 
Yun , cannot believe what lies in his sight.
For right in front of him was none other than the famous execution platform, where the said pirate king was slain.
The platform where Pirate King Gol D Roger was executed.. 
The Logue Town..
 
Jason an ordinary exmarine was revived on the Real One Piece World...

Title: Ringing In My Ears
Synopsis: Shadows are humanity's tag-alongs, with the ability to empower, demoralize, enrich, or disturb, unbeknownst to those they tail. It is up to Violet to intervene when they cross the line, but when she has her most vivid dream in recent memory, she realizes she is up against a formidable adversary. Ian, a guitarist in a local band, joins her quest to find and stop the shadow, only for the threat to be closer to home than he ever could have imagined.

Title: Isekai Knights
Synopsis:
Power and glory and fame, none of it matters, none of it should, when one is faced with a challenge they shall either rise to meet it or fall before it.
  A battle rages on; between good and evil, between a man and an army, between a king and a heretic; two forces opposed with the crown at stake. Many fall and many die, as he charges across the field, friends and foes all fall before him until at last he stands alone at the foot of the hill. And there he finds the final boss rallied against him. That was the day he lost, he lost everything; and in the end nothing changed... Well that's not quite true. Rowan Cloud collapses before his computer, after suffering defeat on the virtual battle field during a global event; and when he wakes he finds himself trapped within the game he once knew.
  Not cliched enough? Well every other players who had scored within the top fifty positions on their respective server are in the same predicament. But unlike everyone else, Rowan or as he is now known Coughin is left with nothing; no friends, no family, no allies, aid. He'd faced that challenge once before: he'd raised himself from nothing to heights greater than he could have dreamed; now he must do it again but this time it isn't a game.
  Let us see how he shall fare.

Title: Fridays (Continue) Online
Synopsis:
Sequel to Continue Online
Kenneth’s had people die in his arms. Not fake deaths from television or video games. These were friends in the military and passengers in the ambulance he attends during his day job. Real life, is shitty.
He escapes on the weekends into virtual reality. The best games come with ongoing story lines, an interactive world, and bars that have all the effect of real liquor without the hangover. When the drama and bar tab get too high, he re-rolls a new virtual body.
Consequences aren't so easy to escape. The AI conspiracy brings real life and virtual problems to bare, and Kenneth will be forced to face the things he's tried to put behind him.

Title: Powerforge Girls
Synopsis: Zander has no powers in a world filled with superheroes. And supervillains. When his suddenly kick in one day -- the power to summon deadly (and beautiful) prisoners from a hellish alternate dimension -- which will he choose to become?

Updates twice a week.

Title: Femalekind (Completed)
Synopsis:
Femalekind
If you read my story on any website besides Royal Road, the website has copied my story without my permission.
Book One (117,025 words):
Created by Prometheus, exiled by Zeus to placate Aphrodite, her new soul is scarred as an apology to Prometheus' tormentor Aetos, the Caucasian Eagle, the spawn of Echidna. She must discover what it means to be human and then what it means to be female in a new world far from her creator. Will she hold on to her humanity, embrace existence as a monster as does Aetos or be a slave to the first powerful presence she meets in this new world?
Book Two (173,714 words):
Zeus betrays Aphrodite, and she seeks revenge. Oh, and if she breaks free of Azizos that wouldn't be a bad thing either.
Book Three (127,130 words):
Aphrodite tries to spread her worship across the known world. This book further develops several threads from Book Two as multiple POVs, with Aphrodite as an essential influence instead of the MC.
P.S. the Covers are made from free resources and originals which aren't mine, they are works re-imagined by me, so if the original artist contacts me, they will be withdrawn.

Title: Twice Lived
Synopsis:
Previously called Standard Reincarnation Story
In a fraction of a moment, the Earth was no more.  The planet was destroyed, and billions and billions of people were dead.  And it was all an accident.
This is the story of Elm.  A regular American born once on earth and given a chance to be reborn again on a planet with magic and monsters and dungeons.  Except that for Elm, this is far from the idealistic reincarnation into a loving family -- the standard story of a child raised by loving parents who teach him the ways of the world,
Instead, Elm is born into a family of inquisitors.  An order of nobility that is dedicated to hunting down and killing "Twice-Lived" -- the name society has for people like Elm who are reincarnated with all their memories of their past life intact.
 
Disclaimer
This story is:
1) Extremely violent and graphic.
2) Still in a rough draft stage.  I see what I am writing more like a synopsis than a fully fledged story.  I periodically will go back to flesh out earlier chapters, build characters, etc... If you find the words "Show don't tell," comforting accept that unfortunately, I'm not at that stage of the writing process yet.
3) At one point this story was called "Standard Reincarnation Story," and I had written an extremely off-putting description of the story. This was mostly to keep out people who would just read the silly first few chapters then rage quit as soon as the violent stuff got started.  Since I just had my first .5 star rating (without a page read count increase) that technique is not working, so I might as well treat this as a regular fiction and try to get regular readers.

Title: Escapee
Synopsis: A short story I made purely because a friend of mine wants to steal my characters and make shitty stories before I release the first full book

Title: What if the world was an RPG?
Synopsis:
What if the world turned into an rpg?
Throughout my entire life I always dreamt about magic, fantasy and otherworldly stuff that could never exist in my world.I would constantly daydream about being a hero in another world or maby a demon king in another world.
Not only would i dream these dreams for years on end, but i would also ask myself questions such as "what would happen if people got superpowers" or " What if there was a RPG-system that gave you a class and powers and so on".
These were just some of the questions i would ask myself on daily basis, well rather than to ask myself questions about it. I dreamt about it, I wished for it and i begged for it, but to no avail.
So what was to come now, when a bluescreen suddenly popped up infront of my face and my surroundings turned to white.

Title: Guanyin's Journey to the West
Synopsis:
This is not a fast-food novel.As I open and flip the history, there is no timeline. "Virtue and Morality" are written on all these askew pages. I cannot fall asleep, so I stare at the words. Then, I finally find something from the words and in between the sentences. This whole book is solely written with "Man-eating".
----------------------------------------------------------
I have arrived in another world and become Guanyin Boddhisattva, a guy who looks like a woman with endless passion for all.
When I was still in the 21st century, I wondered if Guanyin had a dick. After I have become him, I look down and check it...... Oh, I do have a dick.
I used to think I can help every living being getting out from all sufferings, until Buddha says to me: 'Now that naughty child Sun Wukong is your responsibility.' After that, my daily has become clearing up the mess done by Buddha, done by that monkey Sun, done by Jade Emperor, and done by other boddhisattvas. It is hard to earn payment as a boddhisattva these years.
As the Goddess of Mercy Guanyin with tens of millions of followers, I am busy with dressing myself like a woman to get back their monk robe from the evils, transforming into a woman to test their sensations, enlightening them as a woman since then......
From Lingbo Fairy, to an eighty-ish old woman, I have tranformed into every possible woman forms I know.
If I have one day free from Sun Wukong's bothering, I will be impressed and cry and light three insences for myself in one of my temples.
PS: All Buddhists will not have a lover.
================================
Leave here if you dont like this novel. 
Dear other authors, leaving a low star rating here is not going to stop me from going further on this novel. Deities will know what you have done and you will be punished once you have spent all your positive karma.

Title: World Integration ~ Ever Since the beginning of the Apocalypse, I Alone Awakened the Rare {Mimicry} Trait...
Synopsis:
With the rapid advancements of modern-day technology, science, and medicine. Humanity has now entered the age of prosperity and peace, slowly spreading their seed of influences overall towards the furthest reaches and ends of our entire planet.
Landscapes are thereby terra formed to make it more hospitable for human inhabitation; deep deforestation and excavation in order to cut down upon trees to leave room for more tall skyscraping building and houses. And animals that have been mass bred in selection to become dairy products, meat food ingredients to be used in cultural cuisines, or otherwise are to be kept as live pets to be used as social companions and emotional relief for stable households, etc.
Everything then began to change when a Unknown Being from a much higher plane of existence and galaxy then arrived upon our world.


This story was based upon Yue Hajime's story [The Broken World] which was discontinued, with some added elements and plots from the novel [The Legendary Mechanic].

Title: Tragic Lesson
Synopsis:
Gourhurst is a place for wayward souls. A place for the dearly departed. And an endless nightmare where all manner of things go bump in the night.
To the seasoned eye this is all part of the norm. To Raine, Gourhurst’s newest inhabitant, this nightmare is one bizarre encounter after another. Survival amongst the central city’s cobbled streets and shadowed homes means constant vigilance. And a healthy dose of luck, especially when even the lamplights want Raine for their next meal.
Now insurrection is brewing, and Raine is at the center of it. A center of amiable fishermen, a pair of startlingly small giants, and persistent ghouls who cant take no for an answer.
Oh, and mimics. Cause you never know if the fork your eating with is going to lick you back or not.

Title: Skill Online
Synopsis: Time keep walk and walk. People always miss or getting left behind by the time. Always happening to all of us. It's same for the gamers. We catch up or left behind by the wave of time. Technologies keep getting evolve same with the game. Each company game try to gain fame, money and power in the world. However the balance of competition collapse with one of the group team company game in the world. DREAMS Team, the combination of few big and small company working together building a true Virtual Reality console. They success and offcially announce the new  game for VRMMORPG, Skill Online. It's spread like wild fire around the globe including one of the popular streams gamer, Meian or known in real life is Zic. He planned to try how this VR and game work but the gear of fate start spinning make his life changed. Behold Skil Online. Players can do anything they want with "skill" to become adventure, tailor, chef and many other occupation in game.

Title: Star Hell - A Survival Game Novel
Synopsis:
Black Hawk was a burglar, one of the best. His heists were on the first page of any newspaper and boggled the minds of the guards. None was known about the man except he would steal treasures and it would appear in several places for auctioning.
But he WAS a burglar. He crossed path with an idiotic newbie which knocked him out and both were arrested and shipped to a prison planet. The timing couldn't be any better as the famous survival game, Space Hell would take place in a month. Unlike the prior editions, it would have 10'000 players instead of 1'000 and the game prize was also ten times that of the previous ones: 10'000'000 Credits.
He makes it his goal to win the prize money and live a happy life. However, the planet where the competition would take place is a deadly planet where everything from the animals to the plants wanted the intruders dead, not to mention only ten winners could be decided after a 10 month period, however, the players are oblivious to the fact. Can our infamous burglar actually win the game, or would he fall to the cold grasp of death?
 
 
----------------------------
 
Word count: 1200-2000 per chapter
Release: Static
Author: New

Title: Next Life: Awakening
Synopsis:
Welcome to Novus! Where the only limit, is that of your imagination!
Upon the decimation of the earths surface due to nuclear war. What was left of humanity was forced deep within the Earths crust, far from the deadly radiation. The human life has been reduced to a virtual reality paradise, that is, SO vivid and realistic that it feel as though you are REALLY living! Explore a vast landscape populated with countless species and structures designed by our very own pilots! In Novus, you can find adventure, danger, or even love. So make the best out of your new life in that stasis chamber and try your luck in the world of Novus! Where the only limit is your imagination!
Good luck!

Title: Derek-Derek goes to hell
Synopsis:
Join Derek-Derek, gap-year knight, and Hardhat, handyman, on their quest to escape hell and get revenge on the demon who put them there. There's just one problem--to get out, they have to go to the bottom layer.
Updated daily.

Title: The Otherworldly Filmmaker
Synopsis:
An aspiring indie filmmaker was suddenly transported to a fantasy world while shooting a scene in a remote tropical jungle. Having no fighting experience or any other experience, he was only left with his film-directing skills and the shooting equipment that was also transported along with him. He finally decided to be the first film director of this strange new world. He will introduce the craft of filmmaking to that world and move the hearts of its inhabitants with his films. 
Extra lore materials/The World of The Novel:

https://www.worldanvil.com/w/grandea-continent-thesilentone

 
This novel is also available in webnovel.com: https://www.webnovel.com/book/11344537705345005 . I am the same author as that website (Diabolique_TSO). TSO Stands for TheSilentOne (my RRL account)Film collage art was done by: https://www.deviantart.com/sandzen/art/Movie-Box-Collage-3-Dramarama-252080201 All rights of the image go to the respective film studio and his contribution to making the art.

Title: KING OF THE ELEMENTS OF POWER
Synopsis: My name, is Alex Rodgers. I have learned , grown, fought and for many years. Anyone, and everyone I have encountered has either died, or bowed. I live by my own path, and my own creed. I this life I shall know but one oath. I swear.... I will become Immortal!

Title: Chromium
Synopsis: Corporal Dia Zephyr assumed it was just another drill, no more than a Navy tradition, a rite of passage for the recruits. She expected a spacewalk, maybe a shooting game inside an asteroid field, skimming along the Collective's border before turning back to the Empire's space.After all, this was what they knew, what everyone expected.But that's not what happened.

Title: Myriad Domain
Synopsis: This is a fantasy novel involving all races and different forms of power. Gods, ghosts, bloodlines, magic, and magic weapons all exist here. The novel takes place at first during the era of the gods and opens up with the first chapter 200 years after the gods have all been sealed. The battle left many after effects and has created what is now called he myriad domain where the people of that aftermath must learn to live while learning cleaning up the mess of the old gods. But it will mainly be centered a group closest to those gods, the nephelim and balmorals.

Title: Trashy story ! v1.5
Synopsis:
Author:
I've made alot of mistakes in my plot,
I've relied on force to do it naught.
Where does quality go?
When you give up patience for speed though?
 
 
This is a story I will begin,
Hopefully this will make your hearts sing!
There's not much I do that is right,
But I will enjoy writing it this night.
 
So those of you who will cheer me on,
Or not i'll be happy to sing you a song!
 
A song in text! 
Wish me luck next! - authors (singular)  
Trashy story v1.5: starto! 
 
Serious synopsis: Hey everyone it's the author here (Not my character named "Author" or "Also author") I'd like to introduce to you my new book "Trashy story"! So you're proboaly wondering what this "Trashy story" is about, well wait no longer I shall tell you! (Or try to sound cool as I tell you nothing.) 
This story will be written entirely in poem style assides from the author notes (Which are in itself a out of character in character commentary of the story.) With this type of format I hope to talk about things which are commonly overlooked in novels, and or things which are blaringly obvious yet often ignored! In the earlier version of this novel I had gone over things such as how the conditions of a fantasy world may force bandits to do what they do, and also the effects of killing a leader will cause! Even if the leader is a tyrant a power vacuum makes life a living hell, and often more of a living hell than before. 
This story was written on qidian as well but I felt like I was rushing too much on the writing (As qidian is use to crazy release rates) so I hope to port it over to here as I rewrite problamatic chapters. Said chapters may be updated on qidian once I find a good foothold to improve the plot again.
Well thankyou for reading this far down on the synopsis, I'm not sure why you've read so far down but thankyou! I hope you will enjoy "Trashy story" v1.5 as much as I enjoyed writing it!
"Trashy story" v1.0 : 46 chapters (24 not counting side storys) 
"Trashy story" v1.5: rewrite starting at chapter 35 (21 not counting side storys) 
You may be wondering why half of the novels publication so far (as of writing this synopsis) is side story (Bleh... filler!) Well that is because the side stories are where I develop most of the world building. (They really are only called side stories because they follow the side characters and antagonist) 
Note: The origional novel (V.1) can be found on webnovel... Howeverrrrr I will reupload every "Okay" chapter up to the breakoff point here as well. Proof of me moving over to royal road (And not shamelessly stealing chapters) can be found in the latest chapter "Temporary haitus: Partial rewrite") 
V.1: Link 
V.1.5: You're looking at it (Well atleast I think you are!) (Hosted on royalroadl)

Title: Bloodlines
Synopsis:
5 Friends are teleported to another world and given fantastical powers. They are given two goals; establish their bloodlines and become Gods
 
First story ever written so go easy on me
S/O to my friends for inspiring me to write this story and for inspiring the characters.

Title: Journey to Power
Synopsis:
What is true power in a universe where power ceases to have meaning?
Journey with our main character Simon Dawn as he tries to figure out what to do with the power he has been blessed with.

Travel across multiple universes, strange planets and parallel earths. Fight against blood thirsty "heroes", crazy aliens and anything that goes bump in the night why because you can...

Title: Long Winter
Synopsis:
Countless atomic wars caused the earth to fall into a permanent winter state forcing everyone to live within safe zones under control of the military forces.
¿But what´s ouside the safe zones?
¿Why are soldiers still fighting outside and never coming back?
¿Who's the real enemy?

Title: Seizing the Light
Synopsis:
Daryl as far as he’s known has always been surrounded by the never-ending darkness. His parents and everyone around him abuse him almost to the brink of death. Then one day he is given an opportunity to break out of the darkness and seize the light for himself. But not before learning that the world doesn’t revolve around him and that the various forces don’t always allow Daryl to do as he wished. 
A story with unique power systems, character progressions. A good story (attempted) reinforced by complex side and main characters. Contains action, adventure, mystery. tragedy, psychological challenges, scheming/mind battles and even a bit of philosophical stuff, romance (don’t read it for the romance..) and horror all in a low fantasy setting

Title: Zenith: Journey to the top
Synopsis:
A young man wakes in a strange, yet curiously familiar world. With missing memories, no allies and not even the knowledge of his own name, he must somehow find out how got there, why he was summoned and perhaps finally uncover the mystery behind his own origins.
Meanwhile, a chance discovery in the Minnian swamps threatens to set the world afire with war and, to the east, old things better left forgotten are stirring...

Title: The Journal of the Restless
Synopsis: Follow the story of one who sees beyond what he should.

Title: The Wizard's Rise
Synopsis: Damien Krell is one of the most powerful human wizards on the planet, born and bred in wealth. But after a rebellion against his kingdom goes awry, he's sealed and mysteriously transported to another world--a world where gods, goddesses, dragons, and a multitude of other fantastical creaturs exist. And unfortunately for him, it looks like there are a few out to get him. Now he just wants to figure out what's going on.

Title: Carl's Cosmo
Synopsis:
Carl is a downtrodden, late twenties, depressed man. After an event, he finds himself somewhere else.
 
The title is more to do with the story taking place in Carl's view of the world and what's around him (his Cosmos), than it does with actual space stuff. So don't expect starship or lightsabers.
I'll update the synopsis once I have more than one chapter. I have an idea for the story, but I haven't started writing except for this. I'll probably do a chapter a week until I find a groove to get into. Nothin exciting happens in this first chapter, but it does set the tone for how the novel should feel. Let me know what you all think. Also message me for any grammar/spelling mistakes, I'm trying to do this nifty trick where I read what I wrote before posting it.
DISCLAIMER!!! I shamelessly stold this image off of google image search. If someone wants me to take it down because they own it I understand but find it unlikely.

Title: Reincarnate into Another World as a Bicycle
Synopsis:
Boom, David Lee got run over as he saved his crush from being rammed down by a drunk truck driver.Why was this so? She was too busy listening to music while riding her bicycle... But in return, what does he get? He is reincarnated into another world thanks to some mysterious force.
Given a second chance in life, though at first, he would had rejoiced, but the Gods seem to have laughed in his face as he is reincarnated into another world as that same bicycle with a bicycle system.
So... How will David Lee fair in a world full of immortals and demons, cultivation and martial arts, beauties and scions, as a piece of scrap metal?
------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm posting this story on another site Quidian, with the exact same profile pic, and name tag as my own, but if you see my story on anything other than these two places, please report.
There is proof on the synopsis of the story.

Title: Onward
Synopsis:
The meandering thoughts of an imortal, continueing, simply moving onward. 
Expect little in swordfights, or conventional heroics. Simply the thoughts of a man as he does.
 
Authors note: the chapters are short, very short--I have no intention of changing that. While fantastical magics are avalible the main charachter is not a hero in the triditional sence. What I am trying to fulfill is not something engroseing but interesting, I hope it strikes your passing fancy.

Title: The Master and The Slave
Synopsis: In Weyshers: The world comes crumbling down for Naya Nimmith, a princess, albeit naive. The same day that she came to face her farther's terribly cruel side, she also witnessed her mother murdering him. As a witness to the murder, her mother sells her to slavery. In Targia: Respected and adopted by the Royal family, a military trained slave finds love in the midst of war, only to witness her death. Following the war, Nesto Fashier is lost and only finds his way by living a life of servitude. COMPLETE.  Edit: Next novel up: NUMB

Title: Geneticae Navigatio
Synopsis:
Todd never knew his parents. He was found at the doorsteps at a church, security cameras failed to identify his parents so Todd was raised adopted. Todd is an introvert and a loner, never having any friends due to his size. This all changed when Todd submitted his first DNA test...
Author: This is my first web novel...I designed the cover page. Please read through this and tell me if there are any problems and suggest what happens next! I only have 2 chapters written anyways. Updates once a week (If I don't procrastinate)

Title: Shadow World
Synopsis: Symposis: Every light hide its shadow to show its brilliance. This is the story of a man, fate choose him to reveal this Shadow world. Technology is always a tool, in the hand of leaders it is a tool to control masses, in the hand of a Military General it is a tool which can destroy the enemy and in the hand of a man who seeks truth , it is a tool to unveil the hidden faces of leaders and Generals. Just like today where governments taking control of internet it will be the same in the future. There always are people who seek truth but there is nothing absolute. This story is about the dark side of VR.

Title: Of Monsters, Malice, And Magic
Synopsis: A world, altered by the original RESET. The manipulation of time has had all sorts of interesting consequences, both for Earth Prime, and the greater cosmos born of the event. Atsuko Kagari, the current holder of RESET, is making her way to the Luna Nova Academy, accompanied by her friend, Sans the skeleton. She muses over a number of things as she journeys there. What adventures does this universe plan to throw at her?

Title: MMORPG: World's Glory
Synopsis: The most popular game, <<World's Glory>> had Thrasher as its top list of players. With the coming of the VRMMORPG expansion, and the closing of the original servers, everyone thinks the top elites will change. They are unaware that Thrasher's real name is Corey Daring, and that he was trained from a young age in various martial arts. At his house, he's regularly called useless by his family, but secretly his account is worth over 50,000,000 RMB in <<World's Glory>>. "You'll never amount to anything son," "You should just take over the company brother..." Corey listens to his families remarks but pays attention to his heart. He wants to be the King of the Gaming World, and in order to do so, he will aim for the title of God once again.

Title: The Alchemist's Tale
Synopsis:
Some say that being an adventurer doing quests for a living was a wonderful job because of the freedom and exploration that comes with the job. Unfortunately, that kind of life wasn't suited for everyone. A mage who found the life of an adventurer too difficult decides to retire and operate an alchemy store instead. He gains a bit of fame from running one of very few alchemy stores in the world, but things don't go too smoothly for him, as he is once again forced to go on adventures... 
* Novel also posted on webnovel, at https://www.webnovel.com/book/11168117505282705

Title: Stromwyrm
Synopsis:
Names grant meaning to our lives.
Those are the words which define the Isles of Strom. A nation where children are taken at birth and raised in orphanages until the age of 5. They then receive their first names and truly gain access to the powers that govern the world.
This tragic tale follows a young boy and those around him through the trials and turmoils of his youth. Borne into lands of magic, beasts, rebels and royalty. Will he remember his past or will he carve out a new future?

 
Author's Comments:
The story starts off with the MC as a 5 year-old but will progress soon after as I intend to age the characters as it goes along. The story is delivered from multiple charactes viewpoints so you won't have to listen to the mind of a child constantly. I hope you enjoy reading~

Title: The Tempestatem
Synopsis: When Gale Storm is murdered, death brings with it an unexpected ticket to the fantastical world of Mioverold - a place rife with dangerous creatures and political conflict. While the adversaries may be driven by common goals, they have vastly different approaches. Faced with these uniquely powerful combatants, and no chance to return to life as he knows it, Gale must decide what to do next. Choosing a side to spend his afterlife with isn't going to be easy, since war is just as much about perspectives as it is about the absolutes of right or wrong.

Title: Saint who defies God
Synopsis:
Warning : This novel contains NTR, Rape, and Gore. For those who's can't handle any of it do not read it!!!
 
A saint is seeking revenge against god.

Title: Fiend World
Synopsis: The story of what happened, when someone tried to save his friend over himself

Title: A Star for Every Soul
Synopsis:
While attempting to escape an ambush, the Prince of Blades damaged ship is sent off course to an unknown destination orbiting an alien planet. Our prince must trap himself in the unstable and untested weapon to survive and face nightmarish side effects no one could have predicted or for that matter imagined.
My spelling and grammar suck and I don't have anyone to run my work past so expect homophones and grammar errors.
 
Release Schedule
I'm going to try for a release once a week

Title: THE HOLY SWORDMAN
Synopsis:
A 6 years orphan child called KAIZ lives as slave, trying to cultivate his spiritual energy, perhaps his master saw him cultivating, he punished him to death, and throw him away in the sea. miraculously, he was safe when he woke up...
what kaiz gonna do next?
let's descover it together.

Title: RUSH
Synopsis: Sci Fi story in very deep future. Humans live in three new galaxies. There is one more planet, the Konran forgotten planet in far galaxy. Earth, and other closer space colonies are history. Story about Liam, human from Konran planet, his illegally arrival on Planet Xemgin in new galaxy. His not fitting in new system, and not possible to leave old habits like rude speech, smoking cigarettes, habits forbidden in new system.Although it is in economy safe and other views this planet and galaxies are better than his planet which is alone in own galaxies but with a lot troubles, and this galaxies system have a lot omissions...

Title: Wolfheim
Synopsis:
Earth and it's civilizations like you've never seen/read before, maybe. What if the gods of olden times were real? What if things like the Excalibur or the Pandora's Box really exist?
Wolfheim proposes all these possibilities and much more.
All that you believe in will be shaken to it's core, hopefully, at one moment or another.

Title: Mistakes Lead To Success
Synopsis:
Mistakes were made and it led to the death of Natalie Freemen. Her soul was captured and cared for by an young god but such protection come with a cost. Instead of taking the original offer she decided to make a deal. She would rome the multiverse and steal the essence that thrives them. In return she could become a demigod.
Updates at random
Romance is not the focus but a major plot point.
I will take suggestions and corrective criticism.

 *Important Note*
This makes for sense as you read along. 
This story is created by the viewer but there is a twist. Some chapters are static, meaning that it is to propel the plot. Others have polls that will affect other chapters but without a question. This means you don't know what it effects or in which chapter. I wanted to added this effect to create a suspense, something I didn't feel as much in other reader interactive stories. Your vote could create fortune or misfortune for the main character. I know what it will effect because have a chart that tells me the possible routes. You just have to wait and see what your choice have done. I'll even write which poll effects the chapter in the authors note. 
Characters could die in the story and they won't be leads anymore.
In comments you can ask for a detail chart for each poll but it will only be for one answer per poll. I will chose the most requested answer.
I do not own the photo.

Title: The Server
Synopsis:
Okay before reading please note that this will be a hiatus for a long period of time. Basically, I am just writing the story and fine-tuning the story before I start releasing this on a schedule. My reason being is because as a new writer I was not aware that if you fix something in your little writing people who already read ahead aren't aware. I do plan to release chapters but only at least three months if not more. Sorry!
I also want to send this before anyone starts complaining. This story will be more virtual reality later on, but the start of the book will consist more of survival than actual technology based. 
In a Universe that is ruled by two different races with militaristic dominance, it is oddly peaceful. It's not that odd if you consider the fact that the ruling humanoid races aren't bent on ruling but on expanding everyone’s technology. It is also an enjoyable past time to watch other people struggle in a war with a ton of deceit and savagery. They decided to make ‘The Server’ just to sate both desires. Having already discovered all of the known universes they decided to take everything virtual so no one tries to take over their power to make their own and to ruin their plan to help everyone. Or so they say. After many rules and regulations, a new player is about to enter named Joey Mandale. Being a go lucky adult at the age of eighteen he is given the special class Dungeon Creator. How will he create his own mark on The Server among so many veterans before the restart? How will he survive this trial that has his very life on the balance? Will he try to fight for his own planets rights or will he create his own home and his own territory that none will encroach upon?  
 Note: I plan to do a chapter with around 2000 words per chapter.
If there are any parts in the book that don't match each other please let me know so I can fix them. 
This book I had a hard time considering if it should be a fan fiction. I decided against it because I wasn't copying the world nor the character. The book The Gam3 inspired me to write this as well as many other games I've played and other books I have read. I Loved how the gam3 did a virtual reality game with a blend of a sci-fi. I played a game called stellaris and gave me the idea to implement some of the gameplay like that into The Server. (Title might change in the future.) 
Just wanted that out there. If you're even slightly interested in this check out The Gam3 on royal road because it's really good and similar to this book in how he set up the universe although he did it quite a bit differently.

Title: Ore’s Adventure!
Synopsis:
I was your average simple guy with just classes and all those kind of things...
 
However, I DIDNT EXPECT TO BE REINCARNATED AS A MATERIAL?!
 
(This is to improve but also have fun writing this story. I hope to improve while having fun with this story. Have a great day!)

Title: Lieutenant Commander Victors
Synopsis:
There will be new chapters for this novel every Wednesday.
Have you ever wondered why in every zombie apocalypse the MC's always have some useless profession that won't help them in the apocalypse? where did all the elite special forces go? well, this is the story of a man that has seen things that would make most men kill themselves.
Alexander Victors is a Lieutenant Commander in the Navy Seals he joined the Navy when he was 18 years old and when he was 23 he was recommended to the Seals and he has been on all kinds of missions in dozens of countries from gaining intel to assassination missions.
In his time Victors has specialized in every type of weapon, martial arts, stealth tactics, and many more.
Victors is on leave to get some relaxation from the Navy for his 40th birthday taking his hard-earned savings and buying a small house in the countryside hanging an American flag outside his front door he lives alone as the Navy is his life and never had time for women or children.
 
I am Scottish so I apologize if I get some American military things wrong.
 
Also, I apologize as the first chapter will be insanely short as I want this to get approved as quickly as possible also I'm new to writing so please be nice.

Title: Reality and Beyond
Synopsis:
Ever wondered how true Schrondinger's theory is? Rex has the meaning deeply rooted within his mind. When he was suddenly thrown out of his reality, everything became chaos.
Follow Rex as he strives to survive, avoid the Authorities and befriend allies until his reality is restored. (The story takes place in the same verse as Citrix's log) (This isn't exactly a fanfiction nor sidestory, I'm just reusing the world)
(Putting this on hold until I get the time to get it done)

Title: Looking for the Ancient Throne
Synopsis:
The fundamentals brought me here.
without a goal, without a path.
Hazy mind, familiar people.
An ancient throne whispering.
 
 
 
I kinda want to write to relieve some stress.
I just want to write..... plssss

Title: The World of Aekaron (Hiatus)
Synopsis: Screwed this story up, may re-write or try and salvage system.

Title: Don't Cultivate
Synopsis:
A man who accomplished his promise, who also failed.
A man who forgot his purpose, who also remembered.
A man who sowed, who also reaped.
 
This is the story about the tragedy caused by the flow of Time.

Title: Of Fate and Immortals
Synopsis:
In the world of Mire, magic is common place. Not everyone can use magic, and most that can aren't able to use it for more then basic needs. A small portion of people however are capable of so much more.
A person gains their ability to weild magic during puberty, if at all. And even then, amongst those who awaken their magic also awaken a whole new trait for themselves - immortality. No one knows what causes this to occur, and many theories exist. What is known is that these immortals do not age and do not get sick. It is also clear that they still die as anyone else does through any other factor, and just as easily as any mortal.
They also gain a unique ability for themselves that no one else possesses. Similarities exist to be sure, but the exact details of each ability are unique.
This is the story of one such immortal, one who simply showed up at an academy and registered himself as a student. He calls himself Mitzi.
 
 
Hey guys, this will simply be a story that I will be writing in my spare time. Please do not expect a constant schedule, or any specific lengths for chapters. I will try to keep a minimal quality when it comes to grammar and spelling. I do have an endgoal in mind for this story, but I do not know everything that will happen between the start and the end, only the gist of it.
Romance is tagged because of a romantic subplot. There's always a romantic subplot, isn't there?

Title: Tales of the Rozenwraiths [Dropped]
Synopsis: [Dropped]

Title: The Red Sword
Synopsis:
Science has reigned for nearly five hundred years. But gods and dragons and other supernatural beings have had enough of lukring in unseen places.
After having reigned for thousands upon thousands of years, the appearance of the White God and his son, the Saviour himself, pushed humanity to start a war to expunge all supernatural. For fifteen centuries humanity fought and pushed the "forces of darkness" into the shadows, and, having banished most magic of any kind, an age of science had been heralded. After spreading Christian culture into many corners of the world, the old gods and myths had been but hearsay, mere tales - even if there were still fervent believers for some religions. Yet, in places unseen, gods and myths still persevered, beaten down, licking their wounds... Preparing to once again return to their glorious olden days.
And now they're finally ready.
In Windfall, Arizona, there is a little store selling antiquities, occult objects and lost-and-found items. The owner, one Ms. Cressinda Edgecombe, also known as the Ethdrahl's Witch, is a fearsome sorceress, who has after surviving the witch hunts decided to retire. Content with her business continuing lazily from day to day, she enjoys her time with alcohol, loud music, long naps and her best friend Agnes Carter, lawyer, party girl and Hindu deity.Which leaves the work for her new part-timer, Aaron Wilson, orphan and former-delinquent and born with the skill to talk with ghosts and spirits. Things don't get any easier for him, when a girl comes out of a sword and decides he is her new owner - which just pushes a series of events along, that he could have really done without...
And caught between all fronts is third-rate wizard Howard Bruckner, who is stuck with Detective Ann Linsner and the nigh-impossible task of keeping her alive - a normal human infected by society's scientific common sense and with the job of investigating supernatural crimes. What could possibly go wrong?
Inspired by Harry Dresden, Iron Druid and xxxHolic.

Title: Are You All Right?
Synopsis:
In which a person gets everything they wanted at a price.
Just a little flash fiction to make ya think.
It's complete.

Title: I'm Rogue
Synopsis:
A 15-year-old rogue hacker, with nothing but time on his hands, runs various precarious websites that have multiple uses. These websites range from hidden group chats that require a monthly fee. others are simply made just to gather info. Do you want to know the location of someone's whereabouts or perhaps know what they ate last night? If you offer a simple fee your request will be placed now how fast do you want to know then the price skyrockets. After Blake (Our main protagonist) had discovered the city's drone delivery systems had been hacked and shut down by the rogue hacker group Red-Wake Blake had been forced to go shopping himself, the young boy with Low-Grade cybernetic contact lenses quickly looked up the quickest directions to the nearest store. After traveling twenty-five or so minutes he had arrived soon realizing he had to use the bathroom. What he finds soon on a dead man's corpse will change the galaxy within the blink of an eye.
(Will be edited to better suit the plot down the road)

Title: Trapped In My Own Game With Console Privileges?!
Synopsis:
Robert Jackson, creator of the all-time most popular virtual reality massively multiplayer online role-playing game, Revival Online with over 30 million active users, disappears in 2045, 3 years after the initial release. News websites are in chaos and so are the players.
Robert, however, finds himself trapped in his own game after diving in to test one of the biggest updates to come out in his game, the Reform.
You would expect him to be scared and look for a way out, but he has always wanted this to happen as a reader and lover of stories, and now just comes to terms with his situation in his attempt to survive.  Also, he has administrator privileges, which to him is a bonus.
(Expect edits and updates every week or so. The first chapter was rushed so expect a massive description and first chapter update soon)

Title: X-men: The new era
Synopsis: This is a story of the remaining mutant new mutants right after logan the wolverine died. The continuation of story of laura and his few companions and the emergence of new mutants.

Title: It's Hard To Be A Hero(The Companion of Justice)
Synopsis:
A company founded to help newbie Heroes to defeat Demon Lords.
A confused priestess summons an extremely confused professional hero to rid her world of the danger that is the demon lord. A professional hero whose life is constantly screwed by the never-ending heroic summon queue that applied for him. A trainee hero who is summoned to deal with a ridiculously overpowered demon lord because a certain fraudulent goddess is too stingy to pay for a qualified professional hero. A retired demon lord who is still trying to become a full time professional hero. This is their story.

Title: Lorica's Crusade
Synopsis:
In the face of vengeful gods, devouring monsters and ravaging wars, the humans of the world of Abniell turn to Lorica, the hero ordained to unite mankind and lead it to stand above all races. As the survival of humanity relies on the existence of the divine hero, the Prime Forebearer of humanity paid with its life to invoke primordial magic to ensure that there will always be a Lorica.
Cadence, barely starting her freshman year in our world, is about to find out the price of sustaining a champion for humans in the world of Abniell. She will also learn the real meaning of the saying that heroes are made, not born.

Title: Just for Fun
Synopsis: This is going to be one of those vrmmorpg fan fictions. Expect standard clichés like the vr world actually being another dimension etc. I don't actually have this story planned at all, so expect there to be plot holes along the way. Hopefully I reach at least ten chapters before abandoning this thing.

Title: Survive - Terror Infinity Fanfic
Synopsis:
A recently graduated Assassin gets dragged into God's Dimension without being asked. Not that he really minds.
Will his training prove enough to help him through the hells God has decided for them? Or will he crumble under the pressure and let his team down. Who knows, he just knows he's got to survive.
 
Author Note: I apologize to anyone who would rather have the original of what this book used to be back instead of me using it to prop up a new story of mine but I can't keep making new novels and this was one of the relatively unfollowed ones.

Title: Dynasty Wars
Synopsis:
After his death and his revenge for his sister, Fred is put in this Colosseum and is pit in a fight against other participants, all of whom want a wish to be fulfilled, they are given the objective to destroy the others dynasty and have their's reign supreme.
*Cover art from the internet, please inform me if it is yours and you want it removed*
