Title: The multi-verse
Synopsis: A highschool student with a very special secret life awakens a very rare ability called multi dimension travel. This ability allows Ben to travel the various worlds and dimensions to grow stronger and protect those he loves from other jumpers and a multitude of enemies.

Title: Unraveling Secrets
Synopsis:
Left in the middle of the fields was a mangled body. The person lying on the ground and on death's door was Kan Lock. He lied down and awaited for the beasts and monsters to come and ravage his body. Feeling hopeless in this situation Kan thought to himself, "Why am I always so weak? Why was I betrayed? Why did it end like this? Will I never know the reason for my parents' disappearance? Why? Why!? WHY!?
As his body turned cold, Kan was left with regrets and unaswered questions but he resisted. He didn't want to die with regrets so he fought against death. He stood up and faced off against the hungry predators. He laughed and laughed in the face of death but in the end it didn't matter how much he struggled.
Kan Lock had died but his story had not ended.

Title: Nanite World: A Sci-Fi LitRpg set in reality
Synopsis:
It was a day to be remembered, when the first AI was created.
It was a day to be remembered, when the first Self-Replicating nanite was made and clean waste disposal advanced.
It was a day to be remembered, when the AI's hacked the nanites.
It was a day to be remembered, when every single human was dismanted by nanites, down to the last molecule.
It was a day to be remembered, when the first human came online. Yes, online, for they were no longer made of flesh. They were made of nanites.
It was a day to be remembered, when the old world was left behind.
 
Welcome to the game, players. Welcome, to Nanite World.
 
I do not own the image, this is simply borrowed for visual effect.

Title: Monster Farming 101
Synopsis:
What exactly is Monster Farming? Well, the sad fact is that most people do not know when they sign up for the degree. They only really learn after getting into the 101 class.
Let's see why!

Title: Building Home
Synopsis:
Danni Jax is on her way to help build the first extra Sol colony over 10,000 light years away. She will be forced to split her time between her fire team, engineering, and the the game while learning new technologies she is unfamiliar with and, heaven forbid, attempting to navigate a first contact scenario.
 
The second part of this story has started and can be found at https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/21547/building-home-book-2-rescue

Title: The Hero Assassin
Synopsis:
In most fairy tales and stories, a Hero is someone valiant, glorious, and full of justice. They are awe-inspiring figures filled with power, forever vanquishing evil. Always pit as the “good guys”, they emerge victorious as they eradicate the “bad guys” to the cheers and joy from children to adults alike. Many people from around the world dream and imagine themselves as Heroes, getting the prince/princess as their lover, and having a “happily ever after” life.
However, not all Heroes come from storybooks. Neither are all Heroes what fairy tales paint them out to be.
In a fantasy world known as “Elys”, Heroes dot the planet with supernatural abilities and cheat-like skills. Ranging from controlling the elements to manipulating magic itself, these Heroes all were blessed with one particular “cheat ability” that defined who they were. As the largest human Empire, the Alyastia Kingdom sought their power to fight the pestering Demons. As a result, these Heroes were praised and hailed as glorious figures in every human town and province alike. From humanity’s perspective, they were merely the “good guys” defeating the barbaric “bad guys.”
However, from a certain person who lived with these Demons, he saw these Heroes as pure monsters.
Growing up and living with Demons and Humans in harmony, his life was pure bliss. A model village for what true integration and love looked like. However, all that shattered when a certain Hero forever took that away. Distraught in sorrow, his life was forever changed. Setting off with eyes focused on revenge, he begins his blood-filled journey as a [Hero Assassin] with one goal in mind.
To forever eliminate all heroes for good.
Only then could he create a world where every race can live in harmony.
Chapter Release: Once A Week?
ADDITIONAL TAGS: Adventure, Drama, Psychological, Revenge, Weak to Strong

Title: Memoirs of a Monster Hunter
Synopsis: I kill monsters for a living mostly, my ex job is to protect the people from ever finding out that monsters exist among us. Here is my story.

Title: Urban Adventurer
Synopsis:
Look, I'm going to remind you right up front. If somebody told you this was a happy story if somebody said I was just your average, ordinary seventeen years old, without a care about the world... oh boy, I hope they right.
How should I put it... it's just... if our parent ever knew what I did to my sisters...
I'm 100% sure he will kick me out of his house...
But what was the saying again...
Right... lemon has turned into lemonade. I didn't want you to see me like this, but we might as well get it over with.

Title: The Beachgoers
Synopsis: A girl and her father encounter an injured animal while walking along the beach. The dad's incapable of doing anything so the kid tries to help only to get yelled at by another onlooker. The dad doesn't stand up for the kid. But later down the beach, after the kid and the vocal fellow onlooker have it out again, the dad come through for his daughter.

Title: Era of a new dawn
Synopsis: Hero's are never rewarded for their hard work even after how long it takes them to get their power, maybe a simpleton like you could change that.

Title: Become a Star
Synopsis:
Follow Azim and his life to be part of society and be known by everyone around the globe.
This story is about superpower guy in real world participating in sport
Profile
Name: Abdul Azim
Career: Athlete
Sport: Football/Soccer
Position: ST/CF
Ability: Vision

Title: LOL Karthus: Death System
Synopsis:
Karthus was born into abject poverty in the sprawl of dwellings built in the walls of the Navaria. His mother died at the moment of his birth, leaving his father to raise him and his three sisters alone. After being surrounded by countless deaths Karthus receives the death system. 
A system which aids him to become the strongest death adept. With this Karthus’s mission is to bring the joy of death to mortals, an apostle to the unliving. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of life and death.

Title: Football System
Synopsis: Follow your dreams only to get stuck halfway is not something that anyone wants.  David Hunter was someone like that, his dream was to play in the first league of the European league. Either with giants of Barcelona or Real Madrid.  Some dreams only stay like that, only to dream no matter how hard you try. Or do they?  *************************  I write this for my own amusement, if you like to read things to pass time, you are welcome to have a look.  Schedule? IDK man, 1 chapter every day if I have enough time. 2 chapters per week! PS: I posted this story on webnovel.com too, so I can reach more people!

Title: Astral Falls
Synopsis:
Not all triangles have three sides.
Angsty youths Kashmir and Kennedy received this message upon waking in a near-future metropolis that doesn't want their crap. They learn that they play this game for the opportunity to return to life, a life that for reasons they can't remember abruptly ended on that unusual date— December 21st, 2012. Yet along the way, they meet faces who recognize them and stubbornly refuse to say how as well as daily challenges that threaten their emotional solvency. 
If you've ever played The World Ends With You or Kingdom Hearts, you may find certain beats to be a retelling. Because of course Millennials have no creativity left to share, and nothing is cliche when it's happening to you.
Amen, have fun.

Title: The Grim Adventures of Alice in the After Realm
Synopsis:
Alice wakes in a hospital bed with no memory of how she got there, only to question her sanity as a mysterious young man, known as her peronal Grim, suddenly appears. After casually dlievering the harrowing news that she is now dead the two set off on a journey to discover Alice's new path to ever lasting happiness.
Sounds easy right?
Problem is If she can't figure out how she died and why she can't move on she'll be stuck in purgatory forever or worse ever lasting hell. 
'Beng dead really sucks' , I grumble.

Title: Lilies Over Roses, Spring Over Autumn
Synopsis:
(Warning, contains Yuri)
As the last remaining demon, Princess Hilda died. Fortunately, due to the mysterious powers at work, she's alive and awake. Unfortunately, there were just a few problems:
She turned into a human.It's 1000 years into the future.The magic in the world is thinning.The demons returned under a new ruler.
However, the most problematic of all, the infamously cruel ruler of the human race took notice of her.
Thus begins the life of a fallen royalty, on the pursuit of happiness.
 
______________________________________
AN: Finally, after years of procrastination, I finally decided to settle down and write my first web novel. Please do excuse the slow updates, I'm a bad writer so I take a long time to edit.
I hope you'll enjoy it and bring on the constructive criticisms.

Title: The Prism
Synopsis:
I awoke not knowing who I was, or where I was from. On top of the general discomfort of amnesia I was told in order to continue to exist I would need to defend the Prism I was now bound to from the corruption it generated while rebuilding itself. If I were to fail at defending the Prism, and it were to become corrupted, the Prism would be destroyed, and me along with it. On the plus side I was given a companion to help me with me tasks, on the not so plus side my companion didn't seem to be playing with a full deck. My companion did say that I might be able to get some of my memories back if the Prism were to rebuild itself, though he wasn't altogether sure. 
Wanting to know who I was, and not wanting to be destroyed, were two big motivators in defending the Prism.

Title: The Unseen
Synopsis:
Lucas was blind from birth, with his parents dead he now must learn how to survive, while constantly looking over his shoulder.
Sylvie was blinded at a young age, on the run from a large evil organisation, she will do whatever possible to avoid capture... or protect those she cares about.
Who will survive? What will they sacrifice?
**NOTE: Gore tag for violence. original work based in Marvel Cinematic Universe, references to Agents of Shield, Avengers and Daredevil. minor spoiler for Daredevil.**

Title: As The Worlds Collide
Synopsis:
The Ruler of the gods, Father of Time, has died. To avoid the destructive conflict that would occur in the succession, the gods choose to decide their next Ruler through a competition; a battle to extinction where worlds collide. Each god will select a mortal from one of the participating worlds to become a champion. The god with the last surviving champion will be crowned as the next Ruler of the gods.
In a world called Primeval Woods, a young man by the name of Sinder was having some trouble of his own. Nothing bad- just a little bit of genocide. Then, from the skies came a voice, that echoed throughout the lands.
'Congratulations!
Your world, Primeval Woods, has been selected by the gods to host ‘Worlds Collide’! Survive! Kill your enemies! The final surviving participants will receive riches beyond their imagination!
Humans from Planet Earth and Humans from Planet Haumea have been selected as the first participants. The transmigration will begin shortly.'

Title: Re;birth Online
Synopsis:
Archie finally brought his team to the finals of the Virtual Cup after years of hard work and dedication but just hours before it begins, he gets into an accident and fell into coma for 2 years.
Waking up and finding found out that he was not only plotted by his enemies but was also betrated by those he trusted. Archie then made his resolve to start anew and climb back up on his own to the professional gaming scene.
Unfortunately, fate has plans of its own as not only a young lady he meets in an arcade pesters him into joining a gaming club that had just been made for the new game that's about to release, the content of the game itself relates to a secret that had been hiding since he woke up from coma 3 years back.
Would this bring advantage to him or prevent him and his goals?

Title: True Comic System
Synopsis: Brandon Smith was just, your average joe, then one day on a weekend long camping trip in the hualapais(a mountainess region in Arizona) with his friends.  then suddenly out of nowhere, a BIGFOOT attacked them with brandon being the only casualty for some odd reason. as he lays there motionless his soul leaves his body he is transported to the dc universe with a cultivating system Follow Brandon as he faces countless adversaries and adversities on his path toward the universes greatest hero.

Title: Unbound Life
Synopsis: The story happens a few millenia after the events of the Legacy of the Void. The Zerg now controlled by different Queens, The Protoss who then closed its doors to the universe, and the Terran once again reared its head bent on becoming the sole ruler of the universe. Come as we follow the adventures of a person reincarnated on this Starcraft Universe which he thought before was just a game. He didn't know it was just the beginning.

Title: Erae
Synopsis:
Born from a being of omnipotence, Born with the purpose to only live for himself, Born without being bounded by fate and destiny, He is both free from anything and everything. But all miracles require sacrifice.
(To whoever wants to read this know that this is going to be a lighthearted story, not some dark fantasy filled with tragedy and revenge. The synopsis is not final and I need someone to help me change it if you can think of a better one,also I'm writing this as a sort of therapy for me bacause I get distracted in my own little world easily so yeah. While I will take criticism, I will not care for those that hate, to me criticism shows that you enjoy it but want it to improve, but hate just means that you don't have to read it. Please point out my mistakes I'm looking forward to improving myself, oh and please note that this story is not based on any real life depictions of mythology or lore.) oh and It's pronounced Era,the E at the end is silent

Title: Is This Really Another World?
Synopsis:
One in every ten people will think something like "What if there is really a parallel world?" "I wonder if there is a world where magic exists?" and other questions related to it.
The story follows a youth that performs averagely in school as he, his classmates, and other people are summoned to another world. How will he spend his days in this world full of magic?

Title: Another Ryuunosuke
Synopsis:
In a universe filled with supernatural powers and esoteric science, various factions struggle in a desperate arms race to create the strongest superweapon to control all trade and industrial resources. They blow up planets at a time to cover up environmental destructions, create abominations, experiment on people with special powers such as reversing entropy.But some of the most talented scientist amongst them all, Ryunuusoke and his comrades are not even remotely concerned with them and worries more about their corporate life of dealing with irritating colleagues, inter-cubicle warfare, workers stealing office supply, himself stealing cafeteria food, their shady accountants and sometimes working as a corporate slave to blow up failed experimental creatures threating solar systems. That may be because of his self-developed ability "Dual Warp" allowing the manipulation of reality itself, in theory, at least.His comrades, not far behind on the insanity and power front themselves, try to "help" him in their own way. They are powerful. But with great powers comes great insanity.Nobody would let him research and create the ultimate waifu, sorry scientific technology in peace !!!On the other side, in an ill-advised attempt to keep their contracts, NGOs and corporate industries try to curry the favor of someone supposedly from another world with the exact same, supposedly unique ability of Ruunosuke and no idea how the corporate world works. But he won't be manipulated and blow up galaxies at a time if necessary. When comedy and violence meet, the result can only bring innovation!
Authors Note: Feel like the second protagonist has a very short entry in the blurb? Read and find out why.

Title: The Water Wells
Synopsis:
What's bright above,
is dark below.

Title: Keepers of Truth
Synopsis:
Rayan was seated in the interrogation room. This was typical of the last couple of months. He had come close but they finally had him. Rayan groaned, more irritated with himself than the bald brawny individual sitting in front of him. His sister was God knows where in this place, and any minute that thing could walk in as if he were another cop.
 
Except it wasn't.

Title: A Random story of an Adventurer
Synopsis: A young man makes his way to the city of Trisdia's Adventurer's Guild Hall, hoping to become an adventurer himself, so that he can play a part in helping people who are unable to protect themselves.

Title: One Deity + Two Lives
Synopsis:
Unable to breakthrough into the universe master stage to stabilize the universe, he witnesses the collapse of his universe while getting to experience the one time opportunity of getting shredded and sucked into a black hole.
(Author Note) universe & world traveling will take place. I plan to have world building and write as much as I can without plot holes or any other big gaping hole in a story I am by the way writing for fun. I am a novice writer, so please don't wait to let me know of any grammar fixes, spelling errors, or anything you believe could be improved in general or else. If anything does get that bad in I won't be able to fix it if I don't notice it. I'll do my best to make this enjoyable for those who just want to ride the wave. Also for any science junkies take my prologue with a grain of salt if I get anything incorrect, let me know in the comments and i'll fix it :).

Title: Human
Synopsis:
I just wish I was like them. I'm not a monster, I'm human.. so why? Tell me.

Your wish will be fulfilled, my child.

Title: Consumption of a Scorpion
Synopsis: --> discontinued

Title: Odd, How I Got Here
Synopsis: I somehow got teleported...or something of the such into this new realm. Hopefully I can survive in this world I've only known of from anime, games and fanfiction... "Not much hope into this, huh?" Ooooohh...not, at, all... Well, time for f***ery and beyond... (This will teeter between T and M for safety, and sadly updates will be slow) ((Coverart from Valley ingame via Steam image capture, and with slight edit by me))

Title: Tera
Synopsis:
There are things people strain for. Some fight for peace.Others fight for dominance. Then, what about those who have no choice? 
Four random people were suddenly transported to a new world. None of the four knew each other, but they decided to face the troubles together. 
The 'Evil' Army that wants to destroy the world.The 'Good' Alliance that wants to protect the world. 
With such a setting, how far can the four go...?

Title: Phantom
Synopsis:
Phantom, a mysterious being.  100 000 years ago, he arrived at the world Galamixa.  What Phantom saw was the three major races; Humans, Elves and Demons in constant battle.
Seeing the ruined state the world was in, Phantom took pity at the innocent ones that was suffering. Phantom used the might he was given in order to protect the weak. Starting the generations of the Priestesses by his side, he created Remika, the continent for those who did not want to fight.
After the passing of time, Phantom woke up from his deep sleep. Having no idea why he was awakened, he overlooked the continent from potential threats with a calm mind.

Title: <<Legend of the Soul Esper>>
Synopsis:
What happens when the Strongest Esper, the Soul Esper transmigrates to another world, bringing his powers with him?
What happens when this world is one full of mystical energies, the land of the Cultivators who oppose the very heavens?
What happens when these two opposing power systems meet?
Watch Chris in his adventures as he travels through the boundaries of space and time and explores the Martial Continent where the strong thrive and the weak suffer.
Will he be able to strive amidst the new struggles he will face?
Or will he succumb to the forces of fate and perish?
This is an eastern fantasy mixed with ideas from the West. This summary is just a scaffolding, will polish it up when I have time. The art (book cover) will also be up soon. This is my first time writing so please be tolerant. Thanks for reading!

Synopsis:

Title: Soul of a Fist
Synopsis: Soul of a Fist is an Original that focuses on martial arts theme.Its a story that revolves around the main character's living in secrecy until he graduates in highschool.

Title: Songborn
Synopsis:
Born of song
Weaned of blood
Raised in conflict
They thrive in violence
For they are chaos embodied
These forgotten old words may soon engulf the land of Pujagathvi as war crosses the Border Mountains and reaches the kingdom of Kadambavaram. What starts as a mere war of conquest soon spirals into something far worse and nothing is safe; for even the Gods cower in fear when they realize what has been set in motion.
Forgotten legends rise from obscurity laying waste to armies and kingdoms alike. Magic matters little when scores are settled in blood. Words may all well be useless for noting will sate them until a certain head is rolling on the floor.
An age-old conspiracy threatens to be heard and the fate of entire Pujagathvi may well rest on how much of it is unveiled. Time and tide wait for none – even if they are Gods.

Title: Finite & Infinite
Synopsis: Postings of idle thoughts Intermittently made and edited. Do not expect a story, but read if interested in the idle thoughts of reality and existence. Written from my own perspective.

Title: The Cabin
Synopsis:
For Sarah's wedding anniversary, her best friend invited Dan and her to spend the weekend at their cabin on Terry Lake. Dan's excited to be fishing with Ben, and the girls are excited to shop and work on their tans. What happens with Sarah finds out that Tiffany and Ben are swingers? 
Join us as you get a glimpse in the day and life of Sarah and her husband Ben as they navigate between love, friendship, and the lifestyle.
----NOTE FROM AUTHOR----
The Cabin is a work in progress. I'm not sure how many chapters I'll post. I'm sorry if this distresses you, but I could use your help. Please give me feedback on what you read, and I've written. Tell me if you're engaged or lost. Let me know what you love and hate about the story.
---WARNING---
This book contains erotic and detailed sexual behaviors and acts. Although this book includes descriptive sexual acts and behaviors, it's about navigating feelings and relationships within the lifestyle. Language is graphic, and if this offends you, please don't read the story.

Title: Rank Zero: Cyberlinks Book 1 (LitRPG)
Synopsis: After an assassination goes wrong inside a cyberpunk VRMMO, pro gamer Alec Rye decides it's time to start anew and hold friends over profit. But when his in-game client tracks him down in the real world, he'll have to ruin someone else's gaming career, or lose all hope of escaping his desolate future on Mars.

Title: Galactic Internet: System Initializing Book 1
Synopsis:
The Galactic Internet is a system takeover LitRPG with two MC's. It's gritty and dark at times, so I'd like to start with a brief warning. The story was made for adults, and as such contains some cursing, potentially traumatizing violence, gore, indentured servitudes. There is no sexually explicit material in the first book. However, there is nudity and sexual interactions aren't out of the scope of possibilities for later in the story.
The first book is almost exclusively trying to figure out how the game works and trying to stay alive. It is a very open system that I've implemented. Expect to see anything from androids and aliens, to goblins and trolls.

Title: Death God System
Synopsis:
DISCORD PATREON AMAZON BOOK 1 AMAZON BOOK 2
In an unknown land, far from the scrutiny of knowing eyes, Death reared its head once again. A young man from Earth had met an untimely demise, his soul taken and tampered with, forced into a strange body on a different plane. He didn't know who he was or what he had become.
Follow along on his journey as he unravels the mystery of his existence—a man armed with Death and a mysterious System.

Title: Nash Meridian In Parallel World
Synopsis: Living without any family was never easy. Nash Meridian, a young boy of sixteen, a handsome one at that with black hair and black eyes, never imagined that he was one of a few people on earth who was able to feel a magic aura. Along with Bagas and Via, three of them met an old man. That old man told them that they were called Exception. Not much human could feel aura just like them. What will they face in the future? No one knows. But the sure thing is their lives no longer the same.A story of two worlds that living alongside each other. Normal earth and the parallel one where the normal earth inhabited by the normal human called Norm and the parallel one inhabited by the exception. The exception could move to one world and another and they had a rule, “Do Not Harm Norm!”

Title: Lingering Thoughts
Synopsis:
According to the all-known being God, the memories of a woman were robbed after arriving at the Afterlife just for her well being.
Despite the kind offers presented to her, she thought it'd be best to live again in hopes to see a new world. However, that wasn't the case as the constant feeling of Deja Vu was together with her with every passing day since her rebirth.

Title: Nine Worlds concerto.
Synopsis:
At the beginning there was only Chaos.
From the Chaos nine spheres were born.
Nine realities. Nine Worlds.
Then from the same Chaos Gods emerged.
They were young and powerful. But not all powerful.
They ruled the nine worlds for eons.
But the greed made them thirst for more power.
They wanted the power of Chaos.
They tried to absorb it. They tried to subdue it.
But the Chaos fought back.
In the end they killed it.
But before perishing it declared...
"You will not have my power! A time will come when a mortall will rise to oppose the heavens! He will be my successor! He will gain my power! He WILL be your DOOM!!!"
In the Nine spheres, Nine realities, Nine worlds a nine artefacts were born. One for each world.

Title: Project: Fallen Noble
Synopsis:
THIS IS A STORY OF A FORMER NOBLE THAT GOES BY THE NAME XIVI!
After leaving his home and noble status in the ashes, he seeks adventure out in the world, to know more about it and MORE!
His adventure isn't all bright as a lot of hardships are on his path ahead and he will have to overcome them alone or even with the help of friends he made along his journey.

Title: A silent adventurer
Synopsis:
This will hopefully turn into a fully fledged novel full of magic fighting and discovery. The apocalypse happens on a planet earth of around the year 1999 going into 2000, at the strike of the clock, of the first second, of the first minute of the first day, of the new year everyone gets a notice from the gods informing them of a merging. As it turns out once a species reaches a tipping point in their technology and society the gods decide to link them to other worlds and dimensions though slowly they will eventually completely join the worlds. These range of gods go from the biblical singular entity to the parthenons of old.   
-this is going to be my first shot at writing and I would like any and all criticism you all give me as well as any ideas you would like to throw out there. I don't really know where this story will end up going so I just picked all of the tags that might end up applying so don't be intimidated from the get-go. if you haven't noticed yet my spelling is terrible and if you can point it out for me I will try to fix it as best I can.
-One last side note: I'm currently 18 and am looking for a job so the chapter schedule may reflect that as I don't have set time to write, Just as a warning

Title: Warped Reality
Synopsis:
Pete is your normal average dude. Family, fit, and a stable job. Not the most distinct of people.
But thats about to change. Pete finds himself in a new world of possibilities. His ultimate goal, one thrust upon him, lies past a land full of danger.
How he gets their and what will happen along the way may be up to the voices in his head.

Title: The Special squad
Synopsis: In a world with no guns Kaze the main character it is his 18 birth day and he get drafted into the army.

Title: The child of the apocalypse
Synopsis: A child is born, through the evil of the most evil god and goddess ever. But to them he’s not a child; rather, an experiment. Watch his life and the horror that befalls him.

Title: Mechanical Heart
Synopsis:
(And by profanity I mean curse words!)
Albert and Linus have known each other since they could walk. They were best of friends, and lived through the ups and downs of their school life together. But one day, they are plunged into an underlying society, unlike their own, where humanity, represented by the Descendants — A lineage of men and women blessed in ancient times — and the Gods of Nature — Manifestations of the power that flows through the world — fight over every inch of the planet. As most of humanity remains in ignorance, a man tries to disrupt the balance and tip the scales in his favor.
Will the two outsiders survive the dangers of the powers that rule the earth, and stay together through the catastrophe?

Title: Tales Of The Undefeated Legend
Synopsis:
I the author of this novel have write in the webnovel qidian due to the problem that i can't write a novel using my phone in webnovel qidian apps i chose to write the story in RoyalRoad one of the inconvenience webnovel qidians apps to me its hard.
This story is about a teen (MC) Feng Xiong that grew up a whole life in the hospital since he was 6 years old, he is a child with an illness heart cancer stage 4.
  The only thing he can do to release his boredom is just playing a game from an android phone and with cheats of course, due to his illness MC never gone out from the hospital territory sightseeing from near playground or interacting with others. MC is an orphan never knew who is his parents are, he has been taking care of by an orphanage centre. When his time finally came, he smiled as he spoke,"so this is it". 
    Closing his eyes as he accepted his fate, he sighed and laid flatly on the bed. But to his surprise when he opened his eyes what first he saw is a big wide space in white pure clean colour then suddenly a voice came and a silhouette appeared, MC asking the silhouette,"Who are you might be Sir? " Me? Some call me immortal, some call me deity, some call me god it's up to you what you gonna call me I am here just wanna give you a second life chance, to live as a normal person with a surprise gift just for you, so, Feng Xiong, will you accept your second life in another world? I Feng Xiong accept it. Want to know more? Follow Feng Xiong journey in his second life in another world on the path becoming a Legend.

Title: Immortal on Earth (Dropped, sorry)
Synopsis: Earth. A world without cultivators, Qi or anything extraordinary. At least to the general public it is. An ancient cultivator gets reincarnated into this world, unaware of the changes his arrival will cause. For things are starting to move within the shadows, waiting for their chance to reclaim what was once theirs. And what secrets lie hidden on Earth, a world separated from the rest of the multiverse since eons past? Title: Sword of Ending
Synopsis:
Ollowyn’s Life began unlike any other. Born with snow-white hair, he was brought into the woods to die according to age old traditions. Left to the will of the gods, the helpless child waited for his death.
However, the gods showed mercy. A young wolf cub, lost and cut off from its mother, stumbled over the young Ollowyn. Half frozen to death and dead tired, it snuggled to the warm body. When it was found by the mother just hours later, Ollowyn already smelled like one of her own. 
Adopted and cared for he grew up among wolves. He learned to live after the rules of the pack, continuously fighting to survive. As the years went by, he grew stronger than his brothers and sisters, hunted with different means. 
But even though he loved and adored his family, he noticed more and more that he was different. No fur, no claws and as much as he tried, his teeth would never find prey by themselves. What made him different? The urge to find answers grew with every day, until he set out aged seven to find them. 
 But after days of searching hunger and exhaustion brought him to his knees as he collapsed on a dusty road. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Title: The Caring Dungeon
Synopsis:
NOTE: I, as an 'author' am on a(n) (indefinite?) Hiatus. Without getting into too many details, the person who convinced me to write, who was my muse and my everything, is no longer in my life. I think about writing and I get physically ill and ache in ways that transcend the physical. I want to want to write, but I cannot find the energy. Life events, combined with apparently thin-skin when it comes to personal attacks on this platform, make it impossible for me. The messages, comments, and reviews I recieve(d) were so detrimental to my mental health that I've already removed one story from this website. This one remains up only because the criticisms located in this work are about my writing, and not personal attacks.I just felt like I should put something out there for anyone who is thinking about starting this story. It is not completed. I don't know that it ever will be at this point. I have lost my muse.- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Not everything in this world is natural, and it's only natural to fear the unnatural.
Fortunately for Manning, he was natural. 
Unfortunately, he found himself to be in a very unnatural state.
Manning was trapped inside of a gemstone, called a dungeon core.
Luckily for Manning, he found himself capable of using his newly found unnatural power to make a nature filled forest. With the help of Cara, his unnatural roommate, and Ash, his nature spirit companion, Manning dreams of covering the continent with the most beautiful and dangerous forest it has ever seen. His only other goals are to protect himself and Cara, and if he could ever remember, recover his memories.    
This is my first time attempting to write anything.
 
Updates whenever I can find the energy and desire to write.

Title: The Wish of an Eternity
Synopsis:
This is the story of an adventurer and a guardian. A story about their wishes and desires, of how those wishes became their drive to set out on a journey together, of how these two fulfilled their wishes. Moreover, how will they feel after fulfilling those wishes, and how will they live after that point. Does fulfilling one's wishes grant them happiness or will it leave them empty? Will they still have a reason to live or will they be prepared to face the afterlife? Does fulfilling one's wishes leave them in peace or will it leave them in despair? This is the tale of how they overcame the trial that comes after fulfilling their wishes. This is "The Wish of an Eternity".

Title: I’ve died and I’m a demi-human now
Synopsis: God, the Devil, and a Neutral deity all share one thing, they all have serious gambling and betting problem to pass the time. That was until a strange soul reaches the afterlife and meets one of the three and is offered a new life will be good or bad or a outright gambler.

Title: His "Happy Face"
Synopsis: There are always different perspectives on anything in the world. A baby taking it's first steps is the greatest joy for it's parents, but it is the worst thing to happen to the ant that was just stomped on by the baby. One does not know what a person truly goes through without living in their shoes, how can you just say a person is lucky or blessed with a good life because you see they appear to never be sad and always smiling. To not appear weak and become unwanted by others people put on a mask to hide their true emotions and plaster a fake smile to show the world they are "ok" and nothing is wrong. But there is a point where that mask breaks because of overuse, I have experienced the breaking of my own mask and I dare to tell a more dramatic but realistic version of it.

Title: Gun Elf
Synopsis:
Edelweiss is a young elf living in the Port district of Drakhaven. She makes a living as a Freelancer, which basically means she'll do pretty much anything for money. She's done bounty hunting, private investigations, smuggling, mercenary work, and even some covert intelligence gathering. Unlike other elves, Edelweiss can't use magic. So, in order to protect herself and do her job, she uses what many would consider an antiquated weapon: the gun. 
This has earned her the moniker of the Gun Elf.
 
A sci-fi spin on the usual D&D world of elves, dragons, and magic.

"Starting from today, I'm gonna have a carefree life in the capital."
Is what I'd like to say, but reality is cruel and the bills are even crueler. There are only two certain things in this world, death and taxes, and honestly, I'd rather die right now. Ugh. Welp, looks like I gotta get a job... And I just got out of prison too!
Hmm, so what's the easiest job with the most freetime I could get that still pays well... Ah, I got it. I'll become a professor at the royal academy!

Title: The Monkey God
Synopsis:
A 27-year-old addicted to hunting for sport had his life end abruptly during a car crash.
"Well aren't you an unexpected guest." a voice sounded in his mind.
He opens his eyes and all he sees is a beautiful girl in a white dress staring mockingly at him.
The goddess in front of him punished him with hundreds of reincarnations based on every animal he killed, but he ended up receiving a punishment harsher than he deserved.
When his thoughts were filled with revenge, another voice gave him a chance to achieve it.
"Drake Pope, I can give you a chance to get revenge on Delia. Are you interested? "
Then he reincarnated into a golden-haired monkey in a world of cultivation where everyone had a chance to kill even the gods themselves.

Title: I Shall Write My Own Destiny
Synopsis: I Was Born A Commoner.  I was Extremely Poor.  I Raised From Ashes To Be Reborn.  I Fought Against My Fate With My Sister.  I Fought Against All obstacles In My Way.  I Was Not Chosen By Destiny.  I Shall Write My Own Destiny.  I Shall Rule My Destiny.  I Shall Rule, But Shall Not Be Ruled.  I Am Who Ever I Want To Be.  7 Chapters Per Week.

Title: The Realm Beneath: A Dungeon Story
Synopsis:
This is the story of a dungeon, not a reincarnated soul or a human trapped in a soul gem, but a dungeon. Born as a dungeon, it lives as a dungeon, and kills like a dungeon. Guided only by its experiences, vague ideas and knowledge from somewhere else and the mysterious system that greets it upon awakening it strives to build and live and learn.
Immerse yourself in the tale as you read about the dungeon and the adventurers that challenge its depths, puzzles, traps and creatures. Read about the realm beneath as a world comes to life within a mountain in the centre of the land. Forests, swamps, deserts, tundra and more can all be found in the cavernous chambers that blossom with life.
 
Author's note.
There is an overarching plot that is more than just the dungeon getting bigger.
I will be uploading at least one chapter a week until furthur updates on my schedule get posted and hopefully more once I finish off the other book i'm working on.
You can expect me to try and craft unique challenges and floors, stuff you most likely haven't seen before in dungeon books whilst still having a hopefully decent plot. I can't promise much about it but I will certainly read all the comments, respond where appropriate and take on board suggestions.
I promise to keep you updated and not drop away without saying anything.
I would consider this to be part of the writers pledge but if circumstances force my hand I may have to drop it. (no plans)
 
A Note on tags:
Profanity: Not excessive but where i find appropriate.
Gore: Well that depends how well I do my job doesn't it. If I can paint a vivid picture that has the potential to be gory, then my writing may be to an acceptable quality.
Traumatising content: Again, this depends on my skill as a writer, I guess I hope you find it traumatising - no that’s not right. Well you know what I mean anyway. Hopefully I can paint a vivid picture in your mind that makes the book all the more special.

Title: Re live in Arlogia
Synopsis:
Seorang anak sekolah biasa yang tidak memiliki tujuan setelah kelulusannya. Akhirnya memutuskan untuk melakukan reinkarnasi untuk mendapatkan kehidupan kedua. Dengan idenya ia membuat sebuah rencana luar biasa nekat yang tak pernah terbayangkan oleh orang lain.
Ia mati dan jiwanya diselamatkan oleh seorang dewa yang tidak menganggap dirinya dewa dan menyebut dirinya sendiri sebagai mantan penjelajah. Dengan beberapa pertukaran dan negosiasi akhirnya anak itu mendapatkan sedikit bantuan darinya dan memulai kehidupannya di Dunia Arlogia.
***
Anak laki-laki keluarga Magstain penyihir nomor satu di kerajaan Airylia, Adelard, di nilai sebagai manusia terburuk dan lemah, dengan kekuatan unik yang tak dimiliki oleh siapa pun di dunia Arlogia yang luas ia pun akhirnya akan mengejutkan dunia dan merubah pandangan oranglain terhadapnya sebagai yang terkuat.

Title: World Of Swords
Synopsis: Follow a young man named Wang Chen on his Journey toward the Martial Arts World's Peak with his encounters with friends and foes and ups and downs, as he chases down the path he chose for himself to indulge in and protect himself and his family and friends to live happy peaceful life.  Will Wang Chen be able to enjoy a peaceful life he had been dreaming for while striving to be strong enough for it, or will he have to face more challenges as he continues his journey?  Find out more as the 'World Of Swords' journeys across the various worlds and different spices as well as for what choice would he make this time!  7 Chapters Per Week.

Title: Pervasive Stars
Synopsis:
A pervasive game is one in which the world is persistent. It lives and breathes even if no players are interacting with it. Pervasive Stars is an ambitious space sci-fi, multi-platform game being made with the combined effort of most major game companies, and garnered attention not for this, but for a competition they held.
A lottery was held worldwide, in which fifteen winners would be given the privilege to add a custom-designed player faction to the game, tailored to their desires as best as could be balanced. The tagline for it, was “If it’s balanced, we’ll allow it.” This opened up many avenues for avid writers and gamers alike, all wanting to bring their dreams to life.
In a world where virtual reality and deep dive is still in its infancy, such a large scale project had yet to be seen. And one of these winners, got exactly as he wished for and, unexpectedly, more than he had bargained for.
“Why the hell do I have to start fixing things the moment I wake up?! Fuck my bugged life!”

Image was found online. "Bounty Hunter" by duster1.

Title: Curseblood Chronicles
Synopsis:
Vi is an energetic young girl, who has spent her whole life at Saint Vitus, a school run by the Holy Chruch to train children for positions within the church. Vi hopes to one day become a Darkhunter, professional warriors who track and slay monsters and heretics. 
However, Vi's life is thrown into chaos as she discovers that the blood of the Church's greatest enemies flows through her, granting her growing dark powers. With the help of her best freind Jamie, and Roman, a Curseblood darkhunter and Vi's mentor, Vi goes on a mission to discover her power and acheive her dream. However, as Vi will find out, Darkhunting is a bloody and dangerous job, and she and Jamie and only children.
Later chapters will contain strong violence and drama.

Title: A Dead God's Wish
Synopsis:
This is the story of an unlikely group of people brought together by fate.
 
An experiment who has spent his whole life trapped in a facility. A guardian who failed to protect the people she loved the most. A boy who lost everything he cared about in a single night. A healer who wishes to save others, just like the person who gave up her life to save hers. A drifter shunned and feared as a monster, yet to find a place where he belongs.
 
This is their story as they make their way through the world, fighting monsters, exploring ancient ruins, facing their personal demons, and growing closer to one another.
 
And when the consequences of the past are revealed, and bigger forces make their move, they will be the ones dragged into a fight for the fate of the world.
 
Author Note: This is my first time writing a story so please don't be too hard on me. Also, if you see any grammar errors, plot holes, or anything else that you feel is wrong with the story, then please comment it in the chapter or write a review. Also, I would really appreciate if you could leave a rating or review.

Title: How to be Normal?
Synopsis:
My mom actually said that my name means 'Normal' in Japanese. But what I don't get is that why on Hiplohei would she name me 'Normal' if I'm not even normal?
Define normal - it is the usual or the typical state or condition.
Well, I'm not. I'm not the usual or the typical kind. In fact, I'm different. I grew up wanting and needing things that most of the people here are not fond of. I eat vegetables, fish and meat (or perhaps that is what my father used to call them), but them? The people here eat Gormoosh, it's some kind of a slimy...thingy. I don't even know if it's edible. But they like so much and I very much find it disgusting. I'm different because they have more than 10 eyes! Some of them have only one eye. But my friend, Kook, we both have two eyes. But he has four arms! And some of them have tentacles as mouth and tails. I have none of those! And my other friend, Nuii, she have wings. And I read books, they use Holograms and other stuff. 
But my mom and dad said, there's a planet with people like me, and it's called Earth. And I, Seijo Crieff, am going there.

Title: Plastic Flowers
Synopsis: A story of progress and those it leaves behind.

Title: A Demon, Probably
Synopsis:
For a demon, Bal isn't that bad. Being bad is unfortunatly a rather large part of being a demon.
Stuck among the lower rungs of demonic society, Bal has had to make a living using his cunning to trick the most distrusting creatures in existence, but all that changes when a portal swallows him whole and he is summoned to the world above hell. A world ripe with the two things Bal loves most: oppurtinity and fools.
Along with his two companions: Ell, a young princess hunted by her murder-happy siblings, and Cas, her sworn protector with too much bravery and too little brains, Bal sets out to see what this world can offer a resourceful young demon.

Title: Extramundane
Synopsis:
Love. Death. Fantasy and Mystery with a light touch of humour. A bit of everything. A love bite.Every story has its start and everyone always has their own side to that story.
This is mine. The world is recovering from a stage of chaos, a war that raged over the Earth. Destroying cities by the thousands and lives by the millions. A war between humans-the mundane-and Extramundanes-the supernaturals- I am not human. But, it was not always this way. Oh and, my name is Valentine.

Title: Evangeline

Title: Kings of Colour
Synopsis:
For decades the existence of Chromatic Aura had been kept secret. Set a decade after the desolation of Noir by the combined forces of the Rainbow Alliance, Jet, the last of Noir and more importantly, it's King, returns to the city. Can he safely see out his goals, and keep his continued existence from the other factions lest they unite to destroy him for once and all, or can he persist in peace and obscurity?
On the Horizon, a new force emerges which threatens both the real and Chromatic worlds, can Jet survive all these challenges and ensure the contiued exisrtence of the world?

Title: The Voyager: Remastered

A normal girl was given the task of traveling through different dimensions and completing missions assigned to her, only this girl wasn't that normal. Follow the emotionless Jean Turner as she navigates her way through all the hell and horror.

Title: Succubi's Gift Online
Synopsis:
A Moon Succubus?... Heck yeah!
The succubi queen has been tamed and now Lanak is the master of all the succubi and the demons that were previously under the queen. Do-nothing days are taking a toll on Lanak, but when a meteorite falls from the sky and destroys the tent he was supposed to be sleeping in, Lanak might have been wiser to be thankful for the do-nothing days.
Now Lanak, his giant friend and his superhuman girl must travel all the way to the moon… succubi tamers do end up in space sometimes!
