Title: ERDE Online
Synopsis:
Justin's parents told him playing video games would rot his brain. He never imagined they'd be right.
Justin Schwartz is obsessed with ERDE. Short for Extremely Realistic Dungeon Exploration, ERDE is a popular fantasy roleplaying tabletop game which has been turned into computer RPGS, console games, movies, and books. OMEGA-DEGA’s latest iteration of the franchise is something tasty that’s been in the works for ten long years. Known as ERDE: Inside, it’s a massively multiplayer online virtual reality sandbox simulator, with a world that lives independently of its creators.
In a highly publicized PR move, OMEGA-DEGA opens a contest for early beta participants. Justin, obsessed with the game, cheats the submission system and finagles a win. Unfortunately for him, someone else in the system—a hacker calling themselves Pnutxebra—has cottoned onto his trick and threatens the corporate execs at OMEGA-DEGA with a deal. Justin Schwartz goes in, but he doesn’t come out until he’s completed the Son of Schwarzvald questline. Otherwise, the whole decade worth of work done on the game gets flushed down the toilet and ERDE: Inside is lost forever.

Title: An Alien in Wonderland
Synopsis: It fell from the heavens. Like the stars that fall across the sky that the sorcerers always said were signs of good fortune. The streaking tails of fire in the night that children wish upon with clasped hands and trembling lips. Yet it did not grant wishes. It did not bring smiles to the young. It brought men to their knees. It took the works of man and tore them apart with glee. It was a Conqueror.

Title: Overlord Consultancy Firm
Synopsis:
Welcome to Overlord Consultancy Firm.
We provide our expert knowledge to new villains in need of help.
From Dictators, Demon Lords, and even Dungeon Cores. Our service has helped them become great overlords.
In exchange for a fee, we will help you take over the world, kill the hero, or even kidnap a princess.
Leave your request at www.overlord.com or message us at 1-800-Evil and We'll respond within two business days.
Overlord Consultancy Firm the greatest villain maker in the multiverse.
 
Follow Peter an ex-hero turned overlord consultancy firm employee as he managed the multiverse dumbest villains.
Watch as he turned moronic demon lord, unstable dungeons, and mad kings to the most ruthless, cunning, and merciless villains their world has ever known.

Title: Daylily
Synopsis:
This is the tale of two sisters, Lis and Rafflesia, whose lives are tainted by obsession and the sin of charisma. Lis is known as the "Daylily", a courtesan of love for just a single day. Her sister Rafflesia is a girl with a dark secret.
Their daily life slowly spirals out of control and reaches an unknown frontier of the forbidden unseen world.
What is freedom without love? What is love without freedom?

Title: (ON HIATUS) Immortal Mage
Synopsis:
ON HIATUS UNTIL REWRITE
ON HIATUS UNTIL REWRITE
ON HIATUS UNTIL REWRITE
Formerly an Origin Immortal, Aaron Ironblood went to a foreign universe, conquered a world in it, and went for the next challenge.
Now reborn in a place where magic reigns supreme, he must once again rise to the peak to save first the world and then, the universe itself.
Follow Aaron as he employs eons of experience to master magic, crush all opposition, and conquer all in his path.

- OP MC is OP- The main character has some morals- Wuxia/Xianxia elements (including flashy martial arts later in the story)- LitRPG/GameLit world with game-like windows and game-like skills (e.g. Check Level skill)

This fiction will never be removed from Royal Road.Even if I decide to sell it as a book or something, all chapters shall remain available here for free, and keep being released until the story is complete.Pauses might happen if needed, but I will finish the story.

Title: Hope beyond the Horizon
Synopsis:
What would you do if you had a fatal disease and only one more year to live?Doing all the fun things life can still offer to you or would you think about how to take care of your family the best way?What would you do if you were offered 10 Million to take part in a test that will take this last year of time you would have with your family?Would you take the money or the time with your family?Xiang Xinya was asked these questions. Bravely moving on, knowing that her body will fail her any time soon.Taking up the offer she ignores all the resistance of her family and her friends. To make sure that her parents are taken care of, to make sure not to leave behind anything unsettled.But the heavens don't want her gone yet, the cards of her destiny were played again. What might wait for her when she activates the unstable prototype of a VR-implant?Follow her to explore a new world with new dangers, and new friends.
 

No regular release - I write whenever I find the time in my busy shedule so please bear with it.

Title: Reincarnated Legendary Contract Killer
Synopsis:
Reed Aniston grew up in an orphanage which was actually an assassin organization. He was taught everything an assassin needed to know at his age and became one of top if not the top assassin of his time.
Now his time has ended. Betrayed by one of his closest colleagues, he was captured.
He was interrogated for weeks, his captors used everything they could to make him speak, but nothing worked. Then,they finally used the person he cared most.
Forced to the end of his wits, Reed went berserk and massacred everyone. After killing everyone, Reed dies and take his first step to another world.
gonna update this probably 3 times a week. Gonna try to make my chapters the best as possible so you guys don't read terrible chapters.
Also will be on Web Novel

Title: Rise of the Valjikan
Synopsis:
An extrasolar species is back to live on Earth after thousands of years of hiding as spirits inside human bodies.
They call themselves the Valjikans, they are like guardians in the universe, they guard planets against their enemy who is willing to control every existed planet.
But this thousands of years hiding made them forget how to defeat their enemy, so they need to train in a virtual reality universe.

Title: Art of Poison
Synopsis:
When Ru Ning, a young genius studying toxicology for all the wrong reasons, ‘dies’ in an accident after an experiment with his newest creation had gone wrong, he finds himself in another world where monsters and dungeons existed with the same body but with an addition — a system.
How will he survive the cruelty of this world, encounter mythical creatures, and create a name for himself — all while chasing his ambition of creating the world’s deadliest poison?

Title: The Strongest by Walking!
Synopsis:
James Gray has cancer, but he does not wish to suffer through it. So, his brilliant solution is to die. And that is exactly what happens, but something unexpected kills him instead of what was supposed to!
God, now apologetic because of his slip-up, grants James one wish for his new world. James wishes for the ability to level up his power by walking!
Now in a new elf body, James does his best to make this world much better than his old world!

Title: Solo 7
Synopsis:
[Now available exclusively on Kindle and Kindle Unlimited!]
Victory or death... Only one goes home.
"Right, for the noobs, this is the deal. The gamemakers own your ass and if you don't bust it one of these guys are gonna put a cap in it."
Only one of us is getting out of here today. There's no friends, no loyalty. The men and women around me are my enemy, they are my gatekeepers. If I can keep myself from hitting zero health, gear up with guns and mats, and be the last one standing to achieve that epic V, I get to go home.
But this island arena is no place for a noob like me. And the storm is coming.

Title: General's Call
Synopsis:
Zen had never cared that his real life was screwed up, and he was estranged from his family that only cared about money anyway. After the death of the only person that he truly cared about, he ran away from his family biding his time till he got his inheritance from his grandfather. Wanting to forget his past and the family that only holds bitter memories he joins a revolutionary game called General’s Call. A game that has a mixture of strategy, combat and economy that is sometimes more treacherous than the real world.
As he starts his new life and runs away from his old one. He tries to escape his family and an arrogant rich kid and a ex employer, that can’t get over their grudge of being insulted by somebody that is beneath them.

Title: THE SUPREME GOD SYSTEM.
Synopsis:
SPARK HUNTER A BOY WITH A TRAGIC PAST, GET A SYSTEM AND IMBARK ON A JOURNEY TO BECOME THE SUPREME GOD.
THE NOVEL CONSIST OF DIFFERENT REALMS.

Title: In Cold Blood
Synopsis: A young artist finally finds inspiration for his twisted mind in a sea of frozen corpses.

Title: Don't Touch Me, You'll Die!
Synopsis:
Jun Arvin is a person from Earth that died by burrying himself alive. Wanting to escape from his disappointment and hatred for his families, friends and the harsh reality. He then killed himself out of desperation and heart break.
And now, he was reincarnated as a baby in a world of Ivalia as Alexius Merga Zaxvius. The first child of the Emperor and the Crown Prince of Zaxvius Empire.
But fate is really cruel, his title as a Crown Prince was stripped away from him. His power was feared by the people that know him.
And so, because they feared him, he was locked inside a dark and gloomy tower all alone like a prisoner.
"This is nothing! I have been through something more crueller than this... Fine! Since you called me as a Prince of Death, then i shall be one!"
This is the story of The Prince of Death that would make the world tremble from hearing his name and his journey as a Death incarnate!

Title: Tales of Ruinna
Synopsis:
A thousand millenia ago ruin was called the first Thoth, a man in persuit of knowledge of Arcana the concept of magic.
He rose from the masses and united them under the mage towers.
A hundred millenia ago he woke to war, blood and gore, a turmoil that spanned the four corners of the realm. Then, he was called the war god, one whose blades and magic were steeped in the blood of the six tyrants and their heaven-suppressing legions.
Ten millenia ago he caused the advent of the holy artifacts, items of great power that could even hold the world's empires demise on its hand (though it had none)
A millenia ago he put a stop to the tyrany of the one world alliance, that had tamed the four corners of the continent to its whim, to re establish the Archmage council.
Now he has woken again with his one true 'Chaméni Téchni' and his grimoires of eternity.
As he rises he must face his old foes, new and old subordinates who conquest in his name, and an adventure he has never had before.......

Title: Nameless System V 1.00.008
Synopsis:
A mysterious application suddenly installed after Dew Everest finished some random online quiz.
What is this? I am the number #7081?
My charisma is only 5?! Is this high? Is this the reason I never have a girlfriend?!
10.000$ has been transferred onto my account?!!
Quest, capturing a thief?  
Skill? Craft (Poison)? Is this even legal?!
 
The image doesn't belong to me. I find it on 4chan.

Title: Leveling God
Synopsis: William was one of the most powerful person and even some gods were afraid of him. One day he was surrounded by the group of dark forces. He was ambushed by the demon emperor and other lord of the dark force. He tried to fight back and managed to kill the other Lord's but still he died in the end . But he somehow went back to the time when he was weak

Title: PLACEHOLDER
Synopsis: TO BE DELETED

Title: Placebo Effect
Synopsis: It’s was the end of the world and to be honest from what I’ve heard, life wasn’t too different to the world I know today… Besides the fact that we live online, obviously. I’m still in cyber debt, life from what I hear still sucks as much as it did back then, but maybe, just maybe I can scratch beneath the surface of this disillusioned world and disconnect universally; I might have a chance to experience true life in its purest form.

Title: Clarity
Synopsis: A normal guy experiences something abnormal. What does he do? He adapts of course. Except, this situation is a lot more complicated than it seems.

Title: War for Redemption
Synopsis:
Above all beings, there exists the Progenitor. He who creates, he who destroys, he who governs over the living and the dead.
One day, on a whim, he decided to create a game. He picked eight suitable candidates who were set to die from the planet Earth and assigned each the soul of a monster from the planet Arcania that fit a certain requirement.
Along with their companion monster, the chosen eight participate in a battle to the death set in another world.
The prize? The last one standing will live once more as the losers return to an eternal slumber. One will remain and rest will be the stepping stones for the winner in this War for Redemption.
--
tl;dr: God creates a 16 man battle royale with teams of two, a human and a monster. Last team standing wins.

Title: Echoes of Ruin
Synopsis: Ruthven is a soldier that works under the Defense Squadron of Carlisle. One day when he encounters a demon upon beating it realizes his wounds were fatal and will kill him. Faced with the choice to live and accept a curse or die and leave everything behind, he decides to live. Once the curse is afflicted, however, there is no turning back. This is a tale of Ruthven, a normal man, through his own desperation becomes The King Of Ruin.

Title: Lullaby of the Phoenix
Synopsis:
In a land that defies all laws, a war fueled by religion was drawing to a close after 1000 long years. Leaving the old kingdom in ruins and it’s people, still frail from years of endless combat. 
 The world found itself in a great famine following the war, which continued over a decade. For this period of time, the common folk were opressed by the monster population which were able to thrive now that the sentient races were so vulnerable. A group of surviving veterans of the war was recruited by the high priest. A terrible battle unfolded at the end of these 10 years, The priest and his men went out and faced the 11 beasts of the apocalypse. With the king of the beasts slain, the remaining 10 beasts fled into the wilderness where they would remain unseen for mant years to come.
 The great priest had gained the people’s trust and most importantly, their ears. He and his disciples helped spreading a new religion, one that told the tales of the phoenix gods. This newly found faith helped raising the moral amongst the country folk and gave them the motivation to build a better future. His ever growing fame contributed in his rise to power and he was promoted as governor. The church of the Phoenix gained total dominance over the land. It was at this moment in time where order was truly restored, and it was only a matter of time until the empire regained its former glory.  
 Years pass, and a beautiful kingdom is born.
 He built 5 new kingdoms over the ruins of the past, 4 which governed the four extremities of the land and the capital being in the middle. 
 The years flew by and eventually, the high priest past away of old age. With his passing, it was tradition that decided the heritage of the role, his eldest offspring, who continued the tradition for many years to come..
 200 years later, the 7th high priestess was now in charge of the throne after her father’s recent disappearance. Because of her young age, her followers remained skeptical about the future of the kingdom. This stirred gossip amongst the council and common folk, putting a lot of pressure on the new governor, but behind the scenes corruption was brewing amongst the members of the council.
Our story begins in the humble town of Maltais in the cold lands of the southern kingdom.

Title: Deleted
Synopsis:
Mr. Editor is convinced that he's seen it all when it comes to Isekai, and he's frankly... tired of it. If he can't get something new, he at least wants something decent.
"When's the last time a noble has actually been noble? Why can a cityboy fight like a swordsaint all of a sudden, and don't dare say its another bullshit cheat ability. Really? So Villan A decides to be an asshole... just because? Dear lord, I need another shot. I can't do this sober."
Author Disclaimer: I'm not here to shit on all of isekai, but I am here to shit on most of isekai. I firmly believe that tropes can be done well in the right hands and under the right conditions. Regardless of personal beliefs. I do hope you enjoy these short stories. No sexual content, but innuendos and jokes are very much present.

Title: Irregular Awakening
Synopsis:
A boy's everyday life is suddenly changed forever after discovering a mysterious jade.
 
______________________________________________________________________
 
Put on pause for the moment.

Title: Emperor Of Space and Time
Synopsis:
Countless Clans strive for harmony,in an era of chaos when countless immortals compete to control the laws of the universe,
A baby was quietly born in a small universe,unknown to most...he would be feared by all...

Title: The Unluckiest Main Character Ever
Synopsis: The Authority, or AUTHOR for short, has grown tired of how generic and dull their stories have gotten, so as a result of a sudden epiphany they decided to reuse one of their successful old ideas and twist it into something new... How bad could it get? The misadventures of the unluckiest main character start here...

Title: Infinity’s Calling
Synopsis:
In the beginning I created the “Universe”
I do not own the cover  https://www.deviantart.com/pure-poison89

Title: Godhood Online
Synopsis: A powerful god tries its hand at the path of creation after travelling down a road of destruction, only to fail miserably. It decides to have someone else help it. So it decides to test the people of Earth by giving them a test in the form of a game.

Title: Isekai Tales
Synopsis:
This is a story many of you are familiar with.
This is a story of people who find themselves in a different world.
 

Cover Background Image Source: Fantasy Earth Clouds Wallpaper

Title: Slayer of Kings
Synopsis:
This story follows the journey of Leo an assassin who got killed by his friend turned enemy. Leo was never afraid of death, but he died after living a life filled with pain and loss, however, Leo soon wakes up in a new world after his death.
Leo decides to gather more information about this new world, however, while on the journey he crosses path with someone who had changed his life. That person is none other than his friend turned enemy and the person who killed him, Cao. That is not all he soon finds out even though they both died at the same time Cao in this new world is much stronger than him to the point where he nearly kills Leo, but just moments before Cao lands the final blow Leo gets teleported away from the battlefield. The only thing Leo saw was a strange symbol through his hazy eyes.
Leo wakes up once again, but this time it's in his own room back at the village which was the first place he entered in this new world. He notices a black and white rectangle on his right arm.
Leo’s mind becomes muddled by mysteries. How did he reach this new world? How did Cao arrive here? How is Cao much stronger than he is? How did he escape from Cao? What was that symbol he barely saw before he got teleported? What were those two rectangles on his right arm?
Filled with mysteries Leo sets out to find answers, however, an unexpected encounter leads him to meet a girl named, Mia. A charming, strong and determined girl through her Leo gets to know about The Shadow Claw Organization. A group of people who helps others in need, however on the inside, they are killers and spies who will do anything as long as they get money. The helping mentality is a cover-up for the real truth.
Leo soon finds out they are not as simple as he thought they were.
 
 
 
----Chapter release rate: 5-7/week

Title: The Law of Averages
Synopsis:
What young boy doesn't crave adventure? What young man doesn't wish to be a superhero?
But time marches on, and life grows dull with responsibility. Is it any wonder that old dreams are forgotten?
Welcome to The Law of Averages: In which a man is dragged solidly out of his comfort zone. Be careful what you wish for, you never know when it will come true.
This story follows Daniel Newman as he adjusts to a strange new world. One where superpowers are for sale, where heroics are frowned upon, and where life is constantly defying Daniel's expectations. Dan always thought that he was destined to be normal, but one world's normal is another world's special.
 
The Law of Averages now has a Patreon page!

Title: Castlebound
Synopsis:
A young scullery maid bound to a slumbering castle must embrace her innate powers to wake the castle and save the townsfolk from a fiery dragon.
When Sleeping Beauty’s spell sweeps through the castle, putting everyone to else to sleep, Hailey is the last girl standing. While she watches everyone she cares about fall to the ground asleep, mages outside the castle battle to keep the spell from growing to cover the entire kingdom, giving their lives and their magic to keep everyone else safe. The legacy of the mages must be passed on and Hailey finds herself stepping in to shoes that she doesn’t think she can fill.
Note this is a Work in Progress and hasn't been through any editing.

Title: World Ravaging Serpent
Synopsis: Tens of thousands of creatures have died in order to refine a single drop of a Noble Beast, a beast long since extinct harboring unimaginable power. A crazed scientist has made it his life's ambition to bring them back and unleash unimaginable horrors upon the world. A single snake with the blood of ancients flowing through his body must make his way through a treacherous world trying its best to kill him. Will he be stopped before he can mature, or will he persist through and take revenge on everything, that has once hurt him.

Title: Reborn with a maxed out intelligence skill
Synopsis:
Matthew Smith is a normal boy. Well, he used to be a normal boy before he died. Now, after getting reborn into another world he is given another chance. Another chance to have a life full of adventures and happiness. To achieve a life like this he is given a special skill. 
A maxed out intelligence skill.  
 
Think of it as a rewrite for the "Reborn with 1600 iq" but with more mystery and fun stuff.

Title: This time, instead of laughing I will help you say "I love you" to the princess
Synopsis:
[What if... at that time I'm Trying to talk to her]
Hajime Udin, A Top notch playboy, last night broke up with her girlfriend who dated him for 6 month. One of his friends who know this fact come to his room to tease him and suddenly asking him ti watch a fantasy movie with him.
[What if... at that Time, I put all of my effort to Join to the Hero's Party]
When watching A movie he laugh at a certain scene because it feels so stupid and mainstream where a certain foot soldier suddenly run from the formation and got hit by the fire and instantly become an ash.
[What if... at that time, I don't see her smiling face]
When he sleeping he saw a dream about a certain boy who keep saying 'What if' in his head even though he can't hear what the boys talking about. after a certain time finally Udin hear another voice without saying the first word that he hear repeatedly and the context is a very sorrowful even though it is so wishful. a voice about the boy little love song for the girl he like so much until he sacrifice himself to protect her.  
[At Least… I can become a meatshield for her, for the girl that I like, Princess Revita Elfrina. I hope... I can say that I Love her Smile]
It is not a Story about someone who suddenly get an overpowered skill nor even a strength to overpower the other. it is a story about an ordinary boy who fell in love with the princess of the biggest country. a story about a talentless boy who can only trying her best so he can stand beside the girl he loves. a story about a little love song that the boys told to himself for a very long time until he lost his life. a little love song that he tell to a person who he entrust his wish.
After hear all of his regret, i can't feel i can ignore his feeling for the girl...
"Haaa~ ...This time, Instead of laugh... I will help you said 'I Love You' to the princess"
Without fail... I'll tell your little love song to your Princess, Revita Elfrina.

Title: Project: You have died
Synopsis:
A monologue story about a man who died and was reborn in a new world of mysteries and intrigue. Where monsters and magic are common place and gods are plentiful. The story follows his life as fate conspires to bind him to a path which he will eventually struggle to come to terms with.
 
 
*** The story is a slow burner inspired by web novels with the main character accounting every action in time. I doubt this style is for everyone ***

Title: Short Stories Prompt Inspired
Synopsis: Join me as I work on improving my writing skills one short story at a time. My goal, to eventually work on a novel. Feel free to provide criticism, I'll need it if I'm to improve!

Title: Beasts of War
Synopsis:
Two Gods and one Devil, each with their own specific cultivation systems. Essence Cultivation, Soul Cultivation and Bloodline Cultivation. All decided by a small brand on your right hand when you're born. A brand is what makes or destroys legends.
A poor boy is born with the cultivation system of the Devil. His, disgusted, parents sell him to an infamous Army Squad.
By trudging through discrimination, war and a life of hell, watch as that boy becomes the King of Beasts.

Title: Milendrum world
Synopsis: World of magical creatures, gods, beasts, kings, and human with the unnatural ability. This is where the protagonist Arthur live. Follow his adventure in this world . the world of milendrum

Title: The Genesis Of Chaos
Synopsis:
After the earth entered a new era which is known as "The Genesis of Chaos", which causes changes in the natural laws by which the universe is governed. The energy of chaos affects all the technology of the earth, turning it into obsolete scrap. The human being dependent on technology will now have to face all the aggressive changes that the earth is undergoing. And the new threats that loom over the world, is that or face extinction.
 
Four orphaned brothers who have had to survive all their lives on their own, will now have to face a changing and dangerous world with their new skills, limited resources and new threats that have arisen from the energy of Chaos.
 
Author's note: English is not my native language, I write because I like to write, that's my hobby, I hope for your support. Thank you

Title: Reminiscence
Synopsis:
My website: https://putiancom.wordpress.com
 
This is a short story about revenge or something along the lines. 
 
(This is my first story ever written so please go ham at criticising my work.) 
 
Death.
 
It is a form of punishment or torture.
And can be also be a form of salvation.
 
Ultimately, it forms different perspectives depending on the beholder itself and on how the beholder take it as.
 
Life.
 
A point in time where finding your purpose.
Purpose, of life itself and experience its flow, either epiphany or hell.
 
Death.
 
It is an end.
A point of no return.
It also makes the beholder feel free, breaking away from the chain of life.
It makes the beholder recollect and reflect when crossing the boundary between life and death.
 
Boundaries.
 
A place where a path will ultimately, be chosen with or without consideration in the decision, free.
 
.
.
.
 
A place where recounting life, take it as a feeling.
 
The joys and sorrow accumulated, playing back, making the beholder reexperience life.
 
 
 
 
"Reminiscing."

Title: I, the son of Bloody Mary, have become a king of 6 realms.
Synopsis:
This is an Alternate History Genre
 
I, the unemployed, who graduated from Oxford and majored in History and Economics, was dead in a car accident. But, I was born again, as a son of Blood Mary and Felipe II, a person who didn't exist in history. 
In order to survive and secure my throne, after winning the civil war which occured right after the death of Bloody Mary, I have burned my competitor/my aunt Elizabeth - who would have become Elizabeth I, the 2nd popular queen after Queen Victoria - to death, and decided to become greater ruler than her. 
I will be the king of Great Britain, the Netherlands, Spain, Portugal, France and Itlay - the king of 6 realms - using my historic and economic knowledge and my Tudor, Habsburg lineage as a claim for those crowns. 
No one, nothing, shall stop me.

Title: ZOMBIE SLAYER!!
Synopsis:
Scientists discover that a massive gas cloud in space will cover the solar system in one year. They assure the populace that they recognize the gas and confirm that it is harmless. A year passes, and the fateful day arrives.
Eric and Michael go to school like normal, but the world begins to change.
System Initiating... Standby...
Modification is being chosen.... Standby...
Undead System has been chosen... Standby...
System starting in 3...
2...
1...

Title: The Sword Artisan
Synopsis:
Centuries ago, the Calamity dragged humanity to the brink of extinction. Now humanity basks in the ruins of a long forgotten golden age. It's not long until humanity faces another looming Calamity. With the sword artisans gone, humanity has no way of stopping the Calamity and the Dark Abyss that threatens to swallow the world.
That is until Lady Maria meets Shepard a last descented of the Sword Covenant. Abandoned by his father after his mother died, Shepard has no choice but to become an artisan. Shepard will have to face the Calamity and the Dark Abyss whether he is ready or not.
If he fails...

Title: Atemporal Chronicles - Commencement Tale
Synopsis:
Jake is summoned to an old forest to write down old stories of a mysterious man named Hank.
    An untold legend unravels as Hank narrates his life from the very beginning for all curious minds to know and be awed by this miraculous chain of events.

Title: Eternal Warden
Synopsis:
Standing guard over the three Realms are the Eternal Wardens. With unparalleled might they keep all of the outsiders out and keep the Realms safe. Every one million years, they conduct a Trial to accept the top 1000 to join the Wardens in their glorious goal of protecting the Realms.
During one of these Trials, a Mortal teenager however managed to accidentally enter the Trials. This is the story of Jack Lumi, a young man that thought that he had given his life for another to awaken in the Trials meant for people that could move mountains and upturn seas with  but a flip of their hands.
How he will face these Trials and how far he will go, only time will tell....

Title: Open Heart, Open World
Synopsis:
Kelves Weaver is the last of his Caprimet clan after a war between humans and the Magicant people resulted in all Magicants being sent to a dimension called the Sealed World. He lives a depressing life alone in the wintry region of Winstead, keeping to himself and indulging in his vices to pass the days. When Geralt, a Caprimet from a different clan, finds Kelves and invites him to meet his sister, Kelves's journey to opening his heart suddenly begins. Everyone finds themselves getting a bit more than they bargained for, but that's not always a bad thing, is it?
Prequel to Because This World is Loved and the Medlia series.

Title: Cultivation - A parody
Synopsis:
Timothy grew up looking at cultivators, flying on their shiny swords which flickered with words beyond the human understanding.
Dimly he understands that every cultivator reached this point through cultivating their own stories, but this is not something any mortal can do.
One day, he gets his hands on an unimaginable treasure which starts the journey of cultivation... With "How to spell check", he too can become a cultivator!
But even as he discovered the path of cultivation, his non-biological sister was stolen from him!
If you are familar with the term, consider this story crack. While I may try writing serious comedy at some other point, this can be considered to be the other end of spectrum. If you're expecting a story that doesn't take the mickey, this isn't for you.

Title: divine change
Synopsis: Steve was just an ordinary guy, going to an ordinary bar, but waking up as a divinity the next day is not so ordinary.

Title: The Labyrinth of Earth: Progenitor
Synopsis:
60 years after the first and final nuclear war, humanity is at the brink of extinction. 
Brought to this point by an mutagenic virus that was blasted across the earth by nuclear detonation and claimed the lives of 70 percent of the population within the first month, but that was only the beginning. 
The true horror of this virus, was in those it did not kill. These being wander the earth, practically immortal to the unceasing flow of time, driven by a hunger to kill and eat while the virus that infests their veins sustains them with the radiation and festering death around them. These are the truest sufferers of the Labyrinth Syndrome.
This is all Theo has ever known. It is the world he was born into and the world he is determined to survive.
Join him on his quest to survive

Title: Guardian of the light.
Synopsis: In a universe filled with beautiful clouds that houses stars of a myrad colors, and worlds filled with life and shine, there is Darkness lurking on every shadow. The real menace unknow to most, the task of keeping the lights from falling in the darkness resides on a few beings: Some spirits, blessed by the great phoenix, stand vigilant against the dark. This is one of their tales.

Title: Firechaser
Synopsis:
Ragnar Haram, an infamous hacker and escaped prisoner, has been living off the grid for years when a single mistake sends him to a virtual prison he cannot escape. Every step forwards leads to a worse situation until the AI governing the world he is in reaches out and offers him an escape; and more it offers answers to the question that got him into prison in the first place, "What happened to his sister?". 
Join our hero as he has to keep a band of criminals together to escape a fantasy world and expose the system that trapped them there to begin with.

Title: Broken Utopia: Episode One
Synopsis:
After an entire era, Finally, the facade of peace begins to fade
An odd child arrives in a simple village. Bringing with a door to worlds of majik, kings and queens, distant cultures, and perhaps one too many answers to secrets the great want to remain hidden.
But what happens after the facade is no more?
 
 
A Damn Good Fantasy Read

Title: The Chill Monster Tamer (Take 2)
Synopsis:
Welp, I died due to some mistakes being made. Sadly not mine but hey what can ya do when working with Gods. Trust me I don't resent them but Mort, he's on my shit list. My guy Rick, he's chill.  
Anyway, I'm in this new world with mana, monsters, and all that cool jazz. But I'm just kinda here doing my own thing pretty much ignoring important things. A lot of people are doing this "Getting stronger" thing but for me, I'm chilling with my new friends. If I'm restricted I just walk around them. I just like being here with my new friends. I'm getting tired so time for a nap. Catch ya later folks. 
***************************************************
Side note: I'm gonna try to give a chapter a week but to also avoid burn out and giving up I'm taking this time slow.

Title: The Calling: Awakening
Synopsis: Irnoc is a young street rat just trying to survive in a world where mystical beings are summoned to obey the will of the Priests. When a burglary goes wrong Irnoc and his best friend Cat gets sold into slavery. Irnoc makes a daring escape during a monster attack and awakens some of his latent abilities, only to be picked up by the priests of Corana as he wandered the desert. All with power must be trained, and all Callers must belong to the temple, so it’s follow or die. The priests aren’t the only ones that Want Irnoc for their plans, and Irnoc has plans of his own, he must rescue Cat from a fate worse than death, a brothel slave.

Title: The Sagas of Mortaholme
Synopsis:
There is only one god and his name is Elduin, Dwarves are stories, magic isn’t real and the northern kingdoms are made up of raiders and the unfaithful. For two thousand years this has been the truth for the people of Alturine, the holy southern empire. For two thousand years, tradition has been leeched away to form a vicious cycle where the rich stay rich and the poor beget more poverty. Only now, when the southern realms of men are at their lowest does darkness leak back to stake its claim.
Marius was raised in the northernmost reaches of Alturine under the trees of the Black Forest where remnants of the old kingdoms still linger. He never believed the stories of short mountain men, nor the old fables about mages and dragons. Yet the darkness cares little for belief and faith. He watched as wargs tore his mother and sister asunder, as the undead carried his father into their ranks and as his town was put to the torch and drowned in blood. Rage fuelled and vengeful Marius struck out against the architect of his misery only to be outmatched and left for dead.

Title: Modern-Fantasy World
Synopsis:
I was a normal person just sitting on the side of a river fishing...
However, I heard a siren but still continued on fishing anyways. I always have done this type of crap but I didn't really expect it to go this far.
The world that was Modern is now a fantasy type world with some artifacts from the past?!
 
(Gender Bender by the way if you didn't click on the plus button)

Title: AS LONG AS IT'S INTERESTING, ISN'T IT FINE TO LIVE AS A DUNGEON? (Hiatus)
Synopsis:
[This story is now in Hiatus and I dont know if I'll come back to work on it again.]
The story of a girl with a flare for creating a show that’s willing to let a lot of things slide so long as it’s interesting. She is summoned as the core of a newly birthed dungeon. With the power to create and destroy, what poor thing will her curiosity draw her to next? What interesting things will she show us?  
 
Note: This is just something I'm doing in between doing things. Please expect shoddy quality, a poor updating schedule, and significant rewrites. Thanks.

Title: Clan of The Alchemist
Synopsis:
Naruto was tired with the village treating him wrong and wandered into the Forest of Death! After almost being killed by a group of villagers and saved by a strange lady, how will Naruto change? Will it be for the better or for the worst?
I don't own Naruto. Naruto was created by Masashi Kishimoto and serialized by Viz Media for America.

This was originally on Fanfiction.net under the username None of My Business Is Yours but I lost my password. I have been working on it since then.
Romance is not the central theme of this story but various relationships will exist in the story and will effect character interactions.
Updates when I can.
I do not own this image.

Title: Eternalite
Synopsis: Jeffery is an amnesiac who must overcome challenges while on an expedition with the peace corps.

Title: The Titan's Tribute
Synopsis:
It began with a Book
When our souls are born, we are embraced by Innatia. From her love, we see the words of the Tribute, a single page torn across the surface our souls, laying out our lives and giving our infant consciousness a sense of what we will become. And by Innatia’s will, when our soul is torn asunder, we see those words again with open eyes that may understand the truth and hold it for the briefest of histories. 
And then we pass.
The first and last infallible truth you will ever know, the sum total of who you are and all you will ever be. These are the words that exist within the pages of the Titan’s Tribute.

Title: Conformist Without a Cause
Synopsis:
There's a spanner in the works
The trousers of time have lost their thread and they're comng apart at the seams.
Only no one can save the world and thankfully, no one has.
And Much like a toilet elevator, this story is wrong on so many levels

Title: The All at Once Among The Stars
Synopsis:
A colony ship, spanning many generations makes it's way towards a new world.
But all is not well.
All at once among the stars, a boy becomes a man
Brain washed, abused and little better than a slave to the machine that keeps him and his alive.
Can he fight the programming that plagues his every waking moment?
In space, what you must become to once again call yourself human?
This is his story

Title: The Luck of Four
Synopsis: Nobody expected a street urchin to amount to anything. Considered an undesirable vagrant; an orphan of the streets and a victim of a venomous society based on life essence and luck, no one expects Four to be capable of anything. When Four receives his class on his sixteenth birthday, he is expected to be thrust into the permanent life of a labourer. Monotonous but at least survivable. That was his plan at least. When Four receives a class that no one has ever heard of - one that could prove devastatingly powerful, everything changes. Four is thrust into a ruthless cutthroat world full of indiscriminate death and violence, a hundred factions vying for Four’s death or capture. In a quest for survival, Four encounters magic capable of utter annihilation, a book which could provide infinite knowledge and stones capable of subverting the will of even the most strong minded individual. Fighting for survival, Four must rise to the top, or fall six feet under.

Title: To  Truly Be Immortal
Synopsis:
A man who had the blood of millions on his hands had reached the final of the Nine worlds and is about to enter the Tree of the Oracle, Testing himself through blood, spirit, and willpower in order to gain control of The Staff of Creation
 
 
Author's note: Sorry about the short synopsis. I would like for make any mistakes I make to be made aware to me. The virtual reality will come into play later in the story. Will be updating when I recover from desidiam recesseras. Cover image is not mine, if you wish for me to take it down, please, just tell me and I will see to it right away.

Title: The god of rage and war
Synopsis:
This story is based on mytholgy around the world and will not be fact based,
as this story is based on a made up universe.
Nothing ever existed in the beginning. but 6 who will be later be known through out the land of Mythiria as
the Gods

Title: Hacking god
Synopsis: Travis liam was average male teenager but one day after he create a hack that can hack anything from games to banks he died from Exhaustion and reincarnated with his hack system that can hack anything even reality.

Title: Max's Calliope
Synopsis:
In a world of heroes and villains Max is so obviously a villain and yet no matter what he does he can never quite get ranked as one. Down on his luck the robot with a magical credit powered furnace in his chest sits deactivated on the curb until a small pink catgirl brings a wave of excitement, adventure and cash into his life.
 
Read ahead by a chapter at notsomor.bid

Title: Duality
Synopsis:
John was a secret agent before he died while avenging his little brother.
But death was not the end for John, as he had the chance to reincarnate in another world.
Now watch him grow from a slave's son to a hero and a legend.
 
PS: I write as a hobby, with my job and college coming first, so my release rate may be slow and random.

Title: Ultra-Reality
Synopsis: When Klent first tries the first ultra-reality VR headset, the V.I.H., he is instantly hooked. But when new health-related discoveries are made, and Klent's former best friend is dragged into secret experiments, Klent must return to the virtual world to help. Find out what their virtual hold in "Ultra-Reality"!

Title: The Flamelight Chronicles
Synopsis:
This is a fantasy novel with a unique magic system. Imagine if Eragon, Kingkiller Chronicles, Benjamin Ashwood, and more had a weird group baby-- that's this book! It's like a coming of age high fantasy novel.
Eligor is born into a world where everyone has magic. Your status in life is based on two things: your bloodline and your magical power. To Eli, who lost his parents, was born in a small town named Stathen--in which not a single person of true nobility lives-- and is the only person who seems to have no magical power, the world seems perfectly unfair.
That is until one day everything goes horribly wrong and perfectly right.

Title: Black Tears
Synopsis:
Senza is an assassin who is mentoring a young girl to become his successor by the time he dies. 
Khali is a teenage girl who is raised since birth to become worthy to inherit her master’s name.

Title: Finally a competent lord
Synopsis:
What would happen if you woke up in a forest without knowing who you are? And you find yourself in a fantasy world? It's the story of a man who involuntarily became Lord. It is the story of a man who will become one of the greatest lords the world has ever known. It is the history of the evolution of humanity in all its forms.
. "We can, therefore, know that there are five essential elements for victory: 1 He will win who knows how to fight and when not to fight. 2 He will win who knows how to manage the upper and lower forces. 3 He will win whose army is animated by the same spirit in all its ranks 4 He will win who, prepared himself, waits to take the enemy without preparation 5 He will win who has military capacity and is not disturbed by the sovereign - Sun Tzu
I am writing a new novel but I promise nothing to update, and if I am going to continue writing this novel, it will depend on my mood. And if my novel is good enough for me to keep writing it, I will. Read it only if you have time to waste, I will change this sentence the day I would have decided to continue my weekly novel without stopping.

Title: Invasion
Synopsis: When did it start? “They are coming” I think it was ten years ago or maybe more, I don’t remember very well. “Who” What I do remember is that, ever since it came. “They are coming” It never left. “Who” Sitting on my bed, I talk to the voice inside my head, who never answers my question. “I told you many times already, THEY are coming, it wont be long, they are almost here” Looking around, the white walls make me think, why did I end in a place like this? “What do they want” Maybe I should be here, look at me, talking to my own head. “Everything” Maybe I am as crazy as anyone told me I was, However, who will knew… That the voice in my head wasn’t just a message created by me….. It was a warning.

Title: The Magical Lesson
Synopsis: A class of budding mages has their first lesson with an disgruntled Professor.

Title: Death Flag
Synopsis:
The loud slashes, freezing wind.
All of it feels so heavy I think I might pass out.
No, I can’t! After all the sacrifices that were made, I won’t let anything left undone.

Title: Vlue's Short Stories
Synopsis:
The first story is set in the modern world, where two different people from different dimensions do a dead-drop in the same location at the same time. 
 
The stories set in one continuous universe painting a picture of the whole. 
 
Horror, Thriller, Sci-Fi and all the other genres will be part of it. 
 
Stories will range from really short snippets to a few chapters long. 
 
No dedicated schedule exists. I use these to try out new techniques and ways to tell stories. 
 
Happy reading :)

Title: Path of heaven shattering
Synopsis:
Cultivators all over the universe seek to reach the peak, afterall that was why most even cultivate. But does the path that they follow really lead to the peak? Is the peak to know everything and be the best under heaven? What is it to be a human, what is it to be a cultivator, what is it to be a celestial, follow Chen Qing Yan a girl who is innocent and pure to the bone as she journey through the universe to reach the peak, meeting many talented young masters and protagonists on the way.
New Cover By: SnowyCo(purchased from her so now I have ownership over it ;))

Title: Plot armour obtain
Synopsis:
One day, blue screens started appearing in front of everyone, granting people access to the Akashi record and allowing everyone to obtain incredible powers that have once just exist in fiction. The world as he knows it has succumbed to chaos, as the governments have collapse ushering in the new age of Cultivators, Espers, Demi-Gods, Magic Kings and many more abilities from the legends and stories. Follow Cristian as he paves the road to his legend, as he uses kinda op abilities to cause even more chaos, get babes and finally RULE THE WORLD.....as a part-time overlord
 
 
Updates daily
 
 
Images are not mine, so just tell me if your the owner of them, we may be able to make some sort of a deal ;)

Title: Title is too Long, See Below
Synopsis:
Legend of Re: Class Transfer Betrayal VR Online RPG - I reincarnated as a Divine Heavenly Emperor Sword God into a Cultivation Labyrinth System where I NTR'd a slave harem with my disciple little sister's smartphone gacha and my Yandere girlfriend in a Dungeon where I met the Demon King and gave me a Cheat to become a Peerless Dragon Slime while living leisurely as a villager, but I have the appearance of a Trap Loli now?!
Yuu are the protagonist, the self insert. The cookie cutter, the deus ex machina, the Mary Sue. Full name? Eh Yuu. Or Eiyuu. It's Yuu, but pronounced as Mii in Nihongo.
TL Note: Nihongo means Japanese, but in this context it is Romaji, or Fictional Romaji. Arigatou Gozaimasu. Hey kid, fight me on Rosetta Stone. Well moving on.
The parents are mysteriously never at home, just like cardboard cutouts. But Yuu doesn't care at all. What Yuu lives for each and every day, is to log into this game. This game, where Yuu stands on top of a generic world. Yet, Yuu doesn't seem to care for much at all, as Yuu continues living his life thinking that everyone loves him.
 
[This is a satire where I attempt to be funny by being completely unoriginal. I also spend less than 10 minutes on each chapter, if you can call them chapters xD I also do the art for this story.]

Title: PLAYER/KILLER
Synopsis: In the VRMMO [The Age of Eire], there were two factions among players. The PLAYERS, the classic heroes and adventurers that worked together to overcome the challenges of the world and the KILLERS, the villains that preyed on them. Fios, a player that wanted nothing more than explore the beautifully rendered sights of the virtual world, unwittingly becomes a core player for both factions.

Title: Humanity
Synopsis: With his sister taken from him and his parents dead, Max doesnt know what to do. While contemplating on his predicament he is dragged off to another corner of the universe and is given a chance to redeem what has been lost. Standing in his way are Monsters, Beasts, Gods and even himself. Can a weak human like himself overcome everything that is thrown his way?

Title: The Lonely Road
Synopsis:
Ever since Edward was a kid, he has been mistreated in numerous ways. His dad was constantly beating both Edward and his mom, not because of some unfortunate events in his past or anything of the likes, it was simply because he enjoyed beating his kid and violating his wife. Eventually, Edwards mom died and his father was found guilty of killing her. He was sent to prison to atone for his sins, but instead, He was killed by his fellow inmates.
Edward who had lost both of his parents had nowhere to go, so he was sent to an orphanage where he would hopefully be picked up and live a good life. This didn't happen, instead, he was isolated by the other kids and caretakers when they found out about his parents and what had happened.
After five long months, every child had left the orphanage with their new parents except for Edward, who sat in his usual corner, hoping to be able to fetch some leftovers from the caretakers since they never gave him food. As anyone would have, Edward had grown tired of this pitiful lifestyle and decided to leave the orphanage for good. The same day, four men in black attires walked up to the orphanage. Unexpectedly, they were here for a child and since Edward was the only one left it was finally his turn to leave this despicable place.
The men in black attires belonged to a secret organization called "Eagle Eye" which specializes in assassination and suicide missions. Edward had no idea of what was going to happen to him now, all he knew was that his name was now "Edwin Dellmore"...

Title: Select Your Story
Synopsis:
Dear reader,You have a chance to live in this story. I will be the god and you can be a sinner or a saint but %100 my toy.Please be carefull before start riving (mix of reading and living)This book contains different stories,not every chapter is connected with next chapter. Your selections will guide the next stage of your life(the chapter which is your story s following part)WARNING Some stories has good endingsNot all of the stories has bad endingsYou can not decide your sex,age,psyical apprance,family,etc.
Try to reach your goalIf you are ready,click the live button (next chapter) and start your story.

Title: Dragon Ball, A True Coherent Fan-Fic
Synopsis:
Author: So I was writing and erasing every time I had a chapter for my other story, I felt it had something missing. So I decided to practice by doing a Fan Fic after reading some of them. Some of them almost made puke of how much they made me cringe. Now I'll make it justice my doing one. I don't have to create too deep of lore. I can just work around what's already there and fix some things I hated in the original work. Vegito being retcon. Launch being lost in limbo. No love for Tien Shinhan.
 
Synopsis:
I died and reincarnated in the Dragon Ball universe. This is how everything went down after was reborn.

Title: Original Small Ripples = Big Waves
Synopsis:
I don't own MAHOU SENSEI NEGIMA!. MAHOU SENSEI NEGIMA! was created by Ken Akamatsu and serialized by Weekly Sh?nen Magazine.
This was originally on Fanfiction.net under the username None of My Business Is Yours but I lost my password. I have been working on it since then. However, this is the old cringy original draft. I felt it was wrong not a post the whole draft considering my younger self wanted it to be seen. This is an uncomplete story and will not be completed. I will post the revamp version later.
Now it's here!
Updates Sporadically.
*New Summary*
History changed the moment demons attacked Negi's home. The brutality was stored into his mind but someone decided to save him. The question is, was it for the better or the worst?
*Original Summary*
What if a small change in history changed everything? What happens to the world around it? This is the story when a minor difference changed every thing. Negixharem Twin!Negi Older!Negi

Title: Untouchable
Synopsis: A single action can irrevocably alter the course of history. After being sacrificed to The Faceless Immortal, Shen Chao has returned to his world with one goal in mind. The destruction of the Celestial Masters and their self-imposed era of peace. But he who would turn his back on the world will surely be stabbed from behind.

Title: Grow up in a different world or die trying...repeatedly
Synopsis:
Growing up in a different world stuck in a time where an actual settlement of 5000 could very well be a local king's capital and most of the world is still set on on stone age, hunter-gatherer society like lifestyle is not easy. A few exceptions, far more advanced civilisations capable of amazing feats and hidden races full of wonders exist in this world just like the most gruesome customs do, some she would see as a member born into their midst as well as as a traveler on occasion.
Without cars and planes and streets a single chain of high hills and a wide river can separate entire worlds.
Good thing our hero chose the repeated rebirth and soul bound skill & talent options instead of an overpowered mana capacity.
Her first rebirth after her death in our world goes very wrong. Rather, it went like many such things did in times without a high level of civilisation. Fathered in summer, growth during autumn and winter and then a very late spring, with a mother who almost starved. The mother made it, but the baby was too thin and weak to survive her first days in her second life.
It was not the best start, but neither was it the worst our heroine was bound to experience in her lives to come.

Title: Kings destiny system
Synopsis:
What happens when an ambitious guy gets to reincarnate in a fantasy world,were the strong can do what they want and the weak being bossed around like sheeps, with a king destiny system, that guides him to be a supreme ruler.
Well this is my first story so i am a complete beginner so just do with it.Oh, and i am not good at english so am in your care.

Title: Dying and Dreams
Synopsis: What can be pulled out of a handbag? Read and find out.

Title: Here's Our Princess, Take Care Of Her! (And Don't Get Killed By The Dragon)
Synopsis: A young man’s life is turned not-quite upside down when all of a sudden elves from a magical realm appear in his apartment and dump their princess on him because a big, unkillable dragon said so. Take care of her, kay thanks bye!

Title: The Misplaced Dungeon
Synopsis:
The gods on four worlds were in trouble, or rather the clique that had taken over those worlds development and refused to listen to the established but less powerful gods already in power were in trouble. Their mismanagement was causing four previously lush and pleasant worlds to become harsh and inhospitable.
So taking another leaf out of world building 301 they arbitrarily decided to seed the worlds in question with new dungeons they could control or at least influence.
One fine day Azurea, self declared Goddess of dungeons on those four worlds discovered a fascinating world; it was teeming with life, literally overburdened with teeming billions of sophonts. Even better in her view many were atheists and due to the rapidly expanding population many of those were brand new souls.
So without further ado she soulnapped one hundred of them for her cliques experiment.
This is the story of one of the randomly selected beings, a sixteen year old girl with anger management issues, in fact Mary Silvestre has been diagnosed a borderline psychopath by a lazy school system.
 
NB: This story uses UK English spelling.

Title: Being the God of Hell is a bother [On temporary hiatus]
Synopsis: A group of people dies in a plane crash, but their souls are snatched away by an entity called the Highest One, that wants to make them the gods of a new world in order to guide and control its population. One of the passengers, Viktor, protests this, saying that the people of the new world should be entitled to find their own path in life without immortal beings ruling over them. The Highest One then ask Viktor if he really has that much faith in humanity, and after Viktor answer positively he made him into the God of Hell, tasked with redeeming the souls of the damned, as a way to test Viktor's faith in humanity... EDIT: I'm reworking this novel a bit, changing the first chapters from the "screenplay" form to standard prose. I should be done and start a shedule of one chapter per week at the end of february.

Title: End of Loop
Synopsis: Humanities last hope in a battle through time finally faces off against his nemesis for their final encounter.

Title: Blue Phoenix
Synopsis:
Sacrificing his life to protect his best friend was a decision which Hui Yue did not regret, yet who could have known that death was not the final destination, but rather the beginning of a new adventure into a world filled with demonic beasts and martial arts cultivation.
Hui Yue soon found that within this world, strength was what determined your future accomplishments and there was no space for the weak.Embarking upon this new life, Hui Yue meets friends, experience betrayal, and starts his own journey of cultivation to overcome his limits and become strong.

Title: MMORPG:The Legendary Treasure Hunter
Synopsis:
Miracle Of Nature, A Virtual Reality Game Released In 2078 Led To The Start Of The Prosperous Era.                                              Everyone has started working out and eating healthier, the game created an economy system which led to the rise if multiple developped countries rising in both the game and real life , doctors have found the cure to cancer, everyone is happy.
 
Arthur is what you would call in modern culture, a collector, someone who collects things, pretty obvious huh...?
well, no. arthur prefers to call himself a treasure hunter and he will enter the game Miracle Of Nature to leave a trace of his treasure hunting in another world.
watch as arthur becomes a legend in the virtual world Of Miracle Of Nature

Title: Stirrings
Synopsis: A police detective confronts an eerie circumstance that bears troubling resemblance to the situation that led him to his law enforcement career.

Title: Consume
Synopsis:
*Dropped for now but i will return to this one day, it represents a great failure to me. Shortly after writing this my life started getting very complicated and busy and I just stopped being able to handle the hate that inevitably spawns from a semi-popular story. I'm going to try my hand at a few other stories, build my abilities and then come back her for the re-write and give this story the second chance I think it is worth. I love the concept and it would be a shame to waste it.*
What would you do if your world changed? If your neighbours suddenly turned into savage beasts, their nature changed on a fundamental level. What if that savage beast was you? Johnathan Simmons was not a successful man, nor did he have a particularly interesting life, he lived alone with his sick mother and worked whatever jobs he could to pay the bills but his world changes completely when he becomes a monster. 
Note- This is the first time I have written anything but I have a solid idea of where the story is going and what I want to happen, I can't promise my uploading rate won't be sporadic as I have other committments but if this gets big enough I'll definitely work up a schedule. Please leave comments if I've made any errors/ if you have anything you'd like to see in the story. This is pretty much just for fun so I don't mind working things in. Thank you ever so much!

Title: The Draven Reaper
Synopsis: Derek Lupin lived a life of hate and fear, beaten and degraded on a daily basis until after a colmunation of years and years of waiting and planning came together he managed to find the perfect time to run away from all of his troubles, not realising he ran too far and into a whole new set of problems on a much more dangerous but free world, the world of his dreams.

Title: Undeath
Synopsis:
The player going by the name of Nox in the Full Dive VRMMO Heroic Age was perfectly happy with his life just the way it was. He had a comfortable job, a nice place, and a girlfriend that he loved when he wasn’t plotting her brutal murder. All and all life was good.
Then the trickster god Loki plucks up his soul and forces it into the world of Heroic Age, Eden. Sadly for Nox Eden isn’t just a game world anymore, it’s his new reality. His new dangerous, violent, and chaotic reality. Oh, and to make matters worse, he can’t even curse about it…

Random Releases
Main Project
(Cover image does not belong to me, all credit goes to the original artist) 
Ratings/Reviews Wanted!

Title: A "Typical" Dungeon Capture
Synopsis: This short story gives a radically different viewpoint of dungeon exploration compared to the ones typically found in games or literature. One thing is certain: you’ll never see dungeon exploration the same way ever again!

Title: The Story Of a Magical War Hero
Synopsis:
Introduction 
In a small village based in a mythical world. A childbearing a demon was born as a result her mother died and her father not being able to bear the pain of his late wife's death killed himself, leaving the child to grow up alone and scared. Of course, there were the townspeople who cared for the child and provided her with food and water. She was still always alone scared that she would never find a place that she truly belongs. But she aspired to be a wizard along with the other children from the village, the children that would grow up to be her closest friends helping her by trying to kill the demon that would soon be released and unleashing another war. Of course, a few years grew by and Tojiane and her friends practiced magic to help make their dreams come true. They finally think that there ready to become wizards and warlocks and they follow their grand quest to slay the demon that made Tojiane have to go through so much death and sorrow. They made it through graduation and are officially wizards and warlocks. Since the academy knows about Tojiane's demon inside her they had to assign her and her friends a "special teacher" to help her find out how to kill the demon causing her so much pain. The teacher brings them to go see an "old friend" of hers they make it to the island and then the real adventure begins.
To Be Continued...

Title: After the Game Over
Synopsis:
Lucius Altdorf a 23 years old Asian also known as Uriel Zenille on "World of Order" a game based DD(Dream Dive)MMO-RPG as One of Five Legendary Player.
Fight many powerfull warrior on the Arena and make his name resounded in the entire "World of Order".
Who is don't know Uriel Zenille? Lord of Zenille City and a Fxcking Crazy Dark Armored Magic Swordman?
But after the died of his parents 3 Years ago, Lucius stop playing "World of Order" in order to take a job as an accountant in small company near his home while himself go to the colloegue.
Unfortunately fate decided to laugh at him as Lucius got fired because one minor problem.
With lack spirit Lucius just can go home, untill himself remember there is an old game waiting for his return, "World of Order".
Although once again fate decided to play some tricks to our poor Lucius Altdorf.
 
Note :

Title: Apex of Creation
Synopsis:
When James Exosia is brought back from the brink of death by an angel, he discovers that he’s returned with a spark of divinity. Upon his introduction to angels and demons, James is shocked to learn that he’s now considered a “Hybrid” - a rare combination of human blood and angelic power.
But not everyone is thrilled about this development. The forces of Heaven and Hell - perpetually at war with each other - both want to make use of James’s unique skills. As James is unwillingly dragged into transcendental politics and supernatural warfare, he must balance his own goals and ambitions with the responsibilities and duties that come with his new power. For in the entire universe, there is nothing - save God Himself - that is more dangerous than a Hybrid.

Title: Trying to survive in Hardcore Mode (Naruto-verse)
Synopsis:
Our Protagonist is abruptly ripped away from his boring and average life. He is forced into a beta-testing program of Heaven Incorporation. He will have to survive in Hardcore Mode, where the system places him in danger, ruins his carefully crafted plans and does its best to make him live a difficult life.
 
Follow him trough thick and thin, while he explores the Naruto-verse and does his best to become strong enough that the system can't find anything to threaten him with.
 --------------------------------------
Chapter lenght is around 1k words.

Title: Vincent's Bizarre, oops I mean Pokemon, Adventures
Synopsis:
The usual fan fiction set up - an avid fan of a series gets transported to its world and uses their foreknowledge to navigate their way through the storyline.
Vincent is no different as he lands himself in Kanto, he attempts to keep his butterfly effect to minimal impact while journeying his way towards both familiar and new folks, places and pokemon.
As noob new to writing fictional stuff, any mistakes pointed out will be greatly appreciated.

Synopsis: A year ago, a girl named Daniela García made a big mistake which caused her to hide away in her, break up with her boyfriend and stay away from her friends. Some say you hear an enchanting humming 
Some say you hear the most beautiful voice in the world

Title: Chaos Fiend in the Naruto World
Synopsis:
Eric knew it had only been a matter of time before someone came for his life. In all honesty, he was actually surprised that he managed this for live long considering the things he'd done. He'd insulted, killed and fucked over countless people during his years as one of the best military contractors money could buy.
However, now that part of his life would all come to an end. Fortunately, a new chapter is about to begin since he was just offered a new position as an instigator by the primordial god, Chaos, in the world of Naruto.
 
Check out more chapters of my novel at: https://www.webnovel.com/book/11469795206385305/Chaos-Fiend-in-the-Naruto-World

Title: Agents of Dawn[Under Rewrite]
Synopsis: Sorry to all of you who wanted to read this iteration. I started this book years ago, while in university and I didn't really have the time orWhat would you do if you were thrown into another world to be the chess piece of Gods? Follow our heroes as they battle with monsters and gods towards survival. Watch how they rise a nation from dust, where everyone could live in peace and harmony if fates allow it. Sorry for those who read and like the story before, I haven't had the time to upload while in university, and I when I had gotten back to it, now a few years later, I didn't like many parts of it so I figured I'd like to rewrite most of it. Hence what I am doing right now. I have a rough sketch of what I want to happen, but I am doing this in a TTRPG style so everything can happen and ultimately the dice will decide what will happen. So be ready for characters to meet untimely ends and what not. Some Deus ex will happen to drive the story forward, but this is ultimately a game chance.
