Title: Bitzy's Shorts
Synopsis: Each post is a self contained story, though some may be set in similar universes. Please check the author notes as they will cover any content warnings that apply to that story.

Title: Bound by Duty
Synopsis:
Danielle Ward is on the run. After killing her step-uncle, she is exiled by her pack and seeks refuge with one of her good friends. Her callous father, her jealous stepmother and her maternal pack want her blood. But fate has other plans for her.
During a royal inspection, Danielle finds that her mate is none other than the king himself. She gets swept into a series of activities from then on to prove and establish herself as the rightful queen of wolves.
But Danielle has secrets; secrets her mate finds disturbing and dangerous. What happens when he begins questioning her and pushes her boundaries?
Will Danielle, who wants nothing but to be a good queen, decide cover up the truth, or release it, risking their chance to a lifetime of happiness?

Title: I Will Be The Harem King!
Synopsis:
He died.
He met god.
He got a cheat.
He went to another world.
He got girls.
That was the short way of saying what the story of our MC Ray Cross is. As for how, when, why and who? Well, you just have to wait and see what happens.

Title: Avatar: The divided state
Synopsis:
A world without bending.
Bending is now a legend yet to be remembered. Everyone thought of the era of bending as a fantasy to be told to their children for bedtime stories.
People in the present lives in peace,As of now.
Chaos awaits the future.
Bending ended as the last avatar died in his avatar state without knowing how.Where.Who.When?
Until an astonishing event happened.
The return of the age of benders.
Does this also mean the return of the avatar?
"But didn't he died in avatar state?"
Follow Casie, Eryu ,Xyle and Lance in their journey of unraveling
THE DIVIDED STATE.
Please vote..
Photos being featured aren't mine.Ctto.
Open for suggestions.

Title: Revolver
Synopsis:
Theo Lane is chosen to be the avatar of a deity to partake in a tournament to decide the One God. He isn’t the only one. No. There are a lot more than he would like. Of course the apathetic high-school student would never agree to the desperate pleas of the said goddess, but there was a reward for the winner.
He could become a god himself if he won.
The greatest hassle was the stage itself. Instead of Earth, it would be on another planet with technology similar to the medieval ages with a few twists. A planet thrice the size of Earth with denizens of its own, with a history of its own.
There was only one wish in his life, and that was to bring back the one he failed to protect. If murdering every other person in the world was what it would take, so be it. It was his only chance.

Title: To Capture a Protagonist's Heart!
Synopsis: When I woke up, I was in the "Waiting World" and a Goddess appeared before me granting me two options: To reincarnate into a normal life or a life where I would be a main character in a harem anime! I was granted this chance because I was apparently virtuous! My memory is a bit foggy but this is every man's dream. I will begin my life in fantasy! Wait...Instead of the protagonist, I reincarnated as one of the girls and must capture the actual protagonist's heart?!

Title: Despots
Synopsis:
What would you do if you never had anything and when you finally had something it was taken away?
What are you prepared to do in order to get your revenge?
For a moment eveything is good, but what will one do if in the next second, everything he achieved was destroyed.
"We are death bringers. We are wardens. We are despots. We are the dark truth and not a beautiful lie."

Title: The Wolf
Synopsis: A short drive takes a twisted turn in woods that shouldn't be there.

Title: A Fear Response
Synopsis: Waking up scared is normal, waking up scared after being quite thoroughly murdered is a bit less normal.

Title: Naruto ? I should have chosen Pokemon
Synopsis:
Reincarnated into the Narutoverse with a little twist and a really nerved system. 
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Hi, Author here. It's planned to be a long story with a lot of twist and action. Not a good author, more like somebody writing just for fun and maybe some free meals along the way. There is no way to get me a burger/pizza/spaghetti etc. (yet). The story will be launched in webnovel, the site of qidian and RR. But a future site with a website that I created (pats chest proudly) is in plan, it will probably take a few centurys.

Title: Raylia
Synopsis:
Planet was minding its own business in a backwater galaxy in a small little solar system.  Just as Earth was being dscovered, it goes and blows itself up.  The System tries to incorporate as many of the survivors as it can. Worlds that are magic driven to worlds that are technological marvels with all the worlds inbetween.  
A thousand of the survivors are sent to Raylia.  A planet that is on the outskirts of the system, as The System was trying to send as many survivors to as many planets as possible.  
Thoren flies headlong into action...literally.  What equates to skipping the tutorial, Thoren finds himself stuck in a level 50 instanced dungeon.
no food
no water
no weapon
only the company of an imp.
"I'm Screwed"
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This story uses the system derived by Puddles4263 in Randidly Ghosthound.  I've incorporates the Path's system into the leveling of this story.  Some of the beginning paths will be similar or the same as I thought that the starting paths were very logical on how a system should start.  The stories will be completely different as the characters and story arcs will be completely different.  Again, thank you Puddles for allowing me to use your system, really appreciate it!
I also wanted to thank ProFound Magician. Has a lot of insight into a story development and as his system is based on Ghosthound, I saw a some beginning stage skills that should be thought of in a character just starting out.  If you haven't yet read Ghosthound or Genesis System you're in for a real treat when you do!  Thank you both I hope my use is seen as an homage in the beginning.  Hopefully my story can live up to the system.

Title: Memory Fragments
Synopsis:
Dreams, memories – sometimes, I have those from person I don’t recognize.
Sometimes, I wonder if my dreams and memories were real.
Do these memories are real, or are they fake? I wonder that to myself.

Title: [HIATUS] Re:Turn, The Legend of the 4 Swords
Synopsis:
Hiatus Note: Currently on planned hiatus while I finish planning the next section of the story to make sure I know where it's going. Chapter 10 will release soon, and 11 and beyond are ""Part 2"" of the story. In the meantime, check out "Clockwork" my other slice of life LN that I will update regularly.
 
Cryo is an average 18 year old, just graduated high school and is transitioning into college. One notable factor about him is he is incredibly unlucky. Over the summer gets extremely invested in a gacha game known as “Ultima Online” and plays it every single day with his real life friends Gig, Yuso, and Shigeto. Cryo becomes a well-known member of the community because he uploads videos online and livestreams and is especially well-known because he almost never pulls good units from the gacha due to his terrible luck, which makes his anger fun to watch. One day, Admin (Administrators/Developers of the gacha game) send him an email inviting him to their facilities to tour them as a thank-you for making content for the game. On his way to the facilities Cryo stops at a gas station to get some snacks and the gas station is stuck-up by a robber. The robber takes a cute girl hostage and threatens to kill her, so Cryo steps in and bodyslams the robber, causing the robber to aimlessly shoot a bullet which bounces off a rubber tire, just when Cryo thinks he saved the day, the bullet hits him in the head with a lot of force, but not enough to kill him, putting him into a coma. Cryo is then transported to purgatory where a cute goddess decides his fate to be transported to a realm that needed help, promising Cryo if he found 4 legendary swords in this world he would gain re-admittance to the life he once lived. Before being transported to the world that needed assistance the goddess tells him that he can maximize any of his traits, procuring thought into whether Cryo should choose looks, strength, or another trait. After being reminded of his terrible luck in which a flashback to his family dying in a house fire is shown, he decides maximizing his luck trait should be the best choice. He is then transported into this new world, which turns out to be the world of his gacha game, Ultima Online. He meets friends and foes and is tasked with collecting 4 swords that appear as lolis to Cryo. Using the gacha system, he creates a party of strong allies to aid him on his quest to return.

Title: Stygian Mage
Synopsis:
"Welcome Traveler."It was what Soren first heard when he met an impossibly strange man in a horrendously strange world, where fantasy became reality. Now, stranded in the unknown world, Soren must make use of the discovery that strength is all that matters in this world, and try to get himself back home--That is, If he's able to find his way. But there is always more behind the veil of uncertainty, and Soren must be deathly sure of the decisions he makes. After all, curiosity can kill more than just cats.
[Author: This is the first story I have ever written so have mercy on me. Bear with me please if I make any mistakes. I welcome all sorts of criticism as it will help me improve. Hope you guys like it.]
PS: This story will contain explicit sexual content and profanities. The Mc is not a good guy in this story so don’t expect a nice Mc who will help others regardless of his well-being.
P.P.S: The cover image is not owned by me. I used Adobe Spark to combine and edit some free images.
P.P.P.S: Also posting on Webnovel, Moonquill, Wattpad, and Scribblehub.
Edit: I thought I should add this in here because it seems to be a problem for many people--My inspirations came from mainly chinese webnovels, so my writing style resembled that a lot at start. I just wanted to leave a note here for people who don't like such stuff. I've already improved a lot and changed my style in recent chs, so hope you guys give it a try before dropping prematurely if that's your reason. Furthermore, I will also be editing all the early chs in the near future to make the quality similar to the recent chs.
Current Schedule: 1 ch / week [On Saturdays]. [Will be increasing the release rate once I'm comfortable with this speed].

Title: Wait… Why is this a Skill? [Dropped]
Synopsis:
Author's Note:
Now, I just lost my motivation for writing this. Feel free to read until the last available chapter. I might come back to writing, but it will be another fiction.
=========================
During school, Endou Kouta and the whole school were summoned to another world. With the cliché line, “Please save this world from the demon lord!” He and his classmates were given skills to strengthen themselves. However, Kouta, who was labeled “King of the School”, was given no skills. He was shunned by the royals but not by his classmates. His classmates then helped him train during their stay at the castle.
During an expedition to subjugate a monster, Kouta was killed… not. Instead, he was given a skill he never thought he would have.
This is the adventure of a closet online gamer in another world.

Title: Gun Princess Royale - En Paralelo
Synopsis:
Gun Princess Royale - En Paralelo is a collection of side stories that cover interspersed events that take place before and during the Gun Princess Royale main story.
It is recommended that readers be familiar with the main story (currently available on Amazon Kindle) before they read the disjointed chapters of GPR - En Paralelo.

Title: The adventourus healer [HIATUS]
Synopsis:
Su Ming is born to a second life in a fantasy realm. No one and nothing gives him any reason or goal. Su Ming is a gentle and modern man, so he hides for the first ten years. While trying to learn about the world, he grows to love his family and friends. When he finds the opportunity to cultivate his spirit of adventure reignites, and he begins to look for opportunities to help.
I am working on a rewrite of the story. 
The picture is named "Spirited Away" by SeerLight and published on DeviantArt.

Title: Total War Unbound
Synopsis:
Earth has been conquered, the people enslaved and forced to fight in unique settings based around popular games. Victory means earning power, and the right to live. Failure means death. Our Player must survive through countless games set in a game universe, as opposed to a single game. His task is near impossible, but he will not give up.
War comes to all, it is total and absolute

Title: The Storm
Synopsis: Regret and hate go hand in hand. Sometimes even grudges you settle can haunt you to the grave.

Title: Faded Souls
Synopsis:
Lately Ian has this vague sense that something is out of place in his life. The strongest impression of this is from the time he met his best friend Heather. Bringing this up to her at the park, Ian is only met with a strange look. When Heather suddenly disappears in front of his eyes, memories of their first meeting come flashing back. "That's right Heather had a yonger sister, and she was the one who intrudced Ian to Heather in the first place!"  Why did Ian not remember her until now. What is even stranger is Ian was closer to the sister than Heather.
But what Ian did not know at the time was Heather had not disappeared, no he was the one who had just been erased from her life.  Ian has been dragged into a game by beings known as the Earsers. If he wins he has two choices return to his life like this never happened, or try and make people remember the other players.

Title: Godlings
Synopsis:
It was a usual dull day at school. After a long boring lecture, the last bell of the day finally rang, and everybody was happy to be able to return home eventually. Kenny, who was an ordinary student, decided to visit the school library to read a book before going back home.    And then, it occurred suddenly, and before anybody could guess what was happening, they found themselves engulfed by a mysterious otherworldly light.    The next time when Kenny woke up, he found himself in an old mansion hidden in the woods, with an eccentric professor and a mysterious, beautiful maid.
Contents ~Arc 1; The Red Forest    ( Chapters 1 - 17,  Pages 1 - 223 )
Arc 2; (name not yet decided)    ( Chapters 18 -  ,  Pages  224 -  )

Title: AfterWorld
Synopsis:
Dying from reasons unknown Jake finds himself alive in a world between the mortal realm.


 


Here in a world called Afterworld. Jake must strive to keep his second life from slipping through his grasp as he works to grow stronger.


 


Taking up the mantle of an adventurer Jake will travel the world. Along with his friends, he will risk his life for glory, power, and adventure. In a world straight out of a fantasy, one could only guess at what fate has in store for Jake. 


Welcome to AfterWorld the world for souls. Please be sure to grab a brochure and a map for all first-time visitors. Those of you who have returned we hope your stay is enjoyable. RIP!

Title: Desert Runner
Synopsis: An NPC story.With her pain potions in short supply, Maddie accepts a deadly run, pick up a package in Trox City and cross the desert plains to Port Troli, the only issues – an unwanted passenger and Tromoal breeding season.

Title: The Adventure of Two Mildly Sociopathic Siblings in a Poorly Designed VRMMORPG World
Synopsis:
uhh
An author who has no idea what he's doing.
Read on as he regale's a tale of two siblings, whose antics inadvertantly make waves that threaten to drown all those around them.

Credit for the synopsis and the story itself goes to my good friend The Sexy Warrior Poet.
I'm just an add-on for posting.
There will be weekly updates. Most likely. Probably. Hopefully.

Title: Short Stories Of Mine
Synopsis:
Short stories that could range from fantasy to sci-fi and anything between.
This is mainly to get experience and the habit to write stories that have been rattling in my head.
First time I'm writing. criticism is welcome and encouraged.
(If stories fall under tags I will add the tags)

Title: Death Count
Synopsis:
Born with two unique, never seen before skills, life wasn’t easy for E-333.
Experiment Number 333 — E-333 for short — has been tortured and killed repeatedly for nearly his entire life as a genuine pig due to his unique skills.
His two skills, when combined, basically gave him immortality, and that caused many to believe that he was the secret to eternal life, awakening their human nature known as greed.
However, what they didn’t know was that every time E-333 dies, he would come back stronger, his hatred for this world ever-increasing.

Title: Scenario 66
Synopsis:
Silven isn’t too happy when he stops to consider his miraculous prison escape, a guiding voice on the air and the herd of terrifying black knights hunting him down and realises he may be important. Equally, he’s not going to be too happy when he learns he’s nothing more than a character in a video game in chapter 3.8. There’s just no pleasing some people. 
 
But by the time of this realisation, Silven is all-powerful and all-arrogant, with a couple of game-breaking businesses under his belt. And when he finally understands he has been meddling with the very fabric of his own reality, the damage may already have been done.
 

 This fiction contains:
 
* Approx. 4,342,213 video game tropes, mechanics and cliches
* Very light levelling and business development (but no tables. Other than the one on the cover).
* A rather acquired taste in dry, sarcastic humour.
* 0 dragons. Why no dragons, man?
 
Chapters will be released EVERY DAY, in order to sufficiently punish you for all the bad things you've done in life.

Title: Stepping Stones Saga
Synopsis:
Update frequency: Daily
Chapter length: 1350-1500 words

Dartelo Vilruhn was born to a loving farmer’s family in the Holy Pietra Empire. Over four centuries have passed since The Fall, and like the other great kingdoms of the Estoch Continent, the Empire is now a place where one's birth does not determine one's future. A young man's fate may hold many surprises, for these are interesting times. Dartelo is now faced with what seems to be the penultimate challenge as he must put his past behind him and move forward. The question that remains is where will the winding road that is his future take him? Will he study for countless years to become one of the Holy Mages? Will he strive to become a knight and fight his way up to the fabled Throne of the Battle Saint Pietra? Will he become the finest craftsman to have ever graced Estoch? Will he put on the cloak of a travelling adventurer and face the beasts that roam the vast continent? Or maybe, like so many before him, he might wander astray into the depths of hell itself...

Title: Chance to a Fantasical World
Synopsis:
Sorai Takeir is going to begin his life as a 1st year high school freshman today, or at least he should’ve been if not for the abrupt awakening of an earthquake. The last thing he remembers before blacking out is the collapsing roof overshadowing him reflected in his eyes. Not knowing whether he is dead or not, he opens his eyes to find he is now in a world on a different dimensional plane, surrounded by game-like mechanics reflecting in his field of vision. Discovering that he has the ability to transverse to other worlds, he begins jumping between worlds in search of the dimension where Earth should still be existing, in hopes that he could see his family again. 
 
-------------------------
IMPORTANT NOTE: This fanfiction requires the knowledge of popular Japanese titles of various anime, manga, light novels, and visual novels to be able to enjoy to the fullest. 
Knowledge from these titles especially are absolutely required: Overlord (Light Novel), Boku no Hero Academia/My Hero Academia (Manga), Rewrite (Visual Novel), Black Bullet (Light Novel), Toaru Majutsu no Index (Light Novel), Sword Art Online (Light Novel), Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei (Light Novel), Mahou Sensei Negima! (Manga), ???, ???, ???, ???

Title: Infinitum Crystals [2] - The Snow Phoenix
Synopsis:
Set in an alternative world where magic and modern society coexist. Infinitum Energy became the main source of energy to most things in this world. This energy can be found anywhere but especially on many of these people. They call these people, wizards. Besides having the basics of magic, each wizard also has their own unique ability which differs from others. Some may inherit from their family, and some may also inherit from an ancient race way before the dawn of wizards.
Several months have passed since the end of his magic high school. Cyclone White, one of the few young wizards that acquired immeasurable potential in their unique ability through the power of the Infinitum Crystals. He now faces a brand new challenge in the form of university life. Enrolling into Infinity Academy leads to him encountering a whole different set of new friends, foes.
The Snow Phoenix arrives just as White arrives his campus. What tale could The Snow Phoenix tell? What will this fated encounter result to? The answers are in this 2nd Volume of Infinitum Crystal.

Title: Undying Horror
Synopsis: Reborn as the lowest of the low, a man cursed to never know rest, not even in death, aims to carve his name into the heavens; no matter the cost.

Title: Level Down
Synopsis:
Hell is for children. Thats not a social commentary, its open mockery. After finding out the supernatural world has a video game interface I figured not much could shock me anymore. Guess I shouldnt have tempted fate.
WARNING: This is a long form story. The chapters starting out will be buildup and it might take some time to Reach the litrpg elements. please enjoy the first infernalRPG.

Title: The Demon Lord's Lover
Synopsis:
Julius Goldforge knows how the world works. He knows his role. Really, it's destiny by this point. 
The mentor dies, the hero gains motivation, and the demon lord falls to their blade.
Except...something's clearly gone wrong here.

Written by Redknight3996 and Indismile, The Demon Lord's Lover is a fantasy comedy/romance featuring a jaded, middle-aged adventurer who's damn sure he's going to die on this new journey with his students and the ambitious Empress of the Dark Lands, whose drive to conquer the entire world winds up putting both him and her on a bizarre course of attraction and impulsive decision making.
Includes (but is not limited to): action, adventure, big fights, elemental-themed temples, demons, angels, fumbling romance, competence, incompetence, nudist druids, the crimes of the past influencing the current age in myriad ways, interpersonal issues, fatalism, and being a decent uncle to one's adoptive family.
(We've also got a discord~! https://discord.gg/Mbba6g7)

Title: Ben the Dungeon
Synopsis:
On my 21st birthday something strange happened. I became a dungeon.
Write Your Own LitRPG would like to present "Ben the Dungeon"!
Ben the Dungeon is an ongoing story created on Reddit, by YOU the audience and gathered for your reading pleasure. A collaborative story in the style of the old Choose Your Own Adventure books, readers submit segments of story
Read the story here on Royal Road, check out the rules on page 1 and then join in the fun on Reddit (newest post will shows on the newest page or on the top of our Reddit Post Contents Page that can be found on this link)

Title: Assassination System V.2
Synopsis: [Release Rate 14-28 chapters a week] In a world fraught with innumerable dangers where living day by day is a struggle, a young man from the modern age transmigrated into such a world, accompanied by a peculiar system made for assassination. [Move footsteps three inches apart for enhanced stealth.] [Strike at the indicated acupoint to ensure a quick death!] [Host has successfully assassinated the designated enemy! Gained one Assassination Point!]

Title: polyglot("NPC_Revolution")
Synopsis:
Alex finds herself on the shores of a world unfamiliar, a world of fantasy and magic, a world that is a game. They tell her she is an NPC, a part of the code of the game, a part of the fantasy to entertain the players. She rejects the idea, for her memories can't just be lies. Could they?Alex sets out to establish herself in the sandbox fantasy world, to find her identity, and to weather the storm between the players and the inhabitants of the new world.
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Polyglot: NPC Revolution
The story needed to be trimmed to a 10% sample to comply with Amazon's publishing terms. The book will run for free every so often, so keep watch on Amazon or follow for updates!
If you were in the middle of reading the story before I cut it down, send me a PM and I'll try to hook you up.
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Old:
This novel is my first experiment of litRPG and gamelit. It should run about the same length as a standard novel, at roughly 100k words.
Here are some of the things I tried to implement:
Plot centricFemale MC with strong character growthHardcore lowbie action (for a good portion of the storyMinimal stat-spamMinimal flavor textHyperrealistic VRMMO and its rational effct on gamingA dash of weebismBase buildingUncommon magic systemThe role of sentient AI in video games.
I'm pushing towards something light-hearted and fun, while maintaining dramatic tention that reaches a huge scale.
Will update on weekends if not more.

Title: Swords Only, Narutoverse
Synopsis:
Sometimes you live by the sword, sometimes you die by it...
Sometimes, you end up in the Narutoverse a game character obsessed with them to the point of insanity...
He was a little... Broken in his past life...
 
So, just decided to make this cause I've been reading a lot of Naruto FF and I really do quite enjoy them, but the romance and main character are never to my liking, or always Naruto...
Also, I enjoy the LitRPG genre, but I like a more hardcore version, no insane cheats like observation or inspect, and no insane stat numbers, I also feel starting everything as 1 gives me more room to play and gives you a better understanding of how powerful the main character is versus a regular person. There will never be a different person's stat sheet or numbers.

Title: Human Ambition
Synopsis:
Humans are usually the good guys. They show up and save the day just in the nick of time, everytime. But, what if that were not the case? What if they were something to inspire fear? The worst nightmare of every intelligent civilisation in the galaxy that is to be avoided at all costs.
What if in desparation someone opens a door that should have remained closed and Humanity siezes on that momentary weakness? Humans are not your friends. They are different from the rest of us. They are not unified under one government and they are not weaker for that division but stronger despite it.
They thrive in competition and despair. Mutually Assured Destruction is an option they consider to be valid strategy. And they are coming now that they know you're here.

Title: Xuan - Mage
Synopsis:
This is the story of Xuan as he attends the Academy, the most prestigeous and difficult to enter school in the state for magic. Xuan was accepted through a special exception, skipping the usual district rankings. His unusual entrance and unconventional magic and battle techniques will make him stand out and provide a challenge to not only the other students at the Academy but the teachers too.
~~
This is my first written work ever. Please feel free to comment or message me with any feedback!
- ChocMilkshake

Title: Eating Fast Is My "Overpowered" Ability
Synopsis:
Mei is a girl with a peculiar habit. She eats very quickly. That's supposed to be overpowered?
[Discord]

Title: A consequence of Deadlines
Synopsis: With everyone worried about Artificially Intelligent robots taking over one day this story takes a more realistic approach to the subject. It follows the life of the first ever AI robot and all the glitches it came with. These were mainly due to unrealistic deadlines and employees who'd rather be at home than working on this revolutionary project.

Title: Kaleidoscope End
Synopsis: In a sleepy town by the sea lies a bar almost no one goes to, run by shadiest man I've ever met. The furniture is scuffed, the booze is par at best, and off the top of my head I could name five better places to go but... it’s no stretch to say that place literally saved my life.

Title: Virtual Apotheosis
Synopsis:
From a normal person's view, Vincent was a simple man, he did what he want, he didn't do what he didn't want.
  Even if it means spending his time inside his favourite game for years, not socializing, being broke most of the time, and lurking inside his house for most of the day.
  But, what if, in an unexplainable turn of events, he was given opportunity to show exactly what he had been doing for more than half of his life.
  What would he do then?
 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
  Releases are irregular. Chapter length and quality is irregular.
  The synopsis, cover, and the chapters are subjected to change at any time.
  Just an idea I want to put out.

Title: The Demon Against the Heavens
Synopsis: On faraway lands where the Chinese culture meets a Korean nuance, a strange Curse befalls Helial. It may ruin his life entirely, or it may not. From a Korean video-game scenario which follows the Immortality genre design of Chinese fantasy novels, in a world outlined by Classical elements as well, nothing compares the call of freedom.While contrastingly different worlds get in touch volume after volume, this brand-new genre explores new horizons that traditional fantasy literature has never reached before.

Title: Broken System of an OP Guy
Synopsis: Gabriel was sitting on the roof of his school when everyone got the message from the gods about the god games. Gabriel thought that life was boring and now he was gonna have so much fun and the gods liked Gabriel so they gave him the best gift anyone in the apocalypse could ask for. This is the story of how Gabriel became a god.

Title: The Children's Crusade
Synopsis:
Galactic Year, 649.
 It has been long since the fall of earth. Our mother planet has been in ruins for centuries. Humanity is in a full-scale war against the Kyl’aq. Countless men have died in the cold, vast battleground of outer space. However, their blood was not enough to satisfy the devourers. Our growing military strategy and firepower is outmatched. We were unable to keep up with the Kyl’aqi evolution. The thick metallic clouds they spew disabled our machinery and jammed our communications. Their staunch plasma shields rendered most of our weapons utterly useless. Microbial anomalies and acidic fumes put a huge burden on our economy and manpower. However, the nightmare that is most feared by the defenders of man, is none other than the dreaded Atrox. The epitome of the Kyl’aq warring class, the Atrox, evolved an organ that enables biological cold nuclear fission. Powered by this unworldly source of energy, the Atrox unleash fearsome power with unaccountable agility in battle. Several Space fleets were torn like paper by this small human-sized beast.
Anyone who watches the Atrox in battle would despair at the reality upon which we are standing. The fall of humanity is near. The last card humanity drew to fight against the mighty Atrox was a symbol we believed in from the ancient past.
 
The Knights.
 
The weapon they wield, the Knightsword, is made from epoh, the only substance in this universe capable of penetrating the hardened shields of the Atrox. Because epoh is so rare in quantity, it was not forged into bullets or shells, things that would be wasted and forgotten. It was thus cast into a weapon our first ancestors passed down to us – the sword.
Those who receive the sword that are most expensive and precious – more than a thousand cities – who can stand against the mighty Atrox, the living hope of humanity itself, they are the Knights.
Undergoing hundreds of surgeries and augmentations to exceed the limits of man, swapping genes and being injected with neurochemicals, withstanding merciless training that cut bones and reshape organs, and receiving the most rigorous education our race can provide, The Knights are not seen as mere humans but as demigods of our century. However, the demand is far greater than our supply, and the average age of the knights are in the teens. So many young knights are pushed into war and slaughtered before they ever master their swordsmanship.
They are the ones who watch their comrades fall hundreds of times. They are the ones who battle with thousands of foes and finally cross blades with the Atrox.
Our gods are mere children, who shoulder the despair of all a humanity that is struggling to survive.
The praises, money, and worship of our society could not cure these children who are wounded deep within. Young knights endure mere hours and minutes for the months and years of the human race. Their lives are like candles, lit up and consumed by fire for their brothers’ bliss. Yes, they are live sacrifices for our failing world.
May glory be within all fallen Knights. We pray they would find peace at last; the peace they desired so dearly in their lives.

Title: A Fox's System
Synopsis:
A small blunder leads to Riku being cruelly killed by a collapsing shrine. The goddess it belonged to leaves him with an easy choice: Being reborn with in a new world or to start his journey to the afterlife.
Naturally, Riku decides on the former and is promtly reborn in a fantasy world - as a girl and sole survivor of the fox kin. But the goddess still was not done with him...
Why would she do all of this!?

Title: Foreign Homeworld
Synopsis:
A Homecoming no one expected or even thought as possible but one everyone knowingly or unknowingly desired.
A confrontation between science and magic, mortality and divinity, the present and its origins.

Title: Return of The lazy immortal
Synopsis:
Taru would have never thought that he would one day do something as illogical. After finally gaining some time to be lazy and rest after this period of struggle, to think that he would end it so quickly and for peoples that he knew for less than a century to boots. Sure it had been many millennium of inactivity, but it was still far from as for him.
"Well whatever, let's just see how it play out".

Follow him as he return to the magic world to throw some things in chaos and straighten some others with his friends.
*warning : lazy op main character. Probably won't ever encounter something he can't solve.
*warning': lazy unpredictable author. May pump 3 chapter the same day and none the following week. 
*warning''': I'll try my best to to at least 1.2k words by chapters.
Read at your convenience.

Title: The Royal Guard
Synopsis:
An orphan was found on his own, listless and wandering aimlessly. A lithe man with a hood covering his face watches as the kid walks right into him without seeing him. This kid should be the final recruit. Hopefully the guild will be glad to have all the new trainees. The hooded man thinks to himself as he firmly grabs the kids elbow and steers him to a new life.
 Damien lost everything. One day, he is found by a man looking for a very special kind of person. Damien is brought to a training ground for assassins. He spends many years there, until one day, a master in the order of assassins assigns Damien to work as a Royal Guard. The Royal Guards are an elite force charged with guarding the most important people in the empire. Amongst the Royal Guards, Damien will face demons, mages and things beyond his imagining.
 
Mature tag is for one really fantastic song in chapter seven. Totally worth reading the whole story for that one song.

Title: Mega Cringe: Dab
Synopsis: Terin lives in a world made up of social medias. His strength in dabbing is unparalleled which earned him the title of "Dab Master". Even still he is shunned for practicing dabbing. One day his home gets attacked by Marculis Zurcberius and he loses everything. This leads him to go on a journey to the Deep Fried dimension to stop marc from completing project    "Z U C C"

Title: Plague Children
Synopsis:
Years ago, in the country of Sei'O, a plague spread and turned half of their population to stone. The children of those infected were born with skin abandoned of all color. Completely grey, they were known as Plague Children.
Though they possessed no ability to spread the plague, they were heavily mistreated, discriminated against, ostracized, and often times killed at their younger ages.
The story follows the young Plague Child Ora, as he gains one of the strongest relics the world would ever come to see. With it, everything changes with relative ease. What fate awaits this world that heavily mistreated Ora?
In this world of magic, relics, and ancient arts, no one could be certain.

Title: Fur and Fang
Synopsis:
"A fire burns across our land, it ravages villages and tears families apart. A fire burns across our land boy, just look!" A man grabs the face of his son and forces his crying visage to stare at the plumes of smoke which scar the night sky and illuminate it with the dim glow of violence. 
He tells his son of how the sea people came, how they took an axe to the realms of the wood folk and split apart the years of relative prosperity they had prospered under.
"We can only quell the flames if we rally boy if we continue to scramble backwards, fighting the fires behind us and picking at old wounds instead of uniting then that is how we will die, desperate and afraid." His son is crying, he can hear the joyous hooting of the sea people in the distance, coming closer.
"Call the mercenaries boy, tell the woodland kings of what has happened here. Tell them how we suffer and pray to the gods that they answer our call, do you hear me, boy?!" He grabs the lightly furred face of his son and forces the boy to look him in the eyes.
"Yes, father."
"Good, now go. Spread the message to all the corners of the woods." His fathers expression softens and he pushes his son on his way, away from him and further onto the road out of their burning village.
The boy turns around but once as he runs away, he watches as his father charges defiantly into a knot of armoured sea folk, screaming his rage at them and with his knife brandished high above his head.
The boy turns and runs before he sees the outcome, he must tell the kingdom, he must tell them to rally, or divided they will fall.
-----
Author Note:
Hey guys, this story focuses mostly on a single mercenary company and them fighting the onslaught of the sea people, the little scene above just serves to set the stage for the actual characters.
This story was somewhat inspired by the "Redwall" book series and if you haven't read those than what I mean by that is basically that instead of the world being inhabited by humans it is instead populated by Ampromorphic woodland creatures such as badgers, mice and hares to name a few.
The story involves elements of High Fantasy and later on kingdom building. One chapter will be posted each and every day.

Title: Rise of Heavenly Earth
Synopsis:
Following the creation and accidental release of Strongly Symmetric Matter the world is thrown into chaos as powerful immortals and new technology appear. Harmon Sorine wakes up to the realization that like many he can control this new energy.  How will he not only survive but thrive in a world dominated by powerful technology and magic fueled by Universal Heavenly Mana, known to mortals as Strongly Symmetric Matter.  The world has been changed, for better or worst.
I am writing this for fun because I am bored.  Let me know what you think of the story and if I should continue.  I do not like profanity but I think that it is necesary for some characters.  I’ll try to keep the profanity and sexual content to a minimum but you never know so be warned.

Title: The Ruined World  破壊された世界
Synopsis: White is a paranoid 18-year old sophomore discontent with his dull life.As White sets foot upon his new reality after dying to a robber, he quickly realizes that he had unfortunately arrived in a world where the original laws of monsters and magic no longer function properly like they used to. A world truly on the brink of extinction, where humans and monsters alike can no longer afford to be 'good-natured'. Naturally along the way, he encounters people just as broken as him. But more determined than ever, these experiences form the catalyst for him to change in order to survive in this unforgiving grimdark fantasy.Will he use power granted by the trial of this world for others, or will he hoard it for his own good?This is a survival story.

Title: Diver
Synopsis:
Diver, a job that goes beyond the Rift. Fame and fortune to those dive in thr rift...
 
Lets join Cliff and his friends as they explore, conquer and battle beyond and with in the Rift. This is a the story on the adventures of Cliff as he learns and grows to be the best Diver in the world

A highschool boy is selected to participate in a game that involves slaughtering and survivng against other beings varying from gods to rabitts.
This boy is Gakuro Turi and he is a human who thinks his life is boring and wants to go on adventures and become powerful, lucky for him all the gods want him to participate in the god's game. So they each give him a wish and since he wants to become powerful you can guess what he wishes for...
Read along and interact with me to make this story better.

Title: The Greatest Test of all Time
Synopsis: A heartbreaking test of ones resolve before the advent of a new year.

Title: Elscrolls
Synopsis:
In a world, where magic and mythical creatures exist. everyone was living in peace, prosperity, and harmony. But, an evil Wizard  by the name of Nans is planning an all out war for the whole world to see. It is up to Mikchu and her friends to stop the evil wizard .

Living while not trusting almost anyone , how will he(she?) Live his life?

Title: Monarch of Heaven's Wrath.
Synopsis:
Liang Chen was a normal youth, one could easily find countless others like him in the Qing clan. He thought that his normal and unremarkable existence would continue for the rest of his life, a thought that was shattered when he was 12. His parents were forced to take the blame for something that they had not done, causing them to be publicly executed.
Liang Chen had been told about how just the heaven's were, how they would punish evildoers and those who killed the innocent. But now his parents were dead, and the man responsible for it walks free without suffering anything. That was when Liang Chen learned the truth. The heaven's aren't just, they are indifferent. That was when he decided, if the heaven's won't send down their wrath on the man who caused his parents to die, then he would.
If the heaven's have no wrath, then he will become that wrath.

Title: Vampraric Online
Synopsis: A boy name kasima was poor boy he couldn't afford much but that would change when he bought a vmmorpg vampraric online he played for 12 years and made an hold country of vampire and undead and th game ended and he was transported to a strange world what is a head he does not know.

Title: Abominable King
Synopsis:
(Rebooted version Synopsis)
I was just a man like any other, until I got sucked into a world that wants me dead. I can’t think of a reason why they want me dead, aside from the fact that I command a massive army of the unliving and have the reputation of being the embodiment of evil. Between a character I had created in my youth who wants nothing less than to conquer the world in my name, a force made up of unholy monstrosities and the Forces of Light constantly trying to kill me, how am I to live peacefully or find a way back home and will I even want to by the end of my journey? I will do what is needed and fight for survival, even if it means becoming what the slanderous rumors about me proclaim as truth. The reign of darkness has come again on this fantasy world, and all who try to fight me will face the wrath of the Abominable King.
 
(I did not make the art.)
 (WARNING! THIS NOVEL CONTAINS CONTENT THAT IS NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNG READERS! IF YOU ARE UNDER 16-21 OR HAVE ISSUES WITH INTENSE DEPICTIONS OF CRUELTY AND/ OR OTHER NSFW CONTENT, THEN KNOW THAT YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!)

Title: The Brooding Storm
Synopsis:
Alyssa just wanted the recognition of her grandfather, one of the five heroes that defended the humans that were transported to this world 15 years ago. Disappointed that she can’t even get it after all this time she sets out to live life on her own terms.
But tensions between the newcomers and old residents of this world are rising. Will Alyssa live through the coming storm and if yes, where will the wind carry her?
--- --- ---
Hey, I’m new to writing so feedback would be appreciated :3 
Thanks for reading

Title: The Mortal Group
Synopsis:
We've all received those pesky scam emails at least once, and when we do, we often just dispose of them or occasionally read them for fun, but what we very rarely do is going through with them.
Sam Kruzenne is a university student in China who is barely making it in life. He can't pay his loans nor the rent for his apartment and the infamous university fees. He basically has no money what so ever.
When Sam got home to his apartment, which he surprisingly was still allowed to live in, he sat down and started browsing the computer. That's when he received a suspicious mail, it was a scam mail... Not knowing what the amazing results would be, he proceeded with it.

Title: Minigame Dungeon???
Synopsis:
Taylor Athene was just a normal geeky girl; she had been going to college to become a software engineer, and spent her free time playing video games, reading fantasy novels, and surfing the web.
So, imagine her surprise when she finds herself nominated by the god of chaos to become a dungeon core! Apparently clicking on suspicious links isn't always a waste of time, even if she just did it for a lark.
Now, let's follow her journey as she creates a very... unique dungeon for herself. Minigames galore! Everyone loves minigames! What could go wrong?

Title: Aether Dragon
Synopsis: I went to sleep after the  MMORPG I played, Storm and Tempest shut down. The next morning and after a really weird dream I woke as an evil-looking dragon. And not only me, the three NPC followers of the game were standing around having changed too. We may have escaped the game world’s destruction, but what awaits us in this new land?

Title: Memories
Synopsis:
As a virus begins to ravage the worlds population, a young boy grows up in a drastically changing world. His father and him move to a safe city but nothing ever is as it seems. And as the world changes, so does the young boy.
 
The story of "Memories", is the first (One Shot) part of three short stories. They will be published as they are finished.

Title: The Titan's Bow
Synopsis: Jack wants to become a warrior. He and his friend Zack have been waiting to train forever, but the waiting list was a mile long to get a master, and seeing that Jack has very few physical attributes, other than basic archery, it was also very unlikely that he would get a spot. He also has basic Spell casting, but only can use the simplest of spells. Meanwhile, The ancient titans seem to be rising again, and entire castles are going missing!!! What will Jack do if he isn't accepted? Who will stop the titans? And where in the world is that Castle? One wisend old wizard suspects that they're all related, and he may just be right...

Title: The Second Hero
Synopsis:
Jerry was a mercenary. Before he was transported to another world, he joins another mercenary company. He has been given an application that would help him stay in contact with the company. After being transported to another world, the phone still had a connection. What has he gotten himself tangled up in? What is the company and why does he still have a connection to the server?
Eventually, Jerry would leave the Empire behind, and strikes it on his own, leaving his former life behind and adopts a new life. He can then deal with the problems he has slowly, including questions about the phone. What will he do in this new world, alone? What will happen to the Hero when he is needed and has no combat experience?
 
 
Made with freetime, and a child as a proof reader. First novel written, so please critique me.

Title: The Economicon: Economy of the Dead    #huddlercontestentry
Synopsis: Mortimer James Appel, Necromancer for hire is on a job to send a spirit to the other side, but things go sideways and he finds himself deep in something much more serious.

Synopsis:
Things that go bump in the night. A bunch of short stories ranging from ghost hauntings to boogey man kidnappings to arson. Hopefully enough to scare you into not wanting to sleep at night. At least not with the lights off. If I cant scare you I hope I can disgust you.

Title: The Scenery of Tranquil Places
Synopsis:
Warning : this story can be weird af. 
Important note: in case this story gets removed from moderation, you can find it at Archive of our Own with the same title--the username is GayLolis. Haven't start migrating yet. 
Editing is all done, the Extra Chapter is just loosely connected to the main story. Just treat it as some nonsensical fun.
For the cover, it's a prototype design for the mc i made as a practice. it's based on the chapter when she wore animal pajama. well that's about it.
...
It's a place to rest my weary soul. When I had given up hope on everything, these places would welcome me. The views that would never change, just for me.It was all but a tranquil scenery.
Actual Synopsis : This was basically an experiment to discover my quirks on writing and what fits me the best. Call it a prototype for all the future works if you will.
What NOT to expect : an actual well-written story with interesting characters and universe.

Sentient toilet.

Title: P.P.F re
Synopsis: "It was at this point that the end of the world had become an unavoidable conclusion."On the date February 14th, 2008, a girl going by the name Sarah Tet met an unfortunate fate. She was found in a shack in the forest with a bullet through the head. Four years have passed, and the girl's best friend, Ralph Fredrick, is in a continued state of guilt, adopting a new name and hair color in hopes that he'll be forgotten and be left to rot away. If only it could be that easy.As his own memories begin to turn against him, he'll have to choose between forgiving himself and moving on or succumbing to a fate much worse than death itself.

Title: Vice & Virtue: D.M.C. Redemption
Synopsis:
DMC: Devil May Cry (Reboot) re-imagined.
In a world where everyone has their own innate vice and virtue, the centre of hell shakes as the seventh child, born under the vice of Luxuria, begins to awaken. As the one born to Luxuria, in her body flows the blood of the faded Morningstar, but, damned is she who also has the blood of the one who held the Lesser Key. A great danger threatens her, taunting her with a cursed mark. But as the one who embodies Luxuria and as the last holder of the Lesser Key, she will fight. However, to be able to begin her journey, she must first find the heroes that were of old, warriors of renown.
After the events of Mundus, the Nephilim twins are once again separated. The boundary between Limbo and Earth is no more, and although the twins feel lost, they are always on the hunt. So, when a certain call for help from a client gets tossed onto Dante’s lap, Dante finds that he may have been given a job that’s beyond his role as a demon hunter… Not that the pay, or the client for that matter, seems that bad.

Title: George of the Dungeon
Synopsis:
George is having a really rough day.
He was in his room, and then he wasn't. Where he is now, he doesn't know, but it's cold and damp and probably underground and there's a bunch of spiders and stuff that want to kill him. Or not.
And all he has is a mostly empty book.
Yeah, George is having the time of his life.

Title: Eaten By A Slime?!
Synopsis:
While picking medicinal materials in the forest, Eri was suddenly devoured by a slime. When she woke up, the slime turned into a man! He's claiming to be her husband?? Then he's solving all her problems!? Oh dear, there's a sudden influx of memories from her past life too!
"Who's your wife, you Slime!"
"It's destiny, my beloved Eri."
"Damn destiny, you're nuts."
"Shh, less words, let me prove it with love."
"God save me..."

Title: The Infinity Project
Synopsis:
Infinity would be the greatest achievement of contemporary game development. A new, next-gen VR system, with many games available on startup. Created by many companies working under a single group - Demiurge Forge Incorporated, a well known even if rather eccentric company. 
... and then things went downhill. Horribly so. Now playing the game is not a matter of entertainment... but of survival. In one of the most detailed - and sadistically abusive - settings in history of VRMMORPGs.

Title: Stone Buddha
Synopsis: "Master Hai Tong!" Someone excitedly called an elderly monk, who was standing on a river bank. His orange-red robe was quietly fluttering in the breeze. The Master's eyes were fixed on a huge Maitreya-Buddha's statue that was being constructed on the opposite side of the river.

Title: Mana Unleashed Evolved
Synopsis:
After the fall of the curtain in which Reiner's grandfather revealed the existence of mana to the public he was betrayed by his family and lost everything. Reiner a young boy fights for survival in a world polluted by mystical drugs, derranged sychopaths, Voodoo sorcerers, grimoires, summoners, cultivators, reincarnation systems and so much more.
To survive Reiner must rely on his wits to fight through dungeons, escape the clutches of his family and evolve to survive in this twisted world.

Title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Synopsis: A noble, charismatic leader hailed as the next chieftain to her tribe. A deadly, efficient assassin groomed to the next head of her family. Two sides of the same coin separated by duty but eternally bound by love. Set 5 years before the events of "Interview with the Hattori's", the family is contacted to prevent an all-out civil war from breaking out during the Tournament of Champions in Al Mahrib. A teenage Akane Hattori longs for meaning and validation in her life. Yet when she meets a beautiful foreigner, she finds so much more.

Title: Path To Redemption
Synopsis: Sion Claude, a child of a swordsman and a village girl, was raised to be a common villager because of his lack of magical talent.Lay witness as to how he abandons his dream of living a calm and normal life and as strings of tragedies pushes him to obtain power at all costs. All for the sake of redemption.

Title: World Core
Synopsis:
A young village boy life is suddenly turned to a terrible path when he and his family are assaulted by bandits. His father was killed and his mother taken somewhere. The bandits, not knowing what to do with him, decided to bury him alive.
Many years later, that boy awakens as the world's core, controlling nearly every aspect of it. The boy, now with a titanic responsibility on his shoulders, attempts to be a good god and keep the races alive, but every action he takes, in the end will heavily influence his world.
What will the boy, with such a large responsibility do? Will he surrender? Will he try and accomplish his mission?
 

 
Hello there! This is my first fiction, I hope you like it if you read it, please leave constructive criticism and if someone wants to help me, I will gratefully accept it! Also, english isn't my native tongue so furgive any gramar orror ; )

Title: Black Jewels
Synopsis: Power has existed since before time. Power to do anything. How would one think the universe could be born in the first place? This power -these rings- has torn the galaxy to sunder; Civilizations wiped out off a hint, soldiers twisted by false promises, kingdoms falling out of spite. An era of needless war driven by the greediest existence has to offer, and Earth has yet to get a taste of it.

Title: Fate/EXTELLA: In Veneficus In Mundo Eidos
Synopsis:
Posted in FanFiction.Net under the same pen name.
As the sole victor of the Moon Holy Grail War, Hakuno Kishinami made a wish. The Moon Cell did grant his wish but he didn't expect for the Eye of God to transport him to a parallel world with a different Magic System, let alone in a body of a 12-year-old boy who happens to be kidnapped by Mandarin-speaking guys. What in the Moon is going on?

Title: Drunk Dungeon
Synopsis:
This is a story about a man who not only enters the dungeon drunk, but the dungeon indirectly supports this habit. The only question now was what would kill him first, the dungeon or his liver?
Author: This is a story based on a daydream I had after reading some dungeon stories. It's also in first person past tense.
Cover art by Julian the Apostate#7406 on Discord.

Title: Extra character at irregular magic highschool
Synopsis:
Killed at Christmas eve our protagonist soul was transported to world of irregular at magic highschool (anime) as extra character 'Heath'.
# please to not expect much from my story
# please remember my story is FanFic
# i am making this story in order to improve my english (english is not my mother tongue) So please keep that in mind.

Title: Birth of God
Synopsis:
A story of a man becoming a True God and establishing his religion in a medieval fantasy world. The world with humans, elves, dwarf, fantasy creatures(eg. dragons) and more. Various races that try to survive in this harsh world.
The day he descend onto this world is when everything start to change.
Main character OP from start but not the main focus of the story.
What will he bring to this world? Hope? Terror? Blessing? Destruction?What kind of God is he? 
Look forwards: Many legendary creatures, races/tribe, kingdom(group of creatures), religion, interaction, and more.
There will be many minor stories and characters that might or might not interact with one another.

Title: Lost in a Magical World
Synopsis:
An experiment gone wrong flings 4 scientists to a world where some of their some of the laws of physics don't make sense, caused by what the locals call magic. Now they must find a way to survive in this new world.
 
 
First time writer hoping for constructive criticism

Title: The Town Of Fairview
Synopsis:
They say if your looking to disappear, money, power or even a good time if you look hard enough you'll find yourself at the town of Fairview a cesspool of sin, violence, greed and supernatural beings both physical and metaphysical here in this lovely town you will find what you are looking for but be warned everything has a price and if your not careful the town will eat you alive both figuratively and literally but then again when you're group consist of an apathetic demon possessed smith an entomologists wet dream a Scottish lass that can throw fireballs capable of burning through steel a British enchantress that may love her weapons a little to much and  a Chinese alchemist a little too cheap for his own good the question is no longer can this group survive Fairview it becomes can Fairview and its supernatural inhabitants survive this group of destructive inhuman badasses the answer to this question is very simple put twenty on number two also do you guys sell cigarettes. 
Author note: Good news everybody a friend and I are working on our very first book that we hope you guys will love first I would like to point out that we were inspired to start writing this book after reading prehistoric barbarian our goal chapter wise is at least one chapter a week as were very busy with real-life events. But we do have goals such as maybe opening up a Patreon and even move our stuff to Amazon but that is a long road ahead and we may never even get there but I have my fingers crossed now before ending this author note not only do we welcome criticism we know it's the only way to improve and prosper anyways we hope you guys enjoy and we definitely hope we get far. A very big warning we don't constrict ourselves to a moral compass we will not limit our writing for any reason if we believe it entertaining it gets uploaded. besides it's all in good fun who doesn't like a good joke right. We also will not be pushing any type of political narrative to our story's this is just for entertainment.

Title: I Could Have Just Walked Away
Synopsis:
First attempt at writing anything longer than a grocery list since essays in school.  I plan on having the story go between the present and the past as the MC remembers how he came to be who he is (origin etc), as the story progresses.
I going to try my hand at contemporary fanstasy, so think myths and legends, magic and monsters existing hidden (more or less) from the modern world.
Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated and obviously be gentle.

Title: The Luck of the Wrecking Ball
Synopsis:
A condemned building is not what it appears to be and time is running out for the unsuspecting nanny who is caught in the path of a tragedy from many years before.
Stand-alone short story.

Title: Rise of the shinobi
Synopsis:
The story is set in the Naruto world built around several characters I created. The problem with saying exactly what the story is about is that there will be several main characters, I'm not amazing enough to seemlessly bring them all together so it will be more like multiple short stories. The first character is a child of the Uchiha and the Hyuga clan, something that shouldn't have been as such he has been scorned for his entire life. Taiga Hyuga hopes to change that just as soon as he can become a Genin.
This story is set in the Naruto world built around a couple characters I created, unfortunately this does mean it Isn't able to be a real story just a fan-fic, however I only intend to use this as a way to perfect my writing and if I do well I have a couple ideas for real stories. If I enjoy the story and it does well I will probably come back and attempt to re-write the story and make the story one large over arching story rather than several smaller stories.

Title: Wandering The Multiverse! Saving The God?
Synopsis: “Ah, when did things get mixed up this much. Damn that Deaf God couldn't even send me to the right world. Why was I even reincarnated in a world that I have no understanding of?! I asked him to reincarnate me on a TV show which I actually knew about and was a fan of! Damn, now how will I live in this world? All I do is wander in Multiverse. Mostly Anime Worlds I heard, but I never watched. Now I have to visit all of those worlds, with my intelligent system, named The Crow. He guides me and helps me, but there is more to it. When I was getting stronger, all of the sudden I targeted by a group called Templars. As I later found out they also traveled from other world and come to the same world to learn strong techniques, so their God, can be more efficient in the next Annual Universal God Tournament. I was at beginning of my journey and oblivious to the worlds I visit. My intelligent system was keeping me in dark. Do I also get stronger for the God reincarnated me? Am I chosen?" This is mostly an anime fan-fiction novel. The MC is oblivious to the Anime Worlds he jumps into. The story jumps from one world to other. Some of the popular novel worlds also part of the story. The MC first went to the Naruto World but is presently in the One Piece world. But, he will be back! Next Anime World will be Hunter x Hunter !!

Title: The Abandoned Sorcerer
Synopsis:
Orion Zakari is an Ice Sorcerer, the last of his lineage. He's got no clue where he is or how he got there, but he knows one thing for certain: he is being hunted.
His home and family are gone: razed and massacred. He will be next when the hunters find him. But if he can put enough pieces together, maybe he won’t have to follow his family down to eternal damnation. Maybe he can avenge them. And maybe, just maybe, he’s got a destiny waiting past that.
Monsters and men, merchants and mages, hunters and the hunted. This is the story of the abandoned Sorcerer.

What is the Pledge?
Release schedule: Every Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday at 16:00 UTC.
I created the cover using Adobe Illustrator.

Title: New earth
Synopsis: Dream tech has released a new groundbreaking a game called new earth. With its time dialation , cheap headset price and classic RPG form it was a hit before it even came out. It was made to allow you to be a multitude of different races and also has 4 main modes dungeon core, divine, lord and the classic adventurer. Read on to find out what our protagonists jack adventure holds.

Title: The Cassidia Saga
Synopsis:
Roric is the only son in a family of farmers. He dreams to leave his village and break free from its rules of life. When a tragic event shakes the roots of his life he is left alone, almost dead and forced to confront his childish powerlessness. With the help of a mercenary band and a kind priest, he will deal with the shadows of the past and find his true strength.
The Cassidia saga is a sword and sorcery styled adventure. It spans several books. Updated on Tuesday and Friday.
You can support the project and gain early-access to future chapters via my Patreon page.
Official Facebook - Official Discord server

Title: Technoglaze
Synopsis: The world is under threat by one who calls themselves Tridum. A powerful force that has grasped many under its belt, an ecosystem living under Tridum’s rule where murder and rape are legalized. One of the powerful myrmidons has a change of heart, he wishes to leave his life behind but deep down he yearns to undo what he had done under Tridum’s rule. He and a fellow robot join forces to take down an unbeatable behemoth. The evil lurks within its abyss, waiting to dominate the world.

Title: Aspect of the Forsaken
Synopsis: A boy who lost his family to unexpected means, powerlessness is all he has.anger and bitterness are what he feels as death approaches him....does tradegy still await him or is death his saving grace when he hears the words...''would you like to make a deal?''

Title: Nothing but bones [stub]
Synopsis:
When Solus awakens as a lowly skeleton, only undead still roam the barren Earth. Without memory or personality, he must learn fast if he is to keep his new existence. Soon he finds himself dealing with ancient AI, more experienced undead, massive Wyrms, and long-hidden truths. If this wasn't enough, he has to figure out what these pesky emotions are that keep popping up.
[Series 1 - finished]
- So, the first three books are done and all on Amazon. I'll leave this here as a stub for people to find with the first six or seven chapters of each book to read. 
- John


Book 2: (Released on Kindle and Amazon)
A year after the events of book 1, Solus is still trying to find a way to restore his status window. Straying deeper into the wastes, he searches for his original sphere, hoping that perhaps it can offer him a solution. Instead, he stumbles upon an ancient hidden installation and finds an AI of a different caliber. It might have the knowledge to help him, but is it trustworthy enough?On the return trip, Solus meets a new adversary: a new kind of undead that is almost as powerful as himself. When he finally manages to return to Skulltown, he finds that he isn't the only one that these strange new undead have attacked.As more and more mindless and highly aggressive undead begin to appear, disturbing news arrives from beyond Skulltown. Black rifts are appearing in the wasteland, ejecting both sentient and mindless undead. The only one who may have the solution is also the one least likely to help him: Scathia, the mysterious leader of Silt, the one who awoke Vingria, and the one who seems bent on world domination.
Book 3: (Released on Kindle and Amazon)
Many years have passed when Solus slowly wakes from his slumber. He quickly realizes that his body is still unable to move and might be for a long time. However, events above ground are not waiting for him, and he needs to find a way to interact with the world if he is to save his friends. Meanwhile, Tirella finds multiple massive threads that might spell the end of the fledgling undead world.
All three books have been released on Kindle. Due to this I've had to stub the story here.

Title: Shaking the Heavens
Synopsis:
Jack is just an ordinary human without any form of inspiration. Abandoned by his parents and suffering from hardships ever since he was born, he had low hopes for his future.
However, an unexpected event ends with him being transported to a new unforgiving world, one filled with mythical cultivators, roaming demonic beasts and legendary powers.
Opportunity or not, for Jack, this was once in a lifetime miracle for him to change his own fortunes.
But as the lowest form of all existences, will he be able to survive such a harsh new world? Will he be able to adapt inside this new environment, challenge the elites, and ultimately confront the very heavens, just for the sake of creating his own Dao?

Title: High Assassins
Synopsis:
In order to keep his followers loyal to him, Magon the leader of an assassin group, make them high everytime they are not in a mission using oriented made drugs.
Magon have a vision on how the world should be governed but he tried everything peacefully, but in his era ,power is determined in a small group of kings and Presidents. After years of failing and getting tortured, he choose to creat a cult and he's willing to kill every leader who oppose him.

Title: Clockwork: Time can be fun to play with!
Synopsis:
Sakyo Uso is an ordinary boySakyo Uso is an ordinary boySakyo Uso is an ordinary boySakyo Uso is an ordi-
Sakyo Uso is an extraordinary boy.
Using the pocket watch he was given by a shady man while trying to find his parents when he was lost downtown, Sakyo Uso can stop and restart time, and uses this amazing power to his advantage when he is taking tests or with girls, but if he stops time for too long, a ghost trapped in the pocket watch will be released from the watch and will consume Sakyo's soul! Luckily, the ghost is lazy and won't leave the stopwatch for 5 minutes. Also, luckily, Sakyo Uso can bargain with the lazy ghost to allow him to stay paused for longer. Good, problem solved, right? Wrong. Umaru Yuta is another problem. Umaru believes that she has a power to randomly stop time but can't do it on command, but in reality, she is the only one unaffected by Sakyo's time stop. It isn't until one faithful day at a new high school that Sakyo and Umaru meet while Sakyo is using the watch for his perverted gain that Umaru decides she hates Sakyo and is upset that he revealed the truth about her power...Or does she?
Clockwork, a light novel by L00P, released 9/1/18.

Title: My Legendary Adventure
Synopsis: 20 years ago, there were signs of supernatural powers in humans. These were known as 'Fexis', normally superpowers they were named as. Scientists couldn't identify the cause of this. New born babies had marks on their bodies to symbolize the power they achieved. Some of them were powerful as bringing a huge flame to a size of a football field and some of them are weak like pouring water from a finger, about 5 percent of the population is born without powers and tend to die soon due to the overcoming difficulties in the society. This world has been in peace for a long time thanks to the Legends, but soon it was destroyed by hidden Villans. This created an unbalanced nature to the society. I start my adventure as a teenage high school boy to become the best legend ever known to man and eradicate villans.

Title: Legend of Aerolite
Synopsis:
A war without end has grasped two rival nations who bleed without making progress. Two souls clash on the battlfield: a dragon rider, and a lowly officer straight out of the academy. This legend spans the journey of two lost souls marred by strife, war and love. An adventure into the great beyond, where the final key lies to ending this blood-feud.  The price of any progress remains high...
What kind of future will our heroes invoke? What will the price be? And how can they finally find peace.

Title: The Last Deeds
Synopsis: So It all started when I was 12 years old I used to be a show-off. When teacher says any work to other I say that I will do it but I did not know why the others were always looked me in way like they were gonna kill me, when I asked one day that " you have nothing do all the work will be done by your mother you just show off your self as like you did it by your own but as we always do it by yourself our mother never helped us for doing our projects".It gave me a small shock that they hate me because for this but I didn't take it to my heart and been natural like always and I continued and when I was 13 years old there was a natural disaster which made my school close for 2 months or something like that in that holidays it made me addict of taking holiday I always put some drama not to go school practically every day I did the same but one day came to my class everyone sawed that I was acting I must accept it ruined my image a lot as you know that I sed to take a lot of hooliday I used to be incomplete at my works so I used to say that my note is lost so the teacher can give me time but it did not take a lot of time to figure them out that I was lying but when I taught I cant take it anyomore I changed my school but still some old classmates joined the same school which I joined and it did not take long that they made everyone opposed me it was tough me still I seek people talk to me again like a normal person like old days but I guess it will never happen. Did I forgot to say my name its Yuuta

Title: Pirate Cove [Coming Soon]
Synopsis:
Humanity is trapped. Too late did the politicians and the people discover that it was a grave mistake to ignore all of the academia screaming at them that climate change was real. By the time everyone had been convinced, it was too late. Humanity was set on a path of destruction that couldn't be fixed. In desperation, they turned to the stars. A project was started, funded by all of the major governments, with one purpose. Find a way for humanity to leave Earth and survive in space. The project was ground to a halt when they realized there was no way to actually leave the planet. Years of rocket launches had created a cloud of debris, floating around the Earth. Any spacecraft launched was met with an impenetrable wall. They were trapped.
While the project was a failure, it made significant scientific and technological breakthroughs. The world united, desperately searching for a way to live.
Pirate Cove follows a group of college kids as they struggle to face their reality, and try to escape it through the VR game, Pirate Cove. Also, I haven't tried to write a drama before so this will be a new experience. Constructive criticism is welcome.
 
Authors Note: Currently my dominant arm is broken. Its expected to heal in around 5 weeks so no chapters will come out until then.

Title: Dreaming Reality [Dropped]
Synopsis:
"Have you ever wanted become a Hero? Or perhaps live as the Villain? We here at Dream-Industries have developed the technology capable of fulfilling your greatest dreams and darkest desires! From 'Fantasy Hero' to 'Tyrannical Space Pirate', no dream is too big! Thanks to our patented Dream Dilation Technology, a simple five day nap becomes an epic journey of a lifetime!
Order your very own Dream-Life pod now for one easy payment of 50,000 credits and begin your adventures today!"
I couldn't help but grin at the ad being played in my head. The radio addon I had ordered my AI assistant Ti to download had finally come in handy after many years. Before the nagging of my robotic keeper could begin, I had already phoned in the number played in the ad. At the ripe old age of 183, it was time to to be young again.

Synopsis:
You may puck me dry like an hoard of locust, does an field of dreams
you may split the sky apart with your wild thunder and storm
you may lay on an cracking mountain of gold with eye indifferent 
you may be the peaceful snow frost on the top of an new lair of snow 
You may be the hidden Titan Appearing like the thunderous winds
you may lie in the sky above, aloft and alone shining with an light above all other
Or 
you might be a the one around us all, staring in silence
are you truly happy?

Synopsis:

It's really short, so please read it before judging it.

Title: Chimera
Synopsis:
A chimera slowly regains memories of its past life as a human in a nonmagical world.  While he is in part James Borland, temp office worker who was on the verge of being converted to permanent, he is also a savage beast who gains strength by consuming flesh of various creatures.
The more he remembers, the larger the effect his old persona has on his actions, which is often at odds with his instincts as a beast that seeks only to consume prey to become stronger.
 
Updates: Chimera will updatetwo to three times each week.
Disord server: https://discord.gg/WT4J9hg

Title: Lys
Synopsis:
English
In this world of fantasy and magic, where the soul is the source of all supernatural power, and those with a different affinity must fight against their own feelings as their soul grows in power. While some find strength in religion, others do so in their own instincts.
Follow the story of a woman with a troublesome past that seeks to reach her again to take away any peaceful moment she might find. Relive her past history and what led her to end up as a traveler in the world while fighting against her own feelings and wishes, trying to find a balance and a solution for her chaotic life.
 
Español
En este mundo de fantasía y magia, donde el alma es la fuente de todo poder sobrenatural, y aquellos con una afinidad distinta deben luchar contra sus propios sentimientos a medida que su alma crece en poder. Mientras algunos encuentran fortaleza en la religión, otros lo hacen en sus propios instintos.
Sigue la historia de una mujer con un pasado problemático que busca alcanzarle nuevamente para quitarle toda paz que pueda encontrar. Revive su historia pasada y lo que le llevo a terminar como viajera por el mundo mientras lucha contra sus propios sentimientos y deseos, intentando encontrar un equilibrio y una solución para su caótica vida.
