Title: The Dark Sword
Synopsis:
Orton, a kingdom ruled by the Alvics for 900 years. The kingdom has 5 more races : the humans, the troids, the flekois, the igars and the esleks.
Iryn, an outgoing and strong girl who lives with her blacksmith father Alar, decided one day to leave with her best friend Amaya for a quest to find the Dark Sword that belonged to the first great king. Alar who seems like he’s hiding something insisted on going with them.
Iryn will meet many people and discover many secrets about the kingdom, the people and more importantly, herself.

Title: God Is A Game Designer
Synopsis:
Nathan Blackrose finds himself just on the verge of enacting his revenge. After years of devotion and suffering to build his company from the ground up, he was betrayed by his "friends" and co-founders. They were going to launch the product of his genius, the world's first VRMMORPG, as their own. Several years and countless hours have passed since his exile. His entire existence has been devoted to the design, coding, and testing of his new project which would be the most in-depth VR game launched in history. He didn't desire the title of first anymore, just "The Best". As soon as he launched Celerin, the shadow lingering after the betrayal would be severed and he would stand at the top of the world. Just one more bug fix to go. "Would you like to enter the world: (Y/N)" This choice would forever shape him as he was pulled into the world he created, not as a player but as a god.

Title: The Changed World
Synopsis:
Before we knew it, The world we once knew has changed. People are changing, Monsters are appearing, Death is frequent, Nothing we knew was the same. All we now knew was that we need to survive, Just survive. So we keep fighting against the monsters, Aswell as other humans. Many people have changed, Including their bodies, Whether it is for the best or not though, We do not know.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I will release 3-7 chapters per week.
Okay so I hope my synopsis is decent enough for you people. Anyway this is going to be a novel that is similar to stuff like God and Devil World, Which can be found on NovelUpdates, Aswell as Gaia's Will and Challenge. I will take some parts from both stories and combine them into one story, Obviously added with my own ideas.

Title: The Contact Person
Synopsis:
It was the modern day earth. Kaushik Roy was a typical Indian. He had a rough upbringing. His parents were not the most responsible ones around. But he tried to fit into the society. He went to office, worked to the bone all day, and came back home late at night, all the while trying to pay the bills and save enough for the future. He didn't even had one girlfriend till now. A bona fide Virgin.
Roy thought this is how he will spend the rest of his life, sad and alone. However, all of this changed when he opened the promised gift on his birthday night.
Follow Roy as he goes from being a common earthling to being the most important person in the history of mankind, The Contact Person.
 
This will be a light hearted story at its core. There will be no torture, rape, or any dark theme. There will be action sequences and blood, but nothing excessive.
There will be different alien races. No usual elfs, orks, dragons etc.
For now, I count 5 girls around Roy. Number may increase in future.
Magic will be there, however it will be different from the usual found in this website.
 
With all that said, please enjoy the story and don't forget to support me through Paypal and Patreon.

Title: The Royan's challenge
Synopsis: Royan and his best friend Samy are the new righters of wrongs. Their first ambition is to put an end to drug trafficking. But one of their friends is deeply involved in it and in big trouble.How are they going to deal with it?

Title: Primacy Online
Synopsis:
Life on Earth was nearly eradicated in World War III, but using alien technology, the Patriarch of the Church of the Resurrection built a new society from the ashes. He created what he called the Constructed Reality MMORPG, Primacy Online, a world so real that the players could not distinguish it from reality. After outlawing wars between the city-states on Earth, he declared that all wars would be fought inside the world of Primacy Online.
Thirteen hundred years later, the release of Primacy Online VI: Legacy of Balor signals the beginning of World War IX. Players from Earth's city-states will be locked in cryogenic capsules and play Primacy Online in War Mode. Their achievements in the game will determine the victory rankings of their city-states, but if they die in the game, they will die for real.
Patrick Armagh found flaws in the game mechanics of Primacy Online and exploited them to rise to the peak of the game. But when the Church declared he was cheating, he was perma-banned from the game. Now, the Church has declared that Patrick and all the other perma-banned cheaters will be included in a special Church group for World War IX, where they can earn redemption for their sin of cheating. However, Morgan Danan, Speaker of the City of Mann, and the generally acknowledged number one player of Primacy Online, has a deal for Patrick. With her help and his method of cheating, he has the chance to become a virtual god within Primacy Online, but by taking up her offer, he will become an enemy of the Church.
Like a significant percentage of Primacy Online players, Patrick suffers from an ultimately fatal, degenerative nervous system disorder. He has less than five years to live. With death staring him in the face and nothing to live for, he accepts Morgan Danan's offer, and once again, enters Primacy Online as Crom Cruach, a disgraced legend.
Will Crom Cruach, once again, become a legend, or will he be destroyed by the Church?
What secrets has the Church hidden inside the game?

Title: Descent of the Strongest God
Synopsis:
In the year 2108, a spatial crack manifested and numerous beasts invaded the Earth. Chaos ensued, the power of modern weaponry insufficient to deter the beasts' rampage. Soon they engulfed the entire planet and harried frail humanity to the brink of extinction.
Prepared for the worst, a pair of wealth scientists used the peak technologies of their era to implant the full knowledge of the marvels of modern civilization inside their infant child's mind and placed him in a cryogenic stasis craft, casting him adrift into the sea of stars in search of other life in the vast cosmos.
Centuries later, the primordial currents of space instead pulled this craft back to Earth, descending as a fallen star bearing the fruit of human advancement whose seed had been planted there.
This is a tale of Evolution and Chaos, as this young child, Gabriel, awakens and becomes humanity's greatest and brightest hope.

Title: Three Hundred Years After The End Of The World
Synopsis:
Three hundred years after the end of the world as humanity knew it, the gears of an old plan slowly begin to move again, as a group of self-imposed reincarnators, along with their equally unlikely companions, gather once again to set things right... but does the world they plan to restore need, or even want, their help? Follow the misadventures of an eclectic bunch of genius misfits as they attempt to assemble and fix the world they accidentally devastated in the past.
~~~
Author's note: This is actually the first volume of a novel I wrote nearly a decade ago for the VNDB discussion boards, taking inspiration from the random off-topic ramblings that characterized the golden age of the community. After sevear years and countless rewrites, it is pretty much unrecognizable, but while it is not fit for professional publishing (due to the fact that several fragments and older versions are still out there on various forums and blogs), I decided it is a waste to just let it sit idly on my hard drive forever. As such, I decided to share it somewhere where people could maybe appreciate it, so here it is.

Title: The Spirit of Flame
Synopsis:
A story about a flame and a fantasy world.
/Making it up as I go so I'm open to ideas. Anything is welcome, including criticism.\

Title: Days of Blood and Roses: A Magical Girl Thriller
Synopsis: Promises are meant to be kept, but a promise to save a beloved sister leads a group of high school magical girls into a dream of many literary landscapes. Out of this dream of Carroll’s wonderlands and Baum’s fairylands and Poe’s nightmares comes a monster that threatens to invade the waking world. Their promise forms the opening act of a play they can’t stop, so to prevent this monster’s debut into their world, they must play their parts to the end at all hazards to their lives. If you love quirky magical girls, bloodthirsty femme fatales, fight scenes, love scenes, twisty plot lines, fantastic settings, the possibility of dreams, and the uncertainty of nightmares, this story is for you.

Title: Myth
Synopsis:
Myth is an MMORPG that is extremely popular and has a worldwide player base. The game emphasizes an individual's skill, and is well-balanced. It has a professional scene know as Myth professional alliance.
When a retired Top-tier pro player trained 4 talented rookies, what will happen?

Title: Questworld Union Of Underworked Adventurers
Synopsis:
Questworld has ran out of quests. But the heroes still come.
If are one of these unfortunate souls / stubborn fools, then why not consider a seasonal membership to the Questworld Union Of Underworld Adventurers (QUOUA).
We provide breaking news, quest guides, tips, articles, workshops and maps to help you actually make a pittance from running around like a madman making dramas out of nothing whilst the rest of the Hive gets on with its boring peace and quiet.
Act today and pay up. Our tavern bill is waiting.

This isn't a cohesive story as such, and more of a jumbled mix of random articles and utter nonsense. In no way do you have to start at the first scroll. Just dip in anywhere and see if this is for you.

Title: The incidents of a loser
Synopsis:
Just a little more effort, and maybe you could have finished it. Just a slight push from behind, and maybe you could have arrived at the finish line. Just a tad bit of this or that, and maybe the end result would have been different. There's a lot of things that you could have done, but will it even matter? At the end of the day, I will still be the one on top. A young man had told them that, as he nonchalantly stares at them. Because...
He is the oddity that can never lose.
(On hold in the meantime)

Title: A legend of Jean Roseblood Saga: The grave digger
Synopsis: A story constantly changing between future and present tenses, the story starts off with the mc talking about a time before he/she took control. Before they became an ultimate power in all of space and time.

Title: To Build an Empire (Old, new one is out)
Synopsis:
https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/20500/to-build-an-empire-revised For the revised version.An architecture major, dies and is reincarnated in the lowest bums of society as a slave. He is born on a mysterious planet underground, working in the mines as he tries to work his way up the social ladder. Vying to become a power in the world, will Tylor Justifix rise from lowly slave to emperor of the world? 
With his knowledge, he plans to carve out his own path and fix the problems presented to him in this world. In a world full of magical creatures, wizards, evil armies, and corrupt kings, Tylor stands up to them all with the hilt of his noble sword from another world.

Title: Myriad Life
Synopsis:
After destroying his peaceful life with his mistake, Forus Ander came to learn about the existence of the monsters who forfeited his wife's life and took his daughter.
As he died trying to find the whereabouts of his daughter, an unknown being bestowed him a second chance.
Having nothing except his fading memory, Forus desperately chased his final desire. However, unbeknownst to him, a greater scheme was moving behind his footsteps.
Wandering between reality and illusion, Forus found that every coincident might not be as it seemed.

Title: A Dream is a Wish the Heart Makes
Synopsis: Adelaide and Dante start their senior year in high school.  Adelaide is a new girl from New York who’s dad just recently died in the line of duty.  Dante is a soccer player who’s mom works really hard to be the mother and father in their family.  They‘re both kidnapped and put into a dream world where their lives are perfect, but if they stay there it means they’ll have to leave their real families behind.  Should they stay and live their dream life? Or should they go back to reality and be with the ones they love?

Title: Too Many Humans
Synopsis:
Too Many Humans is a dystopian horror web serial which updates every Tuesday.
Series one will run until December.
It takes place in the near future where the results of over-population give rise to questions with brutal and disturbing answers.
It contains gore, profanity and scenes which some readers may find disturbing.

Title: Lys [Español]
Synopsis:
Español
En este mundo de fantasía y magia, donde el alma es la fuente de todo poder sobrenatural, y aquellos con una afinidad distinta deben luchar contra sus propios sentimientos a medida que su alma crece en poder. Mientras algunos encuentran fortaleza en la religión, otros lo hacen en sus propios instintos.
Sigue la historia de una mujer con un pasado problemático que busca alcanzarle nuevamente para quitarle toda paz que pueda encontrar. Revive su historia pasada y lo que le llevo a terminar como viajera por el mundo mientras lucha contra sus propios sentimientos y deseos, intentando encontrar un equilibrio y una solución para su caótica vida.
 
English
In this world of fantasy and magic, where the soul is the source of all supernatural power, and those with a different affinity must fight against their own feelings as their soul grows in power. While some find strength in religion, others do so in their own instincts.
Follow the story of a woman with a troublesome past that seeks to reach her again to take away any peaceful moment she might find. Relive her past history and what led her to end up as a traveler in the world while fighting against her own feelings and wishes, trying to find a balance and a solution for her chaotic life.
https://www.royalroad.com/fiction/20365/lys

Title: Triple Threat Mage And The Three Masters
Synopsis: Draken Crowe is a pickpocket working the mean streets of Gold Seal City. He runs a small but loyal crew working under his young but ambitious uncle. It's a hard but uncomplicated life until one night he unlocks a terrible power. Weeks later the memory still haunts him when he chases down a bully, following him  into the line for the annual open magician apprenticeship trials.   Yet not even the master mages are prepared to deal with the power he holds.  Unique in all of history he is a triple threat mage and has the potential to master all three mystic arts. The only problem , Draken still thinks of himself as a thief and he's looking to use his new magic to pull off the biggest score of his life.

Title: The Young Master
Synopsis: i transmigrated to another universe to be the young master of a big clan not bad.but why his talent so bad.Tags : system + Martial Arts + Sci-Fi

Title: The Cursed Star
Synopsis:
An existence that was revered, envied and despised, returned to the World of Gods, Monsters, and Devils. The World called The Origin was a mystery and his existence was just as mysterious.
"Without power, it is a Sin to exist. Without Friends and Allies, it is unwise to Rule. Without Love and Desire, it is a Wasted Life."
He had to uncover his own secrets if he wanted it all. And he wanted it all.
This is a Tale of Love, Emotions, and Commitments. It's a story as simple as Life.
 
WARNING: R18 content. The targeted audience is 18+.  
The World is OP and MC is only weak in the start if you compare him to the People that surround him.
The Harem is part of the story. Don't read it if you don't like the concept.
The Warning Tags are not for show. Do consider them before reading the story that I am telling.
Thank You!Release Schedule: Every Sunday.Join me on Discord to stay connected to me.
Discord: The Cursed Star

Title: The Muraglen Saga
Synopsis:
BOOK 1What traits define you? What would you do if you had to start over?
When Faust Swift is thrown into a world of monsters, quests and mysteries he must use his wits and returning memories to overcome adversity and grow stronger. He will meet plenty of enemies and hopefully an ally here or there. Join him as the Universe throws him from Realm to Realm and he finds what he is truly made of.  **NOW AVAILABLE ON AMAZON**BOOK 2
How will you deal with the consequences of your actions?Can you stay true to yourself… if you aren’t sure who that is?
With Faust and company scattering across Muraglen, he is sent on an escort mission. The Lae works diligently to come into his power and prepare for the odds that seem ever stacked against him. Thanks to the help of old and new allies, Faust discovers new races and ancient plots that threaten to split the entirety of the Realms. Can he follow the Tether to survival?
 
Cover Art by Harkale Linai
https://www.deviantart.com/harkale-linai/

Title: Life as a celestial
Synopsis:
Hi friends
I am new here so if their are mistakes please help me correct them.
It's a story of a celestial and his strugels to create a new family

Title: Zombie X Rpg World
Synopsis:
Raziel a normal 23 year old, asian male. Got warp in an alternate post apocalyptic zombie world. Will he be able to survive in a world where everything is in chaos.Where humanities law and policy as well as the government no longer holds. Watch him as he struggles and get accustom to where killing someone for a piece of moldy bread is the norm.
I got warp in a different world by a scammer who claims to be the God of Entertainment. At least he was nice enough to give me Game like abilities.

Title: HereAfter: Dragons Fall
Synopsis:
***PART I COMPLETE! Find the novel on Kindle!!***
 PART II begins here...
The worlds of HereAfter are colliding--literally--and only Tavish knows how to stop the destruction and save all the ones he's lost.
Tavish is one of thousands trapped on the fantasy-style world in their digital afterlife known as HereAfter. As glitches start to erupt around them, Tavish and his team must race across the planet and against time to reach the Console where he'll be able to set everything right.
He'll just have to traverse seas full of infinite-HP monsters, fight off revenge-bent psychos, and craft the biggest possible empire to fuel his need for ever increasing amounts of XP.
Half a world away, but equally dead, Kato has ended up crowned shogun and must fight back the forces of evil that are crushing him on all sides. When Tavish's war reaches him it's only through a powerful alliance that they'll both have a shadow of a chance against the people who would destroy their world and everyone in it.
 
*****
 If you are enjoying the story, please comment, rate, and/or review!  I'd love to know what you're thinking and feeling about the story as it goes!
Note: I'm planning to release this on Amazon when it's finished, but I'll keep uploading the continuing stories (this is just part one of a planned long series) as I go.  I love feedback and would love to hear your thoughts—good and bad :

Title: Twinmage of Xar
Synopsis:
Charles is a Twinmage, able to use the two magic systems of the binary planets known as the Twins. He is both a Spellweaver and a Runemage. He is currently part of the space colonization project that is being funded by the Alliance. 
An accident happens during the testing of the starship he helped design and instead of exploring his own star system he crash lands on a planet in another system.

Title: One Piece: The New Age
Synopsis: Pogo D. Shuttle, a small and weak little boy raised on Dawn Island. The poor fellow was so weak in comparison to his peers, an orphan at birth, a pirate at heart. Through countless adventure and gathering of friends and comrades, Pogo will find his ultimate wish--the one piece! After Pirate King, Monkey D. Luffy died in a similar fashion to Gol D. Roger, the pirate era once again surged to the central figure--Raftel! A new era had been ushered by Luffy's final heart-wrenching words, "If you want my treasure, go out and find it. That treasure is something only one man on the sea can ever experience...and that man is the king of the pirates!" His sneery laugh granted him the final wish he desired: The longevity of pirates!

Title: The Bleeding Ghost and the House it Lived in
Synopsis: A writer with newly inherited money to burn and a lack of spice in his life buys and renovates a large house atop the small town of Hollridge, Nova Scotia in the hopes of finding new experiences-that which would be unknown in the bustling city he grew up in. He finds them.

Title: The Seven Helpful Sins
Synopsis: A young man, living a hopeless life, accidentally discovers a cursed book.  Upon opening it, he meets the seven deadly sins. Inadvertently freeing them from the book, he begs for their help. As thanks, they agree to his request and proceed to aid him with improving his life.  Whether this was a wise decision remains open for debate. Author Note: I'm generally trying to include viewer interaction so that the audience decides the order of events and how frequently and/or which characters are the focus alongside the MC.

Title: Hero? Nope I'm their child
Synopsis:
It all started when the floor started shining a dazzling light, the shining expanded in an instant, and seven people were laying on top of a place they didn’t recognize.
After that, each one of them met a king-like person who said “Please, help us defeat the demon lord.” Everyone refused at first, but since they didn't have a single clue of where they were, they accepted the request.
And that wasn't my story, that was my parent story.
 
 
P.S
It sucks to be the heroes child.

Title: Monster Sage
Synopsis:
Born to a family of farmers Lux has always dreamed of being something more. All his life the boy had worked with one goal in mind, enter Myst Academy and obtain a life of wealth and fame. Lux taught himself to read and write, and after years of frustration he even condensed a mana pool. Now, on his fourteenth birthday it is time for him to leave his home and set out on his own path…
With nothing more than a carefully packed bag, a knife, and a few water skins Lux is determined to take on the world.

Random Releases

Title: NPC: Afriat
Synopsis:
Spinoff from NPC 210M following the creation and growth of a Legacy character in the VR world and the offline life of a family guild with its intrigues and power struggles
Afriat is the main legacy avatar of the small Andorians guild, but like all great legends it didn't start at the mountain top holding off a clan of rampaging storm giants with guts, wits and the laws of VR physics, it started long before that pivotal moment in a much humbler woodlands town where a twelve years old boy got an initiation avatar he didn't choose for reasons he didn't understand and definitely did not agree with.

Title: Brawling Beauty Adventure
Synopsis:
Time is a valuable thing, it also may not all have occured yet
 
Sonika is a little girl in a strange world cultivating what fortune she has, adventuring and demystifying what she lacks in order with the rules and regulations of the land, and sometimes not

Title: Plane Walker
Synopsis:
Synopsis incoming...
All you really have to know is:
- LitRPG
- Another world, or is it?
- OP MC

Title: Nothing
Synopsis: There is nothing

Title: Discontinued story 4
Synopsis: Whats the best way to end a story? Make an ending of a story.

Title: My Only Lorelei
Synopsis: Din Morrison has always felt overshadowed by his sister, Katherine, an experienced knight. He aims to make a name for himself and prove his worth to his sister. Until one day, his life changes when the moon shifts and his friend, Lorelei, transforms into a demon. Rather than turning her over to the Executioners, he must protect her and find a way to turn her back. On his quest, he encounters great ordeals that reveal the dark history of the world and that of his lineage.

Title: Nomad
Synopsis:
Nomad is a complete short story that I wrote as part of a writing exercise a handful of years ago.  I have chosen to post this as penance for not meeting my deadlines on another project.  I think that it's pretty bad, mostly because I tried to do a particular artsy thing and failed horribly.  This had lead to amazingly repetetive paragraph breaks and just an overall nonsensical and annoying vibe to the dialog.  There's a fun story in there somewhere, and I'm sure its enjoyable on a handful of levels, but overall I should warn you guys this isnt a technically 'good' story.
Now, with that glowing review, I happily present a post apocalypse sci fi short story.  It should have some fun tech ideas and decent action scenes along the way.  Dunno if it really counts as grimdark, but its not exactly pleasant happy times either.  I do hope you guys enjoy some of it, but also please feel free to make fun of it, that's the point of posting it here.  I do regularly, its quite cathartic.  :)

Title: Fallen Star
Synopsis: A female protagonist, who has gone through countless misfortunes, has lost her everything, Even her life. Then she discovered that she has two more choices can make. Either to be resurrected back to life, or to watch the time flows as a bystander.

Title: Secrets Online
Synopsis:
In a world changed by a catastrophe, you have to fight in order to protect the ones you love. When secrets and mysteries get in your way - you will have to uncover them. 
This is a story of a brother, uncovering the secrets that caused the last member of his family to get caught in a grave danger.

Title: Amacore: Life After Life
Synopsis:
Portal fantasy/LitRPG
Amalia and her sister Tabia are dead. They have been Chosen to live another life by the woman who killed them. They are determined to make a home for themselves on the magical world of Amacore.  
Drawde doesn't know what he is. He hasn't been alive a day, and he has already died twice. It hardly seems fair.

Title: E.O.T.M
Synopsis: In a time where the survivors of the 'Last War' are picking up the pieces of civilization, trying to continue forward, a young man named Haku Maeda struggles to come to terms with his past.Having to make several choices that force him to his very limit, Haku tries to find meaning in this dead and empty world.

Title: Beyond The Boundaries of Virtual Reality
Synopsis:
Koko is only a normal family guy who works very hard to support and protect his family. But when an unfortunate event happened, something awakened within him.
Arrested and detained in cell, a very important person visited him and hired him to conquer <Rebirth>!, created by the world's most important personages.
With a new and clear goal , Koko embarks on his journey to unravel the mysteries and conquer  <Rebirth>!

Title: Tell me, what is eternal?
Synopsis: Two ancient humans who have lived for millennia are trying to get artifacts from old events in their life to put them in their own museum. They used to be great people with powers on an unimaginable level. They stopped being heroes afterward and set this museum as their goal. To remind the world of the events from the past. The remains of past tragedy, however, can bring things other than happiness.

Title: Slimegirl Survival
Synopsis:
Becoming a slime is hard!Slimes are the lowest low on the monster food chain, but Vanna Milton is determined to change those odds. Equipped with years of survival, Army and engineering training (as well as fantasy, gaming and otaku trivia) this slimegirl finds herself in a world appearing hostile at first, but the deeper she goes the sooner she'll find out what kind of Hell she is trapped in. Follow Vanna as this tiny blob gets into far larger problems than she could ever predict.Survival, after all, isn't only about food. Its about avoiding getting eaten.
 

The release schedule is currently whenever I finish a chapter. It could be a week, it could be tomorrow. I currently work two jobs and until writing pays the bills, this is the best I can offer. So until I get some significant chapters stored up here I will beg for your patience. Thank you.While I am working on other stories, this story will contain most of my pop-culture, movie, Japanese and fantasy genre references. If you don't get a reference, I encourage readers to ask questions in the comments so everyone can be enlightened and join in my madness. I will also be letting my political opinions creep into the story when we get to later chapters. If you disagree with me politically I would ask you to be curtious in your comments and keep your discourse civil.This story will contain some few chapters of explicit, sexual material, each chapter clearly marked when they arrive and I will overall not have much of a filter for my deviant mind in the body of the work as a whole. And while it will contain the occasional scenes of Trauma and Gore, those will hopefully be few and far between.All and all, I hope you enjoy!

Title: The Raven
Synopsis:
Harry Johnson by day is a private investigator who aids the police department and by night the Raven, a supehero vigilante who deals with criminals of superhuman strength. Aided by his good friend, doctor Darren Smith, he faces multiple challenges as he struggles to uphold justice in White City while hiding his secret identity. In his quest he is assisted by Captain Thomas Gorman and Lieutenant Lilian Morse while journalists Adam Wells and Jessica Wing try to uncover his secret.
The Raven is a story that combines detective fiction and supehero fiction with elements of Xianxia. It takes inspiration from classics of both genres.

Title: Chronicles of the Sovereign Otherworlder
Synopsis:
What kind of fantasy world is this!!!  What do you mean I can't level up?  What do you mean my powers have become dormant?  What do you mean there's no cheat skills, divine blessings, or any way to become OP?  TO HELL WITH THIS FANTASY WORLD!
I WANT TO GO HOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Follow our mc as he fights to survive in an unknown world.

Title: The Horse Doctor
Synopsis: Second in the Shapeshifter Symphonic Series - Sam, the local vet, has a secret Laura had never expected, and her life is turned upside down when she discovers what it is. However, the situation turns dark when a group bent on the discovery and revealing of the secret Sam's family protects attempts to force them out of hiding, placing Laura in the middle of a growing confrontation that will not just affect Sam but others who share his abilities as well.

Title: The Other Side of the Bed - Half-Stuck in a Fantasy World
Synopsis:
Zach's friends like to tease him, just to watch his reactions. He always overreacts in entertaining ways. To surprises, to flirting, and to suddenly waking up in a fantasy version of Earth, butt naked and broke.
He used to worry about test scores and required credits, but now he's got more important things on his mind. Things like finding clothes, understanding the economy of this new magical kingdom, and figuring out why he keeps flipping back and forth between fantasy and reality.
His only clues are hidden in the strange dreams he's had since he was a child. Dreams of impossibly tall stone walls, monstrous beasts, a missing princess, and deadly Elven magic.

Title: Game of World's Heroes
Synopsis:
A story about a reincarnated man who longing for family warmth, but something always come to threaten his family in this harsh world.
A journey of Vysilius Hylaxis’ life, a broken kid who just want to be happy with his loved ones.
One day, something changed his view about this world forever. Blue dodecahedron pillars emerging around the world, a scene from novels he read in his previous world. A foreshadow of the end.
Can his knowledge of the world save his family?

Title: Sorcery of the Fair Folk : First Book of the Feycrowned Series
Synopsis:
The world of Vanaris is a place ripe with kingdoms and empires with different outlooks. Some fighting for dominance, some for peace and some even for the sake of war. However, the empire of Aveilorn stands above all. Ruled by mages and the common folk no more than slaves. A village of the descendants of several Feycrowned has long since turned into a global powerhouse, conquering all those that stand before them and  oppressing those that give in.
Their newest target is the kingdom of Bleuria, with a dormant mine of mithril that common folk are unable to extract. The path of battle is one the denizens of Aveilorn tread, annihilating all but the submissive.
However, would that be so simple with several Feycrowned appearing out of nowhere in particular? Would the sophisticated mages prevail or the untamed wild Feycrowned succeed in driving off the intruders? Or would those Feycrowned even be willing to help in protecting the kingdom?

Title: How To Beat The Dungeon Boss
Synopsis:
The wheels of war was turning yet anew.
There, at the deepest part of the Wailing Mountain, powers of long forgotten times were suddenly reawakened where all life was once believed to have been extinguished.
It all started with the mischief of one Ashvali, a book, and the lone Shade who was woken by it.
 
• • • • •
 
This story is heavily influenced by HunterXHunter, a little bit of Lord of the Rings, and a dash of Tower of God. Please help me proofread. Suggestions are very welcome.
 
• • • • •
 
Release of Chapter: Once a month

Title: Saturn Library #huddlerscontestentry
Synopsis:
A short story about a librarian in a cosmic library who is struggling to complete a minor task he postponed to the last minute.
Written for #huddlerscontestentry

Title: Voids & Ventures
Synopsis: 20XX, age of the superheros,and five years ago an event changed the world forever...

Title: The oddity that shall be, my new life
Synopsis: You know, I thought it was going to be a normal day of me dealing with the day of school, go to the bus and then go home to relax and get my daily large dose of computer time. Nope, apparently not in my case. (Some basing of the pokemon universe)

Title: The Adventurer's Guild(master)
Synopsis:
In a world of adventure, magic, and kingdoms, only one man can keep it all from falling apart. As much as he wished that wasn't the case. This is the story of the man who became the guild master of the most prestigious adventurer's guild in the kingdom, and then came to completely regret that decision, as he is forced to keep the peace, file paperwork, and babysit adventurers. The life of a guild master is not as great as it once seemed.
 
Note: The prologue is an extended -probably should have not took it that far- joke and is completely skippable from the rest of the series. This is my first work on this website, or on any website to be honest, so criticism is more than welcome. Feel free to leave comments on any chapter, not just the latest one.

Title: New God
Synopsis: A man name kasima got reincarnated as a God in another world

Title: Skeletal Rebirth
Synopsis:
Jack Collins worked at a Graveyard which was completely fine with him since he always found being surrounded by dead people quite peaceful.
One day while cleaning out one of the crypts he tried to move some small rocks but the crypt fell apart and a falling rock caved in his skull.
In the last few seconds of his life, he heard a voice giving him another chance.
The MC will be OP as those are my favorites... so don't get butthurt if you don't like what I write.

Title: System Discovered!
Synopsis:
Press Start, Book 1 of the System Discovered! series is now published on Amazon and is available to read for free to those with Kindle Unlimited. Due to the exclusivity clause, I was required to take down most of the chapters for book 1. The first few chapters are still available here and you can read book 1 in its entirety here. For those that have already read it you can jump to book two here.
            Dean Parker likes to play classic video games. When he found his old consol from when he was a kid he dusts it off and sets it up. He played his old games but he had finished them all long ago. So what does he do? He takes a trip to the local game shop to browse the used titles. Browsing the old cartridges he finds one that he never heard of. Dark Ages: The Death of Magic.
            When a store attendant tells him that game is rumored to never have been beaten he had to have it. Occupying all his free time he finally beats the unbeatable game. What happens next he never would have guessed. He is introduced to the system. Something that has always existed but not everyone knew about.
            Join Dean as he is introduced to the seedy underbelly of the world. One where the myths of magic from the past read like history. Joined by his childhood friend he must survive in a world of magic hidden from everyone. A world that has remained secret through the blood of those who have discovered it. And to top it all off, his childhood friend, his best friend, isn’t even human.

Title: Who Says This OL Can't Become A Splendid Slime!? [Hiatus]
Synopsis:
[Note: This fiction is essentially dropped / in deep hiatus. Please read at your own discretion.]
A journey that began with a simple wish, taken horribly out of context.
'Ah, I wish that I could change my life. I wish for something truly exciting to happen.'
Follow our heroine as she surmounts increasingly difficult odds! As she battles with heavy topics such as 'Is it really safe to eat this?', 'How am I supposed to slay a wyvern!?', and the ever-popular 'Does this shade of pink make my slime look fat?'
"For the record, I've never asked that last question you bastard narrato—"
Follow her as she traverses the world and seeks out her destiny! Thrown into the world with nary a leg to stand on, what will our gelatinous heroine do next? Will she become a savior? Or this world's very own Demon King!?
"Wouldn't you mean Queen? Aside from that, please stop talking like I'm not here."
But at the end of the day, there is one foe that she just may never slay. Despite all her efforts, will she be able to overcome the barrier that is ... her marital status!? 
"Alright, I'm going to Devour you too."
We hope you enjoy the thrilling conclusion!
"It really isn't that exciting. Please don't expect too much."

Title: It's Only Another End of the World
Synopsis:
Fate conspires to unite Cody, a grieving man who lost all he held dear, and Suzy, an eldritch abomination from beyond the stars. Together they attempt to save humanity from yet another end of the world. They will travel beyond time and space! They will face madness, violence and greasy food! They will laugh, cry and fight for the sake of all mankind.

Spoiler: Spoiler


 They will also fail.



This story will update infrequently for the last of its run.
WARNING: This story contains violence, swearing, sex, many depictions of suicide and dark subject matter. Reader discretion is advised. This story is considered NSFW.

Title: Calforn Chronicles (Original)
Synopsis:
With the world in a senseless haze, the Forgotten and the Digits live under the thumb of the Government and Bankers.
When there are world shattering discoveries on the moon, agencies working in the dark see infinite opportunities.
When one engineer from the lower classes breaks through the societal mold, repercussions follow. The chain of events his incarceration began will affect the entire solar system, if not the universe.

Title: The Wanderer's Whistling
Synopsis: Life in a small feud is simple and does not escape the simplest calculation. Of course, not taking in account the manifestation of the wandering spirit in the life of an equally simple boy.

Title: The Underbelly
Synopsis:
There's something wrong with Port City. In the aftermath of the Hyde Park massacre, the city increased its police force dramatically, and Wyatt Milter found himself in uniform, with a gun, a badge, and dreams of someday making detective, but with no clue how to actually make it happen. These days a new, ugly kind of violence is rising on the streets. As a bizarre group of characters emerges from Port City's underbelly, Wyatt will be forced into making a difficult decision. Will he remain a cop? Or will he serve a different kind of justice?
(Author's Note: I started writing this about 10 years ago and only now got around to the idea of uploading it. As a result, much of this predates the rising popularity of the Green Arrow. I'm uploading as is, but future drafts will make minor alterations to the character to differentiate it.)

Title: Codex of creatures: Salvation -Completed-
Synopsis:
Under the desert hot sun to the tangled branches of green forests.From the cold peaks of mountains to the dark depths of oceans.
What an extraordinary our world is, full of mysteries and wonders, loaded with spectacles and allures. Yet brutal and merciless.
This is the codex of creatures, contains epic tales of exotic beings; cruel, savage, sometimes tender, and merciful, but never careless or trusting.This is the written saga of their struggle in this never-ending cycle of life and death.
*** Salvation***
Innyana range, home, and a hunting ground for numerous beings. A place for predators where the incautious can only be prey.
Something is going on in this tiny village near the deadly Crocotta's cliff. Who is the newcomer who enchanted the inhabitants by his arrival?And why some people can never get out of this place?

Synopsis: ¨We are alike, we never liked calmness, and we always seek chaos, do you know why? Vincent Luke was a 21 years old poor guy who struggle everyday just to make end as he worked in many part-times daily. He moved places so often, even changed identities, lying here and there just so he could run away from vicious loan sharks. Just when he finally thought he would be found out by them, some bizarre thing suddenly happened.  After 21 years being miserable poor guy, Vincent Luke finally was honored to be summoned to another world—cough!— ...by a Demon King  Vincent : T-this—what the hell do you mean with ‘honored to be summoned’?! You obviously just kidnapped me here!!  Demon King : Huh… I decided! You are going to be my slave to help this King conquer the world!

Title: Voices at Sunset
Synopsis: Sartore is a young boy in a village, quiet and shy. He seems left out, both by the village's celebrations and whatever friends he thinks he has. Amidst one of those traditions, something snags Sartore's eyes and ears: an inaudible whisper in the back of his head. He follows where it seems to lead him, to a lake behind his house, to watch the sunset. Behind him, all the villagers freeze halt their revelry upon the approach of an army.

What would you do if the world you knew turned into something you don't recognize by the time you wake up?
A world where losing one's life is easy and losing it is faster than a blink of an eye?
Will you turn into prey or continue to live as a predator?
Will you live a life of a demon or help others like a saint?
Will you turn into a killer or be hailed as a savior?
In a place formed when parallel worlds collide, no one can determine their own destiny!Author's notes: Due to high number of words, I can only post two or three chapters per week.

Title: Pandora Project
Synopsis:
In the distant future, humanity's greed had lead them to near destruction. With the developement of interstellar colonization it was thought that they would be able to finally move passed what has occured. For a time the human race was able to bring itself back through the resources of its solar system, but such technology can't be used without a price. The weapons of the past and present had unleashed enough radiation to destabilize the Earths core. A group of scientists had developed a new AI code named, Hope, to save humanity. Hope had devised a strategy to save the Earth, but humanity can't be directly involved. The Haven, a new reality for humans to experience while the Earth is healed, was established. The end of the world can only be solved through something new. Inputing a key factor to forcefully change the world. To introduce... 
 
My first story so please leave comments and please no trolling. I like hearing from others so that I can make this better. I placed this as both Sci-fi and Fantasy because of the main concept of a futuristic society suddenly being introduced to magic.

The blood of an ancient race that runs through his viens, long diluted by his Chimaera blood, now awakens.
With his two little brothers in tow and what feels like the whole world against him......
Where does he go from here?

Title: Monstrous
Synopsis:
A man wakes up in a world entirely unlike his own. One where the wildlife has taken a decidedly weirder evolutionairy path than he is accustomed to.
Stumbling through his first moments in this monster filled world, he quickly comes to one conclusion: Something is very wrong with this situation.
===
The less pretentious version: The main character wakes up a monster, in a monstrous world where magical creatures roam the land killing and eating each other to increase their strength. Humans survive in this world by capturing and taming these creatures, using their magic for their own ends.
Basically, he wakes up a pokemon.
A very, very, weak, pokemon.

Title: It Always Rains During Gym Class
Synopsis:
Tired of his unchanging life in the remote town he grew up in, Finn decides to move to the city. However, the life waiting for him may not be the same one he'd always dreamed of. 
 
 
Cover art by: StickyPotato

Title: The Order of Sekhmet
Synopsis:
Meet Rowan who may or may not be really enthusiastic about telling you how his life is with the goddess of war. It is naturally far from being peaceful, but the blade-wielding, fourth-wall-breaking protagonist certainly wouldn't have it any other way. Egyptian deities? Check. Sword fights? Check. Demonic arts? Check. Burning passion? Check. After all, blood is a good moisturizer.

Please note that I have flagged my content. There is and will be content that may trigger you, particularly if you've been through toxic relationships. While I do my best not to paint these moments in the best light, they exist and are crucial parts of my story. Things are kicked up a notch beginning with chapters named 'The Old World'. Everything before is (nearly) vanilla.

Update schedule is every Thursday/Friday, varying times!

GROW!

Title: This Feeling of Ecstasy
Synopsis: As Blaire grows up, the memory of her deceased parents fades farther away. She develops insecurities due to all her previous foster parents but develops a thirst for books because of an unusual candidate who adopts her. This mysterious person who has a tremendous library in his house form an unbreakable bond formed from a simple mutual need for food. Though first impressions were misleading, she begins to trust and open up to him as she pieces together who he really is until she sees her very own reflection in the man even though their upbringing were in no way similar.

Synopsis: This is the story of a psychopathic killer reincarnating into a Skeleton and killing his way to the top.

Title: Raid Slayer
Synopsis:
Sexy harem chicks, brutal video game action, epic adventure, powerful loot and evil developers!
Zack has nothing left. His family is dead. His life is controlled by the evil ruling Oligarchy.
All he has are the games. So he logs in and plans to never come out.
What starts off as a fun-fueled 5 player dungeon grind for coin and loot soon turns into a nightmare. But a nightmare with an experimental upgradable harem of hot women, more action and adventure than one guy can handle and a customizable player house with a hot tub!
Thrown naked into the dark depths of an upcoming raid zone, Zack and his women must find new equipment and fight their way back to the surface. If that wasn’t bad enough, the raid zone is permadeath, meaning that one wrong move could cost Zack his life.
Warning: Contains hot threesomes, then foursomes, violence, gore, numbery stats, Bard healz, a giant snake woman, a man-hating cult of big women, bikini armor, a grumpy old lady kept up at night by all the “youngins” and their loud and sinful adult fun and a flame farting dragon that sets fire to everything.

Title: Naruto: The Strongest Byakugan
Synopsis:
Otaku is reborn in the Naruto world as a main member of the Hyuga clan!
Let's see how he finds his path in this chaotic world, and stands on top of the world!

Title: The Arbiters of the Galaxy
Synopsis: The galaxy is lead by two superpowers that are at war against each other. From planet destroying weapons to intergalactic politics, every means are use to win this long war that has spanned generations. However, one thing that these powers agree on is that no one else is permitted to affect the balance of this war: worlds must either join or submit to either of them...But when a third party emerges or a unforeseen event threatens the status quo, a team will be assembled. The Arbiters, heroes of both factions working together to save the galaxy... for now.

Title: Xecutioners
Synopsis: Under the threat of witches, ghouls, and demons, humanity is on the brink of destruction. One group, the Xecutioners, stands between them and annihilation. While they can survive for now, it isn't enough. For humanity to survive, they must either grow as an organization or give birth to a savior. Chances are slim to none, but hope remains.

This world are filled of magical mana that allows almost all of the living organisms to have special ability inside their genes. The world itself have one rule. The rule is Power above anything else. How will jaejin a novice adventurer move his way up.

Title: The Suit-Maker
Synopsis:
Tobias Wong is a man with many secrets. He dreams of being a Battlesuit Designer. He does not hate the government. And his father is a supervillain. Then one day, his absent father left him another. A secret so big and powerful, it would change his life forever.

Title: Elutheria: Adventures of a Recluse
Synopsis: Elutheria is a VRMMO designed from the ground up with freedom in mind. Its developers take a hands-off approach, allowing NPCs and monsters alike to make choices as well as level up. In this new world filled to the brim with possibilities, our intrepid hero starts his journey by...ignoring every quest prompt...

Title: Warrior in a World of Mages
Synopsis:
Mages are incredibly revered beings on Akarsa, they are powerful, mighty and seen as higher than a mortal. Everyone looks up to them, well, other than Felix. 
He's part of a clan of Mages, he's even the son of the Primarch of the clan, but he was born without Mage Veins or a Mage Core. So he was shunned by those who weren't his close family. 
But you know what they say; When you're weak at something, you've gotta be strong at something as well, right?

Title: Beyond the Black Sea
Synopsis:
The world had long since fallen, the blackness taking hold, wrapping the entire planet in it's cold, cruel embrace. Life has rotted, and everything that held the pieces in place had fallen apart, only leaving the rotting embodiment of death to blanket all that was lost.
Black snow covered the entirety of the world. The earth had died, the seas have frozen, and the sun had blackened, severing the day from the night as even the stars have disappeared.
What crawled the fallen planet were the creatures of death's manifesto, souls of the unfortunate, the Tainted.
In his world, the sea of black, he continues to roam the broken world, through the darkness and ever forward.
...
......
.........
Watching from afar, a being of the primordial darkness finds a broken world abandoned by the gods, an interesting figure catches her eye. 
Grinning in amusement, she watches closer. A feeling of excitement starts welling up from her chest for the first time in centuries.

Title: The Usual VRRPG
Synopsis:
2068
The earth has changed. Global warming Already passes the 50% stage. United Nation (UN) makes a statement that they will release the virtual reality game that already been developed. The UN hopes the second earth inside the game will slowly reduce the earth destruction by reducing the activity in the real world. 
 
----
Jonny Darker is an average university student that studying Psychology. When then UN release the news, his best friend Aska asks him to play the game. But on the contrary, he refuses because he is doesn't know much about game expect a classic game like Tetris. Until Aska bring all of Jonny Circle of best friend to persuade him. At last Jonny agree to play the game with one condition they can't leave him alone.
This is the story of a newbie player to become a famous virtual gamer.
******

Title: ZERO SUM
Synopsis:
"They say that we are lucky to be here. They say that we are free. I have not felt free for a long time."-AVERY CARRISON, 26, REGISTERED EXPRESSIONIST WRIGHT
One hundred years ago, the water began to rise.
Amstead, a beautiful country along the coast, began to lose ground to the ocean. It overtook land bridges, made islands of peninsulas, lakes of agricultural land. It was the punishment of a people who, despite all warnings, proceeded like the inevitable future would never come. Instead of adapting to the rising tides, Amstead sought higher ground. They laid seiges and bombs against their northern neighbors, quickly overtaking those countries too small too resist.
Our story takes place in Port Haven, a city built on the bones of Pravya, the Ossan port city that Amstead destroyed. In pursuit of a new home, the seat of Amstead's government has shifted from its drowning home to beautiful Port Haven. Port Haven, like all cities across the globe, is powered by Wrights-a person utilizing supernatural forces to practice magic.
For centuries since their discovery in the world, Wrights have been persecuted for fear of their power. Humans have learned to harness Wright utility to accomplish great tasks. Running water, electricity, agriculture, any and all forms of modern innovation and convenience are powered by Wright utility, either directly manipulated by a tasked Wright or run off the storage of their energies. Wright blood has even been utilized to create an addictive recreational drug called Glow that is widely used by Wrights and humans alike.
Amstead glorifies the knowledge of the Expressionists, Wrights who utilize their knowledge and talents to bend the very laws of science. She uses and subjugates Adjuncts, common Wrights who manipulate naturally occurring elements. She actively seeks to eliminate Bloodwrights, Wrights who are inclined to control and manipulate body systems.
In a world that drowns, who survives?

Title: Between The Worlds
Synopsis:
"The universe is boundless.
The worlds are countless.
So are the passages, connecting all of them.
The lone boy is traveling trough them, trying to find the Mother land " - sang the butterfly, as it watched the boy searching for his lost memories.

Title: everybody loves magic

Alongside this phenomena, from the day Portals appeared and onward, people gained 'Class' and used it to fight those monsters and nurturing their 'Class.'.

Title: Skin Never Forgets
Synopsis:
Skin never forgets.  And neither did she.  After losing everything, tonight she's taking revenge.  
 
Winner of the Huddler's Challenge short story contest!  Full story is out now!

Title: What Am I to You?
Synopsis: A Boy lost in darkness and a Girl sheltered by it. Their fates played a cruel joke on them but can they still find contentment and a sense of belonging in each other?

Title: To Build an Empire - Revised
Synopsis:
Peter Johnson, an architecture major, has had his fair share of bad moments in life. Crippled by old age and immorality, he is granted one more chance to prove himself by a God. With his knowledge of modern society and ancient society, can he enthrone himself before the people of a new world? Born into the body of a small infant, he's been given the chance to garner himself as someone important. 
Tylor Justifix, that's the name of the boy who just might rise to power. Through a tale of dark themes, morbid battle, and teeth-gritting sacrifice, he'll have to forge his own path with his newly granted powers. With his knowledge, he plans to carve out his own path and fix the problems presented to him in this world. In a world full of magical creatures, wizards, evil armies, and corrupt kings, Tylor stands up to them all with the hilt of his noble sword from another world.
That noble sword? His knowledge. Let the tale of the not-so noble hero begin!

Title: Ideasthesia
Synopsis:
A long-lost concept. An existence said not to be real. Ancient means for unknown purposes. It was none other than Magical Girls ?
But, who says that, in this day and age, they aren't real at all? A phenomenon can exist although one does not have the concept by which to recognize it. It all depends on how we activate it.
Even if it costs me my life and everything precious to me I will prove they exist.

Title: Scarlet Finale! / スカーレットフィナーレ!
Synopsis:
This is the story that takes place when everyone's worlds come together in the City of Light.
A strange invitation led Faith, a quiet and serious prodigy who closed off his heart, and Wish, an eccentric girl who didn't belong in this world, to Glint City – a desolate and mysterious metropolis. From the small ambitions of a single heart to the hidden truth of the world, they have all gathered here.
Choosing their own path, each protagonist will now step into the secrets of the city that stands at the crossroads of luminescence. Now, let the velvet threads entangle it all and burst beyond the event horizon.

Title: Laeon-Hwel
Synopsis: Da-eun a gifted college student from a long line of Jikininki. Together with similarly smart friends, they face danger while trying to enjoy the Halloween season.

Title: God of a new world
Synopsis:
On the TV:
The 1st of January 20XX.
"A yet to be identified man was found dead at his house a few hours ago. 
Cause of death. 
Stray bullet that fell from the sky. "
The man watching the TV seeing police and paramedics outside his house. 
"damn people shooting guns in the new year!" 
Police are still investigating if it was only foul play or an accident.
"stupid people shouldn't be allowed to own guns."
"Then would you be interested in reincarnating as a god of another planet?"
Said the man sitting across the room.

Title: Ghoulish insanity (incomplete/finished)
Synopsis:
Adventure, Excitement, a jedi craves not these things, but I do!I was captured and kept in a basement by Frank, tortured and partially eaten, yet he somehow managed to keep me alive for a whole month. When he finally decided to off me for fresh meat, instead of dying properly I found myself waking up in the body of a rotting corpse on a battlefield with gamelike elements telling me that I'm an undead ghoul. Oh and there's also the little thing with the gods cursing me as my soul passed from earth to where-ever this place is. But earth gods rock, you know? They blessed me, you know?
Uhm... there's the small detail that I crave the flesh of the living.
Said flesh is really yummy by the way.... It's not weird to eat corpses when you're a corpse yourself, you know? Don't look at me like that! I'm not crazy, okay? Goddamn it!

Title: Assassins Revenge
Synopsis:
Have you ever fallen for someone out of blue?
What if that person was killed right in front of you? What would you do?

Title: Jack
Synopsis:
This is a story about a nineteen-year-old college freshman whose life is flipped completely upside-down when he meets a strange, yet very attractive young girl.
Well... that’s a little bit misleading. It’s more along the lines of a mortally wounded goddess falling from the heavens, and smashing the hood of his car, but you get the general idea.
In a modern society where monsters hide among humans and creatures of myth stalk an unusually gifted boy as he rapidly ascends in power, aided by the most destructive and least predictable force in this, or any universe. Blessed with the power of a deceased goddess, follow Jack’s rise to becoming the newest god of love.

Title: Douluo Dalu - The Legend of the Poison Emerald King
Synopsis: Just another Douluo Dalu fanfiction story.

Title: God's Game
Synopsis:
"Our life is nothing but a god`s game, and we are the fated people to be its player”
A sixteen year old boy was living on alone at the center of the Island, known as Island of death. For him perfect life means eat, play, read, and sleep. He was total hikikomori. This perfect sanctuary makes him nothing to wish for. But there's one problem. Adventurers keep visiting his island because it is the uncharted place at the center of the four main continents. Many adventurers from different nation of those continents keeps intruding the island. The problem is that guardians always wiping them out, which planted a curiosity on the other adventurers. And the cycles goes on. To solve this, he asked the guardians spare them unharmed and tell them to stop their foolishness.
One day another group of adventurers again trespass the island. Unable to keep reading because of the change weather which caused by a guardian beast. He decided go out of his domain (the 9 region-center of the island) to see how the guardian beast will act. But he saw what kind people truly an adventurer is. He decided to kill all of them but spare one. Making a messenger to those will try again to intrude.
Will he be able to achieve peace he was looking for or there's going to be another problem will he encounter.
Note: English is not my native language so having few grammatical errors should be expected. Also this is my first light novel, so please be gentle.I`m a novice author and artist
If you want to visit me on FB: https://web.facebook.com/dreamflakes

Title: Everything Needed to Build a Fantasy World in Countless Easy Steps
Synopsis: This is basically what it sounds like. It is based off of my personal experience with writing, in addition to what I have learned from reading countless books. Its primary focus will be on fantasy and LitRPG worlds, though it will occasionally deviate into other genres. The tags depict what I currently plan on covering, though it will certainly vary. I may or may not use other peoples fictions on this site as examples, as I have not yet decided.

Title: Reborn as Kurama: applying scientific method
Synopsis: Reborn in Narutoverse as Kurama, reincarnated scientist wants 2 things - power to keep himself free from enslavement and to built liberal oligarchy, will he get what he wants?)

Title: What it means to be a sentient being
Synopsis: The super race “rheios” has selected the human race as the next possible candidate to become a “sentient being” and allow its inclusion on the “dimensional galactic union” as a trainee member. However, in order to determine its capabilities, a test is designed and imparted by the “conis”, a race of pure energy beings. One million humans are kidnapped, modified, and transported to the test field; where they have to traverse over 109 levels in order to reach the last level on a complex labyrinth like dimension know as “realm” and make their race worthy of becoming a sentient being.  The test won’t be easy, besides the complex structure of the dimension they have to battle and conquer diverse enemies or monsters using its modifications know as sync abilities.

Title: Eldritch
Synopsis:
Within the deepest depths of the abyss where not even the strongest demons dare to dwell lie the strange and powerful beings known as the eldritch. None are certain where these reality warping beings came from nor how such impossible beings could exist in the first place, but all who know of the eldritch fear them. Even the greatest of gods and devils are thankful that the eldritch remain within the depths of the abyss and seldom leave their deep pit.
So what would happen if one decided it was tired of residing in the void? What would become of the five worlds if even a single one of the eldritch decided to leave its cage…

Title: Kichiro's Rampage
Synopsis:
Meet Kichiro, the son of a samurai. A social outcast, he leaves his home with nothing but a musket and a sword, determined to carve himself a niche in a chaotic world of dragons and leviathans.
This fiction incorporates LitRPG elements, but it's not set in a VR. It's set in a fantastical world based loosely on East Asia in the 16th and 17th Century, when the Ming Dynasty was on its last legs, with the addition of magic and monsters.
I totally stole the stat tables from Exterminatus, the author of Everybody Loves Large Chests, so let me credit him for that.
I'm new to writing so please don't hesitate to criticise, and reviews would be greatly appreciated.

Title: Glaive of the Sky
Synopsis:
Zack Strider, the ace racer in Babylon, finds himself in trouble when strange monsters, known as Umbras, attacked his city. Then he was suddenly transported to a different place by that mysterious man who came for him. After arriving at his designation, he accidentally stumbled upon the princess of the Solaris Kingdom, Elizabeth, who's taken a bath at the moment. 
After a series of mishap and accidents, Zack somehow entering a school where students are raised to be Stellar-Crusaders, knights who use ancient weapons found from the ruins, Stellar Armor. 
Let the academy fantasy battle begin!
Genre+: Mecha, Fantasy. Ecchi, Drama

Title: Magnolias Clarke
Synopsis:
Magnolias Clarke and the murder in Apartment 3B

Title: Dick's Life
Synopsis:
Throughout the course of man's history, one has always sought after the meaning of life. The pinnacle of human thought, wherein the entirety of an individual's cognitive power is used to try and comprehend the reason for existing. Man has erected countless structures, all to aid in the endless search for the ultimate question. Yet failure always seems to be the outcome no matter what is done.
One dashing young lad by the name of long decides that he will carve a name for himself, starting with the arduous task of satisfying the one question that has eluded satisfaction for an eternity. Armed with his thick and long sword he seeks for the truth. coupled with his unending stamina he steel's himself as he begins his journey.
However as the saying goes "Life is like a box of chocolates, you'll never know what you'll get" the same holds true for our young hero, as temptation lies ahead no matter which path he may take. will he succumb to such worldly pleasures or will he temper himself and evade these distractions? Find out as long's life unfolds.
Author's Note: This is my first story and english is not my main langauage, this means that there will be grammatical errors. The main reason why i decided to write a story and post it here is so that i can improve my writing, so please, if you find any sort of error be it grammar or spelling please inform me... also I pretty much got my style of writing from reading exterminatus's stories so similarities will be enevitable... a lot of similarities ;-;

Synopsis:

Title: The War Golem
Synopsis: Goblins craft their greatest weapon, a massive body of iron and enchantment. To complete the war golem, they summon the most evil being in existence and bind his spirit to their creation. What they wanted was a video game character; unfortunately, what they got was a teenage griefer.

Title: Vaslir
Synopsis:
On a peaceful day... the group of savages human, the bandits are attacking the village called Vaynr, located far from the kingdom's capital. They slaughter those who oppose them without mercy... and they caught all the woman except the elders and put them in the cage like an animal... for one reason... to be sold as a slave.
Once they get on what they desire, they massacre all the remaining villagers and burn the houses to crisp.
Semir, a boy who has been forced to witness his parent's fall right in front of him...swore to hunt and torment those bandits... and make them hell as they deserve... 
 
Author note: I can't promise anything about the updates... and English is not my best language. In return... I'll try to make the plot interesting. Any review, comment, or advice are welcomed to this fiction...

Title: Pride
Synopsis:
A pile of rags crawls through caves, and chambers of an old dungeon to find what it's looking for, while slashing and dashing through specters.
 
If said pile was to leave the dungeon, there may be a large world to explore, roads that begin the journey of a thousand steps, and all manner of adventurers dealing with their own business.

Title: Summoned to a Shattered World
Synopsis:
Torn from his everyday life, Cathal is bound to the service of a capricious Demon Lord. With little in the way of powers or special abilities, Cathal struggles to survive the new life forced upon him of blood and battle amongst the demons in a world shaped by a great magical calamity.
On Hiatus
Cover by https://www.taypayart.com/ on commission.

Title: Defiant [Epic Fantasy]
Synopsis:
"Everything that I am is a gift as well as a curse."
Rumors about an infamous Mage-sprout - Azalea "The Bewitched"- have been circling around the Hunter's Council. Such rumors tend to attract the attention of various organizations. It's easy to tell with the uncanny similarities the men inquiring often possess. These malicious gossips have produced troublesome situations for Azalea's demon hunting job. Most hunters are afraid to team-up with her and some people are reluctant to make a hunting request with her involved.
During her solo hunt in Dimatagpuan Region, four students from the renowned school, AB Academy, appears before her with an odd offer. This academy's Headmaster had grown a sudden interest in her skills as a Mage and he wants her to enroll as one of his scholars. It is the most unexpected offer which might as well bring the greatest change in her current lifestyle. Is she prepared to leave behind her normal daily life of hunting and fighting, to turn it around into an unusual daily life of socializing and schooling? How will she respond to her new environment as she learns more about who she really is?
TLDR: Infamous Demon Hunter enrolls in a renowned academy and struggles to keep a normal peaceful school life.

Title: Always Name Your Tools
Synopsis:
A story of betrayal, creation, and conflict.  But most of that sounds dangerous, so our (anti)hero is going to stay firmly planted in the backline for as long as possible.  Thank you very much.
He’s not strong. He’s not even brave. But he is a crafter.  
And someday, he'll become a candle that lights the way.  
Welcome to Oak.

Title: Sins
Synopsis:
PREFACE
 
The World is created by the higher power ( God ) to rule on this world. God created the world to be superior to something.
when god created the world he created,
1st Angels to serve him, 
2nd Human to worship him,
He made places for each to live
The silver city for the god
The world of clouds for Angels
The world of soil for Humans
Many eons the reign become successful and peaceful everyone was abide by the rules of god but it was wasteful for god there wasn't much surprise and new  for him. thus, he provided free will to all.
After the free will, It was New every time but some begin to break the rules
Thus god created one more,  
3rd demon to punish who doesn't follow,
The world of ashes for the demons
God made three being immortal only he could destroy
 One ruler of the clouds                 -   Sidriel " Divinity "
one ruler of the soil                        -  Apothesis  " Mortal flesh "  
one ruler of the ashes                    -  Leviathon " Satan "
He made death to his creations but also gave the power of creation
With time passed Sidriel Bear his 7th daughter named ' Azerael '. God took a liking to her and gave her a powerful Sythe even able to kill the immortal from existence, even to kill her own father if she desire to take the Throne.
After thousands of year, Apothesis tried to die but couldn't, he asked god to kill him as he said he could not bear to watch his loved one die and vanish from his life. God gave him mortality not death for the reward of his services, he bear children and he died being a human.  Long time went on.
God reign over the world for eons under his Superiority
but the ruler of the demons, had his 1289th child named  " Weiss "
 Weiss obsessed with power and to rule, he wanted more for himself.  He could not watch himself under his father. He came to know that there was a world with no ruler " the world of the soil "
Then he begin to search for ways to enter the world of soil with his devastating plan to rule over that world.
These are the facts , But this story begins with the boy named Satoru Ren  Standing in a tall building .

Synopsis:
As the world comes to its end, as part of the promise, the whole Earth citizen has been transported to another planet. Common sense and logic don't apply on this planet. And there is new rule where everything is based on Class and System. and the most important factor of all? the hidden status LUCK.

MC is a jerk.

MC has an anti-hero attitude.
MC is a short-tempered bastard.

Title: Rosasphere

Will Lucinda find Earth again?  What perils await her and the crazy crew in interstellar space?  Find out!

How come I get a cute turtle? Why does he have a fire ape? She even has a baby dragon?! WHAT THE HELL IS THIS? ~~~~2 CHAPTERS A WEEK (I'M A COLLEGE STUDENT AND I'M WORKING)~~~~ =^_^=

Title: 99 Dungeons: The Beast Lord
Synopsis:
Lucas’ favorite game has become his personal Hell, and now he’s the boss everyone wants to beat. 
Conquer the 99 Dungeons and slay the Beast Lord to free Al’Goryth from magical tyranny. What was once just a game objective is now the fate Lucas is condemned to after killing the game developer’s son in defense of his best friend. His memories of his old life—and death—are gone, but when a group of treasure hunters show up in his catacombs claiming they’re there to save him from an upcoming special event, his cursed life is turned upside down.

Title: The Lost Little Lizard
Synopsis:
The Immortal, the King of Monsters, Kingdom’s End, that's what they call me now... but before... before I had any form of strength... before I could even be called sentient. I was just a little lizard,
   A lost little lizard… In a big big world...
 
In the world of Termarant where gods and monsters are commonplace, a world in which an all knowing all powerful System is a limiter of all forms of life. A simple little lizard is born, having above average intelligence (at least for a lizard of his world). Then, starting life by watching all his siblings get eaten by a monstrous wolf-ish demon, the little lizard runs in fear stumbling into the darkness of the deeper depths of a cave. Now with the simple goal of surviving and becoming something that won’t have fear anyone. But what will come of the little lizard on his journey to grandeur?
Who will he meet?
Will they be friends or foes? 
What will he become at the end of his journey?

Title: Nano Mage
Synopsis:
Like always a young man wakes up to the rhythmic ticking of his clock,
but the clock stops ticking suddenly.
He hears voices, and after a sudden pain in his gut, 
he falls unconscious.Upon waking up he has been blindfolded, 
and is currently being marched somewhere.
 Nearly a month later and he understands a few key points.
1 He is a test subject for a prototype of nanobots.
2  These bastards are cruel as fuck.
3 He his not the only subject.
4 It seems impossible for him to expect a rescue effort. 
And finally 5 He Likely does not have long to live.
 
In another world a young mage is on the verge of mastering his spatial 
magic. “Just one more push and…”
 
A thunderous noise causes the nearby village to vibrate.
Where the mage once stood, a black mist is swirling about.
 
That same black mist is now coated around the kidnappers.
In a chair a young man sits. 
 
The mage can see the man’s clouded over expression, 
and assumes he is being mind controlled with magic.
(Only one thing to due! Saved him!)

Title: Stop the Rain: I Smile
Synopsis:
First book in the series Stop the Rain They say your smile is the most beautiful part of you, but is it still beautiful if it's artificial? Do you think, that it is worth living as someone you aren't just so that you'll never get hurt again? 
 One day, your walls you have worked hard to build will come crashing down.

Title: Leech
Synopsis:
A young man suddenly finds himself amidst a warzone. In his final breaths, he sees a chained woman trying to get a bottle in between them. This event thrusts him into a world he no longer recognizes as his own.
Author's note: It's my first story, constructive criticism would be appreciated.

She was abandoned by her family and sold as a slave.

She has grown into a beautiful flower filled with thorns.
She promised herself that someday, she'll rise and ascend to the top.
But, is she a fated person or a cursed one?

The three head off to Haven City in search of water and provisions and encounter a mysterious old man who claims to be a friend of their late parents who then takes them in offers them three books that changes their future.
