Title: Dark Apocalypse
Synopsis:
This story has been put on Amazon in Kindle Unlimited.

The Earth did not end in nuclear fire. The Earth did not end in nuclear winter. The Earth did not end in an ice age. The Earth did not end in global warming. The Earth ended in Darkness. The Dark Web claimed the Earth. All the dead rose from their graves, and everyone the dead killed rose again. Humanity changed from the oppressors to the prey. In a single day, the modern world died. The nations of the Earth were overturned, and the world fell into chaos and violence.The living dead were hungry, but they were not the real monsters. The real monsters were those humans who preyed on other humans, and those humans who became things other than human. Not everyone who was bitten by the living dead died; some became the Changed, mutants with more than human capabilities. Others chose to cast aside their humanity; they fed on the flesh of the living and became Ghouls. Whether the Changed or the Ghouls, they gathered the criminals, the violent, the bullies, and the abusers. They preyed upon the other survivors, the normal humans, killing the lucky and making slaves out of the unlucky.When the Dark Apocalypse came, Walker Daniels was serving life in prison for the murders of his wife and some of the gang members that raped and murdered her. The only thing that had kept him from giving up and dying in prison was his undying hatred for the human race. He was a brutal, violent man, with only two men he considered his friends. In an attack by the newly risen dead, one of Walker's friends died, but Walker survived. He did not become a Changed. He became something else. He Awakened. He gained the potential to evolve into something other than human. He became a monster, who would terrorize other monsters.When Johnny Jackson, the last living human Walker considered a friend came to break him out of prison, Walker Daniels set out on a quest to hunt down and kill any and all survivors that might have been complicit in his wife's death and his imprisonment. Anyone that got in the way of his vengeance would pay for it with their blood and their lives.WARNING: Brutality, Extensive Profanity and No Safe SpacesNOTE: This book contains light Gamelit elements.

Title: Born as Slime In New World
Synopsis: The story about a man that has reincarnate as a slime in a new world. Follow his adventures in order to find a new goal for his life.

Title: Eternal Rivals
Synopsis: The Holy Moon continent exists in a world where respect can only be earned through strength. Within this Holy Moon continent a young mischievous boy Mo Yang was hailed as a once in a Millenium genius. His cousin and rival was also a once in a millenium genius. Hailing from the Mo clan the two of them enjoyed a peaceful life. But peace cannot last forever, Their peaceful life is shattered and the only way to reclaim it is to fulfill their destiny. Join the two rivals on their journey, as they discover a destiny far greater than they could ever hope to imagine. A destiny that will affect even the fabric of the entire universe.

Title: Lust, like Vengeance, Demands Red
Synopsis: Yu Yuan was robbed from her mother's arms and sold for an orphanage owned by the righteous sect of light, At the age of eight. She was intelligent but naive in due to her youth.  She was used and manipulated for years. Those years twisted her. Time and time again. she bottled her madness into a facade.  Soon she wasn't needed anymore.  But before the day of her death, she found a demonic spell. 'Give your soul away, and live again in the flesh.' Yu Yan got ahold of her dagger, plunged into her heart and screamed in madness  "TODAY I DIE AS A LAMB, TO LIVE AGAIN AS A DEMON!"

Produce anti-mana.
With nothing but a few metal puppets to its disposal, Custodian will have to adapt to change; whether for peace or for total extermination of every organic being to achieve its goal.

Title: Living a leisurable life in another world.
Synopsis:
Second time’s a charm! Formly a thick plot armor story named Witch of the East.

Winston Vickers, an ordinary woodcutter and an artisan who had the ambitions of living a pleasurable life full of leisure suddenly got himself killed by his own mistake- cutting a tree in a wrong direction! 
But death did not await him, instead, a god who laughed at his own stupidity!
“For that hilarious behavior and entertainment, I will grant you a second life!”
Upon the god’s words, Vickers was suddenly transported and found himself in another world and inside another person’s body!? Join Winston Vickers as he lives a life in another world where Monsters, Demons, Dragons, and Magic exist! Through farming, cutting trees in a safe way, and even teaching, Winston will live his way as fun and as peacefully as possible..!
‘Living a new life would be fun!’ Is what he expected... I mean she, right now...
”Curse you god!!!”
Sadly, nothing comes out free. 

Author: Winston does not like Homosexuality but not to extent he disrespects the said sexuality. Or for some who might take offense; not a yuri...

If they say something then everyone listens if they want someone or something no one stands in their way and no one questions them.
the year is 2018 and this story is about Elijah Grey heir to the family throne our story begins on his first day of boarding school.

Title: Dimension Space - A Dungeon Core Novel

Alison Hart, Chief engineer of the most advanced superdreadnaught in the Terran Federation Navy was afraid. For 200 years the war against the Ourchos has raged and humanity is about to lose this war. Her fleet is about to head into the last battle of humanity among the stars, to either be eradicated as a race or to start over on a far away planet.
However the Battle may end up, she will not see the end of it. Ready to meet her end, an unexpected turn of events ends up with her conciousness uploaded to the central core of the superdreadnaught. But before she can really realize what happened to her she blacks out, only to awaken millennia later...

Title: High School with Humans
Synopsis: Veev isn't from the realm of humans. When her world became consumed with war and death, the valiant efforts of a single wizard saved her life as well as many other children. Through a temporary doorway they escaped into the plane of humans where powerful beings fight over control of those weaker than themselves.Is the human realm really any better than the one she left behind?

Title: White Tiger
Synopsis: The 14 Lesser Kingdoms are constantly on the verge of war. Fighting for resources that don't exist, every single kingdom is greedy to expand. In the Eastrock Kingdom the flames of war brew yet again. For a certain young boy, this will bring far more changes to his life than he could've possibly ever known.

Title: Seventh Fates
Synopsis: The war between Meister Maximus and Berzerker has been going on for years. Amelia Shimizu, a girl from Crystalhill always dream to become a Meister Maximus alongside her adoptive brother Shiori Shimizu, they head to Starsea City and head to Seventh Star Academy in order become a Meister Maximus and meet Milla James and Elias Moonfall. Join them on their journey!

Title: Doorway of Opportunity
Synopsis: One minute James was cleaning out his grandparents basement and the next he’s standing in the middle of a forest. Now James needs to find out where he is and how to get back.

Title: Moonlight Sword Sect
Synopsis:
One of the three great sects, the Moonlight Sword Sect is a powerful sect that rules over a overwhelming amount of deity-like cultivators, like a dragon that rules over powerful treasures.
The Moonlight Sword Sect, also called as the ?Moonlight Illusions Sect,?is the most feared sect among the three great sects for its profound and mysterious technique that can destroy realities and even the time itself.
Indeed. This is the sect that no one must or even most, "can" fight as this sect is strong by any means, be it offensive or defensive as they can bend the reality to illusions, giving the attacker or defensive side a dim light of hope of surviving from the wrath of the Moonlight Sword Sect.
 However...
 "Are you really that serious, sect master?"
"Yes, I am indeed serious."
"You're giving away the sect master role to someone so that you can go away from your sect-master duties and court that female cultivator from other sect?! Are you serious sect master?!"
"Yes."
"Sigh... I can't believe this is happening..."
 
???
 "Xiare! I challenge you!"
"Hehehe.... Even though you're an OP character, you're still a weakling, my little Eumi. Fine then. I'll accept your challenge. Let's duel! Show me your best cards!"
 
Indeed. Instead of a more serious tone of what the Moonlight Sword Sect cultivators imagined and portrayed by the other cultivators to be, they were instead opposite of that.
Instead, they were casual, free from worries and most importanty— carefree with no sign of ending. It was as if they were like a joke, despite being one of the most feared sect across the cultivation and mortal world.
 
Follow the cultivators of the Moonlight Sword Sect as they experience the changing world with their carefree lifestyle.

Title: Dreadnought
Synopsis:
Dreadnought, a massive galaxy spanning VRMMO space sim, where massive player corporations battle for supremacy. Erik is an Executive of one such corporation. During a particularly nasty space battle the game updates, and Erik's life is changed forever. 
Side note: I'll try to keep swearing and gore to a minimum, but its there just in case. 

Spoiler: Spoiler


Basically it's a transported to game world story, similar to Overlord, except Erik, and some guild mates arent the only one sent, he isn't OP, and enemies don't pull punches. Fun times.



 P.S. Any writing tips, advice, and recommendations would be greatly appreciated. New chapters will be released once, or twice a week.

Title: Raghnall: The Tales of Valor
Synopsis:
He comes with many names, hailed by many titles, his valor was known throughout the land, and his wisdom was acknowledged by all. No one doubted him nor questioned his works however, he who believes that his achievements was enough, was in the end seen as nothing in the eyes of greed.
How foolish he thought he was but never in his years of triumph and fall does he hope for another chance, but the heaven has given him so, however his eyes was open but his mind was confused.
For whose thought is this that he is thinking of that cause him heartache he never felt before. And for who does these words are meant for cause he believe that in the years of his tiresome life he never uttered so.
"Death cannot erase nor kill what is not measured by time, my love will go on as long as forever does, and even with death, it will continue so, far beyond what they have describe as eternity, it will haunt you, follow you and mark you wherever you go."
Crossing worlds he thought things might be different but what has change were only the faces, the place and the names. But just like a poison apple, no matter how beautiful it was outside, it will remain rotten inside.
Tired of being a fool of the past, he now strive to change not only his self but others too. He only hope that this time he does it right.

Title: A Duel of the Divine

This was meant to be Gantu's final mission for the federation before his retirement with honours .
A routine reconnaissance of a small continental planet in the far outer reaches of the federal space force. He could not have been prepared for absolutely everything going wrong on the mission.
Now he finds himself stranded and he must ensure his survival on this planet. Perhaps with the help of a higher power or two, he can utilise alien concepts and apply his experience to survive and in turn further his new benefactors agenda.
Can he build a better future and stop this planet from destroying itself for a second time in the process?Extra Tags
Village building ; Army building ; kingdom building ; Religion ; War
 This is my first attempt at writing in the public domain, I'm trying to keep the story unbiased and neutral as possible as it progresses.
Due to the main characters viewpoint it will be skewed at first. I hope to balance this out with the eventual introduction of other pov characters. 
Any constructive criticism is welcome and will seriously be considered. 
Thanks for your time, 
Dil

After years of planning, Lucifer has discovered a means to kill his siblings, the archangels. It’s a perfect plan. One he’s sure Jude will not see coming. Neither will the archangels who’ve now become complacent, self-righteous, judgmental, and arrogant.
The battle begins when Ava, the woman chosen to veil the Sacred City of Ashbourne, cries out for help.
Everyone has a plan, a need, or a desire, except they forget the one plan that matters most—God’s.
Two brothers are in love with the same woman

Everyone has a plan, need, or desire, except they forget the one plan that matters most—God’s.

magic is everything.

Because of that humans searched magic, built schools, built labs, stole books, killed mages, waged wars, singed treaties, betrayed those treaties, and did everything in their power to have more magic and stronger magic.
 
Some sold their souls, some sacrificed everything and made a deal with the devil, looking for a shortcut for the path of power.
Little did they know, at the end of the shortcut only suffering awaits.
And in the midst of such suffering one boy managed to cut through and reach the goal, using such a shortcut.
This is the tale of such a boy, the tale of kenz.

Title: Nearly Witches
Synopsis:
Prologue
 
Anathema and You
 
The first documented case of Anathema was in 1692. The church classified it a plague when the protestants decided that the symptoms of Anathema were unholy, and those afflicted must be exterminated. After a small town massacre in Massachusetts in which 20 lives were claimed, the rest of the world quickly adopted the crusade against Anathema. 
 
Colloquially, Anathema is referred to simply as a curse. Up until the turn of the 20th century, being infected with Anathema was punishable by death. However, after a United Nations ruling in 976, the cursed were declared separate but equal.
 
Today the cursed are welcome to live a full and normal life so long as they report their condition to the proper authorities and do not exacerbate their symptoms. Whereas most cursed citizens follow this law, there are underground cults and societies whose sole purpose is to rebel against what they believe is unconstitutional oppression. These felons are wanted in all 50 states.
 
If you think you may have Anathema please book an appointment with one of your local clinics. Anathema medical evaluations are provided free by the federal government in every U.S. state, territory and province. All clinics have support and outreach programs, as well as resources for the afflicted and their families. If you are considering suicide please call 1-800-273-8255.
 
 If you or someone you know is considering exacerbating their symptoms, please notify the local authorities immediately.
 
You are not alone, and God Bless America.

Title: Glitch
Synopsis:
I always dreamed of being one of the Awakened, one of the heroes that fights back the Insanity on his own terms. They’re always pictured driving the newest cars, wearing the latest clothes, using the best gene-mods and implants. They’re supposed to be more than just human. 
At least, that’s what I thought until I Awakened. Now my life is a mess of corporate intrigue, shifty politics, cyberzombies and at least one group of revolutionaries whose ideas are sounding better every day.
I never wanted to be the punk that brought the system down, but the temptation to just glitch out is growing by the minute. 
 

Glitch is a Cyberpunk LitRPG set in a near future where some people are given abilities that allow them to do things that no normal human could ever do. This fiction is written, maintained and owned by Edgar Malboeuf. Copyright 2018

Title: The Legend of the [Place Holder]
Synopsis: The End came for me, I do not remember any of it though everything else has been engraved into my soul, or that is what I believe, for how else would I have perfect recollection of my previous world without carrying my brain over too? I was born to a happy family of 4 becoming their 5th member. I am the youngest of my siblings (obviously) and will remain the youngest for the foreseeable future. My mother is known as the Blood Tyrant to her friends and Talina of the Mists to her enemies. I personally think thats the wrong way around but what can I do about it? My father is a goofball with no apparent ambition or drive. His goal in life is to torment my mother and make the Blood Tyrant smile. There must be a good reason my mother keeps him around, I just don't know what that reason is. There is a secret hidden from me by my family and everyone else I meet in my little world. But little do they know that I am already aware of it. I may have been a crawling, bawling, eating, annoying, farting little poop factory but I was also aware of everyone around me, learning, watching, stalking. I learnt the secret kept from me and I will reveal it to you all. We have MAGIC and the biggest secret and the greatest crutch -  ADMINISTRATION.

Title: GraveWalker (Dropped)
Synopsis:
This Is a Shadow of Mordor & Shadow of War fanfiction I have loved the lord of rings Movies, Books, and Games for as long as I can remember but I was slightly disappointed about these games for one little reason and that reason is talion is a wimpy little bitch so in my story he will be replaced by another ranger of my making also it will be a different story with maybe one or 2 similarities here and there.
Eranor is the Captain of the black gate he is an elf that was banished for his crimes and sent to the black gate 100 years ago over time his reputation as a criminal vanished and he gained the reputation as a natural leader he is a skilled swordsman and diplomat but on his 100th anniversary at the black gate which was supposed to be a day of celebration was instead a day of horror as an army of Uruk-hai attacked silently taking out the sentries and quietly killing everyone in their way if it wasn't for a screaming maid everyone would have died without even putting up a fight as her scream is heard the alarms start ringing after hours of fighting and screaming it looks like the Rangers will push back the Uruk-hai horde that is until one of them gets knocked 20 feet into the air as the remainder of the men stop and stare at the newcomers they realize they are fucked as the people standing in front of them are none other than The Hammer of Sauron, The Tower of Sauron, and The Black Hand of Sauron.

I don't consider myself a good writer, in fact, this is my first story and I'm going to write it how I want if you don't like that then don't read it since I'm going to write what I want and not adhere to what others say (Useful Criticism) is welcome but just blatant "I HATE THIS NOVEL" comments will be deleted and I also ask for no reviews good or bad I apologize but I'm a simple man and I like simple things also my MC will be disgustingly OP.

got pic of google

Title: Stories from Talsweil - Calamity
Synopsis:
During the 396th recorded cycle, the great country of Rohakohou was struck by a calamity, a mist of corrupted mana so massive that it covered a majority of the country-side. One third of the population was wiped out before the court-magicians managed to trap the mist and prevent more casualties. While the country eventually recovered from the losses, the tragedy remains forever ingrained in everyone's mind. The rest of the world was also shaken by what happened and some countries began taking harsh measures against magic in attempts to prevent corrupt mana from appearing.
Yet, no matter what one does to prevent a calamity like that, the true way to stop mana from becoming corrupt is to know exactly why it happens. This knowledge has yet to be discovered.
One of Rohakohou's great noble-houses, the Faders, are known for their prodigious court-magicians throughout history, one of which supported the calamity's subjugation. It is now the 483rd cycle. The current family-head, Erica Faders, is not as talented as her predecessors but her children show great potential to one day join the court... or well, two of them do. Her adopted daughter Anja is quite peculiar. She is mute and unable to cast any kind of magic much to the disappointment of many...

Title: The Woven Light
Synopsis: The Entities have plagued the multiverse for a countless amount of cycles yet this time their pattern is interrupted. And the vulnerability caused by that changes Taylor's fate as this time instead of bugs, the light is on her side. And slowly things spiral away from the fate that was foreseen.

Title: In Another World With The Bleach System
Synopsis:
In Bleach, it is in the spirit world that the strong reside. Those powerful beings that can set fire to entire cities and slash mountains in half are already dead. Hollows, Arrancar, and even Shinigami. It is only when you are a spirit, that you can become strong. Even Ichigo Kurosaki wasn't strong as a human, but instead as a soul reaper. The only exception to this would be the Quincy.
This imbalance of power doesn't exist for Haru Saito. Previously a resident of Earth, Haru Saito has died and gone to a different world. In this world, the mortal realm isn't weak. Cultivators that destroy mountains aren't exactly common, but they are certainly present. Haru wasn't even aware that the spirit world existed in this new world, not until it happened. When the Bleach system that had been dormant in his body finally awoke after three years of living here.
What changes have been made when cultivation exists? Is there still a General Yama? Are hollows still hollows? Is there even a Zanpakto anymore? Join Haru as he explores the soul realm of a completely different dimension.  
 
I don't own Bleach, its image, characters, world, or unique characteristics. This is a fan-fiction exploring those unique qualities in a different world. 
Not going to promise regular updates for now. Just thought it would be interesting to see how cultivation would effect the balance of power in the spirit realm.

Title: Can a Lich Cry
Synopsis:
Update every 1-2 weeks. Well, I say that, but I usually write during the weekdays and chill in the weekends. Should be the other way around, but writing helps me destress with schoolwork.
The cover is a make-shift drawing I made some time ago.
 
The Seven Kingdoms moved at the will of their prophets. They were the voices of their gods, and the deities wanted blood. After being caught in the crossfire, a young man named Sura died among the endless corpses. However, he inherited the Curse, and the Curse did not allow him to rest.
When Titus conquered the Seven Kingdoms, he was still there.
When mages became the new prophets, he was still there.
Centuries later, the lich had faded into the unknown as the aide of Fia, the bastard mage and the only descendant of Titus. A dead man did not have anything to protect, so what did he fight for? For the game was not over, and it was still his to lose.

Title: 7 Desire 7 Death , a way you chose me
Synopsis:
His name is Saga, just a being a poor youth guy who fall in love to the Duke Daughter since childhood. He growth and be a knight of the Duke Daughter , Allysa Baumann. Allysa and Saga has a promise they will change the fate the fallen of the Kingdom of Zanack.
They make this promise when the 16 years old. But, when Allysa fall in love to Zaskar , Sons of Duke Milleno their promise is broke.
 
Country fallen 6th time , Saga die 6th time for protect their promise, Allysia who his love so much married to Zaskar and Die 6th time . So when he rebirth for 7th time with frustrated from his time leap he try hard to protect their country and keep sure make Allysia alive.

Synopsis:
This is a story about a man who after death reincarnate as a bear in a magical forest

Title: A Daemon's Gamble
Synopsis: Follow the main character, Priska J. Huld, as she tackles the world of 2096... the only catch is that there is magic, she is a mercenary, and she is only an eighth human. Watch as she assassinates targets, goes out for coffee with friends, and occassionally murders those who get in her way.

Title: To kill the king
Synopsis:
The king's game was announced in Heilig kingdom.
For everyone who will succeed to kill him will claim his throne.
But for some reason, The king seems to be immortal.
Questions still resides on everyone's mind,what is the motive of the king on this killing game?How strong is the king to create such game that will threaten his own life?
Furthermore, this world of sorcerers and knights keeps a deep dark secret about the war amongst kingdoms that will change everyone's positive perception about the king.
This is a start of Renz and his companions' adventure on how TO KILL THE KING.

Title: Foam Experimentation 0007492616
Synopsis:
This is a short story. Warning: contains traumatizing content, if this will cause you stress please avoid it. 
Setting:  underwater
Two siblings, a boy and girl, have always spent their time in the ocean. They are merfolk, rather than mermaids: they’re tailless. Their time is spent vaguely, and their neighbors are mysterious. 
Unlike most oceans, they are in some enclosed environment. Why? They’ll never know. 
But things get too much for them. What’ll they decide on? 
Enjoy.

Title: The Tales of Owell
Synopsis:
Oh, when the demons come,
When all but hope is gone,
When kingdoms fall,
To the rescue of all, the light will rise and come in the wake of our call.
Only when the gods themselves have abandoned us will we surrender!
-first verse of an old folksong from Viccicia
 
The celestial council has fallen to the great unknown, causing the destruction of the border of worlds.
The peninsula Owell and its inhabitants get transported to a new world, devoid of the nuclear wars and fallen governments of their own.
Surrounded by races never seen before and small kingdoms of swords and magic, how will they survive in this new, hostile environment?

Title: Logicalis School of Magic
Synopsis:
Marcus Logicali wanted to be a wizard but, was rejected admission by every magic school because of the most common reason. He didn’t have enough magic to achieve much as a wizard. But this was not enough to stop him. Instead, it propelled him on a path of establishing his institution of magic “Logicalis.”

1 or more updates every week.Updates will be very sporadic over the first few weeks before I end up with a set standard time of release.

Title: Magical Girl Manager
Synopsis:
What if you never decided what to do with your life?
What if you never chose a major?
What if you never finished college? What if you drifted from unfulfilling job to unfulfilling job, until you ended up as a deliveryboy living for your next smoke break, and no friends?
What if you were a failure?
And what if you had a second chance?

Title: The Oceans Edge
Synopsis:
Everybody obsesses over something in the world. Whether it be money, fame, recognition or status. Here enters Pelagius Saiph, our resident sword lover who desperately wants a REAL sword. Not any of those practice swords, but rather a neat, clean, titanium edge blade. Join him as he tries to improve his craft, find his vagabond father, apprentice under a swordmaster, and maybe make new friends.
I am a new author and would love feedback or any interaction at all really! Feel free to critique and say how good/bad it is. On the note of any new chapters, I have no quota set and it will probably stay that way as I am not a very efficient writer and I have a lot of things going on. This story is one of the ones where you just put it in bookmarks and it will just sit there until the next update. Hopefully, I will improve my writing speed as the story progresses! Cheers - BlankZero

Title: Star Trek: Sidereal
Synopsis:
The year is 2414. The USS Sidereal, a 40-year-old Akira class cruiser under the command of Commander Sina D'raxis, responds to the distress call of an outlying Federation colony. What first appears to be a simple relief effort quickly turns into a race against time to save tens of thousands of lives.But the crew's real test begins on their way back home. Events beyond their control throw them into a strange world full of dangers and sacrifice, where old enemies become unexpected allies. With the way back home seeming closed forever, can the Sidereal's crew make friends in this hopeless situation?Stranded, deserted, and forsaken, the Sidereal and her crew are reborn, rising like phoenix from their ashes. But while they struggle to find a new home away from home, they unwittingly hold the fate of the Milky Way in their hands.

Title: Duck and Wolf
Synopsis:
Atticus (Adi) Wulfert comes from a long line of hunters, and now it's time for him to find his calling. Only... He's sort of a failure at it.
His girlfriend thinks he should get a real job, his first teacher was slain by werewolves, and his target has decided to become his not so warm and caring mentor. Quite the opposite of warm, really. Dead cold is more like it.
Adi isn't sure if he's being kept around as an emergency foodsource or if this vampire really wants to help him, but whatever the case may be, he doesn't have much choice in the matter.

Title: The Death Game
Synopsis: Make a deal with the devil and you're sure to be burned. Sell your soul and sell it smart, cause you've only got one.  And when the devil comes to collect his debt, you better hope he's in a good mood. If he isn't then hell will be the least of your worries. He's got something planned for the poor bastards that try to bargain with him. That something is called the Death Game.

Title: (Deleted)
Synopsis: Supernatural detectives Luciel and Soren are tasked with investigating a series of demonic occurances. Who is the true villain?

Title: Subjugationist
Synopsis:
Necromancer in a modern-day setting. Protagonist isn't overpowered, but ain't no Gary Sue either.
Derek's life is thrown into disarray when he wakes up with holograph-like screens everywhere. And then he resurrects a dead person. Once he comes to terms with that, he'll have to get some answers.

Title: Travelers [DROPPED]
Synopsis:
DROPPED.
The story focuses less on dungeon building than on the why of dungeons and how they fit into the universal order.
While I am working from a grand plot, the writing is going slice of life style because I need to do that to work out how things progress into that grand plot.
The original story seed idea / synopsis is below.

The Grand Tapestry protects Rhofhir from Primal Chaos by imposing Order via patterns. However, the patterns grow stiff, stagnant, and so the Tapestry is nearing a time of Unraveling. Evidence of past civilizations wiped out during previous Unravelings foreshadow the apocalyptic catastrophe looming over the world. The mages of the Arcane Asylum reach out across dimensions, searching for some way to prevent, or at least stall, the coming Unraveling. Among the many voices they find is a gifted graduate student researching machine-assisted telepathy -- and his gaming group.
Lena never expected that the chance to play DnD with telepathy would result in her becoming an actual Dungeon Master, nor that her friends could become the bosses of her dungeon. This is, in many ways, her dream come true, but there's a catch: What happened to Brad, the creator of that telepathy machine?

Title: Origins of Three Empires
Synopsis:
Judge Jay Black believed he had the pinnacle of his desires for the future within sight. He was recently appointed as a judge, a definite milestone. Jay also held interest in forging swords and today he would fufill the longtime dream of forging swords to put on top of his mantelpiece... except he might not see his home again.
Laftus was a bored king. He had the intellect, strength, and resources to carve out his own empire, but preparations for anything successful would only complete in the far future. While he did enjoy his otherwise easy-going and decadent life style, he wouldn't spare resources to bring a hammer down on insurgents.
The hero who toppled the gods awakened as a calamity two hundred years after being betrayed.
 
Has at least one update every month and participates in the WriTEr's Pledge.

Title: Chillin' in a dungeon
Synopsis:
Dungeons & Miscellaneous, a giant company building dungeons for gods, kingdoms and rich privates. After years of honorable service at D&M Stephen decided he was tired of making dungeons for others, so he embezzled enough materials to build his own and ran away when police came knocking on his door.
Follow this unlikely Mc as he builds a dungeon to live comfortably.
Warning: may contain humor and nonsense

Title: A Tale of Fates
Synopsis: The country was not prepared for the demon lord. He came out and unleashed his powers into the world. Cities fell and the kingdom quivered, but they had one hope, a summon hero. Sounds cliche? It won't be like your average hero story. Trust me :)

Title: I Got Transported To Dota World with Just 2 shared Tanggos and qualing blade?
Synopsis:
I am genius technical system engineer. One day i got transported to another world with Dota 2 system. 
Can You believe they just give me a qualing blade and 2 tanggos? WHERE THE CHEAT ISEKAI novel who has plot OverPower Main character? My harem girls?

Title: Guardian - A Novella
Synopsis:
What would it take to grant a wish, even if it was a wish that you didn't make in the first place?
Quentin's in a good place. He's set in school, not looking for romance, and has his priorities straight, but his brother, Derek, is struggling. No job, no girl, and still living in his college apartment despite already graduating. It's not like he isn't trying, but he certainly hasn't had much in the way of luck.
One accidental summoning of an ancient demon later, and Quentin might have what he needed. Magic that would change his brother's life for the better. Should he ignore it, or should he see what would happen if he were to fall prey to the demon's power?

Title: Hypparciatus
Synopsis: A man die from old age on earth. At the same time, on wei'ja, in the country of istrom, a meterorite crash near the city of ziuto. The Baron Maxwell decide to examine the site and find a baby in place of the meteorite. He see him as a god's gift to humanity and decide to raise him. Thus, Adam's life in this world begin and he will have to overcome difficulty after difficulty, from an non-existent magic affinity to antagonistics nobles. Watch as he grow to become the strongest.

Title: The Heroic Death Knight
Synopsis:
The multiverse is much like a domino built in a circle. If one falls, all the others do.
The reality barrier shattered, letting monstrosities rush into the multiverse, bringing a world into the brink of destruction.
The All God, the creator of the multiverse had found of a way to defeat the monsters, even as he didn't have any authority over the creatures.
He created Earth, also called Universe Seed, and accelerated its time fast enough to help the world in an emergency. As soon as the humans evolved into something resembling an intelligent species, he gave information of the multiverse to them as entertainment.
The engrossed, addicted and the longing ones were called Seeds, and had the privilige of re-living life in their world of choosing, all the while protecting it.
Theo was one such boy, born into the house of a minor family due to his own request, and oddly asked not to get any talent in magic, yet due to unforeseen circumstances becomes a sorcerer, a natural born mage.

Title: A genius of none
Synopsis: A group of merceneries that was supposed to go on a suicide mission, find themselves in a very different situation.

Title: A Collection of Tales
Synopsis:
This is or rather will become a collection of short stories set in the worlds of The Misplaced Dungeon and Unexpected Consequences as I am finding it difficult to avoid including some amusing ideas that would sidetrack those stories.
And now also include stories from the world of And Dungeon Makes Three.
Unless otherwise stated these stories happen in the background and are here because they seem to want to get out.
Updating will be irregular.

Title: Sorry, but I'm not interested in love.
Synopsis:
Itsuki Sora, a high school boy with secrets. Secrets that could potentially endangered his life if it were to be exposed to the world. At 6pm when the sun sets, Sora will undoubtly turns into a girl! Born into the Itsuki household, he cannot escape this unfathomable curse. After the death of his parents, and now having to take care of his little sister. He must absolutely avoid uneccessary trouble at all cost.
Shackled with heavy responsibilities and a curse, Sora promised to give it his all to shoulder this burden for the sake of his little sister.
Despite aiming to live a calm and peaceful highschool life, It's not as easy as he thought it would be. Constantly being involved with his classmates, will his secrets remain safe? Or will he be exposed? What does fate have in store for him (or her)?

Title: Liminal Radiance: Path Of Old Dreams
Synopsis:
“Bring your brother back alive.” 
With these words, her family had sentenced their unwanted daughter to death. Frail and broken in more ways than one, she was ill-prepared to face the post-apocalyptic nightmares of the fallen capital.
Yet legends are forged on the anvil of adversity. When the last heroes are dead and the powerful dance in madness, a chance encounter with an old friend set this tormented girl on a path to change destiny. Now the weak must become the strong as wit prevails. But sanity is a scarce commodity when the skies are ruled by a false star and primal entities awaken from slumber.

[This is an action-horror story set in a gothic scenario. It includes some Yuri-Romance elements in a grimdark setting.]
Please note: The first chapter includes a short tag overview at the end. If you like your author chatty, I'm always happy to reply. Each chapter also has a bit about my writing process. Check in, see what's there and if you like it, cool. If not, tell me how I can improve.
This story is a proud participant in The Pledge. This means it won't be dropped and is guaranteed to get the intended ending. You can find more about my update schedule at the end of the first chapter and more info about The Pledge by clicking the banner.

Title: The Orbs Prophecy: The Keeper of the Orb
Synopsis: The Keeper of the Orb is the start of Peter Norrington’s journey to be the end of Zalthar, a sorcerer obsessed with power who wants to abolish the human race in a world beyond Earth called Astrasia. This is the story of how a London orphan is told he is the owner of the most powerful magical item in Astrasia, but is doomed to be hunted by Zalthar and his followers. In my story, Peter finds friendship, courage and strength he didn’t know he had in his quest to keep the Orb out of evil’s hands.

Title: Fool's Bluff
Synopsis: An annual tradition. A few fun-filled days of adventure. A peaceful, pristine mountain covered with fresh snow. A mysterious disappearance. An untimely death.Samantha Shepherd leads a group of six up a mountain. Two days later, she comes down with only five, after one backpacker vanishes. Sam’s search for her missing hiker takes her into ever-more threatening terrain as she uncovers dark secrets never meant to be revealed.

Title: The Fatemaker
Synopsis:
In a world divided by those between magic and those without, Josephina Sort dreams of saving her country. But for someone without magic, such a task isn’t easily achieved. Nor is the world keen on allowing her an opportunity to do so. After she defends and saves her home city from The Beast, a powerful foe, she realizes her full potential and sets out to make a change. But achieving her dream may not be as easy as it seems; as Josephina travels, deadly secrets come to light and her view of the world is shattered.
Thousands of miles away, her steadfast soldier of a sister, Joan, and her brother, Varos, are assigned to find The Godkillers: three ancient artifacts that can kill The Beast. They find their viewpoints challenged and themselves torn as the truth of the country is laid bare. War approaches and the siblings must face their demons as they decide on their alliances.

Title: How a Carpenter became the strongest melee fighter of the New World
Synopsis:
After taking a short 5000 year nap a god aweakens and finds that humanity had prospered since the dark ages, without him to pourpusly fuel magic in to the world, mithical beasts disapeard and became legends, Witches no longer had powers but stil got burned at the stake.
it took him a fraction of a second to analyze all databases and history recorded up to this moment, every bit of information was processed in his mind.
He yawned as he found the current world to boring for his liking.
And thus began the New Era Of Magic
 
The story follows a bored Carpenter from NYC
 

ENGLISH IS MY 4RTH LANGUAGE.
so dont expect flawless grammar or fancy vocabulary.
i mostly write this things as my hobby and to improve my english skills.

Title: Memento Mori: Death Incarnate
Synopsis: The emergence of monsters and superhumans hasn't disrupted the modern-era. People have adapted to their new way of life and among them is Casper Clay, a man who has long since awakened to a gift that seemed to be more of a curse until it leads him to a different path. Seeing the opportunity in front of him, Casper heads down a road that could lead to prosperity just as easily as it could lead to an untimely end.

Title: Awakening of a Monster
Synopsis:
Amon, despite his name, was a normal guy. Went to school, practiced martial arts, went out to do stuff with his friends. But what happens to him when the world doesn't let anyone be normal anymore? Well, like everyone else, he changes.
Is it a good change or the very opposite? Who knows. All Amon knows is that he's not normal anymore.
 
(I don't own the cover photo. If the original owner wants me to take it down, private message me and I will~)

Title: I Get A System, But I'm Still On Earth.
Synopsis:
Ho Lee Fuk, a young man that just finished his college.
As he spending his day looking for a job, a mysterious force gave him along with several others people a LitRPG like power.
The world didn't change, there was no demon king or alien invasion coming to Earth. 
This just suddenly happened without no clear reason.
But, while looking at the black letters that were floating right into his face. 
Does having a system can help me getting a job? How about a girlfriend? Ah, I forgot to feed my cat.

Title: -sub° Marines
Synopsis: Exploration of space is a dirty job, much too dirty for the delicate hands of pilots to handle; that's where the Exomarine corps comes in. in the marine tradition of: first in last out; follow Sergeant Rocco "Rocky" Zulo and his squad of marines as they explore planetary bodies in the near future. They secure the landing sights, set up base camp for the science specialist to relax in, then off to the next cesspit to do it all over again.

Title: Nandemonogatari: The Story of Something Else
Synopsis:
Welcome to Miyafuji High, a school in a world damaged by economic failures where daily life is business and students are the commodity. Adding to the turmoil, beings and phenomena long thought of as impossible begin to make their appearances known. From the disorder, Miyafuji High and schools like it emerge. At the center of this school's tale lies the Paranormal Club, a misfit band of students brought together by circumstance who may someday come to decide the future of this strange new world.
Completed! New adventures have begun!

Title: Star Wars: Pyro Rising
Synopsis:
*story arc not on canon timeline*
Set in the first years after the fall of the empire, where species admitted into pilot training academy have to meet diversity requirements for the school to receive government funding; Ketch Vantil is nobody's idea of a perfect candidate for officer training.  Stealing the Dean's spaceship and his daughter's heart are the least of Ketch's troubles, bounty hunters abound as he flees his only home to escape his past misdeeds.
*very rough draft*

Title: Hollowed Tales of Horror
Synopsis:
Be the villain you were born to be
don’t wait for others to corrupt you
embrace your darkness
 own it.
 
My own dark twisted view of reality including my reimaging of the Peanuts as adults and other twisted outlooks on the world.

Title: Riders of the Heart Woods
Synopsis: In a world of Dragons and magic, mundane devastation and disasters still shape our lives profoundly, four orphaned boys come together to challenge the way things have always been and wake others from their torpid state of acceptance.

Title: Singularity (System Cycle Series)
Synopsis: Markus is an underpowered god in a sandbox filled with humanities finest. See him spam powers and gain levels to max out the grind. Watch him experiment with monsters and create chimeras. Learn with him what it means to be a hero in this world and what it means to live with it.

Title: Slaughter princess
Synopsis: She the number one killer in the world was poisoned by her own family to get the money from her bounty she vowed in her next life to trust no one.

Title: The Adventures of Rusty Slater
Synopsis: Rusty Slater, a teenager from a small town in Louisiana, skips school for a week to head down to the Gulf Coast and enter into the Lou-Loi Surf competition. While he is at the beach, he meets his greatest enemy and he finds the love of his life. After the competition, Rusty returns home to his boring yet interesting hometown and is reunited with his gang of rebellious friends. Adventure awaits the young boy.

Anna Clemet was looking forward to her tour in afghanistan ending; with only half a year left on her hitch with the marine corps, she could finally start after her dream of being an investigative journalist. but fate rarely takes our wishes into account, Anna is injured on the flight deck as she's getting ready to head out country. Forever altering her path and making her future a blurred mass of broken possibilities; as delicate and scared as her legs.

Title: The Heralia Legacy
Synopsis:
In a world where the paranormal is the norm, and your bus driver is a weretiger. Beings in every nook and ass crack of lore are real. Countless species coexisting in a haven called Geas. Divided into three big ruling councils: Mana for the magics, Spectra for the undead and Were for the shifters.
But to keep Geas a Haven, there must be a higher presence that enforces it.
The Heralia. A being with mixed blood, of great power and the mouthpiece of the gods. Along with his enforcers The Order, the Heralia is the police and the law, the gel of a dangerous society but when the assassination of the century leaves the Heralia dead. A rippling political tide washes throughout Geas, which left everyone wondering just who will be the next Heralia?
Enter one: Argus Knight, just an ordinary, if not quirky, college kid in a world where no one is ordinary.
Argus’ is happy with his life, even though he doesn’t have any powers or abilities like most of his friends or any money, okay so maybe not that happy. He was left at the step of a shifter temple when he was a child, so that sucked since he must have been a sexy lookin’ baby. Raised by an adoptive shifter mom, that makes the best cookies and gives the warmest hugs and unleashes the sharpest sass a being can wield, and oh, is also the high priestess of the Were Council. He lived his life surrounded by nuns, he was spoilt and gobbled all that attention up and he’s not ashamed to admit it.
One day, innocently doing a psychology exam, like pro, if you will, a weird rainbow mist starts gushing out of his skin, for the lack of a better word and suddenly he is floating, then seizing, yup still in mid-air, in the middle of his exuding rainbow aura session, a voice booms out like a missive from the gods themselves, “AWAKEN MY HERALIA”.
Sweet baby sugar nuts, what just happened?
Join Argus in his journey in becoming the next Heralia, which will be jam-packed with snark, some sarcasm, interesting friends, a dash of heroism, a bit of hubba bubba wink wink nudge nudge with a special friend and an ass crack full of awesome.
Readers discretion advised, for readers under 18, strong language and some sexual scenes.

Title: Nature's Companion
Synopsis:
Gorm, an old man living in the mountains and forests of the Endless Wilderness for thousands of years, is dying. Not how he wanted to, surrounded by nature, but trapped in a cave with strange carvings all over its walls. When he was transferring his soul into an oak tree to prolong his life, the carvings on the cave walls lit up.
 
This is my first story so feel free to criticize and correct me.
English is not my first language, so if you find grammatical or spelling errors inform me.
 
I’ll try to publish 2-3 chapters a week.

Synopsis: Elementista Trama: Un giovane ragazzo di 14 anni per puro caso, ad osservare un'accesa lotta tra due uomini. Colomba si presenta come un'esistenza dell'elementare che gli cambierà il modo di vedere il mondo. Vieni reagirà a questa scoperta? Cosa gli succederà

Synopsis:

Genesis Roberts, a man with eccentric parents with a penchant for nature, finds himself in a new world with a new body with no idea as to how he arrived. Forced to travel in a strange new land, he looks for any clues that could help him return to normal.

Title: Madness Impulse
Synopsis:
Blood?
My breath echoes in my ears harder than my heartbeat and confuses me even more. I study the shadows on my room’s walls and after relaxing a little, I let myself drop back on the bed.
The nightmare still plays under my eyelids. I can’t completely remember it, but I know what I saw. I remember the red blood, and the black that lived, breathed, flew around me as if suspended and then swallowed me.

Title: The Demonic Aka Manto
Synopsis: A 17-year-old boy who turns out to be a demon...who can kill Satan!?

Title: The Unholy Trinity
Synopsis:
I can't leave..but, that's fine.I've left long ago...in my mind.-Escape (D.B Author Original)
 
Set in a time where those who are specially gifted thrive yet, fall all the same. The humans are closing in; territories divided, the fragility of influence, power flowing through each faction. But, slowly dies as the scales are tipped. The unholy trinity have been released, plans have been set in place.
No one is safe.
What are their orders?

Title: Just For Fun
Synopsis:
Have you ever been betrayed by those you've trusted? Cast out from what used to be your safe space? Seil has. He sought out revenge on his former guild, wanting to destroy them for what they did to him. Enter ELI, the very first VR game. Seil decided to make his guild's life hell there, knowing that they wouldn't be able to resist the challenge. 
And for the next 3 years, he did.
But people must grow up, and "Seil" was no exception. Realizing what an asshole he was, he quit the game and swore to become a better person. He got help, started to take care of himself and the people around him, and began to truly be happy. 
But avoiding the issue isn't always the best decision, and he's realized that too. And he knows what he's got to do.
He's going play for fun.

Title: Roaming core
Synopsis: ben is reincarnated into a dungeon heart, but he wants to travel instead of building a dungeon

Title: 100 Lives
Synopsis:
Dan Steele, Max Kumias, Leon Noles these are the names he has had over his past 3 reincarnations.
Dan Steele was born into a world of superheroes the power he gained was teleportation and he became the worlds best thief.
Max Kumias was born on earth in 1620 as he grew older he was one of the biggest slaveholders in the world with the power of Shadow Manipulation and Teleportation.
Leon Noles was born in the distant future full of spaceships and aliens he was the leader of a legendary mercenary group using his ever-growing powers of Upgrade, Shadow Manipulation and Teleportation.
He can't remember his original name or where he came from or why he keeps reincarnating with more powers but as Leon Noles dies he opens his eyes again to begin his 4th life just as a status screen pops in front of his face.
This is my first story so please keep that in mind when reading this in case you think it sucks also i love Overpowered MC's so that will also be a thing to watch out for.

Title: THE DEMONIC CELESTIAL
Synopsis: James a biochemist in his past life just got murderd by his best friend he is then transmigrated into th body of a youth without celestial veins watch at how he rules as the celestial sovereign

Title: A Tale in Nakatau
Synopsis: A Wizard was tasked by the king to rescue his daughter from the evil clutches of an evil Mage. Together with his ranger friend and the prince, they travelled around their continent while meeting unlikely allies on the way to stop an evil Mage from using the King's daughter and wage war with the five kingdoms of Nartaal.

Title: Parallel World Vet
Synopsis:
After a difficult and lonely life, Arun is reincarnated in a parallel world thanks to his love for animals. In the body of a brilliant vet who doesn't have any success, he wakes up with the ability to hear the voices of pets. And in this new world, they have a very important place, to the point that each human being has a unique pet.
Thanks to the new capabilities offered by his system, Arun decides to take over the veterinary clinic he now owns, to help pets and their owners through their problems. But it seems that in this world where pets are as intelligent as humans, understanding them may lead him into complicated cases... What will he discover about this mysterious world, and about the true role of pets ?
1 chapter / day.

Title: Reverie
Synopsis:
Natalin thought that being a champion of the gods was supposed to make things easier.
It turns out, life isn’t that simple.  
For centuries, the four gods that rule the land have each chosen a hero, a mage-warrior to act as eyes and hands in the world.  Gifted with their Divine’s blessing, these Ascended and their successors have worked for centuries to ensure the land stays at peace.
As the new Tideborn, the disciple of the sea god Efren, Natalin is expected to follow in their footsteps.
Her counterpart Takio finds himself in the same boat, tasked with keeping his volcano goddess patron in check.  The demands placed on them are immense, but together with their nations, they’ve managed to keep the peace.
Until the crops and grasslands begin failing, sending Takio’s mountainous nomads careening towards war.  Natalin’s shores fall under siege, destroying the seabound trade routes that keep their nations flourishing.
When the very safety of the four champions is threatened by the growing chaos, Natalin and Takio realize the truth - their Divine favor won’t protect them.
And there’s more at play in their ‘peaceful’ world than they’d thought.
 
Cover art by Rin! Check out her work!

Title: A Nameless Goddess' Colorful World
Synopsis: Forgotten by the world and doomed to await her inevitable end, a goddess carries her weakened body through the remains of the once lively shrine she calls home.Unbeknownst to her, a group of seven friends have invaded the property, planning to challenge themselves to a test of courage in the supposedly haunted ruins.Fates mingle and lives start anew, as the friends die and get reborn into a vibrant world of fantasy and magic."Where is that goddess that brought me here?""Is that an Exp-Bar?!""It- it is entering my body!"

Title: The Worlds We Leave Behind (GameLit Novellette)
Synopsis:
Some days are better than others for Holly. Today is one of the good ones, one of the ones where the crushing grief of losing her son eases back a little, and she's able to face the memories of who her son was, maybe even the potential of who he could have been. 
She feels like she's made tangible progress over the past three weeks, having progressed from crying on the couch to crying on her son's bed, in the room that he spent so much of his time. When it all finally threatens to overwhelm her again, she stands to leave, bumping his chair and awakening his computer.
The voices filtering through the illuminted virtual reality headset are from three of David's best friends. Seperated by thousands of miles in the real world, they had come together inside of the virtual world of Silenia to quest for fame and fortune. At first she is unable to face them, unsure how to tell them that their friend is gone. Once she enters Silenia herself, she discovers that the virtual friendships David forged are as strong as any in reality.

Title: The Abyss
Synopsis: Nikolai lost his will after the most recent skirmish between the Grime Lords. The only thing he wants is to leave the Grimes alive, an impossible task. That is, it was an impossible task. With an Abyss that opened in the middle of the Grimes there's hope of gaining enough strength, money, and recognition to either fight, flight, or just plain old bribing his way out.

Title: Spectre
Synopsis:
Spectre follows a dark tale of lust, hatred, love, anger, bloodshed and much more.
The story takes place in a fantasy world of Iries on the continent of Astariel. A series of events start to occur surrounding a teenage boy who struggles to keep his true self alive while searching for something precious.


Spoiler: Spoiler


 There is more to the story then the synopsis. The story will consist of bloodshed, goriness, and psychological trauma. If you have some sort of soft spot regarding religion, then proceed with caution.

Title: Edea Chronicles: Hero Summoning Conspiracy
Synopsis: Enter Kazuya, a boy who never had any memories before his adolescent life. He was summoned to the world of Edea where in the final battle against the Demon King, our hero entered the last room to find a welcome he had not been expecting. An unguarded, unarmed demon king who greeted him with manners and etiquette.As if a respectful and well mannered final boss wasn't shocking enough, he was then introduced into an elaborate plot to exploit summoned heroes. Unfortunately, our naive hero chose to trust his companions. He underestimated human greed which led him to suffer alone in darkness for a time he himself does not know how long. When he suddenly woke up, he was surprised to see a younger version of himself. As an amnesiac, he had been thrown into an unknown part of his life. One thing never changed though, his blood-filled desire to get back at those who made him realize his fall from being a hero to a pawn.Follow along as Kazuya finds out about his past and tries to prevent the tragedies he's experienced while discovering what caused them to change the tragic life he led into one that he could accept.

Title: Multiversal
Synopsis:
Jet Li’s The One meets Orphan Black in this insane trek across universes.
Plain ol’ Lana, while minding her own cookie business, gets kidnapped by her doppelgänger who claims she’s from a another universe. WTF, right? Let’s call her Coolana, cause she’s so cool and all. Then they team up to find and kidnap-slash-rescue other versions of themselves, namely Tallana who is 2 metres tall, Draculana, who yes, is a bloodsucking vampire, Terriblana who no one likes but they make a half-hearted attempt to save her anyway, while Ruslana and Voilana don’t get along very well and somewhere along the way they misplace Smallana in somebody’s purse.And to top it all off, the stalker, who apparently can hop across universes and is constantly breathing down their necks, is killing Lanas one-by-one in an apparent quest to rid the multiverse of that specific nondescript girl named Lana.And did we mention the spiders?The hair-legged, poisonous-biting, universe-hopping spiders that show up out of nowhere?You really don’t wanna know.
Warning: “Multiversal” contains adult themes, drug use, forced application of drugs on helpless members of the Araneae order (Arachnids), people having sex with themselves, murder, attempted murder, kidnapping, a ton of stuff given in the metric system, realities that can seriously break fragile minds, British spelling, bilingual cursing, terrible naming conventions, puns, tasing of genitals, questionable computer coding practises, spiders, spider bites, love bites, shameless homages to pop culture, horny individuals (both literal and figurative), polyamory, LGBT characters, diversity, and the story of a cookie girl that gets tangled up in a mess of her own making.

Title: One Note At A Time
Synopsis:
Her name was Ritsukera Arya. She was her parents' tool, who's sole purpose was to bring them money. Now entering the race to become a full-fledged Idol, her passion is however already dead and buried, and her dreams have already turned to ashes. She didn't care, though. If money was what her parents wanted, then money she'd bring them. Simple, right?
Or at least, that's what she thought, until she met... them.

Title: Companion
Synopsis: A man and his dog wander the wasteland in search of a better life.

Title: Together Now
Synopsis: Together we can survive. Together we can make them pay. Together we can become monsters.

Title: The White Desert
Synopsis: The White Desert is a collection of short stories, written by myself, Nigel Scott, for your perusal and enjoyment. Each chapter will be its own short story, and will center around different characters and events. Some stories are based upon my life, and others are from a world I have written.

Title: The Supreme Trickster
Synopsis: When a Yo-yo fanatic Gyro wakes up from a coma, he finds himself reborn in the body of a 15-year old boy, in a mystical world where the strong preys on the weak and people with extraordinary abilities can bend the fabric of reality. In his desire to return to his home world, he discovers that his only way is to strengthen himself to a level in which no one has attained in the last 10 thousand years, an almost impossible task, until he finds hope in a Trick System installed in his mind. This leads Gyro to bitterly struggle his way to the top against the people who want the same thing, Godhood.

Title: Wrong World
Synopsis:
A young man suffering from a horrible childhoods  loosing all his emotions finally gets the sweet release of death, but it seams death is also something which will be denied to him, follow him as he learns to live again.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Authors Note:
Well guys this is my first time writing anything and English is not my first language, I hope this is entertaining to read. This story is a fanfiction but the story will be little darker than the original one, as for what the original story is, for that you would have to read the book.
All constructive criticism is appreciated.
I will be adding a new chapter every 2 days with an occasional double release a day and I will finish this story.
If  someone would like to provide/suggest a cover please do tell.

Title: Priestess Of The Land
Synopsis:
Amalthea wakes up in the body of the Prime Minister's 2nd daughter, Tria Ashir. A motherless daughter who has been abandoned and left to die because of her poor mental health and absence of talent.Not even a day has passed since she traveled into this unknown world, and she is already being married off to a prince, with a similar reputation, a cripple.However, things are not always what they seem.Follow along, as Tria becomes a revered existence to the world, and a wife at home.
[Disclaimer: This is a temporary cover, the artwork is not my own. It was done by BeaGifted.]
I will now continue posting mainly on webnovel.com. Thanks for reading.

Title: Man of Earth
Synopsis:
Magic is a terrifying force. Logic itself is subject to this energy, which is (logically speaking) impossible for us to comprehend. 
Every universe requires some version of magic to exist. That is, all but one. Our world functiouns based on a powerful and intricate net of laws that act independently from magical interference. The most notable of these is the human brain, which is capable of even more than its creator had thought possible.
Naturally, this prompted the question: "How would a human fare in a world of magic?"
Soon, there was a bet.
Next, a human was selected.
Finally, an odd young man with a strange black hat was introduced to his new world, and all restraints were removed.

Title: What Do You Mean All Dungeons Are Girls!!!?
Synopsis:
This Story is no longer being updated on this site.

A boy wakes up in a mysterious black space, with a goddess who reincarnates him as a demonic dungeon. There’s just one catch, in this world dungeons are girls, and then when he finally unlocks his avatar he discovers, it is a cute loli demon and while he or rather she is dealing with her new found gender issues the church comes calling.

Title: Tridante
Synopsis:
Hello, my name is Tridante and I am a clownfish. You all may be wondering about how a clownfish could talk, but let me tell you, I myself do not know.
The story I am about to tell you is obviously about myself, a fork in the ocean and how we met two weeks ago.

Title: Ease & Quiet
Synopsis:
What can you have ?
By strength, action. 
What can you do?
By choice, consequence. 
How can you live? 
By will, freedom.
What will it take?
By nothing, everything.

Title: Galal: Horde Master
Synopsis: Mankind. Conquerors, builders, criminals and craftsmen. Tamers of beasts. Arrogant, they attempt upraise a beast, to create a machine of war. A beast born of blood and of violence, mankind will do its utmost to tame it as it resists their shackles and seeks the freedom it craves.

Title: The hidden truth
Synopsis: This Is a story about a girl who is from Arizona, but soon has to leave everything behind to go to some school in London. While in London she makes a shocking discovery about her family. What secrets have her parents be keeping from her?

Title: Big City Fight
Synopsis:
After the apocalypse what would happen?
What if I said Aliens? A young boy named Caesar will have to discover the real truth behind the Octavians. With his brother Zu tagging along after their mother’s death, they will face many twists and turns. In this "Utopia" of this post apocalyptic world ruled by the Octavians, can they survive or will they be consumed by what they cannot comprehend?

Title: I Sent My Children to Another World with Cheat Abilities
Synopsis:
Synopsis: A young professor does everything he can to ensure his children can live long and happy lives. (Short Story, only one chapter.)
A note by me: My second attempt at writing, I apologize if the format is not to everyone’s liking.
Inspired by Shelter.
Releases: This story is complete.

Title: Naruto: After the end.
Synopsis:
Narumi and Sasuke awake to find themselves near death from their showdown in the valley of the end. After a drastic action from the nine tailed fox they find themselves once again in the presence of the sage of six paths after being flung into the past.
...............................................................

Title: Six Seals
Synopsis: Put on indefinite hiatus.

Title: Cold Bones Warm Heart
Synopsis: Seren is a heroic skeleton girl. First she saves Jaime, the guy she loves, from the evil mage Lord Mortis and then she must go on an epic quest to stop the worst threat of them all - the evil necromancer Zarath!

Title: Chosen
Synopsis: Jas expected to hear a tale of glory and heroism. He hadn’t planned on living it.Drenwell is in trouble. The idyllic nation teeters on the brink of disaster as one trouble after another lines up before it. Crops fail. Animals flee. Earthquakes rattle the land. In the midst of it all is the mountain, rising tall over the plains and forests. Legends passed down over the years place it as the center of the kingdom’s woes, host to an ancient, looming threat.Tucked away in the countryside, Jas isn’t worried. Drenwell has a savior waiting, a man chosen by their god to defeat this evil. He knows it better than anyone, since this Chosen is his childhood friend, Darren. Jas knows that Darren will be the one to end the threat and keep them safe.But their Chosen is clever, armed with his god-given gifts and talents, and he’s no fool. He can see the truth of the mission laid in front of him, its dangers and risks. The expectations placed on him are strong, but the will to live is stronger still.When faced with his ‘heroic’ fate, he chooses an option no one expected - least of all Jas. With no way left to him but forward, Jas finds himself trapped into playing hero in Darren’s place.

Title: Dragon Bones
Synopsis:
Once there was a city built upon the bones of a beast. One that was said to have slept beneath the mountains since the time of the Gods. She had waited as the grass grew, and the forests bloomed, as humanity learnt to till the soil and farm the land. She waited as empires rose and nations crumbled, as anger turned to violence and war became genocide; that was until two years ago: until something changed.
  This is the story of those who fought that beast, the story of those who came after; those who built a city and the nations that desired it, those who challenged the dungeon growing beneath its' street, those who traded the rarest gifts that dungeon could provide, this is the story of the dragons' bones and the man who came to find them, mine them, and make his fortune.
  This is his story, and trust me; it will change the world.

Title: The elf from Shaylet
Synopsis:
The elves are a race that pride themselves in the purity of their blood, in their natural beauty and in their mastery of archery. They love nature and hate those that defile it.
Finch is nothing like them. He could care less about nature. The most elven thing about him is his ears and boyish face. He grew up enslaved by racist nobles and escaped the first chance he got. Taking odd jobs to make enough to get by, he honed his skill in the sword and became an adventurer. This is about how his first big assignment from the guild might change the kingdom
*This is the first fiction I have ever written, please be gentle.*

Title: The Skywalker Chronicles
Synopsis:
Luke Skywalker wakes up nude in a new world after going to bed as usual. Adventure with him as he readily abandons his previous life and discovers all the wonders of this new world.
This is my first attempt at writing that I actually posted anywhere.
English is my first language but I pretty much suck at it.
This novel will have sexual content but as someone who can’t stand reading those grocery store romance novels I will likely do as Robert Jorden and just say “they did it” and end it with a fade out scene.

And finally, this is not a Star Wars Fan Fiction. The origin of the MC’s name will be explained as the story progresses. Skywalker is just such an awesome name I couldn’t help it. Anyways, we all know Star Gate comes in first followed by Star Track and then Star Wars.
I give no promises on release dates or time.

Title: Soul Anomaly
Synopsis:
Yuichi Shiro, a narcissistic teen, is killed in a road traffic accident (mostly caused by his own stupidity). He is a given a single chance to resurrect. He takes it. But how will his life change now that he has returned as a Human Anomaly?
"I'm now a magnet for dangerous monsters? I don't care, I'm still beautiful."
"A group of Slayers wish me dead? Ha, they don't even measure up to my ankles."
No matter the dangers that are thrown his way, with a beautiful Reaper as a fiancé at his side, and caring friends at his back, he will overcome them all.
He shall walk his path of narcissism and become a legend.
(Also being written as a manga/web comic)

Title: Journey for Destiny: One Piece
Synopsis:
Chris Stevens, a soldier who sacrificed everything for what he believes. Sent on a quest given to him by a being outside of his comprehension. A quest to combat the effects of the aspect Chaos, in a world unfamiliar to him. This mission will lead him on a journey that will affect his destiny. Can he succeed in the dark world of One Piece? Or perhaps he will change fate itself making new waves on the high seas?
Joint host on Webnovel

Title: Strong
Synopsis:
Welcome to the not so happy world of Tera.
Whispers of dark ages spread and no species will escapes their cold grip. Our troll main lead Strong will be one of the many beast roaming in the upcoming darkness. Will Strong become one of the many tools of destruction or will he follow his own deep desires. Can Strong truly achieve his wish and become the first smart troll or will he forever live with the shackles of his mind.
 
I like realistic storys (NO GO: lucky suprise overpowering, loved person of god and all good people, bad people with no real reason to be bad expect mental illness), I would appreciate it, if you share your opinion on stupid actions on my part.

Title: The Adventurer's Song
Synopsis:
This is the story of Walther, a young soldier in the Imperial Army. The world around him has begun changing. Conflicts are erupting. Grand events are beginning to unfold and a new element has been introduced, Adventurers. These Adventurers have an innate power to grow their strength faster than anyone else, and they all seem to have strong levels of magical affinity, a quality not found in most.
Even more interesting however, in Walther's opinion, is the Adventurers ability to undertake quests. That, or their tendency to randomly sleep for long periods of time. Either way, Walther is sure of one thing: somehow or another, he was going to become an Adventurer.

Title: the wandering ronnin
Synopsis:
Lost gate online a vrmmorpg with unlimited choices want to be a ork wielding tonfas as a paladin go ahead.wield a halberd as a Halfling rogue have fun. Mikeal plays as a gnome necromancer armed with a daisho. Watch as he goes and becomes a feared and respected player in the world.
p.s I am writing on a phone so please forgive me for how the chapters look I will fix them later if I get a computer.

Title: Fight To Live Another Day
Synopsis:
A world full of abundant beauty and energy, populated by wondrous creatures.Renn, a human boy was tossed into the wilderness and should have died, when everything changed for him as a wolf mother found him and took him into her loving care.But meanwhile, a mysterious darkness overshadows the world...
-Credits to Kyo-chan12 for the cover-

Title: Modern Age Online
Synopsis:
It is the Future. The realm of online video game entertainment has grown, creating vast and wonderous worlds for people to explore and enjoy.
This is the story of Kaleb, a young gamer, and his adventures in the latest Super-Hero Virtual reality MMO: Modern Age Online. Join him as he takes on villains (both player and NPC), joins forces with other player heroes, and even deals with some of the bureaucracy of being a hero in a perfect virtual recreation of the world. No cheats, no guides, just one newbie Super-Hero against the forces of villainy in his new virtual home.
 
Notes: 1.) While not my first time writing, this is my first time throwing anything I've written at the tender mercies of the internet. All criticisms welcome. 2.) Just to inform people early: There is no evil corporation looking to control the world with VR, there is no Krueger-esque "if you die in the game, you die for real.", and this isn't a story of some OP harem-loving god of the system. Nothing wrong with those stories this just isn't one. This is a simple story about a guy playing a game and finally 3.) This story is extremely rough, i did very little editing, this is just me gauging interest really.
oh, and English is my 1st language, if for some reason you find that important.  

Thank you to everyone.
(Book Two on Amazon here)
(Book Three on Amazon Here)
Both books should be available through Kindle Unlimited.

Title: A Power Fantasy - The Fulfillment of a Wish
Synopsis:
Dylan is an ordinary highschool student. He is bullied by his classmates and teacher, and his girlfriend betrays him and breaks his heart. After this, he dies and reincarnates in another world. A world of fantasy where he can learn magic, level up and gain the power he needs to plan his cruel revenge.
 
---
...This is an experiment at writing a brief exaggeration of some tropes that I see often used in stories like these.
I like the litRPG/ Isekai genre, but some things I read make me cringe, and I hope my first attempt at writing a brief parody on this whole thing makes you cringe this time. ;3
I don't know how much I'll extend this, but I expect it to have about 2-4 chapters. Though, we'll see. Maybe I'll end up turning it into an epic tale of thousands of chapters? ...eh, unlikely. I'll just write on it until I get bored.
This can be considered my testing the waters to see how this whole thing works. It's kinda weak to begin with this as my first submission, but any of my other projects I have in mind are too ambitious and long to just start posting them as carefree-ly as this.
