Title: LIFE::UPLOADED
Synopsis:
Who would have predicted that the way to defend the planet from a devastating attack would be playing a virtual reality game? 
The gamers, so it seems, will inherit the Earth. 
If there's still an Earth to inherit...

Title: A Titan's Crusade
Synopsis:
Erik Thayne spent most of his life being brutally ridiculed and tormented for his weight and physical appearance, among other things. A social pariah and diagnosed with an eating disorder no one has an explanation or treatment for, Erik spent years trying to overcome his issues with his personal image and escape the ridicule and vicious torment of his peers. After years of dedicated effort, and a fresh start in a town away from his childhood and adolescent tormentors, he had finally begun to truly realize what he'd been striving for all along. Only, fate apparently has other plans because in the blink of an eye, Erik found himself snatched from Earth and taken to another universe, another world, where he is offered the chance to be more than he'd ever imagined.
Now, he has to fight to restore the Balance between Chaos and Order on a world of swords and magic, in a universe governed by the System's laws, which resemble those of RPGs from Earth. Erik learned to embrace the things about himself that others taught him to hate, using them to reforge his physical identity into something more removed from his old self-loathing. But can he learn to embrace the darkest parts of his mind just as he did the reviled aspects of his body and become who he needs to be to succeed in the task set before him? It might just prove easier to stalk in the dark as a monster than to walk in the light as a man...
*This is my first time publishing anything I've written to a public audience. Due to formatting issues, I forwent traditional stat-screens for something a little less problematic, delineating stat screens by separating them from regular text with horizontal lines in a lighter-grey coloration. Let me know if you like them or not.
 Criticism is entirely welcome, but please don't hate on my work after only reading 1 chapter. This is a writing project I intend to complete but I have committment problems so we'll see how long this goes on. Also, fair warning, as the description implies, the main protagonist is intended to be someone who has been treated cruelly, developed antisocial tendencies, and ultimately has to question his own humanity--or lack thereof.
This story is not intended to be brutally dark but I will definitely be trying to follow a darker theme. It is intended to be violent and some scenes later in the story might be...alarming. There will likely also be some light, non-graphic (think more implied with crude jokes and conversation than actual details, there will be no full-blown sex scenes)relationship scenes planned later and if you're opposed to either a bisexual or gay main character, stay away. I haven't yet decided which way he's going to swing but the odds on him being straight are relatively miniscule, and I've always wanted to write a story about a gay man who basically looks like a lumberjack because who doesn't like giving conventional stereo-types the middle finger? This will NOT be a harem story, and I have no intention to focus on romance over action--it's a consequence of character development where I'm concerned, not the be-all-end-all of the story. 
The cover-art does not, in any way, belong to me. It was an image titled the Druid King (by duskanmarkovic according to the file name) which I found on Google Images. Until I can get something commissioned, this is the best stand-in image I could find.

Title: Play On! My Lovely Goddess!
Synopsis:
Why live as a man when you could live as a woman?
Chen Hua asked himself this question all the time.
But one day, it really happened! Though life as a woman wasn't as easy as it appeared to be.

Title: Orc Spawn (A LitRPG Story)
Synopsis:
In the game of life, nobody asks to be an orc!
There’s just one thing stopping Tucker from getting into the game - and that’s funding. He can’t afford a copy of Wrath of the Ancients with his meager part-time job.
He’s in luck, though, because a mysterious man in black hands him a copy of the game - for free. The catch? This cartridge drops him physically into Acaedia where everything is real. Magic, monsters, you name it.
This would be a dream come true...if Tucker wasn’t spawned as an orc. How is he supposed to make it in a world where orcs are despised? He better figure that out quick, because the game’s difficulty has been switched up to maximum!

Title: I Am A Hero: I Believe I Can Fly
Synopsis:
An utopia endangered. People from various timelines are called upon to save the land called Eden from peril. Their job, to vanquish the mysterious Chimeras and restore the land communication infrastructure. But unrelated threats soon emerged, old enemies rise again to the call. In a world where the victor has rewritten all of history, the 'heroes' must find their own path or perish [Update every three days]
*This is a work in progress and contain mild violence

Title: The City of Dead
Synopsis:
Nishimura Yukine is just another highschool boy with baring with his regular boring life. One day, he boards a late night train. After a while he notices that the train hasnt halt at any station yet! To his suprise the whole train is empty! As he get's up to check for other passengers, the train stops. As he gets out of the train he notices that it isnt Japan!
It dosen't take long for Yukine to realise that his everyday life was off track and that his new home is a bit far from reality.

Title: The Laq Docte: Din
Synopsis:
Din Laq Docte. A son and a zealot of the Laq Docte family. Spirited away, Din endures the harsh new environment. Desperate to find solutions to difficult problems, both psychological and external.

With the support of an innate ability Din levels up along the other people whisked away to this place.
 
 
I have published the entire book on https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07F3W65J3
 
Or you can read the entire book here. It is completed and as of 10.10.2018 the entire book has been uploaded to royalroad

Title: A Beauty and the Beast Tale
Synopsis:
A Beauty and the Beast story, but with reversed gender roles. Jett seeks sanctuary with a Countess who was cursed and transmogrified into a grotesque creature and forced to live as a recluse in an enchanted castle. Can she and Jett learn to love each other and break the curse on the Countess and her household? But why is her Mantis Maid against them finding happiness together and breaking the curse?  And is Ludmilla the huntress determined to have Jett for herself?
Explicitly a Beauty and the Beast story, but the Beast is a lady and Beauty is a guy.  Set in Greyland, a fictitious country, in this world it is a tiny island in the middle of the North Sea.

Title: Prophecy of the Elven King
Synopsis:
My name was Rick Evets at least it was before I died. I spent most of my life studying the human soul. A mistake was made and I reincarnated in a world of magic. The strange thing is they knew I was coming.
 
Story also contains traces of "Romance".

Title: Dragonbourne
Synopsis:
Extremely rough draft. First story publishing.
Life was going indifferently in the mundane world of the people of Creation. Bandits roamed the wilds. Mages, witches, and wizards studied magic, potions and/or dark theory. Drunks drinking in their usual tavern. But what happens when a group of drunken bandits discover a little secret about a big problem? Can one wizard of short stature (and temper) help guide four children to their destiny?

Title: Land of the Gray
Synopsis: A journey of the area between whats right and wrong.

Title: The One Luna
Synopsis: Luna and his best friend Boni only wanted to play an upcoming MMORPG.But what happens when a System  is introduced to Earth. Zombies spawn out of nowhere, beasts start to mutate, new races from a failed world appear out of nowhere.A new world where those who adapt the fastest will be rewarded. FIGHT. STRUGGLE. EVOLVE! Before you can even try to find out why these strange events have happened, you have to be strong enough to even survive in the first place and figure out what rules govern this new world!

Title: Tartarus- A Prison Odyssey
Synopsis:
Tartarus. The world's first and only prison country, created in 2020 to hold all the unnecessary and undesirable elements of the world.
Out of sight, out of mind.
Aaron Hassan is an adventurous lock picker in the year 2075 who wishes to someday stand atop the walls of Tartarus, to do so, he is willing to enter Tartarus, and then try to break out, which has never succeeded...Lucky for him, he's being framed for murder, which is enough of a no-no to get sent to Tartarus... but once inside, he finds that the world of criminals isn't as simple as it first seems.
Inside the only Sanctioned Lawless Zone in the world, Aaron finds that there are little to no rules for the strong... and while he isn't strong, he can do amazing things... especially with locks.
Khul ja Shem-Shamayim.
Be opened, doors to heaven.

Amazon Links:
https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B07HNXX88D
https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B084FDWL63
Smashword Links:
Book 1: https://www.smashwords.com/books/view/1008205
Book 2: https://www.smashwords.com/books/view/1011667

Title: Throne Of Origin
Synopsis:
To save the universe from doom, an Immortal breaks the fabric of reality and sends his memories back in the past, into the head of a young boy named Damien. However, those memories held power: the knowledge of the future. How could the mind of a young boy comprehend it all? The memories seal themselves in the deepest part of the child's conscience.
An unwitting child now possesses the knowledge that no one should ever have, and the only thing stopping him is the question of him understanding it.

This fiction is now available on WebNovels too. Although we plan to be a few chapters ahead on RoyalRoad.
WebNovel: Throne OF Origin

Title: Mending Chaos
Synopsis: Seth had led a mostly normal life. Sure he grew up with a foster family, but he had his best friend by his side since the orphanage. Everything seemed to fall into place for him, from his new job to the house that was just in his price range. But little did he know it was all orchestrated by those seeking to protect him. Now into early adulthood he was about to discover a world that lived secretly within his own. Earth Menders, Chaotics, and Demons, some sought to protect him while others wanted to use - or even kill - Seth. And mixed up in it all, he would finally meet someone he loved.

Title: Isekai Reporter
Synopsis:
Nomad Battalion, a name that strikes fear to bandits and kingdoms across Melno...is just a bunch of kids?!As a junior JSDF commando, RynosukeTanizawa was on a mission scouting the now devasted Shibuya district for insurgent activities until an ambush renders him unconscious. Awaken in a new world and receiving the "heroes never die" blessing from the gods, he starts his journey with the guidance and blessing of the 9 demon clan's head Kuucifer to vanquish Khaos and build the largest alliance known to man. 
PS. I know the cover is shit but the good one got stolen along with my old laptop so... yeah.

Title: Incarnation
Synopsis:
Incarnation, the virtual world that the worlds greatest AI, Meg, slowly developed over the course of 150 years was about to be released. The world looked forwards to its release. The game promised an experience that no one ever had before, it promised a magical new land that humanity will be able to slowly explore.
For many people, Incarnation will hold several meanings. For some it will be a place where they will obtain full control of their bodies again and expierence things they thought they would never be able to again. For others it will be a place where they’ll be able to let loose and act how they normally wouldn’t act in reality, a place where they would be able to let out their inner selfs without much repercussions.
.....What would a new world mean to you?

Title: The Exploiter
Synopsis:
Congratulations Fray!
You're one of the 10,000 lucky contest winners chosen to test the Beta version of Cry Of Iron.You will be the first testers outside of the Creation Team. More info will be given to you when you receive your first capsule.
Attached to this email, you will find a contract. Please read it carefully, honestly answer it, sign it and send it back A-S-A-P. It will be personally reviewed by the creators' main team and, once approved you will receive the gaming capsule within 2-3 working days.
We hope you will enjoy being the first visitors to this new world of ours.
Follow the path or make your own, there are no limits but the ones you set yourself.

Title: Unnamed Wanderer
Synopsis:
I am Dimolia Nila one life guided by my unknown past and the fragment in my soul Voice. Together I travel the world in order to ultimately wrest control of the world's resources for my own birth. 
(Title was changed from Rebirth in a Fantasy world again but finally giving my char a name gave me a good reason to change it.)

Title: Magick Online
Synopsis:
Honestly,this was started on a whim because I couldn't find anything that fit my tastes perfectly, also it's my first ever story, so don't expect much
It wasn't his fault that, at a young age, he was observant enough to see the dark dealings of the race that were humans. It wasn't his fault that he turned out like this because of them. He was a psycho and he knew it, they didn't but they didn't need to after all it was their fault that he ended hating and wanting to kill his own species. But of course he never did get to indulge in this, but the release of the VRMMORPG Magick Online would give him this chance. He would become a legendary villain that haunts the lands.

Title: Beautiful Life
Synopsis: Reyansh is a teenager dealing with issues like depression, loneliness, insecurities and other psychological issues. And because of that, he is not able to cope up with the harsh courses of his studies. He frequently gets bullied by Aryan, the topper of the class. Nobody tries to help him or interfere as Aryan belongs to a rich group of Brahmins. Where will this journey lead Reyansh to?

Title: The Concubine's Tomb: A Dungeon Core novel
Synopsis:
Anomus ip Garma, greatest living architect of the Subori Empire, is tasked by his emperor to construct a tomb for the emperor's concubine upon her death. Anomus and ten thousand workers labor in the desert for years while the emperor's dead love waits, ensorceled and undecaying, for her final resting place to be completed.
But betrayal awaits Anomus and all who slaved to build the Tomb, and a dark god has taken an interest in the evils man does to man...

Title: Azure Lightning
Synopsis: A boy adventures through a mysterious land as he attempts to find out just where he came from. He develops his powers to fight off stronger and stronger enemies along the way as learns of the harshness of the cultivator world.

Title: Royal Sword Cain
Synopsis:
Waking up from his seemingly eternal slumber, the young man finds himself unable to recollect his memories. From his birth to his recent activities, he could not remember those.
It was as if his memory was wiped out from the very beginning.
"Wha..."
This was the first word that came out from the amnesiac man's mouth. He was both in the state of shock and amazement after speaking, being able to speak out the words that he couldn't remember learning in the first place.
"Who... am I?"
The man asked, most notably, himself. Despite the fact that his memory was wiped out, he could still speak foreign words very fluently, as if he was born with it.
However, his own question became his priority rather than his ability to speak unknown words fluently.
Indeed. This was a simple question to everyone but to the man, it was an existential question. It was like a question that decides his fate.
As he questions himself deeper and deeper, he roams the vast world in search of his forgotten memories of the past.
Follow the man as he experiences the beauty of the vast world unknown to him.
 

Spoiler: Spoiler


 If the synopsis is kinda boring and long to you, I'm truly very sorry about that! m(_ _)m. I couldn't think of any synopsis so I just wrote what my minds tells me to write. So once again, I'm sorry about that neh?
Also, I might change the novel's synopsis once an arc is finished. If that doesn't sound too good, I'll just stay on this synopsis without changing it.

Title: Legendary
Synopsis:
An immortal rose once more
Behold his journey
___________________________
This novel is available in amazon.

Title: Margaret's Magic
Synopsis:
Everyone has a Role to Play
With a guard on their tail and time closing in on them, Hailey and her companions are trapped deep inside the stony walls of the Giant’s domain. As their plans begin to unravel, they must rely on one another to reach their sweet reward. Can they make it safety before they are discovered?

Title: Empress of Blue Flower Mountain
Synopsis:
Once upon a time, there lived two great and mighty spirits on the mountain. One loved humans, the other hated them. When their differences could not be reconciled, they came to blows, and the human loving spirit was chased out.
The banished spirit wandered the world. Rather than an exile, the spirit viewed her situation as an extended vacation. She saw all the sights and people she'd only ever heard about on the mountain.
But it was a little lonely. No one could see her or hear her. She was a rootless spirit with no place to call home.
And then, one day, she found a friend.
When anger and jealousy take everything, only love can create something new. This is the story of perseverance, sacrifice, and forgiveness.
Discord for FREE STUFF: https://discord.gg/Q2tQhQH
---Book 1: Empress of Blue Flower Mountain - Complete
Book 2:Emperor of Blue Flower Mountain - In Progress
Book 3:Princes of Blue Flower Mountain - N/ACover drawn by me, the Author!

Title: A Hopeless Romanticist's Reality.
Synopsis: The reality of love and relationships are not as pretty as the motion pictures make it out to be. No matter how much we believe and dream, we feel the happiness and joy until we are struck by reality and life goes back to normal.

Title: The Warden's Gardener
Synopsis: Stew picked the wrong grape during his tradition of becoming a man. So what? It's not as though there wasn't a beautiful young woman distracting him at the time, setting in motion a chain of events that created a plague so virulent and widespread that it wiped out a large portion of his home countries population. And it couldn't have been this that earned him the eye of the literal Guardian of the Dead, who recruits Stew to be his gardener. Not that Stew knows much about gardening anyway. And is it really Patricide, Matricide, Fratricide, Amicicide, and Genocide if it was all by accident? Right? There's no proof. It's not like you'll be able to get at Stew alive anyway.

Title: Lost in Love
Synopsis:
My name is Alexander Halesworth, sole heir to a prestigious ducal house. Or rather, that’s what my identity is supposed to be now. I still haven’t gotten used to this whole situation yet.
Not long ago I was just a humble store clerk. But shortly after getting into an unfortunate road accident, I woke up in the setting of an infamous Otome Game called “Lost in Love: A Heart Throbbing Romance in a Fantasy World~!”
Yeah. It’s even trashier than it sounds. Don’t judge me, it was a gift from a friend.
*cough* Anyway, this situation wouldn’t be too bad, except I ended up in the body of the worst possible person: the villainess’ older brother. Alexander has great looks, near limitless wealth, and a thoroughly rotten personality. In most of the game’s endings I end up dead or exiled. My family also falls to ruin, and don’t even get me started on what happens to my evil little sister.
Well, whatever. If that’s the hand fate dealt me, then I just have to prevent the bad ends, right? And if I have no choice but to deal with this family’s baggage, I may as well enjoy myself while I’m at it. Being filthy rich and powerful has its benefits.
For example, this cute maid who I get to tease whenever I want.
 
(Male lead otome reincarnation, inspired by Akuyaku Reijo Ni Koi Wo Shite and similar works)

Title: Heavy Metal: A Cyberpunk Novelette
Synopsis:
A soldier meets his favorite rockstar, partakes in mind uploading, and faces the reality of the war he's fighting.
Ian finally has a night off, just in time to see his favorite band and the rockstar he worships. But then the doors are blown in, and a special ops team storms the place with guns blazing. When the smoke clears, his hero is dead.
When the captain tells him to keep quiet, Ian can't help but talk to his hero one last time. What the rockstar says turns his reality upside down, that he might be the one inflicting terror on his people. Now Ian has to figure out what his captain is hiding, before he's forced to destroy the mind of his hero.
If you love cyberpunk that makes you think, then you'll enjoy Ian's war within himself, and his plight against the military system pushing him to murder.

Title: The Story of Life and Death
Synopsis:
Elias was an ill-fortuned soul, cursed with a heart condition that brings death behind him in his waking life until it caught up. But, with a stroke of luck and divine intervention, the boy relived his life once again, better than before as one of the apex species. However, a boon was not without its bane, for the dangers that followed could cut his life short even swifter than before. But fortunately for him, another came to take him in.
Although, his aid came in an unexpected form. A man much like him, but so different in every way. One who was forced to live with the curse of undeath for eons yet lived a life fuller than anyone else. Elias' journey had begun.

Title: The Path Toward Heaven
Synopsis:
What do you see, gazing down from the starry heavens?
Grand palaces? Mystical mountains? Shining skies? Legendary heroes? Heroic legends? 
Who could ever say? Those who have seen do not tell, while those who tell have never seen. 
Spring has finally come to the Myriad Worlds, bringing with it the ringing clap of thunder, the trickling rush of rain, shattering and washing away the stagnant, icy silence of winter. 
This is a season of blooming wildflowers, an era of strife and conflict, an age of young heroes and new legends. 
A teenage girl, garbed in snowy white, steps from an empty mountain temple to set foot upon the lonely path toward heaven, her eyes full of questions, wonders, and dreams. 
A young man, a blood-stained sword grasped firmly in his hand, takes his first steps onto the bloody path toward heaven, his eyes cruel and bleak. 
A middle-aged official, scroll in one hand, pen in the other, steps off his post, giving up the secular and the worldly to travel upon the dusty path toward heaven. 
A young girl, scarred by war, stands alone in the snow outside a temple door; the girl is still and yet, she too has stepped upon the broken path toward heaven. 
An old man, gazing up into the stars, pondering all that he saw upon the bitter path toward heaven- and the things he saw at the end. 
They, and many more, countless even, walk upon The Path Toward Heaven.

Title: Kingun
Synopsis:
"Kingun"The title only the one who stands above all and is recognized by the masses has.It means "Supreme King".Since the ancient times when the world was first united under the might of the first Kingun, the masses pursued the dream of becoming the next one.Facing a world where power is the rule, watch as a certain youth rises to legend and fights his way to become Kingun.
-------------------------------
Chapters will be released every day around 14:00

Title: Blue Star Cultivator
Synopsis: An orphan from a big clan was maligned to live destitute in the outskirts of a mountain, but discovered a miracle that would change his life forever more. This a xanxia story about the journey of our gravity controlling mc from a weak individual to a powerhouse in the Aldora continent

Title: Prepare For Death
Synopsis: Michael McManus grew up a long time ago. He always felt like something was off, but he couldn't tell if it was him or the world around him. He was troubled by these feelings until the day he died, but it turns out that death was just the beginning.

Title: Shard Drifter
Synopsis:
Earth was never the same anymore.
Tears of portal connecting to other worlds began to appear in unhibited places, aliens and otherworldly beings invaded the earth.
Humanity was doomed to extinction, or was it?
This story follows Claude as the main lead of the story.
Better synopsis will be written after i dished out more chapters about the universe.

Title: BLACK BABLE
Synopsis:
The story begins as "Black Bable " was the first  VRDMMORPG that was released in 2024, the protagonist ,a 22 year boy named klaus entered the game again after a year of break ,he used to be one of the top player in Bable and was nicknamed as the "Absolute"due to his Dominance over the server, but when he logged in he ended up into unknown world , not knowing what to do, he decides to make a name for himself in this new world ,also needs to find out about this new place ,whether this place is "Bable" itself or somewhere else. but during this adventure Conquiring becomes his top most priority....
follow the journey of "klaus Nightstar" to know what's awaiting for him in the future....

Title: The Moment that dissolves in fate
Synopsis: Liam is from Onapi Island and sets out on a Journey to the worlds capital, Cretazeus! Here he is going to be schooled in a high class academy on the worlds beast, magic and wonders that surpasses human understanding. But before getting to Cretazeus he have to travel with the luxury cruiser Poseidon where unknowingly to Liam, his fate is about to get desited before it even begins.

Title: Red Sands
Synopsis:
Even the mightiest of kingdoms give way to the sands of time.
But what of the legends?
- . -
Watch as one spirit defies the wishes of the gods.
 
 
Writing this while I'm bored.

Title: Alien Abduction: A LitRPG
Synopsis: A college freshman is kidnapped by aliens and forced to become a gladiator. There's just one problem: it's hard to imagine anyone more unsuited to the task...

Title: Swan Dive Riot
Synopsis:
One of the best hitman on earth, earned the nickname "The Walking Disaster", bad luck has clung to him since childhood, but his skill were top class and was considered a living weapon by the government.
While tasked to eliminate a prominent individual he was betrayed by his partner in turn leading to his death.
His soul inevitably sucked into another world reincarnating him into a baby still intact with his previous memories, skills, and knowledge of his past life all the trauma and training.
All the more this world is a world of sword, magic, and.. Monstrous beasts? It doesn't help that the power that is bestowed on him is next to nothing? it seems his bad luck has carried over to this world as well.
How will a highly trained assassin that only knows how to kill maneuver through this world?
How will he find out the purpose for this reincarnation?

Title: Demonbane - The Second Coming
Synopsis: The Great Demon Wars changed the world. Demons lead by the Evil God Balthomel ravaged the land and took countless lives. All seemed lost until the hero Gabriel Alrduid performed a sacred pact with the Supreme Goddess Ariah. Forming the Great Six with his trusted allies who also performed the sacred pact with five other gods, Gabriel and Ariah successfully contained Balthomel with a sealing spell, but at the cost of whatever life force remained in them. Fast forward onto the present, a new generation of warriors called Demonslayers maintain the peace in the land. Rumor has it that a cult aiming for the release of Balthomel is on the move. Simon Helmbarte, unconscious after a horde of demons attacked their village, awoke to a mysterious young girl named Shera letting him rest on her lap. Shera happens to be a spirit with no memories except her name wandering the forest. Simon and Shera enter a spiritual pact after he promises to help her regain her memories. In return, Shera grants Simon the power needed to slay demons and avenge the death of his village.

Title: the battle bard
Synopsis: reincarnated with a guitar and a plan

Title: Dragon Slayer
Synopsis:
In a world of magic and monsters, dragons stand at the peak of all. But 500 years ago... a dragon was killed. A dragon, an absolute monster that could be killed by no army, no legion... was slain by a single individual.
Now, 500 years later, another dragon is out causing trouble. Sam is retired and doubtful of his ability to take down another dragon, but he just can't turn down a good deal...

Title: Oblivion
Synopsis: IDK how to delete this, woops

Title: I like my Comprehension
Synopsis: Just some dude worrying about life getting a cheat skill.

Title: Re: Rabbit Eyes
Synopsis:
[Read on Scribblehub]https://www.scribblehub.com/series/55083/re-rabbit-eyes-a-yandere-harem/
White finally leaves his irreparable past behind when transported to another world. Using this second chance he decides to live his second life quietly, but things never go according to plan.Inevitably tangled into the company of deranged women around him, White has to learn to navigate around their obsessions cleverly, with his life as the only collateral.And if all else fails? —Perhaps he should just embrace the madness instead.

Title: DARK SMITH
Synopsis:
One of the greatest empires of the land has began using collars to bind the will of men.
Slaves they make of enemies of state; even children don't escape their parents fate. 
Hope dawns in Death's pawn, and a captured heir. 
As the Dark Smith forges weapons of power, a Duke musters an army for war.

Title: Generica
Synopsis:
Reality is a constant.
You have to assume that, otherwise, what's the point?

Title: Urban Fantasy Conflict Work
Synopsis:
This is a casual anthology of stories set in a shared urban fantasy world. Though characters will reappear and be used in more than one chapter there are no main characters in this story. 
In a world that shares a few similarities with our own there are various species that share the planet. Many of those species are similar to creatures from our mythologies. This is a collection of stories from the various conflict workers and peacemakers who live in that world many of whom are human but not all of whom are. More than anything else this anthology is an introduction to the field of Peace and Conflict Studies. In it you'll meet conflict workers from different countries who deal with identity conflicts, who handle hate speech, who work in communities where internal conflicts threaten lives and more. You'll also learn various models and theories scholars in a multitude of fields have about conflicts and peace. My hope as an author is that this anthology entertains you and educates you as well.

Title: Tale of the goddess
Synopsis: A young girl runs away from home to avoid capture by a deadly group led by someone close to her and finds herself on a bigger adventure than she excepted after meeting him.

Title: Part Orc Dungeon Mob Adventurer Guy: A Generic Fantasy LitRPG
Synopsis:
A young man dies a tragic death, and by chance is given another shot at life.
This is intended to be a light read, and as I've never written a story before will probably not be the best thing you've ever read.
Story contains to some degree: profanity, gore, sexual content, potentially traumatising content.

Title: THE NEW GATE
Synopsis:
"How many times should a missile hit the strong and mighty dragon, until it dies? Will a magic barrier protect someone from a nuclear attack? Can a world filled with ancient magic defeat a world of modern technology or can a world of modern technology defeat a world filled with ancient magic?"
"Fantasy vs. Reality..."
A brand new take to the fantasy genre, in which a portal that connects both worlds and reality. When one is filled with Ancient magic and wonder and the other is filled with technological advancements and weaponry. How will they react in this situation?  Will the other world adapt to their technology?  Can the other world learn their magic? How are they going to resolve their differences? Will they resolve it with peace or with war, when both have conflicts in itself?With this interesting take in the fantasy genre, filled with unsuspecting twist and political agendas. This is truly an epic political opera to read.

Title: The Last 100
Synopsis: The bustling crush of humanity had become common place now, the cacophony of voices and the symphony of a city had become the song and dance of our species. But it was not always such, and return back to our more humble roots we did.The system had come, and it had stripped us bare. Sure it had given us a means to power, but at what cost. We were the last 100 left. Night was falling on the human race, it was a dark night, and it was cold.But go quietly we would not. We would make the world burn with an inferno of our defiance. Rage, rage against that goodnight, and I Jack Casser, have rage a plenty. This is my story, the story of the last 100.Author Note: This story is a LitRPG apocalypse, woah fucking original idea I know but hear me out. If you can look past preconceived ideas driven by a stigma of overdone tropes and done to death plots of achieving world domination and self-righteous characters and give the story a chance I hope it can surprise you.

Title: War of Armies
Synopsis:
By the year 2024 came the release of the game known as "War of Armies", a wondrous game that propelled the "FrekGem" company to peaks of glory. After years of gameplay by players around the world, the game was stopped but only for it to be moved to another stage. The game was moved from a console game to a full immersion VRMMO game.
 
Though it may seem like it was only a small transition of devices, it was not. With the release of the full immersion, the game would not allow for a much more variable gameplay where players are able to do things that they were unable to do previously. The game now, though still having some few systematic mechanics, is now more of an open world where players are able to do things that are only limited by the creativity and imagination.
 
In this story, we aren't following the strongest player or the smartest player but instead the weirdest yet logical, nicest yet meanest, normal yet pro player out their, the hypocrite PeaceOfSheet (but people usually call him “The Freak” or Freak for short)

Title: Re: Sanguine War Era
Synopsis:
This novel is a renewed version of the old one. This version is more detailed but with the same plot in mind.
Here's an edited synopsis from the old novel.

Selfish desires were born from the founding of a certain near-mythical power by the Empire of Alantieus. Desires that never should have existed until now. Suddenly spread its tendrils across the whole continent of Pacifia. The Emperors of Noct and Persidius were naught but puppets of greed. Led by their desires, they invaded the Empire of Alantieus with one goal in mind. To obtain the power for themselves.  
Meanwhile, in the informative Nation of Peacius, was a young man by the name of Teiga Ura. His life will soon be turned upside down when his nation gets caught up in a continental mess.

Title: I Want a Girlfriend
Synopsis: Follow the wacky and comical adventures of Kota and Kyou as they live out their College days attempting to score and enjoy the remainder of their youth. Brimming with references and what can only be classed as the ocassional dark humour, our two heroes bromance hard in this epic tale of striking out with the opposite sex, failing at life and generally being losers.

Title: BLACK GOSPEL ブラックゴスペル
Synopsis: Luciel is a half-angel half-demon detective with a tragic past -- will he drown in his inner demons? Or will he unleash his inner angels? (Psychological // Gothic Horror // Dark Fantasy)

Title: Reincarnation in Animes
Synopsis: What would happen to someone who did a very high Karma that no one could evaluate, adopting some goddesses, giving them strength, and finally they could go back to their house again, but the goddesses were sad to leave him with nothing.He never asked for anything, he just smiled and treated them like his own daughters, when they returned to heaven, he continued to help them in their duties until the end of their mortal life.But it was only the end of his mortal life and the beginning of his journey to be a god begins now.

Title: Is it Really Ok for a Dungeon Master to Manage a Dungeon?
Synopsis:
Leo Flores just wanted to play D&D with his friends. He didn't expect anything life changing to happen during their odd little campaign, but next thing he knows he's been summoned by those same friends as the Demon King who will lead their dungeon to greatness.
This takes being a Dungeon Master to a whole new level doesn't it?

A fun romp of a story that takes a few jabs at the common tropes found in isekai LN while also mainting a genuine plot. Some moments and characters are based off my own campaigns I've run before. Trying to upload once a week, but may take up to two weeks to upload.

Title: The chronicles of Miles Stormwind: The Beginning
Synopsis:
A man of many faces is bored with his life. To him life in the 21st century is dull. "A slave to money and those who have it." A big outdoorsman who would spend weeks and months in the wilderness is about to donate all his money to charity and go live off the grid when a blue pop up screen offers him a new adventure. 
 
English is my first language but I am still not that good at it so please bear with me. If you see a mistake in spelling or grammar let me know and I shall fix it. This is my first story so it will be a little rough around the edges so please be nice. I always have ideas for novels pop into my head and when I sit down to write I just get flooded with ideas and it turns into a cluster duck.

Title: The Gregorian Saga
Synopsis: A band of adventurers unleash an ancient evil, and are swept up in a quest to undo their mistake. With a great war looming in the distance, it is up to these heroes to explore a fanastic world where magic and culture are one, while discovering the mysteries of their kingdom, and making new allies along the way.

Title: Authority: The Prequel
Synopsis:
*Humans do not own anything but is only instead given the talent to manage it.*
 
Thus, authority was born.

Title: Run Wild!
Synopsis:
"This isn't anything like what you said, what you promised. You lied to me didn't you? You're not a god are you? I should have known, this other world fantasy stuff was tailored just to get a reaction from me? Just to make me suffer? Why? What's the point? Do you have nothing better to do?"
 
"I wanted to twist the knife in the scars of your heart. I wanted to see you feed like the parasite you are. I want you to fight and fight until you run wild! The game is fair. You'll get your desire as we signed the contract. Sink your hands in blood in that world so you can come out clean in yours.
Grovel towards others with that power of yours and grow, squirm from love to love until you get your wish. use that power again and again and again until you have no more remorse.
So please play the game now, you've got twelve labours to go. Stop complaining and get to it! I'm looking forward to our next meeting, I'll be watching you verrrryyyy carefully."
Satou Haruto simply said that he'd like a chance to change his life, to alter fate in his favour, to get rid of that feeling of unsatisfication and so he was offered a way to do just that as long as he would go to another world.
The game was rigged. Given a power that relies on and uses others after having resolved to not repeat his past mistakes... forcing him into a corner until he sinks his soul into a pool of shadow and blood. That's what it wants of him at least...

Title: The Demon Lord Candidate
Synopsis:
Samael was a half human-half demon which is a result of a human experiment. He somehow did not lose his sanity unlike other test subjects, and the Devil jewel shard infused miraculously. He escaped with the help of the jewel’s power and was on the run. The kingdom has issued a huge bounty over the last remaining test subject, to be retrieved dead or alive.
Things looked grim for Samael while fleeing from the military, bounty hunters and also struggling to not lose his sanity as the shard started to take control of his body and converting him to a demon.
The jewel’s acceptance itself meant he was deemed worthy to be a candidate to the Demon Lord’s position, the sole human to be a demon lord candidate among the other chosen 100 pure blooded demons. This is the journey of Samael's survival and his quest for revenge.

Title: Memorybound
Synopsis:
Two kingdoms and two women, inexorably linked through distant memory. One cannot remember who she was, and the other cannot see the truth of her present. One struggles to remember her history, while the other’s past trauma follows her everywhere she turns.
Protecting their borders, and the heirs of the kingdom is the only thing that matters, but threats from outside and threats from within may soon crumble all that they have worked for.
As the two do what they can to protect their kingdoms, it becomes increasingly clear that they are locked in the same struggle, two sides to the same coin, and coming together may be the only possible way to solve both of their problems.

Title: Conquerors
Synopsis: The humans were no longer the tiny ants oppressed by the variety of species in the world. They were no longer the slaves nor the food they used to be. They were no longer the weaklings, cowardly people they were. With their more advanced technologies they reign over species. What can a werewolf do against a silver bullet? What can a giant do against missiles and rockets? The humans were no longer called humans...they are now called Conquerors.

Title: Balance
Synopsis: Hundred years of war ended as the Mage King's head fell on the floor. The sword continent took over the magic continent.The use of magic got banned and the whole continent under was under strict surveillance.The only hope left for the mages, sorcerers, witches, spellcasters, runemasters... are the King's offspring: The king's son and his bastard boy.

Title: The Successful Failure
Synopsis: This story is about a high school student named Jason, who was a model student at his school. He never knew the word failure and only successes in everything he did so much so that he appeared on the news multiple times. However, this all changed when he met her... Mia an upcoming young author and an aspiring manga artist.

Title: Dungeon of Immortals
Synopsis:
A tale of a dungeon just trying to make his way in the world with the tools he has on hand. Why are so many people angry at him? Is it the undead?
Welcome to the tale of a dungeon with a simple direct purpose. Stop intruders any way he can using whatever he has on hand, including the souls of the dead, the bodies of the slain, and the knowledge his minions gain from defeat. He will create a dungeon where no enemy ever stays dead - a dungeon of immortals.
Updates will be 1000-2000 words 1-3 times per week. If you complain of short chapters, well, 1000 words is short. Hopefully, without the pressure to write lots, I will write more often. This is the plan, anyway.
I am an amateur writer. I would say my biggest weaknesses are maintaining a scene, dialogue, and lazy editing. Tips and tricks in that direction are welcome.

Title: Enlightened Empire
Synopsis:
A prince sent into exile, without the means to fight back.
A young man trapped in an unfair world, without the status to bring about change.
Combined, they will have both means and status.
Armed with advanced knowledge from a strange world, will Prince Corco be able to cut through the injustice, regain his birthright and turn the country of his ancestors into a paradise of true peace, equality and prosperity?
"Okay, first step: Let's make some Brandy."
...that's a maybe then.
 
Author's note: I love the idea of kingdom-building novels and think the genre has a lot to offer, but I don't think many authors do them very well. Here is my attempt. The novel has a strong focus on politics and kingdom building, with occasional action and a bit of humor. Have fun.
 
Cover was made by MrZombie
 
Updates three times a week.
 
My discord server, come hang out: https://discord.gg/2N7qzcy

Title: Traum
Synopsis:
Traum. A world where the game is everything. In a world where people live as game characters, meet Aron, a summoned adventurer. Follow his life as he tries to adapt to this illogical world. 
 
 
P.S.
And I am back to write. There are a lot of major changes and Aron's character class was changed. Thank you for reading it again. :)

Title: Kalethia
Synopsis:
Join a spell casting android assassin in his adventures across Kalethia!
Not sure what else to put as I'm making it up as I go along, but hopefully you'll like reading it as much as I like writing it!
cover picture found here: http://widelec.org/p/3827/grafiki-by-dave-rapoza/2/

Title: When LitRPG Destroys Earth
Synopsis: The floating screen and stats suddenly appeared and distributed throughout the entire earth. But at what cost? People dying, no internet, the writer of my favourite comic is dead, every day is either kill or be killed. Well... at the very least laws and orders aren't a thing anymore.

Title: True Death
Synopsis:
Once an ordinary person with a normal life; friends, family, weaknesses and strengths. 
Ever since that fateful day, everything was overturned. Identity lost, feelings crushed and their very existence threatened.
Aah, again? I stared into the crowd of family and friends who were glaring at me with contempt and hatred. A prompt beep indicated that I should act at once. A cackle emerges from my trembling lips as I straightened my back and raised my hand to my mouth.  
 
--------
Hello hello. This is my first ever 'writing'. Honestly, I am a fickle and LAZY person so I'm not sure if this will ever be completed. But I will try my best since I doubt this will be a long series. So let's hope I persist till its done. I'm not a writer so this will have infrequent updates. This is based on my love-hate relationship with tragic stories and something I've dreamt about before. How about a story of a broken being who desperately wishes for escape? Enjoy I guess.

Title: Life after
Synopsis:
Change can either be good or bad... or very, very bad, or very good I suppose unlikely though. Yet this change is not like other regular everyday changes, this change is for everyone, family's, community's, country's the world, yet this change may be seen as very, very bad, but for some, the select few, it is very, VERY good.

Hello!!
This is my first story, I'm not very good at punctuation so please  comment on any mistakes, or comment a suggestion to add to the story this is an impulse write and I don't really have any idea what this story is.

Title: Guardians : Awakening of Athene
Synopsis: Three thousand years ago, Athena was sealed. For love, for peace, for war, and for the human realm. Betrayed by the gods, humans, and demons. She promises to bring terror when she awakens. Three thousand years now. She rests her soul within a mana-less young woman, Alice.

Title: The Weather Vane
Synopsis:
This is the first few chapter of my new book available on Amazon.  The beginning is very light and fun, but more mature content comes later.
From medieval fantasy to ultra high-tech to dinosaurs, The Weather Vane is a grippingly fast-paced adventure full of fun and excitement, literary flourish, and colorful characters. A group of ascendant masters find themselves in the afterlife and learn that they are newly recruited into the cosmic battle of good versus evil. Before they can join the fight, shipwreck strikes and they are lost in the ether. Stranded in a magical land beyond the reaches of the universe, The Weather Vane follows our crew of heroes as they try to piece things back together even while The Dark Lord’s forces march, maraud, and murder at every turn. Themes of darkness chase the overall levity of The Weather Vane which suffers not a lull as the climax begins near the beginning of the book and drives on through the greatly satisfying finish. The most epic of epics.

Title: The Tail of a Dragon
Synopsis:
Ever wondered what happens when a dragon is born into a fantasy world? Yeah, me too. Time to find out how this goes, because everybody loves the tail of a dragon--pun intended. So don't blast me on the title. If you like game elements and level-ups, you'll enjoy this novel. If you enjoy evolution-esque LitRPG's this novel might be your cup of tea.
Our young...protagonist, has a bright future ahead of him! Although, he might need to increase his intelligence and figure out what that red box is in front of him. The traveling knights find a batch of young hatchlings, and its up to the youngest dragon of the batch to save his brothers and sisters from those evil humans!He'll even go out of his way to save the blue dragon that he detested for learning how to walk before him! Red beats blue anyways, am I right?

Title: The Witch and The Warlock
Synopsis:
Every person has their wishes. Fame, glory, wealth, power, love, happiness, etcetera, etcetera. The list goes on and on and on. In a lifetime, how many wishes will be made? How many will be fulfilled? How many will be forgotten?
Once upon a time, I was asked, 'What is your deepest wish?' I thought about it for a long time before I answered.
'I wish to live forever,' I said, trying to be clever. 'Then I can have an infinite amount of wishes.' A laugh was my only response.
This is a tale of three thousand, six hundred, and fifty wishes, none fulfilled, yet none forgotten.
 
As for humans who can't make a single wish?
Well, then they're no longer people, right?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Though you can read however you want, I find it more enjoyable when I use the dark theme and 60/70% width.

Title: GAME[SAVE/LOAD]
Synopsis: In a world where kids are being born with supernatural abilities called power-ups, our main character Gilbert is born without one. That, plus the fact that he is a jock who's only good at fighting games made him a prime target for bullying throughout his school life. But now, during his junior year of highschool, he discovers his true powers. Still, it's isn't all fun and games because his newfound powers lead him on a world-saving mission that has him wishing he never had any!

Title: Worldguard
Synopsis:
A story about the classic tale of the Hero and the Demon King. Revolves around a secret organisation dedicated to training future generations of Hero to combat the ever-reviving Demon King, due to the fact that every Hero who has slain the Demon King, dies mysteriously from unknown causes.
 
 
PS: This is a one-shot, couldn't figure out how to put completed.

Title: Riverdale Village
Synopsis:
You are a mage leading a team of B-Ranked adventurers. Every B-Ranked Adventurer Party is given a test to determine whether or not they're worthy of being graded A-Rank. The Guild Master issues you the test. In Riverdale Village, there is a great fiend attempting to resurrect a powerful demon... You must investigate the town, find the villain and his conspirators and thwart their plot!
How will you do so? Will you work with the town, who may or may not be conspirators, or go at it with your team alone?
Use your judgement and logic to determine the best path to proceed and deliver justice upon the villains!
(This is a choose-your-own adventurer theme fiction. I've browsed the site fairly well... But have yet to encounter this genre. If you do know of one here, do tell me. That aside, this novel is still incomplete... This is just to show that I'm not dead yet, nor have I given up.)

Title: The Demon Within(German)
Synopsis:
Because my lack of english skills this Story will first be in German. Maybe there will be a English Version at a later Date.
-------
Der Held ist dazu bestimmt den Dämonenkönig zu besiegen und damit Frieden über den Kontinent zu bringen. Genau zur gleichen Zeit erwacht eine Succubus mitten im Wald ohne jegliche Erinnerungen und beginnt ihre Reise durch den Kontinent, natürlich benutzt sie dabei alle ihre Fähigkeiten um jegliche Kreaturen in den Abgrund zu bringen.

Title: It will end badly
Synopsis:
John had a good life. 
He wasn't rich nor did he achieve anything remarkable.  he had a loving wife, a warm and big family. With a comfortable house and even a cat. Time past and John reached the age of 82. He was content with his life.
Yet all things come to an end, but don't fret sometimes an end is just another beggining.
Some are better While others are worse. Unfortunately, this specific beginning is of the later.
Author note:
Hello everyone I'll start by saying I wanted to make a different take on how a reincarnation could go. Hope you will enjoy this fiction.
 Help pertaining writing style/grammar will be very much appreciated. 
 Sometimes a title can be misleading.

Title: Rebirth of The Demon King
Synopsis:
The Demon King Kalai ruled the world of Taima for 7000 years before dying of old age.
After closing his eyes for the last time he had a chat with the Goddess of Souls.
For his many Achievements in Taima, he was given 2 options.
The first was to become a god of his own planet and rule it how he wants.
The second was to be reborn into a random world as a newborn but he will get to keep 5 of his many million abilities or traits.
He chose The second option as he was already basically a god in Taima and wanted to do things differently.
"You will be reborn in a world of Superheroes and Villains as a gift from me I will transfer all common knowledge about this world to your brain and give you a basic understanding of the language used there"
"Thank you, Kitten," Kalai says as he steps closer to her and strokes her cheek with his fingertips "I hope we can get to see each other again soon.
Holding back the tears she raises her head with an angelic smile "I hope for that too" She kisses him as his body disappears to be reborn anew.

Title: Karma
Synopsis:
Responsibility was not the weight which dragged Evan down, his own existance carried with it the pain of loss and hurt. 
 
Despite going to the ends of the earth no answers were found.
 
As the weight became too much Evan decided to look in one last place: Death.

Title: Distant Leaps to Circinus [Obsolete]
Synopsis:
Click here to visit the new Distant Leaps to Circinus fiction Rewrite
 
A dark fantasy story that takes place on a reborn Earth.
 
 A century has gone by since humanity nearly wiped all life from the earth. Their lust for power and progress tempted them to tamper with an unknown entity, and in turn brought forth an enigma of change. The weather, animals, physics and even humans had all taken new forms. What does "The compass Planet" Circinus, offer to the children who are born upon its lands? What is the true nature of the "Second Sun"?

Title: A Boy’s Reincarnated Adventure
Synopsis: Ah... it’s so cold. I’m sorry, mother. Your son couldn’t even do one favor you’ve asked of him. He was very selfish. Even though it’s too late now..... please God. Give me another chance. To die like this would be.... If only... If only.... If only I were given a second chance. I’d change, become a better human, live some more, and finally die happy, leaving this world happy. Even though I know I don’t deserve it. Ah... I can’t feel my arms or legs anymore. Is this it? Feeling the cold lips of death touch his lips, Calph felt his consciousness drift away slowly into the empty abyss. Closing his eyes and accepting his passing, Calph was ready to die when he felt a bright light shine on his body. Opening his eyes slowly, he felt there was a change in scenery.Where am I?

Title: System Programmer
Synopsis:
After dying, our main character found himself summoned by a young woman. She comes from a long line of summoners and had expected to partner up with a powerful being, like the rest of her family. Instead, she summoned a computer programmer, who from now on will be living inside her head. Powerless, he's unable to help her with the upcoming war. Disappointed that neither of them had been blessed by fate with some divine abilities, he decides to build a computer system inside her head himself.

Title: Dial (Ben 10/MCU SI)
Synopsis: A man from our world is dropped into the Marvel Cinematic Universe with nothing but a watch on his wrist to make a life with. Luckily, it's one hell of a cool watch. Now if only he'd gotten the manual...

Title: Feral: The Story of a Half Orc
Synopsis: Char has lived in Jarvin his entire life, subjected to hatred and suspicion for his Half-Orc heritage. He avoids the crowd, only wanting to focus on his blacksmithing and runes. Right up until the girl who is prophesized to save the world decides to become his friend, pulling him into assassination plots, conspiracies, and caves full of giant spiders. Yay?

Title: The Confused Explorer
Synopsis:
Have you ever dreamed? Dreamed of battling giant monsters with unparalleled power, gaining vast riches and living a life filled with greatness? That's what Mike also did, even being 40 years old didn't stop him from doing that, all Mike had ever wanted was to shed this mundane life and live how he had wished since his teens. However, when he opens his eyes to look at a landscape far away from home and eyes locked with a flying monstrosity he had taken back all those dreams. Hello I am a first time author writing this because I was sick of reading books that I never enjoyed and it has always been my wish to do something like this, to act upon my imagination and create something I enjoy. I may not be good at this and there could be a lot of grammar problems, but please bare with me as I stride along the path of an author! 
 
Please be warned about my novel. The first chapters are the crystallization of my first ever attempts at writing, I believe the story flow gets better as the chapters progress.

Title: Spirit Caster: The Lost Dragon
Synopsis: Soulless, the term used to describe someone empty inside, takes up another meaning, that is a person with no Spirit Powers. A person who is shunned and pushed to the edge of society for no other reason than a difference they had no choice in. Maddox and Kuro, siblings, had moved through life as soulless individuals, pushed to the edge of reason, but when one tragic encounter sets off a series of events beyond anyone's imagination, could these soulless people really change the world?

Title: What Chaos Can do
Synopsis:
The Earth, a living breathing organism, hates Jeanie with a fierce passion
But Harold, and Marsha had a plan... yesterday...

Title: HABITAT
Synopsis:
400 years ago, everything ended.
Anything we had left, we burned to keep ourselves warm.
We sacrificed some to save all of us. We turned ourselves into monsters to keep us safe.
Even our children.
Now it's time to start over.

Title: Forever Online - Wanderer
Synopsis:
Wanderer
The journey of one young man to greatness. Will he succeed? Will he die almost instantly? Probably the former because of the special trait is known as 'Plot Armor'  achievable only with the level 1000 legendary title 'MC'.
“This world may be infinite but I will not stop until I see every inch”

Title: The Immortal Beast
Synopsis:
A Norse Viking in his late teens unbeknownst to him, stumbled upon the fabled foutain of youth, drinking it's waters dry over the course of a week because of the cold weather up in the moutains. Finally leaving it was a three weeks later on a raid that the change came upon him. 
He will eventually gain one wish and be taken to a more suitable world.

Title: Titan Trample
Synopsis:
A man is sent back to the past by unknown powers. Blessed with the powers of immortality, he comes back to the present the only way he knows how. By waiting.
"I'm not proud of the things I did, however, every time I think about it, I simply cannot bring myself to care. You're all ants to me after all."

Title: Death Becomes Him: An Age of Steam and Sorcery Novel
Synopsis:
What does a highschool boy do when his life spirals out of control?
Play video games, of course!
What happens when the game starts to play you back though? How does one young man deal with bullies both real and digital? How does he cope when he's certain his parent's impending divorce is entirely his fault?

Title: Fragment of Space
Synopsis: Our young mc is pulled into a new world after fiddling with and anceint gem, Everything is lost to him, except him mind and a new ability . trapped int the bottom of a dungeon he must make his way out find what this world has to ffer him and get revenge most foul.

Title: (OLD)
Synopsis: Arcanist v2. What are you doing here? Go here instead.

Title: Dead or Alive
Synopsis:
"The Japanese Revolutionary War",  began after an altercation where seven Japanese were fired upon by United States soldiers. Japan citizens, which already had tension with the US, had began to create its own militia forces to maintain its own safety. To make matters worst, "Sense", A brain augmentation had severely widened the gap between the social classes and the term Valid and invalids quickly caught on to differentiate those with and without.
Alton, an "Invalid" American bastard, lives with his Japanese mother in Yokosuka, Japan. Casted as an outsider and mix breed, Alton endured discrimination growing up. Yui, a Valid Pureblood, was born with a silver-spoon and was forced to undergo the Sense augmentations as a baby to surpass her peers. She can't even remember a time without a "Hud", and has "never" been wrong in her life. Sai, invalid Pureblood and son of a "War Hero", he has been trained all his life and ironically his passion for make up started from covering up his bruises. With his father's deep roots within the Imperialist, he struggles to express his true self. 
Together they take on the burdens of society together, unaware of an even darker adventure they are about to be forced to partake.

Title: Wish-Fulfilling System
Synopsis:
On Earth, it always seems like people have everything figured out. Perhaps they have talent or a set of optimistic goals. In the worst scenario, they would at least have a sense of self. In such a world, Buyao Lian is a misfit. He's cynical and lacks any understanding of himself. Despite wild ambitions, Lian also lacks the courage to do anything. This... is until a bizarre encounter he has on one fateful night. Join Lian on his journey of self-discovery, immortality, and complete mastery of all skills human-kind has to offer!
Other useful information:
Side-note: the goal of this novel is to explore the themes of growing up in the current generation, understanding ones' self, and facing one's fears. But, there's also some some entertaining aspects like the system, skills, comedy, and adventure. Hope you enjoy!

Title: I'm Not the Demon Princess!
Synopsis:
With the demon king and his army finally defeated, humanity is close to finding its long-desired peace. Only one danger remains, in the form of his daughter, the sole survivor of the demon king's family.Thousands hunt for the princess' head. Some desire the generous bounty placed on her, others dream of fame and power. Little did they know she was already among them, hiding right in front of their eyes.
?————-???————-?
Consider this a work-in-progress. If you have any advice, any wishes or critics, anything you want to see or not to see in the story: use the comment section. I will take it into consideration.

Title: Then I Don't Exist Here Either
Synopsis: She doesn't exist. Not anywhere or anytime. She feels no happiness or love or hope or sadness or remorse. The world is spinning, leaving her in the dust to rot and disappear. She is only a lump of flesh, trudging through mountains of snow and treacherous terrian; fragments of her lost memory leaving a trail behind her...

Title: The Third Prototype
Synopsis:
What if there's third person that become the Prototype besides Alex and James?
Why do we never heard of his name?
What if he was sent to another world instead?
Well, this is his story
The story of the third "Prototype"
But in another world
=======================================================================================
Based very loosely on Prototype and Prototype 2 video games

Title: The Adventure Of White Cat
Synopsis:
White Cat, an adventurer party that is trying to make a name for themselves.
Will they make it or Will they break?
 
 
Disclaimer: I don't own the drawing on the cover.

Title: The Royal Jerosian
Synopsis:
He is known by many names and has been alive since the world was still young. There are many tales about him, but none come close to the truth. 
 
For he is THE ROYAL JEROSIAN
 
••••••••Warning••••••••
Some of you may be offended, But I am trying to portray a world that is In the infant stages. Where the strong rule. Where civilization is beginning to develop, where various races and species will be born and be extinguished in the struggle to survive. Where morals and righteousness will only get oneself killed faster. A world that cannot be avoided. And a boy who struggles to survive in this harsh world.
 
I will be blunt, and at times I may not make sense, but please bear with me for I am a newbie novel writer that is doing this as a hobby.

Title: Phantasmal Party
Synopsis:
In the two weeks since he first entered the Labyrinth, Eduard Fergusson has gained the patronage of one of the Five Families, three powerful companions and lovers and a unique and powerful Shard.
Unfortunately, he also managed to gain a powerful and perssistant enemy in the form of his former party member, Kevin, and in Kevin's mysterious new master.
The first ten floors of the Labyrinth are behind him now, but the road to the fiftieth floor, and the mystery of his sister's disappearance is long and arduous, and there is no telling where the Questshard called "The Luck of Sindbad" will take him next.
Book 1 of Phantasmal Party
Cover art by Erez Regev

Title: Chronicles of the Radiant God
Synopsis: My first life was mediocre when dying young, in this life I will become the owner of my destiny.Praise and adore me in this world!I will reach the pinnacle of this existence, I am a God!------------------------------------------------------------It is the story of a young man reincarnated in the body of a young master, as he expands his territory and converts it into a kingdom.It is the history of the creation of a church and its faithful begin to praise him in the different lower planes and he becomes the RADIANT GOD.

Title: Scion of Shadows
Synopsis:
For a normal girl from Armorica, studying at the prestigious Academy of Magical Arts in Ys is a big deal. But Madeleine discovers that she isn't as ordinary as she thought. And when a mysterious stranger offers to keep her secrets in exchange for loyalty, she accepts. Now it's up to her and her new friends -- noble and conceited Gaius and smart and down-to-earth Cleopatra --to figure out what to do when the fate of Ys and maybe the whole world hangs in the balance.
 
Cover image comes from http://julijaaa.deviantart.com. Used without permission (for now).

Title: ILLICIT
Synopsis:
Young man Kuss,living his ordinary life,suddenly wants something new in his life.Not the every boring day he is facing,not the future everyone gets to,but something different.As a normal guy,he has nothing special,yet wants to spend his life for something.
What is that something that he wants,and what is that something that comes his way ...
Without even dreaming about it,he is going to face something that he never hoped nor dreamed about.

Title: Construct Your Fate
Synopsis:
What would you do if you could suddenly do anything?
Lucas Creo finds himself alone and clueless when The Construct arrives. What he was before doesn't matter any longer. Talents, Skills, Perks, and Levels are how he will Construct his Fate, for better or for worse.
Follow Lucas on his path with an atypical weapon choice, a penchant for crafting Talents, and a gratuitous amount of puns.
The cover art for this story is done by my best friend https://bkalicky.artstation.com/ ! You should go check him out he makes lots of cool stuff! If you like it enough, he takes commissions! His contact info is on the site!
A big thank you to the user Azorath1234, he helps me keep all my numbers straight in the story! :) This story wouldn't be as good, or accurate, without him!

Title: The Interlude Thief
Synopsis: Edward is one of the first public users to get the Interlude FIRE [Full Immersion Reality Experience] Crown, a full immersion virtual reality implant. He discovers the intricacies of this new technology are deeper than anything currently on the market. While exploring the City on the Endless Isle of New Amsterdam, he finds something that will forever change his experience in Interlude Online!

Synopsis:
Wake up, eat, collect, eat, clean, learn, eat, sleep.
Wake up, eat, collect, eat, clean, learn, eat, sleep.

Title: Eos Project: I'm A Phonie. Per Se~
Synopsis:
Sophie's always lived a relatively free-willed life as the daughter of the Ashwit family and the nomadic Eflish chief's daughter. She's spent her life studying the nuances of magic and discovering the various vices of the world, much to her father's pleasure and displeasure.
Yes, her mother dropped her off and never came back. Yes, the Ashwit family runs a drug cartel, but those are small things. Her wonderful sister Maire can take over the finance records, and her overly-ambitious brother can take over the family business. Or, that's what the plan was.
Unfortunately for her, Sophie's achievements have left her in a pivotal position for succession, and her siblings certainly aren't a fan of that.
A/N: Why the hell does RR not have a Villan-Lead tag?!

Title: Black Iron & Cinder
Synopsis:
Black Iron & Cinder is complete and will no longer be updated except for important announcements. If you're interested, consider purchasing the published version on Amazon, which is a brand new revision with error fixes and approximately 2000 more words in length.
Also, please check out my newest fiction, The Wolf of Asano.
Six months ago, a colorless miasma swept across the entire northern section of the continent of Yhordran, creating a vast army of undead that lurks within its boundaries. In an attempt to encourage citizens to help restore order, the crown creates a public organization called the "Mistwalkers", made of individuals who register to venture into the mysterious fog to discover and stop its source.
A foreign knight in self-exile from his home is one of those Mistwalkers, and on a desperate journey for meaning, he steps into the grey abyss with the company of Yhordran natives to make his way 400 miles north to reach the plague's epicenter.

Title: Above All
Synopsis:
"In a world where strength rules supreme. All beings shall bow before the strong."This is the golden rule of all mortals who wish to take the path of martial arts or wizardry and defy the will of the heavens.Those who do not obey this rule will suffer a miserable fate worse than death.
Arthur, a 13 year old boy who has encountered a strange occurrence during his early childhood, is forcedto undertake the tribulation of the heavens.
Follow him and watch as he tries to become the one who stands above all.

Title: A Human As A Demon Lord
Synopsis:
The story follows Patience, a human picked up by the Demon King.
After being raised as one of their own he is given a position as one of the Seven Demon Lords a war breaks out between Humans, and Demons.
He is forced to face countless enemies, monsters, and heroes, in order to protect the kingdom that he considers his home

Title: THE MUTANT LORD
Synopsis: A OP character that doesn't want to be a hero, he isn't a hero, he could even be a anti hero. -------------------------------------------------If you don't like OP characters, this might not be for you. ( not telling you not to read, just that you might not like it )

Title: World of Dreams
Synopsis:
In 2017, a meteor hit Earth and gave people the abilities only found in fiction in the form of their Dreams. Dust from the meteor called Dream Energy spread and infiltrated the whole world resulting in a society based on super powered people and Dream Energy. Now, people face the threats of evil humans, Nightmares and life in such society.
Our Mc is a person who has weak stats but an ability called "CopyCat"

Title: I, the CEO have to Farm to Survive?
Synopsis: They say once the apocalypse begins, living things will gain powers as a mean to survive. The world will once again reverts to 'the strongest will rule the world' law again. What a bunch of crap! In the end by being the descendants of the Ho clan will you be above others. What about me, you asked? I happen to be one ... hehe.

Title: Anything For The Crown
Synopsis:
An old emperor said to his son, "remember, anything for the crown". 
An epic tale of political struggle and moral darkness of humanity.

Title: Esper
Synopsis:
Hey, the author here. As this is a side-project I'm not entirely sure what to write for a synopsis. All I can say is to read the prologue, it'll explain most of what you'd need to know.

Title: Martial artist on a Mage World
Synopsis: A martial artist was left alone on a magical world. What will happen to him.

Title: What Are You Going To Do Kill Me?
Synopsis:
Jin Bang had never felt like  he belonged anywhere so when he was killed by truck and told he'll be moving to a fantasy world deep inside he felt hopeful at the prospect.
You'd think this was an intentional "accident" but when the god ends up realising he DIDN'T kill a Japanese High School student and instead killed a 21 year old Chinese man our protagonist was given a power entirely at random.
And it was basically Destiny Bond. So if the one fighting him kills him they also die. Not the best of abilities.
Still... in this strange land he begins to feel a sense of familiarity... like he's finally home.
Now all he has to do is earn his freedom.

Title: The Demon Lord Isn't The Bad Guy?!
Synopsis:
[A/N: Good lord it's been awhile. Has my writing always been this... unbearable? Hm~ However... this concept does still resonate with me. I might return to it one day. Otherwise, it will be on an indefinite hiatus. Sorry for all the trouble!].


Cecilia was killed and is reincarnated in a different world. How was she killed? By a truck.
The truck carried the foretold hero, Leonhart, the person who will defeat the demon lord and bring back peace. Hooray.
Problem, the hero is a girl. Why is this a problem? This world is corrupted! Slavery and women oppression is still a thing! 
Another problem! Cecilia was supposed to be a girl, but she was turned into a guy?!
More problems! Why so many problems?! Celicia just wants to learn magic in this fantasy world! Why is she being dragged along?!

Title: Death by Ex-Girlfriend
Synopsis:
Meet Osamu Ashikaga. He returns to Kyoto after 4 years away, expecting a short trip down memory lane...only to be kidnapped by one of his ex-girlfriends. But it's not just one, Osamu has several crazy dames vying for his heart, and sometimes his blood. Despite the obsessive, psychotic, and sometimes violent behavior of his exes, the simple fact of the matter is that a web of love binds them all. As they all begin to live under the same roof, is it possible for Osamu to reconnect with his exes and rekindle the flames of painfully lost love? Death by Ex-Girlfriend is ultimately a story of how far Osamu and his crazy little family of exes are willing to go for themselves and for each other. This long story begins with the first arc, Aika Crisis.In Aika Crisis, the star of the story is Aika Mihara, one of Osamu's exes. Things have changed dramatically in the 4 years Osamu has been away, including Aika's heart. How much anger, love, and misery can be bottled up in just 4 years? Enough to kill you. Osamu and his not-so-sane exes try to save Aika's life before it can ever be in danger. But sometimes, love stops giving you things and begins taking them away, without mercy.
It's funny, it's crude, it's sexy, it's endearing. It's Death by Ex-Girlfriend.

Title: Bitter Smile
Synopsis:
Everyone will someday experience liking someone, especially if they consider that person very important to them. While some started liking another through time and memories, there are others that happened to be by simple everyday contact. There are also some that show them liking someone by teasing and other actions.
Follow the bitter-sweet thing called love from the points of view from different people, situations and reasons why they believe they are in love.

Title: The Institute and Me
Synopsis: Follow Myr, a noble boy at day, and an unamed female assassin at night as they shape the world around them, one sword slash at a time.Total Current Word Count: 13268

Title: Great Green Empire
Synopsis: (this is a empire building novel) Year 2040 the world sent into chaos! The CDC or which also dubbed as Zombie Deer Disease evolve and turn humans and other living being turn into zombie's (flesh) Rance a child who learned Spear since he's 5, fight in order to survive. One day the God descend and said "The portal to a new world is open! a portal to a new life do exist. My children, the south pole is your hope". Rance : " a new world? is there magic? i hope so." what await him is better than what he thinks. Not only magic, but also Gene Merging?!.??

Title: A Powerful Duke In Another world
Synopsis:
Sorai Hiroto, a 24-year-old guy was killed in a road accident. Meeting the god and having too much regret on himself, God Origin grants him another life. He now has to start in a cliche isekai novel like starting and vows to live a life he wanted with all his childhood fantasies that became a reality in this new world.
Lyon Purgarian, a 13-year-old child who became a duke after his father's death is killed by the most unexpected foe, his aunt. Our protagonist gets reincarnated in his body to continue living as Lyon. Can he enjoy his life like he vowed or he would end up having regrets in this life as well?
